ssw: kulomnyaka lowengcile, sihlangabetane nekufadalala kwemnotfo kwekucala eminyakeni leli-17.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sibhekane nokuphelelwa ngamandla komnotho wethu okokuqala ngqa eminyakeni eyi-17.

ssw: lenkinga iholele ekutseni umnotfo wetfu ulahlekelwe imisebenti lengu-900 000. linyenti lalabalahlekelwe yimisebenti yabo ngilabo labondla imindeni lephuyile.
zul: le nkinga iholele ekulahlekeni kwemisebenzi eyi-900 000. abaningi balabo abalahlekelwa yimisebenzi kwakuyibona abondla imindeni edla imbuya ngothi.

ssw: ngendlovana kulomnyaka lowengcile, hulumende, emabhizimisi, tisebenti nalabamele ummango bavumelana ngetindlela letihlanganisile tekunciphisa umtselela waletiyaluyalu tetemnotfo.
zul: ngonhlolanja kofile, uhulumeni, abamele amabhizinisi, abasebenzi kanye nomphakathi bavumelana ngeqoqo lezinyathelo zokunciphisa umthelela kanye nobukhulu bale nkinga.

ssw: sibeke linyenti laletindlela.
zul: sisebenzise eziningi zalezi zinyathelo.

ssw: silandzele tincumo leticinile tekulwa nekufadalala kwemnotfo ngekucondzisa emalini lechitfwa nguhulumende, kakhulukati kusakhiwonchanti.
zul: siqalisile ukusebenzisa indlela yokuchitha imali kuhulumeni elwisana nokuphelelwa ngamandla komnotho, kakhulukazi kwingqalasizinda.

ssw: kucinisekisa kuphepha kwalabaphuyile, sichubekisele embili kwandziswa kwemali yetibonelelo, saphindze selula iminyaka yeluhlelo lwesondlo sebantfwana yayewufika eminyakeni yebudzala lengu-14.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuvikeleka kwabadla imbuya ngothi, sisheshe senza ukukhushulwa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni, saphinda sanyusa iminyaka yezingane ezihola izibonelelo zikahulumeni zezingane zaba ngaphezu kweminyaka eyi-14 ubudala.

ssw: kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako, labanye bantfwana labatigidzi letimbili labavela emindenini lephuyile, labaneminyaka lengu-15 kuya ku-18, batawuhlomula kuloluhlelo lwesondlo sebantfwana.
zul: eminyakeni emithathu ezayo, ezinye izingane ezingaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili eziqhamuka emindenini kanye nasemakhaya adla imbuya ngothi ezineminyaka eyi-15 kuya kweyi-18 zizohlomula kusibonelelo sikahulumeni sezingane.

ssw: inhlangano yekutfutfukiswa kwetimboni ibekele eceleni imali lengemarandi langemabhiliyoni lasitfupha kute kusitwe tinkampani lesetidvonsa matima.
zul: isikhungo sokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni sibeke eceleni imali eyizigidigidi eziyisithupha zamarandi ukusiza izinkampani ezikhahlamezekile.

ssw: luhlelo lwekucecesha?
zul: uhlelo lukuqeqeshwa emsebenzini?

ssw: lolutawuniketa tisebenti litfuba lekukhetsa kuceceshwa endzaweni yekudzilitwa emsebentini.
zul: ukunikeza abasebenzi ithuba lokuqeqeshwa kunokudilizwa.

ssw: sive sitawukhumbula kutsi ngesikhatsi senkhulumo leyetfulelwa sive nga-2009, ngimemetele kutsi luhlelo lwekwandzisa imisebenti yemphakatsi lutawusungula ematfuba emisebenti langu-500 000 ngengongoni 2009. lawa ngematfuba emisebenti lasungulwe kute anikete bantfu labangasebenti liholo, lwati lwemsebenti kanye nematfuba ekuceceshwa.
zul: le mizamo yenziwa ngcono wuhlelo lwemisebenzi yomphakathiisizwe sizokhumbula ukuthi kunkulumo echaza isimo sezwe yonyaka we-2009, ngamemezela ukuthi uhlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi luzovula amathuba emisebenzi ayi-500 000 ngozibandlela ka-2009.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile, takhamiti teleningizimu afrika,kuyintfokoto kumemetela kutsi ekupheleni kwengongoni, besesisungule ematfuba emisebenti yemmango lengu-480 00, lokungemaphesenti langema-97% elinani lesitibekele lona.
zul: lawa mathuba emisebenzi akhelwe ukunikeza abantu abangasebenzi amasentshana, isipiliyoni somsebenzi kanye namathuba okuqeqeshwa.

ssw: lemisebenti isemikhakheni yekwakha, kunakekela bantfu emakhaya nasemmangweni, kanye nemiklamo yetemvelo.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, bantu baseningizimu afrika,sinenjabulo yokubika ukuthi ekupheleni kukazibandlela, bese sakhe amathuba emisebenzi yomphakathi angaphezu kwe-480 000, nokungamaphesenti angama-97 omkhawulo esasizibekele wona.

ssw: sibone letinye tindzawo lesingenta ncono kuto, letitawukhomba kuchubekela embili, kufaka ekhatsi kucinisekisa imiklamo lebukene netisebenti.
zul: imisebenzi yakhiwe ezindaweni ezifana nezokwakha, onompilo bomphakathi kanye nabasemakhaya, kanye nasezinhlelweni zezemvelo.

ssw: siyati kutsi leti naletinye tindlela tanciphisa ngalokuphelele imitselela yekufadalala kwemnotfo.
zul: sihlonze ezinye izindawo ezidinga ukwenziwa ngcono ezizoba nomthelela kwinqubekela phambili, okubandakanya ezinye izinhlelo ezisebenzisa abasebenzi abaningi.

ssw: siyabonga ngemoya wekusebenta kwemndeni, kwemmango nekutitsandzela lokhutsata bantfu labanyenti kutsi basite labo labakhungetfwe nguletiyaluyalu tetemnotfo, ngaletikhatsi letimatima.
zul: siyabonga ngomoya womndeni, womphakathi kanye nomsebenzi wobuvolontiya ogqugquzele abantu abaningi ukusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe yile nkinga, kulezi zikhathi ezinzima.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,tinkhomba tetemnotfo tikhomba kutsi sesigucule simo nyalo.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,izinkomba zomnotho zikhombisa ukuthi sesiyaphuma manje kule nkinga.

ssw: umnyakato wetemnotfo uyenyuka eningizimu afrika, kantsi silindzele kukhula lokuya embili.
zul: imisebenzi yezomnotho iyakhula eningizimu afrika futhi silindele ukukhula ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

ssw: tibalo tetisebenti letikhishwe ngelesibili, tikhombisa kutsi nyalo umnotfo sewusungule ematfuba emisebenti kunekutsi ilahleke.
zul: izibalo zabasebenzi ezikhishwe ngolwesibili, zikhombisa ukuthi manje umnotho wakha imisebenzi kunokuyiqeda.

ssw: nanobe kunjalo, kusesemasinya kakhulu kucinisekisa litubane lekubuyela esimeni sangembili.
zul: kusesekuseni kodwa ukuba nesiqiniseko ngesivinini sokusimama kwawo.

ssw: ngako hulumende ngete atihocisa tindlela takhe tekwesekela.
zul: ngakho-ke uhulumeni ngeke azihoxise izinyathelo zakhe zokweseka.

ssw: nyalo sesikhatsi sekubeka sisekelo sekukhula lokucinile lokuya embili, kanye nekukhula lokuletsa imisebenti leminyenti.
zul: manje sekuyisikhathi sokwakha umsebenzi oyisisekelo sokukhula ngokuqina njengoba siphikelele phambili, kanye nomnotho okhulisa amathuba emisebenzi.

ssw: tinhlelo tesakhiwonchanti setfu sesikhatsi lesidze titasisita kutsi sikhule ngekunonopha.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lwesikhathi eside lwengqalasizinda luzosisiza ukuthi sikhule ngesivinini.

ssw: tinhlelo tetfu tetemfundvo netemakhono titakwandzisa kukhicita kanye nekuncintsisana kwetfu.
zul: izinhlelo zethu zezemfundo kanye namakhono zizokhulisa ukukhiqiza kwethu kanye nokuncintisana.

ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwenchubomgomo lesebenta kutetimboni nekugcila kwetfu lokusha emisebentini lephelele, kutakwakha timboni leticinile naletemukela tisebenti letinyenti.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokusebenza lwenqubomgomo yezimboni kanye nokugxila kwethu emisebenzini yemvelo luzokwakha izimboni eziqinile futhi eziqasha abasebenzi abaningi.

ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya titakwenta ngcono umkhicito wasemakhaya, kanye netemphilo tebantfu labahlala etindzaweni tasemakhaya.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuthuthukisa izindawo zasemakhaya luzokwenza ngcono ukukhiqiza ezindaweni zasemakhaya, kanye nezimpilo zabantu abahlala ezindaweni zasemakhaya.

ssw: lokwesekela lisu letfu lekubuyisela umnotfo esimeni lesetayelekile nasekukhuliseni, luhlelo lwetfu lwekusisa ngetimali.
zul: isisekelo seqhinga lethu lokusimama kanye nokukhula komnotho, wuhlelo lwethu lokutshala izimali.

ssw: kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako, hulumende utawuchitsa imali lengemabhiliyoni emarandi langu-846 kusakhiwonchanti semmango.
zul: eminyakeni emithathu ezayo, uhulumeni uzochitha izigidigidi ezingama-846 zamarandi kwizingqalasizinda zomphakathi.

ssw: kutekutfutsa, sitawugcina siphindze senabise umsebenti wetfu wekuchumanisa tindzawo ngemigwaco.
zul: kwezokuthutha, sizokhanda futhi sisabalalise ubuxhakaxhaka bemigwaqo yethu.

ssw: sitawucinisekisa kutsi kuchumanisa kwetfu kwetindzawo ngaloliwe kuyetsembeka, futsi kuhlanganiswe kancono nemachweba etfu.
zul: sizokwenza isiqiniseko ukuthi ubuxhakaxhaka bemizila yethu ehamba izitimela ithembekile, iyancintisana futhi ididiyelwe kahle nezikhumulo zethu zemikhumbi.

ssw: kute kucinisekiswe kuniketwa kwemandla agezi, sisungule likomiti letindvuna lelibukene netemandla, kute kwentiwe luhlelo loluhlanganisile lweminyaka lengama-20.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuphakelwa kukagesi okuthembekile, sakhe ikomidi likagesi elakhiwe ngongqongqoshe, ukuthuthukisa uhlelo oludidiyelwe lwemithombo lweminyaka engama-20.

ssw: phakatsi kwaletinye tintfo, loku kutawubuka ekutibandzakanyeni kwebakhiciti bemandla labatimele, nasekuvikeleni labaphuyile ekwenyukeni kwemanani agezi.
zul: phakathi kwezinye izinto, lokhu kuzobheka ekubambeni iqhaza kwabakhiqizi bakagesi abazimele, kanye nokuvikela abadla imbuya ngothi kumanani kagesi akhuphukayo.

ssw: sitawusungula luhlelo lwekusebenta ngagezi lolutimele, lolwehlukile ku-eskom holdings.
zul: sizosungula umlawuli wohlelo oluzimele, olungahlangene nenkampani yakwa-eskom.

ssw: eskom utawuchubeka nekwakha lamanye emandla ekukhicita emandla agezi aphindze ente ncono simo setiteshi takhe tagezi.
zul: u-eskom uzoqhubeka nokwakha ezinye iziphehlo zokukhiqiza ugesi kanye nokwenza ngcono ukukhandwa kweziteshi zokuphehlwa kukagesi.

ssw: kucinisekisa kukhuliswa kwemnotfo lohlanganisako, kute sisite kukhula nentfutfuko, sisungule umkhandlu loweluleka ngeluhlelo lolwenabile lwekuniketa labamnyama emandla kutemnotfo, loluholwa ngumengameli.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukukhuthazwa komnotho ofaka wonke umuntu, ukusiza ukukhula kanye nokuthuthuka, sibuye sakha umkhandlu wokwelulela ohlelweni olunabile lokuthuthukiswa kwabamnyama kwezomnotho, kanti usihlalo wawongumongameli.

ssw: kugcila kwetfu lokukhulu ekuguculeni inchubomgomo kumele kube kungenela ekusunguleni imisebenti yebantfu labasha.
zul: lapho esizogxila khona ezinguqukweni zenqubomgomo kufanele kube wukungenelela ekwakheni imisebenzi yentsha.

ssw: emazinga ekungasebenti kwebantfu labasha angetulu kakhulu kunelizinga lelilingene.
zul: amazinga entsha entula imisebenzi makhulu kakhulu kunokujwayelekile.

ssw: tiphakamiso titawubekwa kute kusitwe ngetimali etindlekweni tekucasha tisebenti talabasha, kute kukhutsatwe emafemu kutsi atsatse tisebenti letite lwati lwemsebenti lolwenele.
zul: iziphakamiso zizondlalwa ukuxhasa ezindlekweni zokuqasha abasebenzi abancane, ukukhuthaza amafemu ukuthi aqashe abasebenzi abangenaso isipiliyoni.

ssw: lokunye kwelulwa kwetinhlelo temisebenti yemmango nako kuyachutjwa.
zul: okunye ukusatshalaliswa kwezinhlelo zokuqashwa komphakathi seziqalile.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi sakhiwonchanti ezingeni lasekhaya nemiklamo lemikhulu kanye nemiklamo yekukwati kufundza nekubhala, kunakekela kwasemakhaya, kugcinwa kwetikolo kanye nemitamo yekukhulisa bantfwana labasebancane.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ingqalasizinda yendawo kanye nezinhlelo zemfundo ephakeme kanye nezokufunda, ukunakekelwa emakhaya, ukulungiswa kwezikole kanye nezinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane.

ssw: kulomnyaka lowengcile sisukumise sikhungo sekutfutfukisa lusha lwavelonkhe.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sathula inhlangano kazwelonke yokuthuthukiswa kwentsha.

ssw: siyalele loluphiko kutsi lusungule imitimba yalo, eliveni lonkhe, kute lutewukwati kusita ekucondziseni tinhlelo tekutfutfukisa ngekhatsi kuhulumende.
zul: sijube inhlangano ukuthi isebenze ngokushesha ukwakha izinhlaka zayo, ezweni lonke, ukuze sikwazi ukufaka izinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwentsha kuhulumeni.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,ngalesikhatsi baphatsi bacala kuphatsa emnyakeni lowengcile, sitsembise kusebenta ngemandla kute sakhe umbuso lotfutfuke ngemandla.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,ngesikhathi lo hulumeni uthatha izintambo ngonyaka ofile, sazinikela ekusebenzeni ngokuzikhandla ukwakha umbuso othuthukayo oqinile.

ssw: sitsite kutakuba ngumbuso lophendvula etidzingweni nasetifisweni tebantfu, nalosebenta kancono nangekunonopha.
zul: sathi kuyoba umbuso ophendula kwizidingo kanye nezifiso zabantu, futhi osebenza kangcono futhi ngokushesha.

ssw: lomnyaka, wa-2010, kutakuba ngumnyaka wekwenta.
zul: lo nyaka we-2010 kufanele kube ngunyaka wokusebenza.

ssw: luphawu loluchaza lokuphatsa kutakuba ngulolo lwekutsi kuyati lapho bantfu bahlala khona, kuvisisa tidzingo tabo futsi kuphendvula ngekunonopha.
zul: into eyenza lohulumeni uhluke ukuthi uyazi ukuthi abantu bahlala kuphi, uyaziqonda izindingo zabo, futhi uphendula ngokushesha.

ssw: hulumende kumele asebente ngekunonopha, ngemandla nangekuhlakanipha.
zul: uhulumeni kufanele asebenze ngokushesha, ngokuzikhandla futhi ngobuchule.

ssw: sitawulindzela sigungu lesiphetse kanye nemsebenti wahulumende kutsi bahambisane nalombono.
zul: sizolindela isigungu esiphezulu kanye nabasebenzi bakahulumeni ukuthi bathobele lo mbono.

ssw: sakha umbuso logcile ekusebenteni, ngekwenta ncono kuhlela kanye netinhlelo tekulandzelela kusebenta nekulinganisa.
zul: sakha umbuso ogxile ekusebenzeni, ngokwenza ngcono ukuhlela kanye nokuqapha nokuhlola indlela okusetshenzwa ngayo.

ssw: kumele futsi sihlanganise tindlela tekulinganisa kutebulili eluhlelweni lwahulumende lwekwenta.
zul: sidinga futhi ududidiyela izinyathelo zokulingana ngokobulili ohlelweni lokusebenza lukahulumeni.

ssw: loluhlelo lwekwenta lutawucinisekisa kutsi bomake, bantfwana nebantfu labakhubatekile bakwati kufinyelela kumatfuba ekutitfutfukisa.
zul: lesi sinyathelo sizoqinisekisa ukuthi abesimame, izingane kanye nabantu abakhubazekile bayakwazi ukuthola amathuba entuthuko.

ssw: sinentfokoto yekumemetela indlela lensha yekwenta tintfo kuhulumende.
zul: siyajabula ukwethula indlela entsha yokwenza izinto kuhulumeni.

ssw: umsebenti wematiko utawukalwa ngemiphumela, letfutfukiswe ngeluhlelo lwetfu lwekulandzelela kusebenta nekulinganisa.
zul: imisebenzi yeminyango izokalwa ngemiphumela ethuthukiswe ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuqapha nokuhlola indlela okusetshenzwa ngayo.

ssw: tindvuna letibukene nemphumela lotsite, titawusayina namengameli sivumelwano lesichaza ngalokubanti ngekusebenta kwato.
zul: ongqongqoshe abanomsebenzi womphumela othile bazosayina isivumelwano esibanzi nomongameli.

ssw: lesivumelwano sitawuchaza kutsi yini lokumele yentiwe, kanjani, ngubani, esikhatsini lesinganani nekutsi ngutiphi tindlela tekukala kanye netinsita letitawusetjentiswa.
zul: sizobalula ukuthi yini okufanele yenziwe, kanjani, ngubani, esikhathini esingakanani futhi kusetshenziswa kuphi ukukala kanye nezinsiza.

ssw: njengobe nati, sitibophetele etintfweni letisihlanu letisetulu eluhlwini: imfundvo, temphilo, kutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya, kusungula imisebenti lemihle kanye nekulwa nebugebengu.
zul: njengoba nazi, sizibophezele emisebenzini emihlanu eseqhulwini: ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nokuhlelwa kabusha komhlaba, ukwakha imisebenzi ehloniphekile kanye nokulwa nobugebengu.

ssw: ngetulu kwaloko, sitawusebentela kwenta ncono kusebenta kahle kwahulumende wasemakhaya, kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti kanye nekuhlaliswa kwebantfu.
zul: phezu kwalokhu, sizosebenzela ukwenza ngcono indlela asebenza ngayo uhulumeni wasekhaya, ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kanye nokuhlaliswa kwabantu.

ssw: sitsembisa kwenta iminyakato leyinsika lelibangise ekutfolweni kwalemiphumela.
zul: sizoqala imisebenzi eminingana ekubhekeni ukufeza le miphumela.

ssw: sibeke imfundvo nekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono enkhabeni yetinchubomgomo talohulumende.
zul: kuhlelo lwethu lonyaka we-2010 sifuna ukwenza ngcono ikhono lezingane zethu lokufunda, ukubhala, ukubala eminyakeni yemfundo eyisisekelo.

ssw: ngaphandle kwekwenta loku, singete sakwati kwenta ncono lizinga lemfundvo.
zul: ngaphandle uma senza lokhu, ngeke sikwazi ukwenza ngcono izinga lemfundo.

ssw: tibalo temfundvo lesitibekele tona timalula kodvwa tinebungoti.
zul: imikhawulo yemfundo esizibekele yona ilula kodwa ibalulekile.

ssw: sifuna bafundzi nemathishela babe sesikolweni, eklasini, ngesikhatsi, bafundza futsi bafundzisa ema-awa lasikhombisa ngelusuku.
zul: sifuna othisha nabafundi babe sesikoleni, emagunjini okufundela, ngesikhathi, befunda futhi befundisa amahora ayisikhombisa ngosuku.

ssw: sitawusita bothishela ngekubanikela luhlelo lwetifundvo lwemalanga onkhe loluchaza kabanti.
zul: sizosiza othisha ngokubanikeza izinhlelo zesifundo sosuku ezinqala.

ssw: kubafundzi, sitawuniketela ngetincwadzi temsebenti lokumalula kutisebentisa letibhalwe ngato tonkhe tilwimi letili-11.
zul: kubafundi, sizobanikeza izincwadi okulula ukuzisebenzisa ngezilimi eziyi 11. kusukela kulo nyaka kuya phambili, bonke abafundi bebanga lesithathu, lesithupha kanye nelesishiyagalolunye bazobhala ukuhlolwa kwelitheresi kanye nezibalo okuhlelwe ngokuzimela.

ssw: sihlose kwenyusa lizinga lekuphumelela laletivivinyo kwanyalo lelisemkhatsini kwama-35 na-40% kuyewufinyelela lokungenani kuma-60% nga-2014.
zul: sihlose ukukhuphula izinga lokuphasa kulokhu kuhlolwa elisuka phakathi kwamaphesenti angama-35 kuya kwangama-40 eya okungenani kumaphesenti angama-60 ngonyaka we-2014.

ssw: imiphumela itawutfunyelwa kubatali kute balandzelele inchubekelembili.
zul: imiphumela iyothunyelelwa abazali ukubheka inqubekela phambili.

ssw: ngetulu kwaloko, ngasinye setikolo tetfu letingu-27 000 sitawuhlolwa tikhulu telitiko lemfundvo lesisekelo.
zul: phezu kwalokhu, isikole ngasinye ezikoleni eziyi-2700 sizohlolwa ngumhloli ophuma emnyangweni wemfundo eyisisekelo.

ssw: loku kutawurekhodwa embikweni lobhaliwe locwaningekako.
zul: lokhu kuyoqoshwa kumbiko obhaliwe olungisekayo.

ssw: sihlose kwenyusa linani lebafundzi bamatikuletjeni labakhona kwemukelwa emanyuvesi kutsi lifinyelele ku-175 000 ngemnyaka nga-2014.
zul: sihlose ukukhulisa isibalo sabafundi bebanga leshumi abamukelekayo emanyuvesi nge-175 000 ngonyaka we-2014.

ssw: sicela kutsi batali babambisane natsi ekwenteni loku kube yimphumelelo.
zul: sinxusa abazali ukuthi babambisane nathi ukwenza lokhu impumelelo.

ssw: semukela sitatimende semnyaka lowengcile lesakhishwa tinhlangano temathishela letintsatfu, naptosa, sadtu ne-saou, sekucinisa futsi nekutibophetela kwabo emkhankasweni wekufundza nekufundzisa lokusezingeni leliphakeme kusukela ekucaleni kwa-2010.
zul: siyasamukela isitatimende esithulwe yizinyunyana ezintathu zothisha, i-naptosa, sadtu kanye ne-saou, begcizelela ukuzinikela kwabo emkhankasweni wokufundisa nokufunda okuqotho ekuqaleni konyaka we-2010.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,kumele sisise kulusha lwetfu kute sicinisekise kutsi sinetisebenti letinemakhono naletikwatiko kusebenta kute kwesekelwe kukhula nekusungulwa kwemisebenti.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sidinga ukutshala entsheni yethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bangabasebenzi abanamakhono futhi abakwaziyo ukusebenza ukusekela ukukhula kanye nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi.

ssw: ngaloko sihlela kwandzisa kuceceshwa kwalabaneminyaka yebudzala lengu-16-25 etikhungweni temfundvo nekucecesha.
zul: ngakho-ke sihlela ukuqeqesha intsha eneminyaka eyi-16 kuya kwengama-25 ezikhungweni zokuqeqeshwa kanye nokuqhutshezwa kwemfundo.

ssw: loku kutasenta sikwati kuniketa imfundvo litfuba lesibili, kulabo labangakulungeli kuya emanyuvesi.
zul: lokhu kuzosenza sikwazi ukunikeza ithuba lesibili lemfundo kulabo, abangenayo imiphumela efanele yokubangenisa enyuvesi.

ssw: sisebentisana netikhungo temfundvo lephakeme kute kucinisekiswe kutsi bafundzi labakulungele batfola lusito lwetimali, ngeluhlelo lwavelonkhe lwekusita bafundzi ngetimali.
zul: sisebenza nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi abafanele bathola usizo lwezezimali, ngokusebenzisa isikhwama sikazwelonke sokusiza abafundi ngezimali.

ssw: siphindze satibekela emanani ekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono, kute kukhicitwe labanye bonjiniyela nabochwepheshe, kuphindze kwenyuswe linani labothishela labakufanele kufundzisa tibalo nesayensi.
zul: siphinde sazibekela imikhawulo ethile yokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, ukukhiqiza abanye onjiniyela kanye nochwepheshe, kanye nokukhulisa isibalo sothisha abaneziqu zezibalo kanye nesayensi.

ssw: kumele futsi senyuse linani lalabasha labangenela tinhlelo tekufundza ngemisebenti emikhakheni letimele nasemkhakheni wahulumende.
zul: kufanele siphinde sikhulise isibalo sentsha eqeqeshelwa imisebenzi emikhakheni ezimele kanye nekahulumeni.

ssw: lomunye umphumela lobalulekile kucinisekisa imphilo lendze nalekahle yato tonkhe takhamiti teleningizimu afrika.
zul: omunye umphumela obalulekile ukuqinisekisa impilo ende futhi enhle kuzo zonke izakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika.

ssw: sitawuchubeka nekwenta ncono luhlelo lwetfu lwetemphilo.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokwenza ngcono uhlelo lwethu lokunakekelwa ngezempilo.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kulungisa tibhedlela nemitfolamphilo, kanye nekwenta ncono timo tekusebenta tetisebenti tetemphilo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukwakha kanye nokulungisa izibhedlela kanye nemitholampilo, kanye nokwenza ngcono izimo zokusebenza kubasebenzi bezempilo.

ssw: sibambisene nelibhange lekutfutfukisa le-afrika leseningizimu kute kwentiwe ncono kusebenta kwetibhedlela temmango kanye nemahhovisi ato etifundza.
zul: sibambisane nebhange lentuthuko laseningizimu ne-afrika ukwenza ngcono ukusebenza kwezibhedlela zomphakathi kanye namahhovisi ezifunda.

ssw: siphindze sisebentisane nelibhange lekutfutfukisa le-afrika leseningizimu kanye nenhlangano letfutfukisa timboni, eluhlelweni lwebudlelwane kuhulumende nalabatimele kute kwentiwe ncono tibhedlela kanye nekusita imiklamo ngetimali.
zul: sisebenza ngokubambisana futhi nebhange lentuthuko laseningizimu ne-afrika kanye nenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni, kuhlelo lukahulumeni ebambisene nezimboni ezizimele ukwenza ngcono izibhedlela kanye nokusiza ngezezimali ezinhlelweni.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,kumele sibukane nekutsi umjikeleto wemphilo kusukela esikhatsini sekutalwa, wehle kusukela eminyakeni lengama-60 nga-1994 kuye wufinyelela ngephansi kweminyaka lengama-50 lamuhla.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,kufanele sibhekane neqiniso lokuthi iminyaka yokuphila kusuka uzalwa yehlile isuka kwengama-60 kuya ngaphansi kwengama-50 namhlanje.

ssw: ngako siyangenelela ngenhloso yekunciphisa emazinga ekufa kwebantfwana lababelekwako, kute kuncishiswe kwesuleleka ngesandvulelangculazi lokusha kanye nekwelashwa kwesandvulelangculazi nesifo sesifuba ngalokuyimphumelelo.
zul: ngakho-ke, siyangenelela ukwehlisa izinga lokushona kwabantwana bezalwa, ukunciphisa ukusuleleka ngesandulela ngculaza kanye nokwelapha isandulela ngculaza kanye nesifo sofuba.

ssw: sitawuphindze sinciphise kufa kwetinswane ngeluhlelo lwekugonywa kwetinswane letinyenti.
zul: sizophinda sehlise ukushona kwabantwana ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokugoma.

ssw: sitawubuyisela tinhlelo tetemphilo etikolweni.
zul: sizobuyisela izinhlelo zezempilo ezikoleni.

ssw: sitakwenta tonkhe tetsembiso lesatenta ngelusuku lwengculazi lwemhlabawonkhe letimayelana netindlela letinsha tekuvikela nekwelapha sandvulelangculazi.
zul: sizoqalisa ukusebenzisa konke ukungenelela okwenziwa ngosuku lomhlaba lwengculaza oluphathelene nezinyathelo ezintsha zokuvimbela nokwelapha isandulela ngculaza.

ssw: umsebenti uyachubeka kute kucinisekiswe kutsi umsebenti uhambisana nesikhatsi lesibekiwe.
zul: umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka ukwenza isiqinisekiso ukuthi lo msebenzi uhamba ngokohlelo.

ssw: sitawuphindze sichubeke nemalungiselelo ekusungula luhlelo lwemshwalense wetemphilo velonkhe.
zul: sizoqhubeka namalungiselelo okwakha uhlelo lomshuwalense kazwelonke wezempilo.

ssw: takhamiti taseningizimu afrika,sisebenta kamatima kucinisekisa kutsi wonkhe umuntfu eningizimu afrika utiva aphephile kanye nekutsi kuphephile.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,sisebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu eningizimu afrika uzizwa ephephile futhi kuphephile.

ssw: sitawuchubekisela embili umsebenti wetfu wekunciphisa bugebengu lobukhulu nalobuneludlame, siphindze sicinisekise kutsi luhlelo lwetebulungiswa lusebenta kahle.
zul: sizoqhubezela phambili umsebenzi wethu wokunciphisa amacala abucayi kanye nanesihluku futhi siqinisekise ukuthi uhlelo lwezobulungiswa lusebenza ngendlela efanele.

ssw: setfula tinhlelo tekwenyusa linani lemaphoyisa ngemaphesenti lalishumi kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako.
zul: siqalisa ukusebenza kwezinhlelo zokukhuphula isibalo samaphoyisa ngamaphesenti ayi-10 eminyakeni emithathu ezayo.

ssw: sikhombe kulwa nekutsatselwa timoto, kwebelwa kwemabhizimisi netindlu, kanye nebugebengu lobenteka ngekutsintsana lobunjengekubulala, kuhlukumeta ngekwelucansi kanye nekushaya, njengetintfo letisetulu eluhlwini lwetintfo letibalulekile.
zul: sihlonze ukulwa nokuduna izimoto, ukuphangwa kwamabhizinisi kanye nezindlu, kanye nobugebengu obuhlanganisa abantu njengokubulala, ukudlwengula kanye nokushaya njengamacala aseqhulwini.

ssw: sonkhe sinendzima lokumele siyidlale.
zul: sonke sinendima okufanele siyidlale.

ssw: asitibandzakanye netinkhundla temmango letibukene nekuphepha.
zul: asibambe iqhaza kuzinhlaka zokuphepha komphakathi.

ssw: asesiyekele kutsenga timphahla letintjontjiwe.
zul: asiyeke ukuthenga izimpahla ezebiwe.

ssw: asilungele kuniketa emaphoyisa lwati lolumayelana netento tebugebengu.
zul: asihlale sikulungele ukunikeza amaphoyisa ulwazi mayelana nemisebenzi yobugebengu.

ssw: ngekusebentisana sitabehlula bugebengu.
zul: ngokusebenzisana sizobunqoba ubugebengu.

ssw: bakitsi netivakashi letihloniphekile,bohulumende basekhaya kumele basebente.
zul: bakwethu kanye nezimenywa ezihloniphekile,uhulumeni wasekhaya kufanele asebenze.

ssw: bomasipala kumele bente ncono kuniketelwa kwetindlu, emanti, tekuhanjiswa kwemangcoliso, gezi, kutfutfwa kwetibi kanye nemigwaco.
zul: omasipala kufanele benze ngcono ukunikezelwa kwezindlu, amanzi, izindlu zangasese, ugesi, ukuphathwa kwemfucuza kanye nemigwaqo.

ssw: sibambe umhlangano nabosodolobha kanye nebaphatsi babomasipala emnyakeni lowengcile.
zul: sibambe umhlangano nosodolobha kanye nezimenenja zomasipala ngonyaka odlule.

ssw: loku kunikete litfuba lekubona tintfo letingabonakali ngetincabhayi lebanato bohulumende basekhaya.
zul: lokhu kusivule amehlo mayelana nezinselelo ezikhona kuhulumeni wasekhaya.

ssw: siphindze savakashela imimango nabomasipala labehlukehlukene, kufaka ekhatsi ibalfour empumalanga kanye nethembisa egauteng.
zul: siphinde savakashela imiphakathi kanye nomasipala abaningana, kubandakanya ibalfour empumalanga kanye nethembisa egauteng.

ssw: ngemuva kwekuvakashela ebalfour, sitfumele litsimba lemalunga layimfica etindvuna kutsi avakashele lendzawo kute ayewubukana netindzaba letiphakanyiswe ngummango.
zul: emva kokuvakashela ebalfour, sathumela ithimba elalakhiwe ngongqongqoshe abayisishiyagalolunye ukuthi bavakashele le ndawo ukuxazulula izinkinga ezaziphakanyiswe ngumphakathi.

ssw: tindzaba letinyenti setivele tiyabukisiswa.
zul: izinkinga eziningana sezixazululiwe.

ssw: ngiyalele tindvuna kutsi tibukane netindzaba letisasele.
zul: ngijube ongqongqoshe ukuthi babhekane nezindaba ezingakaxazululwa.

ssw: sisasho futsi kutsi atikho tikhalo letivumela ludlame nekucekelwa phansi kwemphahla.
zul: siyaphinda siyasho, azikho izikhalo ezingaba yizizathu ezinqala zodlame kanye nokulinyazwa kwempahla.

ssw: siyalele tikhungo letibukene nekulandzelwa kwemtsetfo kutsi titsatse tinyatselo leticinile kulabo labangahloniphi umtsetfo ebalfour nakuletinye tindzawo.
zul: siyalele izinhlaka eziphathelene nokuqiniswa komthetho ukuthi zithathe izinyathelo ezinqala mayelana nokungahlonishwa komthetho ebalfour kanye nakwezinye izindawo.

ssw: ngengongoni 2009, ikhabinethi ivume lisu lekugucula kusebenta kwetintfo kubohulumende basekhaya.
zul: ngozibandlela wonyaka we-2009, ikhabhinethi yamukela iqhinga lokushintsha ukusebenza kukahulumeni wasekhaya.

ssw: loku kutawucinisekisa kutsi bohulumende basekhaya banebuphatsi lobufanele, nemakhono ekuphatsa kanye newebuchwepheshe.
zul: lokhu kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni wasekhaya unamakhono afanele ezokuphatha, ukulawula kanye nawezobuncweti.

ssw: kulomnyaka wekwenta, asibambisaneni ekwenteni bohulumende basekhaya babe ngumsebenti wakhe wonkhe umuntfu.
zul: kulo nyaka wokusebenza, asisebenze ngokubambisana ukwenza umsebenzi kahulumeni wasekhaya ube wawo wonke umuntu.

ssw: sisebentela kwenta ncono tindzawo tekuhlala letingakahleleki kanye nekuniketela ngetinsita letifanele kanye nebunini bemhlaba lokungenani kumakhaya langu-500 000 nga-2014.
zul: sisebenzela ukuthuthukisa izakhiwo ezingahlelekile ezisendaweni enhle kanye nokuhanjiswa kwezidingo ezifanele kubandakanya umhlaba kubantu okungenani abayi-500 000 ngonyaka we-2014.

ssw: sihlela kubekela eceleni emahektha langetulu kwa-6 000 emhlaba losedvutane nemmango kute kwakhiwe kuwo tindlu talabahola kancane naletingabiti kakhulu.
zul: sihlela ukubeka eceleni amahektha ayi-6 000 omhlaba osendaweni ekahle ukwakha izindlu zabantu abahola kancane futhi ezingambi eqolo.

ssw: umtamo lomusha loyinsika kutawuba kucabangela bantfu labahola kakhulu kute batfole kusitwa ngetimali nguhulumende, kodvwa lokubonakala bahola kancane ngendlela yekutsi abakulungeli kusitwa ngemabhange kutsi batsenge tindlu.
zul: uhlelo olusha olubalulekile ukuhlalisa abantu abahola kakhulu ukuthi bengathola uxhaso lukahulumeni kodwa abahola kancane ukuthi bengatshelekwa amabhange imali.

ssw: sitawubeka sikhwama sesicinisekiso semali lengemarandi layibhiliyoni yinye kute sikhutsate bemabhange latimele kanye neluphiko lwetetindlu, kutsi basungule umkhicito lomusha lotawuhlangabetana netimfuno tetindlu.
zul: sizovula isikhwama esinegaranti yesigidigidi esisodwa ukugqugquzela amabhange kanye nomkhakha wezezindlu ukuthi uthuthukise imikhiqizo emisha ukuhlangabezana nalesi sidingo sezindlu.

ssw: bakitsi,emnyakeni lowengcile sitsite, bantfu basemakhaya nabo banelilungelo lekuba nagezi, emanti, imithoyi lehanjiswa ngemanti kanye nemigwaco.
zul: bakwethu,ngonyaka odlule sathi, abantu basemakhaya nabo banelungelo lokuba nogesi, amanzi, izindlu zangasese ezigijima amanzi nemigwaqo.

ssw: satsi kumele babe netindzawo tetemidlalo kanye netindzawo letinetitolo tekutsenga letinkhulu letincono njengaleto tasemadolobheni.
zul: sathi kufanele babe nezindawo zezemidlalo kanye nezindawo zokuthenga ezinkulukazi eziphucuzekile njengezasemadolobheni.

ssw: kuloku, sisukumise indzawo yekucala lokutawuhlolwa kuyo luhlelo loluphelele lwekutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya egiyani, elimpopo, ngengci emnyakeni lowengcile.
zul: mayelana nalokhu, sethule uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya oluqukethe konke endaweni yokuhlola egiyani elimpopo ngoncwaba kofile.

ssw: kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi, sekwakhiwe tindlu letingama-231.
zul: kusukela kwaqalwa, sekwakhiwe izindlu ezingama-231.

ssw: kuphindze kwaba nenchubekelembili ekuniketelweni kwesakhiwonchanti kute kwesekelwe kutfutfukiswa kwetekulima, kanye nekuceceshwa kwemalunga emmango.
zul: inqubekela phambili yenziwe futhi ekwakheni ingqalasizinda ukusekela ukuthuthukiswa kwezolimo kanye nokuqeqeshwa kwamalungu omphakathi.

ssw: kufinyelela etikhungweni tetemphilo netemfundvo kwentiwe ncono.
zul: ukufinyelela ezikhungweni zezempilo kanye nezemfundo kwenziwe ngcono.

ssw: senta tinhlelo letinjengaleto etindzaweni letisikhombisa eliveni lonkhe, letizuzisa emawadi langu-21.
zul: siqalisa ukusebenzisa izinhlelo ezifanayo ezindaweni eziyisikhombisa ezweni lonke, noluhlomulisa izigceme ezingama-21.

ssw: nga-2014, sihlose kuba netindzawo letinjalo kumawadi langu-160.
zul: ngonyaka we-2014 sihlela ukuba nezindawo ezigcemeni eziyi-160.

ssw: sifuna emakhaya langu-60% kuletindzawo kutsi ahlangabetane netidzingo tawo tekudla emkhicitweni wabo nga-2014.
zul: sifuna amaphesenti angama-60 abantu kulezi zindawo bahlangabezane nezidingo zabo zokudla ngokuzikhiqizela bona ngonyaka we-2014.

ssw: kancane kancane kutawulunga, njengobe kusho sisho, tintfo letinkhulu ticala ngaletincane.
zul: kancane kancane kuze kulunge, phela bakwethu, kuthiwa nempandla iqala ngenhlonhlo.

ssw: kumele futsi sihlanganise kancono tinhlelo teluhlelobusha lwemhlabatsi kanye netinhlelo letesekela tekulima.
zul: futhi sidinga ukudidiyela ukuhlelwa kabusha komhlaba kanye nezinhlelo zokusekela ezolimo.

ssw: imphumelelo yetfu kulomkhakha itawukalwa ngekwenyuka kwelinani lebalimi labalima etindzaweni letincane labagcina sebakwati kutimela kutemnotfo.
zul: impumelelo yethu kulezi zindawo iyokalwa ngukukhula kwesibalo sabalimi abancane ababamba iqhaza emnothweni ngendlela ebonakalayo.

ssw: somlomo lohloniphekile nasihlalo wemkhandlu wetifundza wavelonkhe,asisilo live lelinemanti lamanyenti.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile kanye nosihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe,asilona izwe elicebile ngamanzi.

ssw: kodvwa sisalahlekelwa ngemanti lamanyenti ngemaphayiphi lavutako nangesakhiwonchanti lesingakalungi.
zul: kodwa, sisalahlekelwa ngamanzi amaningi ngenxa yamapayipi avuzayo kanye nengqalasizinda enganele.

ssw: sitawube sibeka tindlela tekunciphisa kulahlekela kwetfu ngemanti ngelinani lelinguhhafu nga-2014.
zul: sizothatha izinyathelo zokunciphisa ukulahlekelwa kwethu ngamanzi ngengxenye ngonyaka we-2014.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,njengencenye yemitamo yetfu yekukhutsata kukhula kutemnotfo, sisebentela kunciphisa tindleko tekuchumana.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,njengengxenye yemizamo yethu yokukhuthaza ukukhula komnotho okukhulu, sisebenzela ukunciphisa izindleko zokuxhumana.

ssw: ummango weleningizimu afrika ungabuka embili kulokunye futsi kunciphisa ngalokubanti, emanani abomakhalekhikhini, lucingo lwasendlini kanye netincingo temmango.
zul: umphakathi waseningizimu afrika ungalindela ngabomvu okunye ukuncishiswa kwemali yamagagasi obuhlakahlaka bokuxhumana ngomoya, omakhalekhukhwini, izingcingo zasendlini kanye nezingcingo zezigxobo.

ssw: sitawusebentela kwenyusa sivinini siphindze sicinisekise emazinga lasetulu etinhlelo te-intanethi, ngekuhambisana nenkhambiso yemave emhlaba.
zul: sizosebenzela ukukhuphula isivinini samagagasi obuhlakahlaka bokuxhumana ngomoya kanye nokuqinisekisa izinga eliphezulu lokutholakala kwe-inthanethi, ngokuhambisana namazinga omhlaba.

ssw: takhamiti teleningizimu afrika,lohulumende utawucinisekisa kutsi imphahla yendalo netinsita letitfolakala endalweni tivikeleke kahle, nekutsi tiyachubeka nekukhuliswa.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,lo hulumeni uzoqinisekisa ukuthi izimpahla zethu zemvelo kanye nemithombo yemvelo ivikeleke kahle futhi ithuthukiswa ngokuqhubekayo.

ssw: ngekubambisana nelebrazil, indiya nechina, kuhlanganisa nelemelika, lemele emave latfutfukile, sifake ligalelo lelivakalako ekwemukelweni kwesivumelwano emhlanganweni wekugucuka kwesimo selitulu wasecopenhagen ngengongoni kulomyaka lowengcile.
zul: ngokubambisana nezwe lasebrazil, elasendiya nelasechina sijoyinwa yizwe lasemelika, nebelimele amazwe omhlaba athuthukile, saba neqhaza elikhulu esivumelwaneni esamukelwa enqunqutheleni yokushintsha kwesimo sezulu ebisecopenhagen ngozibandlela kofile.

ssw: nanobe kungakefiki lapho kudzingeka khona, kodvwa kusinyatselo lesibalulekile njengobe onkhe emave aphendvula kulokugucuka kwesimo selitulu.
zul: yize singakafiki lapho okudingeka sifike khona, kuyisinyathelo esibalulekile esiya phambili njengoba sibophezela amazwe ukuthi abhekane nokushintsha kwesimo sezulu.

ssw: sitawusebenta ngemandla nebalingani betfu bemave emhlaba ngenhloso yekufinyelela esivumelwaneni lesibophako nalesisemtsefweni.
zul: sizosebenza ngokuzikhandla kanye nozakwethu bomhlaba ukwenza isivumelwano esisemthwethweni esibophezelayo.

ssw: njengeningizimu afrika, sitibophetele ngekutitsandzela emananini lesitibekele wona ekunciphisa kungcoliswa kwemoya, kantsi sitawuchubeka nekusebentela kuhlangabetana nendlelasu yetfu yesikhatsi lesidze yekunciphisa kugucuka kwesimo selitulu.
zul: njengeningizimu afrika, sizinikele ngokuzithandela kwethu ukuzibekela umkhawulo othile wokunciphisa intuthu engcolisayo, futhi sizoqhubeka ukusebenza ngeqhinga lethu lesikhathi eside ukwehlisa ukushintsha kwesimo sezulu.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,sitawucinisa imitamo yetfu yekuchubekisela embili tinhloso teningizimu afrika emhlabeni wonkhe.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sizoqinisa imizamo yethu yokwazisa ngezintshisekelo zezwe laseningizimu afrika umhlaba wonke.

ssw: sitawesekela imitamo yekunonophisa kuhlangana kutembusave nakutemnotfo kwesifundza se-sadc, kanye nekukhutsata kuhwebelana nekusisa emkhatsini kwemave akulesifundza.
zul: sizosekela imizamo yokusheshisa ukuhlanganisa ezomnotho kanye nezepolitiki esifundeni senhlanganisela yamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika kanye nokugqugquzela ukuhwebelana kanye nokutshalwa kwezimali phakathi kwesifunda.

ssw: iningizimu afrika iyachubeka nekudlala indzima lesembili emitameni yelivekati kute kuciniswe lubumbano lwe-afrika netinhlaka talo, kanye nekusebentela bunye.
zul: iningizimu afrika iyaqhubeka ukudlala indima yokuhola emizameni yezwekazi yokuqinisa inhlangano yamazwe ase-afrika kanye nezikhungo zayo, kanye nokusebenzela ubunye.

ssw: sitawugcila kutemandla ekuniketeni kabusha emandla budlelwane lobusha bekutfutfukiswa kwe-afrika, njengendlelasu yekutfutfukisa temnotfo kulelivekati.
zul: sizogxilisa amandla ethu ekuvuseleleni ukubambisana okusha kokuthuthukiswa kwe-afrika, ngenjeqhinga lokuthuthukisa umnotho ezwenikazi lase-afrika.

ssw: takhamiti teleningizimu afrika,umsebenti wahulumende kumele usabele elubitweni lwekwenta lesigamu sibe ngulesinye sekusebenta ngekunonopha kanye nekusebenta kwembuso lokwentiwe ncono.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,abasebenzi bakahulumeni balinanele ikhwelo lokwenza lesi sikhathi sikahulumeni kube ngesokusebenza ngokushesha kanye nendlela yokusebenza kombuso eyenziwe ngcono.

ssw: sidzinga kusebenta ngalokuncomekako nangemandla.
zul: sidinga ubuqotho nokusebenza ngokuzikhandla.

ssw: sidzinga tisebenti tahulumende letitimisele, letinemakhono naletinakekela tidzingo tetakhamiti.
zul: sidinga abasebenzi bakahulumeni abazinikele, abakwaziyo ukusebenza futhi abazikhathalele izidingo zezakhamizi.

ssw: hulumende sewuvele usebentela ekutfutfukiseni nasekwetfuleni luhlelo lwekutfutfukisa umsebenti wahulumende, lolutawubeka inkhambiso necophelo etisebentini tahulumende kuyo yonkhe imikhakha.
zul: uhulumeni useqalile vele ukusebenza ekuthuthukisweni kanye nasekuqalisweni kokusebenza kohlelo lwentuthuko yabasebenzi bakahulumeni, oluzobeka indlela yokusebenza kanye namazinga ezisebenzi zikahulumeni kuzo zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,sichubekisa imitamo yetfu yekucedza inkhohlakalo nekweba eluhlelweni lwekuniketwa kwemisebenti nemathenda, naseticelweni tetincwadzi tekushayela, kutibonelelo tahulumende nakubomatisi, phakatsi kwalokunye.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,sizoqhubeka nemizamo yethu yokuqeda inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa phakathi kwezinye izinto ezinhlelweni zokuthenga kanye nezamathenda, ezicelweni zezincwadi zokushayela, izibonelelo zikahulumeni kanye nomazisi.

ssw: siyajabula ngenchubekelembili hulumende lasayentile kuleminye imikhakha.
zul: siyajabula ngenqubekela phambili eyenziwa nguhulumeni kwezinye izindawo.

ssw: kuleliviki, sicedze kukhokhelwa kwetibonelelo tahulumende letinenkhohlakalo letingu-32 687, letibita imali lengemarandi latigidzi letingu-180.
zul: kuleli sonto, siqede ukukhokhwa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni ezikhwatshanisiwe ezingama-32 689, nezibiza isamba samarandi ayizigidi eziyi-180.

ssw: likomiti letindvuna lelibukene nenkhohlakalo lisabuka tindlela tekucedza nya inkhohlakalo.
zul: ikomidi lenkohlakalo elakhiwe ngongqongqoshe libheka izindlela zokuqeda nya inkohlakalo.

ssw: ngekusebentisana singenta lokunyenti.
zul: ngokusebenzisana singenza okuningi.

ssw: bakitsi,njengobe nati, setfule inombolo yekutsintana nelihhovisi lamengameli kute sente hulumende nelihhovisi lamengameli lifinyeleleke kummango, kanye nekusita kuvulela kweftulwa kwetinsita letivalelekile.
zul: bakwethu,njengoba nazi, sathula inombolo kamongameli ukwenzela umphakathi ufinyelele kalula kuhulumeni kanye nasemnyangweni kamongameli kanye nokusiza ukuqeda ukubambezeleka kokuhanjiswa kwezidingo emphakathini.

ssw: lenombolo yamengameli imele kutimisela kwetfu ekwenteni tintfo kuhulumende ngalokwehlukile.
zul: le nombolo imele ukuzimisela kwethu ukwenza izinto ngenye indlela kuhulumeni.

ssw: kwente umehluko etimphilweni tetakhamiti letinyenti teleningizimu afrika.
zul: yenze umehluko ezimpilweni zezakhamizi eziningi zaseningizimu afrika.

ssw: singabala nkt.
zul: singabalula unkk.

ssw: buziwe ngaleka wasemount frere, lowaba nesicelo sekucala lesasitsatsa lebesimayelana nemphesheni yemyeni wakhe longasekho, lolu kwaba lucingo lolwatsatfwa elusukwini lwekucala kwekusebenta kwalenombolo.
zul: buziwe ngaleka wasemount frere, ucingo lwakhe mayelana nempesheni yomyeni wakhe kwaba ngolokuqala ukwamukelwa osukwini lokuqala lokusebenza.

ssw: sinaye emkhatsini kwetfu lamuhla.
zul: unathi la namhlanje ebusuku.

ssw: emkhatsini kwetfu sinamnu.
zul: phakathi kwethu futhi, sinomnu.

ssw: nkululeko cele, lowasitwa kutfola tincwadzi tamatisi, lokwamenta wakwati kubhalisa enyuvesi yethekhinoloji yasetshwane.
zul: nkululeko cele, owasizwa ukuthola umazisi owamsiza ukuthi abhalise enyuvesi yezobuchwepheshe yasetshwane.

ssw: leti tindzaba letimbili nje kuphela temphumelelo emkhatsini kwaletinyenti.
zul: lezi ezinye zezindaba eziyimpumelelo.

ssw: kuleti naletinye tibonelo, sibona butsakatsaka lokumele bulungiswe tinhlaka tahulumende letahlukahlukene.
zul: kulezi zibonelo kanye nakwezinye, sihlonza ubuthaka obufanele bulungiswe ezinhlakeni ezahlukene kuhulumeni.

ssw: ngasomlomo, simeme titfunywa temacembu lahlukene ephalamende kutsi avakashele sikhungo setincingo, kute emalunga ephalamende atotibonela umsebenti lowentiwako.
zul: ngosomlomo wephalamende, simeme ithimba elakhiwe ngamaqembu ahlukahlukene asuka ephalamende ukuthi livakashele isikhungo sethu sokwamukela izingcingo, ukuze amalunga ephalamende azitholele wona ngokwawo mayelana nomsebenzi owenziwayo.

ssw: bakitsi nebangani,ngichaze tincenye letimbalwa teluhlelo lwetfu lwa-2010, kutibophetela kwetfu sisonkhe njengahulumende kubantfu beleningizimu.
zul: bakwethu kanye nabangani,ngindlalile amaphuzu abalulekile ezinhlelo zethu zonyaka we-2010, ukuzinikela kwethu sonke njengohulumeni kubantu baseningizimu afrika.

ssw: inkhulumo leyetfulelwa sive iniketa sibutsetelo lesibanti seluhlelo lwetfu lwekwenta.
zul: inkulumo echaza isimo sezwe inikeza isithombe esibanzi mayelana nohlelo lwethu lokusebenza.

ssw: tindvuna titawuniketa umbiko lowenabile ngalesikhatsi tetfula tinkhulumo tawo temcombelelotimali.
zul: ongqongqoshe ngamunye bazonikeza ulwazi oluthe xaxa uma sebethula izinkulumo zabo zesabelomali.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile, takhamiti teleningizimu afrika,ngelweti kulomnyaka, sitawube sigubha umnyaka wa-150 wekufika kwemandiya eningizimu afrika.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,ngolwezi kophezulu, sizobe sigubha ukuphela kweminyaka eyi-150 selokhu kwaqala ukufika kwabomdabu basendiya eningizimu afrika.

ssw: kuniketa litfuba lekubona kubaluleka kwesandla lesifakwe ngummango wemandiya emikhakheni yetemisebenti, temabhizimisi, tesayensi, temidlalo, tenkholo, tebuciko, temasiko kanye nasekutfolweni nasekuhlanganisweni kwentsandvo yetfu yelinyenti.
zul: lokhu kusinikeza ithuba lokubonga umthelela obalulekile owenziwe umphakathi wasendiya emkhakheni wezabasebenzi, amabhizinisi, isayensi, ezemidlalo, ezenkolo, ezobuciko, ezamasiko kanye nasekutholeni nasekuqiniseni intando yeningi.

ssw: bakitsi nebangani,asengitsatse lelitfuba ngiphindze ngendlulise emavi endvudvuto kuhulumende kanye nebantfu basehaiti ngenhlekelele nekufa lokubuhlungu lokubavelele.
zul: bakwethu kanye nabangani,angiphinde ngithathe leli thuba ukuthumela umyalezo wokuzwelana nohulumeni kanye nabantu basehaiti mayelana nefu elimnyama elibagubuzele.

ssw: siyajabula kutsi litsimba lebasiti betfu likwatile kuyewusita.
zul: sinenjabulo ukuthi amaqembu ethu ezokutakula akwazile ukuya khona eyosiza.

ssw: ngitsandza kubonga sakhamuti seleningizimu afrika lesihlala singahluleki kusita njalo etikhatsini tetinhlekelele, siphindze sisite tsine ekukhuliseni umbono wekuba ngummango lonakekelako.
zul: ngithanda kakhulukazi ukubonga isakhamuzi esisodwa saseningizimu afrika esingahluleki nhlobo ukusiza ngezikhathi zezinhlekelele , kanye nokusiza ukukhuthaza umbono womphakathi onakekelayo.

zul: samukela udkt.

ssw: bakitsi beleningizimu afrika,kubanjwa kwemidlalo yendzebe yemhlaba ye-fifa kwenta 2010 abe ngumnyaka wekwenta mbamba.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,ukusingatha indebe yomhlaba yefifa kwenza unyaka we-2010 kube ngunyaka wokusebenza.

ssw: sichitse iminyaka leminyenti sihlelela lendzebe yemhlaba.
zul: sichithe iminyaka eminingi sihlelela indebe yomhlaba.

ssw: sisalelwe tinyanga letintsatfu kuphela.
zul: sisalelwe izinyanga ezintathu kuphela.

ssw: kantsi sitimisele kwenta lemidlalo ibe yimphumelelo.
zul: futhi sizimisele ukuthi siyenze ibe yimpumelelo.

ssw: sakhiwonchanti, tekuvikeleka kanye naletinye tinhlelo setikhona kute kucinisekiswe umchudzelwano loyimphumelelo.
zul: amalungiselelo enqgalasizinda, ezokuvikela, kanye namalungiselelo okuhamba asenziwe ukuqinisekisa umqhudelwano oyimpumelelo.

ssw: njengesive, kumele sibonge likomiti leligcugcutelela imidlalo ya-2010 ngemtamo wabo lomuhle.
zul: njengesizwe sidinga ukubonga ekomidini lakuleli elihlela imidlalo yonyaka we-2010 ngomsebenzi walo oncomekayo.

ssw: sifisela sihlalo welikomiti leligcugcutelela lemidlalo, irvin khoza, sikhulu lesisetulu danny jordaan kanye nemceceshi webafana bafana, carlos alberto parreira, konkhe lokuhle kuletinyanga letilandzelako.
zul: sifisela usihlalo wekomidi lakuleli elihlela imidlalo u-irvin khoza kanye nomphathi omkhulu udanny jordaan kanye nomqeqeshi webafana bafana ucarlos alberto parreira impumelelo kulezi zinyanga ezizayo.

ssw: mengameli mandela bekasembili ekusiteni lelive kutsi litfole emalungelo ekubamba lomdlalo lomkhulu nakangaka.
zul: umongameli umandela waba ngumongo ekusizeni izwe lethu ukunqoba amalungelo okusingatha lo mcimbi oyindumezulu.

ssw: ngako kumele sente lendzebe yemhlaba ibe yimphumelelo kute sihloniphe yena.
zul: ngakho-ke njengendlela yokumbonga kufanele senze indebe yomhlaba ibe yimpumelelo.

ssw: bakitsi, asesisekele licembu lesive i-bafana bafana.
zul: bakwethu, asiphinde siseke iqembu likazwelonke ibafana bafana.

ssw: ngingulomunye walabakholwelwa ekutseni i-bafana bafana itawugila timanga.
zul: ngingomunye walabo abakholwa wukuthi ibafana bafana izogila izimanga.

ssw: lokukhulu, tsenga lithikithi lakho!
zul: okubaluleke kakhulu, ithikithi esandleni bakwethu!

ssw: sonkhe asitsengeni emathikithi kusenesikhatsi kute sikwati kuhambela lemidlalo.
zul: sonke asithenge amathikithi kusenesikhathi ukuze sikwazi ukuthamela imidlalo.

ssw: bakitsi beleningizimu afrika,njengobe sibungata kukhululwa kwamadiba lamuhla, siyaphindza futsi sitibophetela ekubuyisaneni, kulubumbano lwavelonkhe, eliveni lelite buhlanga kanye nasekwakheni likusasa lelincono sisonkhe njengetakhamiti teleningizimu afrika, labamnyama nalabamhlophe.
zul: zakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika,njengoba sigubha ukukhululwa kukamadiba namhlanje, siyaphinda siyazibophezela ekubuyisaneni, kubumbano lukazwelonke, ukungacwasi kanye nokwakha ingomuso elingcono sonke njengezakhamizi zaseningizimu afrika, abamnyama nabamhlophe.

ssw: siholwa nguloko madiba lakusho ngalesikhatsi asebhokisini atekiswa licala, nakatsi:"imphilo yami yonkhe ngiyinikele kulomzabalazo webantfu base-afrika.
zul: siholwa yilokho okwashiwo ngumadiba ngesikhathi esebhokisini labasolwa, ngiyamcaphuna:"empilweni yami yonke ngizinikele kulo mzabalazo wabantu base-afrika.

ssw: ngilwe nekubuswa ngulabamhlophe, ngalwa nekubuswa ngulabamnyama.
zul: ngilwisene nokuthi abamhlophe babe ngaphezu kwabanye abantu, futhi ngilwisene nokuthi abamnyama babe ngaphezu kwabanye abantu.

ssw: ngilondvolote umcondvo wemmango wentsandvo yelinyenti nalokhululekile, lapho bonkhe bantfu batewuhlala ndzawonye ngekuthula, futsi banematfuba lalinganako.
zul: ngivikele futhi nganakekela umcabango womphakathi okhululekile futhi wentando yeningi, lapho bonke abantu bephila ndawonye ngokuthula, futhi benamathuba alinganayo.

ssw: lona ngumbono lengifuna kuwuphilela nekutsi ngiwubone.
zul: kungumcabango engithemba ukuwuphilela, futhi ngiwufeze.

ssw: kodvwa nakunesidzingo, ngumbono lengitimisele kuwufela.
zul: kodwa uma kunesidingo, kungumcabango engizimisele ukuwufela.

ssw: "ngikhutsatwa luphawu lwetfu madiba, kuyinhlonipho kimi kuniketela lenkhulumo leyetfulelwa sive yanga-2010 kuwo onkhe emachawe nemachawekati, ladvunyiswako nalangakadvunyiswa, latiwako nalangatiwa.
zul: "sigqugquzelwa yiqhawe lethu umadiba, kuyintokozo kimi ukunikela inkulumo echaza isimo sezwe yonyaka we-2010 kuwo wonke amaqhawe namaqhawekazi, abongiwe nangabongiwe, aziwayo nangaziwa.

ssw: asibambisane kute sente lomnyaka wekwenta ube nguloyimphumelelo eliveni letfu.
zul: asisebenze ngokubambisana ukwenza lo nyaka wokusebenza kube ngoyimpumelelo ezweni lethu.

ssw: ngiyabonga.
zul: ngiyabonga.

ssw: 13 feb 2014somlomo lohloniphekile welibandla lavelonkhe,sihlalo wemkhandlu wetifundza wavelonkhe (ncop).
zul: 13 feb 2014somlomo ohloniphekile wesigungu sikazwelonke.

ssw: sekela somlomo welibandla lavelonkhe nasekela sihlalo wemkhandlu wetifundza wavelonkhe.
zul: sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe (i-ncop).

ssw: sekela mengameli weriphabhulikhi yeningizimu afrika, mhlonishwa kgalema motlanthe.
zul: iphini likasomlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke kanye nephini likasihlalo we-ncop.

ssw: sekela mengameli wangaphambilini baleka mbethe,mhlonishwa jaji lelikhulu leriphabhulikhi yeningizimu afrika, nani nonkhe malunga lahloniphekile etebulungiswa.
zul: iphini likamongameli weriphabhulikhi, umhlonishwa kgalema motlanthe.

ssw: tindvuna letihloniphekile nabosekela tindvuna,tindvuna tetifundza letikhetsekile nabosomlomo betifundza tetfu.
zul: iphini likamongameli laphambilini, ubaleka mbethe.

ssw: sihlalo wenhlangano yabohulumende basekhaya eningizimu afrika, nabo bonkhe buholi babohulumende basekhaya.
zul: umhlonishwa ijaji eliyinhloko leriphabhulikhi kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile ophiko lwezobulungiswa.

ssw: sihlalo wendlu yavelonkhe yebaholi bendzabuko.
zul: ongqongqoshe abahloniphekile kanye namaphini abo.

ssw: tinhloko tetikhungo tahulumende letesekela intsandvo yelinyenti.
zul: ondunankulu abahloniphekile kanye nosomlomo bezifundazwe zethu.

ssw: mphatsi welibhangesilulu,baholi bemabhizinisi, temidlalo, tendzabuko, tetenkholo nayo yonkhe leminye imikhakha,malunga emancusa akulamanye emave, tivakashi letikhetsekile naletihloniphekile,malunga lahloniphekile,bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,good evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeienaand.
zul: usihlalo we-salga, kanye nabo bonke abaholi bohulumeni basekhaya.

ssw: ben skhosana, longumunye wemalunga lasasebente sikhatsi lesidze futsi lomdzala kulendlu lehloniphekile nalobekayindvuna yaphambilini yelitiko letekucondziswa kwesimilo.
zul: abaholi bezamabhizinisi, ezemidlalo, ezendabuko, ezenkolo kanye nabo bonke abaholi beminye imikhakha.

ssw: somlomo lohloniphekile,sihlalo lohloniphekile we-ncop,lena yinkhulumo yebunjalo belive yekucala leyetfulwa angekho mengameli wetfu longumsunguli, umhlonishwa nelson rolihlahla mandela.
zul: good evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeie naand.

ssw: kusishiya kwakhe emhlabeni, ngembi nje kwekutsi kube yiminyaka lenge-20 yenkhululeko yetfu nentsandvo yelinyenti, kwabanga buhlungu lobukhulu kubantfu bakitsi nangesheya kweminyele yetfu.
zul: ngithanda ukubonga izikhulu ezengamele izindlu zephalamende ngokunginika leli thuba lokuba ngikhulume nabantu baseningizimu afrika, kulo mcimbi wokwethulwa kwenkulumo echaza isimo sezwe (i-sona) yokugcina kahulumeni wentando yeningi labantu wehlandla lesine.

ssw: sitfola kudvudvuteka ekwatini kutsi madiba utawuhlala aphila njalo etinhlitiyweni tetfu, nekutsi futsi sinemsebenti wekuchubela embili umshiyandvuku wakhe.
zul: ngithanda ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo ngokudlula emhlabeni komhlonishwa umnu ben skhosana, ongomunye wamalungu asebe yingxenye yale ndlu ehloniphekile isikhathi eside futhi ubengelinye lamalungu asezikhundleni eziphezulu, futhi phambilini wayengungqongqoshe wezokuhlunyeleliswa kwezimilo.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,live letfu likhicite emadvodza nebafati labakhetsekile, lababe baholi ngetikhatsi letimatima.
zul: sidabuka kakhulu ngokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni ngokuzuma.

ssw: moses kotane, umgcinisikhwama jikelele waphambilini wakhongolose namabhalane jikelele waphambilini welicembu lemakhomasinisi laseningizimu afrika.
zul: sidlulisa ukukhala kwethu emndenini wakhe, nakumholi we-ifp ushenge, kanye namalungu onke e-ifp.

ssw: sihloniphekile kuba nemkakhe lotsandzekako, make rebecca kotane, njengesivakashi setfu lesikhetsekile lamuhla kusihlwa.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile,sihlalo we-ncop ohloniphekile,lena yinkulumo echaza isimo sezwe yokuqala eyenzeka engasekho emhlabeni umongameli wethu wokuqala, umhlonishwa nelson rolihlahla mandela.

ssw: make kotane uhlanganise iminyaka yebudzala le-102 itolo, futsi simfisela lokuhle kodvwa.
zul: ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni, kungasensuku zatshwala kufike umgubho weminyaka engama-20 yenkululeko nentando yeningi yethu, kubazwise obukhulu ubuhlungu abantu bethu kanye nabakwamanye amazwe.

ssw: oliver tambo, lowagcina sibane senkhuleko sivutsa ekhaya nangesheya ngesikhatsi lesimatima kakhulu semzabalazo wetfu.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile,izwe lethu likhiqize abesilisa nabesifazane abanohlonze, abahlinzeke ngobuholi ngezikhathi ezinzima.

ssw: indvodzana yakhe, dali nemkakhe rachel bakanye natsi lamuhla kusihlwa.
zul: kuyintokozo enkulu ukuthi unkosikazi wakhe, umama rebecca kotane, unathi lapha kusihlwa njengesivakashi sethu esikhethekile.

ssw: setfulela solomon mahlangu sigcoko, lijaha lebelinesibindzi lelahamba ngekweyisa lacondza etingodvweni tekulengiswa nga-1979 lapho labulawa khona lineminyaka lenge-23 budzala.
zul: izolo umama ukotane ubegubha iminyaka yobudala eyi-102, futhi simfisela okuhle kodwa.

ssw: sihlonishiwe ngekuba khona kwamake wakhe, make martha mahlangu nemtukulu wakhe bathabile.
zul: indodana yakhe, udali, kanye nonkosikazi wayo, u-rachel, banathi lapha kulo mcimbi kusihlwa nje.

ssw: lomnyaka wa-2014 ubuye futsi ube ngumnyaka wekugujwa kweminyaka lenge-40 kwabulawa ngebugwala kwemholi wetitjudeni abram onkgopotse tiro nga-1974 ebotswana kusetjentiswa emaphasela emabhomu ,.
zul: sithanda ukuthulela u-solomon mahlangu isigqoko, ibhungu elabe linesibindi esikhulu, okungadikizanga nqulu kulona ngenkathi lilengiswa ngowe-1979 lineminyaka yobudala engama-23.

ssw: jabu ndlovu, umeleli wenyonyane yavelonkhe yalabasebenta ngetinsimbi yaseningizimu afrika (i-numsa), wadvutjulwa washona nga-1988 emgungundlovu kanye nendvodza yakhe jabulani nendvodzana yabo.
zul: kuyintokozo enkulu ukuthi lapha sivakashelwe ngumama wakhe, umartha mahlangu kanye nomzukulu wakhe ubathabile.

ssw: semukela indvodzakati yabo luhle nendvodzana yabo, sanele, sibuye futsi sihloniphe yonkhe imindeni leyashonelwa ngulabatsandzekako bayo, kuwo wonkhe umkhakha wetepolitiki.
zul: futhi unyaka wama-2014 uqopha iminyaka engama-40 kwenzeka isenzo sobugwala obukhulu sokubulawa komholi wabafundi, u-abram onkgopotse tiro ngebhomu elalifakwe ephaseleni, ngowe-1974, ebotswana.

ssw: somlomo lohloniphekile,sihlalo lohloniphekile we-ncop,sakhona kuncoba bonkhe lobo buhlungu besikhatsi lesengcile sabuye sakha ummango lomusha.
zul: sithanda ukwamukela umfowabo, umogomotsi tiro onathi lapha kulo mcimbi.

ssw: sesakhe tikhungo leticinile tentsandvo yelinyenti.
zul: sidlulisa ukubonga kwabantu, ngokuzinikela nokuzidela komfowabo.

ssw: siwungcwabile umbuso welubandlululo lobewungasiyo intsandvo yelinyenti, lobewungameleli, ugcilatana ukhohlakele futsi lebewusebentela lidlantana.
zul: siyabakhumbula labo abashona ngenxa yodlame olwabe luxhaswe ngumbuso ngeminyaka yama-1980s kanye nama-1990s emalokishini ethu kanye nasezindaweni zasemakhaya.

ssw: sakhe hulumende wentsandvo yelinyenti longabandlululi ngekwebulili, ngekwebuhlanga, lotiphendvulelako ubuye umelele bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika.
zul: unkk jabu ndlovu, phambilini owayeyisikhulu esimele abasebenzi senyunyana yabasebenzi bensimbi baseningizimu afrika (i-numsa), wadutshulwa washona ngowe-1988 emgungundlovu kanye nomyeni wakhe nendodana yabo.

ssw: sakhe intsandvo yelinyenti lebuswa ngumtsetfosisekelo lonemphumelo, lonetinhlaka tembuso letisebenta kahle kakhulu – sishayamtsetfo, sigungu lesiphetse netebulungiswa.
zul: sithanda ukwamukela indodakazi yakhe uluhle kanye nendodana yakhe, usanele, futhi sithanda nokuhlonipha yonke imindeni eyalahlekelwa yizithandwa zayo, emaqenjini wonke.

ssw: sinetikhungo tahulumende letesekela intsandvo yelinyenti tibuye tivikele emalungelo etakhamiti.
zul: somlomo ohloniphekile,sihlalo we-ncop ohloniphekile,saphumelela ukubudlulisa bonke lobo buhlungu besikhathi esedlule kanye nokwakha umphakathi omusha.

ssw: inkhululeko nentsandvo yelinyenti nako kwakhe sikhala semmango lonemdlandla kanye nebetindzaba labakhululekile.
zul: sawungcwaba umbuso wengcindezelo, owawukhohlakele, owawungenayo intando yeningi, owawungamele bonke abantu, futhi owawubhelekela izimfuno zabayingcosana kuphela.

ssw: inkhululeko ibuye yaletsa kwekucala ngca, setsembiso sekulingana ngekwebulili.
zul: sasungula umbuso wentando yeningi owodwa onezinhlaka eziningi ngaphansi kwawo, ongacwasi ngokobuhlanga nangokokubulili, ophendula kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika futhi obamele bonke.

ssw: kumelelwa kwabomake kutikhungo tahulumende kukhule kakhulu kusukela ekucaleni kwenkhululeko, futsi nekukhuliswa kwetinsitanchanti nako kuyabazuzisa bomake.
zul: sakha umbuso wentando yeningi ophumelelayo osekelwe phezu komthethosisekelo, onezinhlaka ezisebenza kahle – isishayamthetho, isigungu seziphathimandla zikahulumeni kanye nophiko lwezobulungiswa.

ssw: onkhe lamagalelo ente iningizimu afrika yaba yindzawo lencono kakhulu kutsi kuhlalwe kuyo manje kunangaphambilini.
zul: sinezikhungo zesahluko sesi-9 ezeseka intando yeningi futhi ezivikela amalungelo ezakhamuzi.­futhi inkululeko kanye nentando yeningi seyivule nesikhala sokuthi kube nomphakathi wezinhlaka ezahlukene okhuthele, kanye nomkhakha wabezindaba okhululekile.

ssw: nanoma kunjalo, live letfu lisebukene netinselele tebuphuya, kungalingani nekungabi khona kwemisebenti, lesiloku sibukene nako.
zul: inkululeko ilethe futhi, ngokokuqala ngqa, isethembiso sokulingana kwezobulili.

ssw: kubukana naletinselele sekube nguyonantfo lebalulekile lekugcilwe kuyo yabo bonkhe buphatsi bentsandvo yelinyenti.
zul: ukumelwa kwabesifazane kwizikhungo zomphakathi sekukhule kakhulu kusukela ngenkathi kufika inkululeko, futhi ukuthunyelwa kwezidingongqangi kuyabahlomulisa nabesifazane.

ssw: sikhetse kugcila etintfweni letisihlanu letihamba embili, temfundvo, temphilo, kulwa nebugebengu nenkhohlakalo, kutfutfukiswa kwetindzawo tasemaphandleni nekulungiswa kabusha kwemhlaba kanye nekwakha imisebenti lenesitfunti.
zul: kepha-ke, leli lizwe lisabhekene nezinselelo ezintathu, ububha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi, okuyizinselelo esiqhubekayo nokulwisana nazo.

ssw: siphindze futsi sahlela kabusha umbuso kute kutfutfukiswe kusebenta.
zul: ukulwisana nalezi zinselelo sekuyinto abagxile kuyona bonke ohulumeni bentando yeningi.

ssw: sente imisebenti lemibili lemikhulu, kuhlela kwesikhatsi lesidze kanye nekulandzelela nekuhlola.
zul: thina siqoke ukugxila ezintweni ezinhlanu esizibeke eqhulwini, ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukulwisana nobugebengu nenkohlakalo, ukuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya nezinguquko kwezomhlaba kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi osesimweni esigculisayo.

ssw: sisungule ikhomishini yekuhlela yavelonkhe lekhicite lesikhonkhwane luhlelo lwekutfutfukisa lwavelonkhe, lokuluhlelo lwalelive lwetenhlalo netemnotfo nalokungulokunye lokuzuziwe lokukhulu kwalohulumende wesine.
zul: sisungule imikhakha emibili ebalulekile, umkhakha wokuhlelela isikhathi eside kanye nowokuqapha nokuhlola ukusebenza kukahulumeni.

ssw: loluhlelo lubeka kabanti ngalokufanele sikwente kute sicedze buphuya, kukhulisa ematfuba emisebenti nekunciphisa kungalingani kungakefiki umnyaka wa-2030.
zul: sisungule ikhomishana kazwelonke yokuhlela, ekhiqize uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezwe oluyingqophamlando, oluwumhlahlandlela waleli lizwe wezenhlalo nezomnotho futhi lokhu ngenye yenzinto ezinkulu ezifezekiswe yilo hulumeni wehlandla lesine.

ssw: kulandzelela nekuhlola kwetfu kukhombisa kutsi tinsita letinyenti tiyachubeka nekuba ncono.
zul: lolu hlelo lukhombisa lokho okumele sikwenze ukuqeda ububha, ukwandisa isibalo samathuba omsebenzi kanye nokunciphisa ukungalingani ezweni ngaphambi kokufika kowezi-2030.

ssw: kwenta sibonelo nje, tibonelelo tahulumende tetenhlalo kanye nabomatisi nyalo sekutsatsa sikhatsi lesincane kutsi kucutjungulwe.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuqapha nokuhlola ukusebenza kukahulumeni luyabonisa ukuthi ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingongqangi eziningi kuyaqhubeka nokuba ngcono.

ssw: kepha letinye letinyenti tisadzinga kusetjentwa lokuchubekako.
zul: kodwa-ke miningi eminye imikhakha esadinga ukuthi kuqiniswe isandla.

ssw: ngitawetfula umbiko ngaloku lokusihlanu lokuhamba embili, ngitawucala ngetemnotfo.
zul: ngizokwethula umbiko wendlela okusetshenzwe ngayo ezintweni ezinhlanu ezibekwe eqhulwini futhi ngizoqala ngomnothongokwesilinganiso esimaphakathi, umnotho ukhule ngamaphesenti angu-3,2ngonyaka, kusukela ngowe-1994 kuya kowezi-2012, nakuba kubekhona ukufadalalakomnotho okuholele ekutheni kulahleke amathuba omsebenzi ayisigidi.

ssw: ngekusebentisana sonkhe njengahulumende, bemabhizinisi, tisebenti kanye nemkhakha wemmango, siwunakekele lomnotfo wate wavuka.
zul: ngokusebenzisana kwethu singuhulumeni, abamabhizinisi, abasebenzi kanye nomkhakha womphakathi, sikwazile ukuwuvusa umnotho.

ssw: umcebo wavelonkhe, nawukalwa ngekwemkhicito lomkhulu wasekhaya (gdp), ukhule waba ngetulu kwa-3,5wetigidzigidzi letiphindvwe katsatfu temarandi.
zul: umcebo kazwelonke, uma ukalwa ngokwesamba somkhiqizo wezwe (i-gdp), ukhule wafinyelela ngaphezu kwezinkulungwane zezigidigidi zamarandi ezingu-3.5.

ssw: imisebenti manje iyasungulwa futsi.
zul: aseqalile futhi ukuvuleka amathuba omsebenzi.

ssw: manje sekunebantfu labatigidzi leti-15 labasebentako, linani lelikhulu kakhulu lelike labakhona kulelive, futsi kulomnyaka lophelile kuvulwe imisebenti lenge-650 000, ngekuya kwelihhovisi lelubalobalo laseningizimu afrika.
zul: njengamanje sekunabantu abasebenzayo abayizigidi eziyi-15 kuleli lizwe, okuyinani eliphezulu kunawo onke emlandweni wethu, futhi ngokusho kwezezibalo eningizimu afrika, ngonyaka odlule kuvulwe amathuba omsebenzi ayizinkulungwane ezingama-650.

ssw: loku solo akusiko lokukahle ngalokwenele.
zul: kodwa-ke lokhu akwanele neze.

ssw: kucashwa kwelusha eningizimu afrika kusachubeka nekuba yintfo leletsa kukhatsateka, njengoba kwenteka mhlaba wonkhe jikelele.
zul: ukuntula kwentsha amathuba omsebenzi eningizimu afrika kuyaqhubeka nokuba yinto esikhathazayo, njengoba kunjalo nakwamanye amazwe emhlabeni jikelele.

ssw: sitsatsa tinyatselo letinyenti, letifaka ekhatsi umtsetfo wekukhutsata intsela yekucashwa lokhutsata bacashi kutsi bacashe tisebenti letilusha.
zul: kunezinyathelo eziningana esizithathayo, kubandakanya nomthetho wesaphulelo sentela sokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi, okhuthaza abaqashi ukuthi baqashe intsha.

ssw: kutawukhishwa imitsefosimiso letawucinisekisa kutsi loku akutsintsi kabi tisebenti letingatfoli selekelelo nalesetikhulile.
zul: kunezimiso eziphathelene nalo mthetho ezizophasiswa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lokhu akubi nomthelela omubi kubasebenzi abangaxhasiwe noma abasebenzi abadala.

ssw: letinye tinyatselo ticuketfwe kusivumelwano selusha savelonkhe lesasayinwa esoweto ngamabasa lowendlulile.
zul: ezinye izinyathelo ziqukethwe kwisivumelwano sikazwelonke sentsha esasayindwa esoweto ngenyanga kambasa ngonyaka odlule.

ssw: luhlelo lwetemisebenti lekhulisiwe yahulumende kanye neluhlelo lwemisebenti yahulumende kuyachubeka nekuba siphephelo lesinemandla salabaphuyile kanye nelusha.
zul: uhlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nohlelo lwamathuba etoho omphakathi ziyaqhubeka nokuba yizinhlelo ezisebenza kahle ezivikela abantu abahlwempu nentsha ukuze bangakhahlamezeki kakhulu.

ssw: sakhe ematfuba emisebenti letigidzi leti-3.7 kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu edlule sivule amathuba etoho angaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-3,7.

ssw: bantfu betfu batfola imali lengenako nemakhono eluhlelweni lwetemisebenti yahulumende, labawasebentisela kutfola kucashwa lokuhlelekile.
zul: abantu bethu bazitholela imadlana kanye namakhono ohlelweni lwemisebenzi yomphakathi, abawasebenzisela ukufuna umsebenzi ohlelekile.

ssw: ikhabhinethi itibekele umgomo wekusungula ematfuba emisebenti letigidzi letisitfupha kusukela kulomnyaka kuye ku-2019, kucondvwe lusha.
zul: ikhabhinethi izibekele umkhawulo wamathuba etoho ayizigidi eziyisithupha kusukela ngalo nyaka kuya kowezi-2019, futhi ngalokhu kuhloswe ikakhulu ukuqasha intsha.

ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekusita kutenhlalo manje lolufinyelela kubantfu labatigidzi leti-16, luniketa tekuphepha kubantfu labatigidzi, ikakhulu bantfwana labasengotini.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lwezibonelelo zomphakathi manje selufinyelela kubantu abayizigidi eziyi-16, ikhakhulu izingane ezintulayo.

ssw: imiti leminyenti itfola kusitakala ngenca yetibonelelo tahulumende, imali yebantfwana, impesheni yalabadzala neyalabakhubatekile.
zul: imizi eminingi ithola ukusizakala ngenxa yezibonelelo zikahulumeni, imali yezingane, impesheni yabadala neyabakhubazekile.

ssw: letibonelelo titawuchubeka njalo ngoba imiti leminyenti itfola kusitakala ngobe ematfuba emisebenti ayimvelalakancane ngalesikhatsi semnotfo lobutsakatsaka.
zul: lezi zibonelelo zizoqhubeka njalo ngoba imizi eminingi ithola ukusizakala ngoba amathuba emisebenzi ayivelakancane ngalesi sikhathi somnotho ontengantengayo.

ssw: lamatfuba latfolakala kuhulumende, enta kutsi sisho ngekutigcabha sitsi, iningizimu afrika lesiphila kuyo lamuhla, incono kakhulu kunaleyo besiphila kuyo ngembi kwa-1994.
zul: la mathuba atholakala kuhulumeni, enza sisho ngeqholo ukuthi iningizimu afrika esiphila kuyo namhlanje ingcono kakhulu kunaleyo esasiphila kuyo ngaphambi kowe-1994.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi,sisesikhatsini lesimatima.
zul: bantu bakithi,namanje sisabhekene nesikhathi esinzima.

ssw: tintfo letenteka emnotfweni wasemelika setiholele ekuweni kwetimakethe tetimali lebetisavela, kufaka ekhatsi lirandi.
zul: izinto ezenzeka emnothweni wasemelika seziholele ekutheni ehle ngesivinini amandla emali yamazwe asafufusa, kubandakanya nerandi.

ssw: nga-2013, lirandi lehle nga-17,6 wemaphesenthi nalicatsaniswa nelidola lasemelika.
zul: ngenkathi kuqhubeka unyaka wezi-2013, amandla erandi ehle ngamaphesenti angu-17,6 uma liqhathaniswa nedola lasemelika.

ssw: silinangisonani sekuntjintjiselana siveta ingoti lenkhulu yekwehla nekwenyuka kwentsengo.
zul: ukwehla kwamandla emali kungenzeka kuholele ekutheni akhuphuke kakhulu amanani entengo yezimpahla futhi lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi uhlelo lwethu lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda lumbe eqolo.

ssw: nanoma kunjalo, tinkampani letitfumela imphahla ngaphandle kulamanye emave, ikakhulu umkhakha lokhicitako, kufanele tisebentise lelitfuba lekwehla kwemandla elirandi kanye nekuvuka lokunemandla emaveni emhlaba.
zul: kodwa-ke, izinkampani ezithumela izimpahla kwamanye amazwe, ikakhulu emkhakheni wezokukhiqizwa kwempahla, kumele zilisebenzise leli thuba elihlinzekwa yirandi elibuthakathaka kanye nokusimama komnotho womhlaba emva kokufadalala kwawo esikhathini esedlule.

ssw: njengoba sisenaletinselele, siyati kutsi singamelana nalesikhatsi sebumatima.
zul: nakuba sibhekene nalobu bunzima, siyazi ukuthi sizokwazi ukumelana nalesi sikhathi senxushunxushu ebangelwa ukwehla kwamandla emali.

ssw: sente njalo phambilini kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.
zul: sikwazile ukukwenza lokho phambilini kule minyaka emihlanu edlule.

ssw: sitawuvuka, ecinisweni, sitawuvuka sinemandla kunaphambilini nasingenta tintfo letifanele.
zul: futhi, eqinisweni, sizophuma kule nxushunxushu sinamandla kakhulu kunakuqala uma senza izinto ezifanelekile.

ssw: sifanele sisebentisane singuhulumende, temabhizinisi netisebenti kute sikhulise umnotfo wetfu ngesilinganiso lesingetulu kwemaphesenti lasihlanu kute kutsi sikhone kwakha imisebenti lesiyidzingako.
zul: kumele sisebenzisane njengohulumeni, abamabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi ukukhulisa umnotho wethu ngezinga elingaphezu kwamaphesenti amahlanu ukuze sikwazi ukuvula amathuba omsebenzi esiwadingayo.

ssw: ngenhlanhla lenhle lokusebentisana sekuvele kuyenteka.
zul: ngenhlanhla lokhu kubambisana sekuqalile ukwenzeka.

ssw: kwenteka ku-nedlac lekungulesinye setikhungo letibalulekile tekusebentisana kuntsandvo yetfu yelinyenti, emkhatsini wahulumende, temabhizinisi, tisebenti kanye nemkhakha wemmango.
zul: ukubambisana kwenzeka kwi-nedlac okungesinye sezikhungo ezibalulekile zokubambisana zentando yeningi yethu, phakathi kukahulumeni, abamabhizinisi, abasebenzi kanye nomkhakha wezinhlaka zomphakathi.

ssw: kwenteke ngisho nasekukhulumisaneni lebesiba nako nemmango wetemabhizinisi.
zul: lokhu kwenzekile futhi nasekubonisaneni esibe nakho nomphakathi wosomabhizinisi.

ssw: kulomnyaka lophelile ngicale kubandzakanya temabhizinisi etinyatselweni letitsite hulumende langatitsatsa kute kube lula kuchuba emabhizinisi kulelive lakitsi.
zul: ngonyaka odlule ngiqale ukubonisana nabamabhizinisi mayelana nezinyathelo ezingathathwa nguhulumeni ukuze kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi ezweni lethu.

ssw: lokwavela kuleyo nchubo kutsi manje, sesente kuvunywa kwekulawula nekuniketa emalayisensi ekuhlola lifutse letesimondzawo, emalayisensi emanti newasemayini kusebente kahle kakhulu nangemphumelelo.
zul: ngenxa yalolu hlelo lokubonisana nabamabhizinisi, manje sesikwenze lula ukulawulwa kanye nokunikezwa kwezimvume zokuhlolwa komthelela wokukhahlamezeka kwemvelo, nezimvume zamanzi kanye nezezimayini.

ssw: iphalamende isaphotfula tichibiyelo temtsetfo lotawunika emandla lentfuntfuko lenhle, kutawenteka ngaphansi kwemalanga lange-300, sikhatsi lesitsatfwako nakucalwa imayini, kusukela nakufakwa sicelo kudzimate kube sekuvunyweni kwekugcina.
zul: iphalamende liphothula izichibiyelo zomthetho ukuze kuqaliswe ukusebenza kwale nqubo ezoba nomthelela omuhle kakhulu, ezonciphisa ubude besikhathi sokusungula izimayini behle bufinyelele esikhathini esiyizinsuku ezingaphansi kwama-300, kusukela ekufakweni kwesicelo kuya ekwamukelweni kwaso.

ssw: lisekela lamengameli weriphabhulikhi liyachubeka nekuchuba tingcoco emkhatsini wahulumende, tinkampani tetimayini kanye netisebenti.
zul: iphini likamongameli weriphabhulikhi liyaqhubeka nokuhola izingxoxo eziphakathi kukahulumeni, izinkampani zezimayini kanye nabasebenzi.

ssw: inhloso yaloku kusimamisa tebudlelwane kutetimboni kulomkhakha lobalulekile wetemnotfo wetfu.
zul: injongo yalokhu ukuletha uzinzo kubudlelwano phakathi kwabaqashi nabasebenzi kulo mkhakha obaluleke kakhulu emnothweni wethu.

ssw: lenchubo ikhipha imiphumela.
zul: le nqubo seyibonakalise izithelo ezinhle.

ssw: titeleka kulomnyaka lophelile kulomkhakha tibe mbalwa futsi taba tesikhatsi lesincane.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sinciphile isibalo seziteleka kulo mkhakha futhi azidonsanga isikhathi eside kakhulu.

ssw: futsi lokubaluleke kakhulu kutsi, tinchubo tetetimboni tenteka ngekuhambisana nemtsetfo ngalokungagucuki.
zul: futhi into ebaluleke kakhulu ukuthi izinqubo zokubonisana phakathi kwabaqashi nabasebenzi zenzeka ngendlela ehambisana nokuthotshelwa komthetho.

ssw: siye sangenelela kutetimayini ngobe ngutona letibaluleke kakhulu ekwakheni ematfuba emisebenti.
zul: sibone kufanele singenelele kwezezimayini ngoba lo mkhakha ngomunye wemikhakha yethu ebalulekile evula amathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

ssw: sidzinga umkhakha wetimayini losebentako.
zul: sidinga umkhakha wezezimayini osebenzayo.

ssw: timayini ticasha bantfu labangetulu kwahhafu wesigidzi.
zul: izimayini ziqashe abantu abevile kwisigamu sesigidi.

ssw: ngutona letingumkhakha lomkhulu wemali lengenako levela emaveni angaphandle kulelive letfu.
zul: lona ngumkhakha ongenisa imali evela kwamanye amazwe enkulu kunayo yonke eminye imikhakha ezweni lethu.

ssw: tibuye futsi tifake tigidzigidzi letinge-20 temarandi letingena ngco kumalingena yentsela.
zul: futhi lo mkhakha ufaka imali eyizigidigidi zamarandi ezibalelwa kuma-20 engena ngqo esikhwameni sentela saleli lizwe.

ssw: tetimayini tibuye futsi kube ngito letifaka sandla kakhulu njengemtsengi wemphahla netinsita, kanye nemfakigalelo kuleminye imikhakha yemnotfo wetfu naleminye iminotfo emhlabeni jikelele.
zul: futhi izimayini zinegalelo elikhulu kakhulu njengomthengi wempahla nemisebenzi ehlinzekwayo, futhi zihlinzeka ngemikhiqizo kweminye imikhakha yomnotho wethu, nakwamanye amazwe emhlabeni jikelele.

ssw: sihlola kubambisana nalabatsintsekako kute kubukwe ludzaba lwetindlu tekuhlala emadolobheni lanetimayini.
zul: sicubungula izindlela zokubambisana nabo bonke abathintekayo ukuze kulungiswe udaba lwezezindlu emadolobheni akhelene nezimayini.

ssw: akengiphindze futsi ngikhumbute tinkampani tetimbiwa kutsi 2014 ngumncamulajucu wato wekutfutfukisa tetindlu netimo tekuhlala tebavukuti kanye nekuzuza lokunyeti lokuhlosiwe.
zul: ngithanda futhi nokukhumbuza izinkampani zezimayini ukuthi unyaka wezi-2014 yisikhathi esingumnqamulajuqu ezibekelwe wona ukuthi ziphucule ezezindlu kanye nezimo abaphila ngaphansi kwazo abasebenzi basezimayini nokuthi kufezekiswe imikhawulo eminingana ebekiwe okumele kufinyelelwe kuyona.

ssw: hulumende uyachubeka nekulandzelela nekuphocelela kuhambisana kuko kokubili tinhlelo tetenhlalo netetisebenti tetimayini kanye nalokuhloswe yishatha yetimayini.
zul: uhulumeni uyaqhubeka nokuqapha kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuqaliswa kwezinhlelo zezimayini eziphathelene nenhlalo nokunakekelwa kwabasebenzi kanye nokufezekiswa kwemikhawulo ebekwe ngokwemigomo kasomqulu wesivumelwano sezezimayini.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,malunga lahloniphekile,ngaphandle kwetetimayini, sibuye satfola lokunye lokusihlanu lobekukhicita imisebenti nga-2009.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,malungu ahloniphekile,ngaphandle komkhakha wezezimayini, ngonyaka wezi-2009 sahlonza eminye imikhakha emihlanu ezovula amathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

ssw: loku bekutekuvakasha, tekulima, temnotfo letinganukubeti simondzawo nemvelo, kutfutfukiswa kwetakhiwonchanti netekukhicita.
zul: le mikhakha ngowezokuvakasha, ezolimo, umnotho obhekelela imvelo, ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kanye nowezokukhiqizwa kwempahla.

ssw: imboni yetekuvakasha seyikhule ngemandla.
zul: imboni yezokuvakasha seyikhule ngendlela emangalisayo.

ssw: nga-1993 iningizimu afrika yatfola tivakashi tangaphandle letitigidzi letintsatfu.
zul: ngonyaka we-1993, iningizimu afrika yamukela abavakashi abavela kwamanye amazwe abayizigidi ezintathu kuphela.

ssw: nga-2012 lelinani lakhula laba tivakashi letitigidzi leti-13.
zul: ngowezi-2012 lesi sibalo bese sikhule safinyelela kubavakashi abayizigidi eziyi-13.

ssw: sitawuchubeka nekukhulisa lemboni, ngenca yekukhona kwakha imisebenti.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokukhulisa le mboni, ngenxa yokuthi inegalelo elikhulu ekuvulweni kwamathuba omsebenzi.

ssw: nga-2012 sitfule luhlelo lwetakhiwonchanti lwavelonkhe, loluholwa yikhomishini yekucondziswa kwesakhiwonchanti yelihhovisi lamengameli.
zul: ngowezi-2012 sethula uhlelo lwengqalasizinda lukazwelonke, oluholwa ngumongameli ngokusebenzisa ikhomishana kamongameli yokuqondisa ukwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda.

ssw: ekuhambeni kwesikhatsi sikhone kutjala sigidzigidzi sinye lesiphindvwe katsatfu kutakhiwonchanti temmango kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu edlule sitshale inkulungwane yezigidigidi zamarandi ohlelweni lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda yomphakathi.

ssw: leminyenti yalemiklamo seyiphotfuliwe noma seyidvute kuphotfulwa.
zul: eminingi kule miklamo seyiphothuliwe noma sekusele kancane ukuthi iphothulwe.

ssw: ngitawubala nje lembalwa.
zul: ngizothi nje qaphu qaphu ngemiklamo embalwa.

ssw: luhlelo lwemabhasi latfutsa aphindzelela i-rea vaya ejozi manje lusetjentiswa bahlali basegauteng labangetulu kwaba-100 000. tinhlelo letifana nalolu tiyakhiwa ekapa, etshwane, enelson mandela bay, ebuffalo city, ethekwini naserustenburg.
zul: egoli, uhlelo lwamabhasi asheshayo olubizwa nge-rea vaya manje selusetshenziswa ngabahlali basegauteng abangaphezu kwezi-100 000. kunezinhlelo ezifana nalolu ezakhiwayo ekapa, tshwane, nelson mandela bay, buffalo city, ethekwini kanye nase-rustenburg.

ssw: lugu lolusikhumulo semikhumbi selwentiwe lwaba ncono.
zul: asenziwe ngcono amachweba akuleli lizwe kanye nezikhumulo zemikhumbi.

ssw: sesakhe liphayiphi lekuhambisa emafutsa lelingemakhilomitha lasikhombisa lelisuka ethekwini liya egauteng kute litfutse tigidzigidzi letine temakhiyubhikhi emalitha aphethiloli, dizili naphethiloli wetindizamshini ngemnyaka.
zul: sesakhe iphayiphi elithwala uphethiloli elingamakhilomitha angama-700 ubude elisuka ethekwini liye egauteng elithutha izigidigidi ezine ngonyaka zamakhubhikhi-litha kaphethiloli wezimoto, udizili kanye nophethiloli wamabhanoyi.

ssw: sekwakhiwe imigwaco lemisha noma imizila lecishe ifike kumakhilomitha layi-1500.
zul: sekwakhiwe imigwaqo nemizila emisha ecishe ibe ngamakhilomitha ayi-1 500. le nqubekelaphambili eseyenziwe ekwakhiweni kwemigwaqo isikhumbuza abantu ababeyingxenye yalo hulumeni esikhathini esedlule ababenesifiso sokubona leli lizwe linengqalasizinda kanokusho, abanjengongqongqoshe wezokuthutha waphambilini umnu dullar omar.

ssw: umkakhe lotsandzekako farieda ungulomunye wetivakashi tetfu lamuhla kusihlwa.
zul: unkosikazi wakhe u-farieda ungomunye wezimenywa zethu ezinathi lapha kusihlwa nje.

ssw: kwakhiwa kwemizila lemisha yesitimela sekucalile empumalanga, kute kunciphise kugcwala kwetitfutsi emigwacweni.
zul: sekuqaliwe ukwakhiwa kojantshi besitimela abasha empumalanga, ukuze kuncishiswe ingcindezi emgwaqweni.

ssw: umklamo wegautrain manje usebenta ngalokuphelele futsi itfwala bagibeli labangetulu kwetigidzi leti-1,2 ngenyanga.
zul: umklamo we-gautrain manje ususebenza ngokuphelele futhi uthwala abagibeli abangu-1,2 wezigidi ngenyanga.

ssw: sikhungo sekutfwala bagibeli ngaloliwe saseningizimu afrika sitawusebentisa ngetulu kwetigidzigidzi leti-120 temarandi kuleminyaka lelishumi letako kutsenga titimela letinsha.
zul: uphiko lwezokuthuthwa kwabantu ngezitimela lwaseningizimu afrika luzosebenzisa imali engaphezu kwezigidigidi eziyi-r120 ukuthenga izitimela ezintsha kule minyaka eyishumi ezayo.

ssw: i-transnet yetfula indlelalisu yayo lenkhulu yaloko lokudzingwa yimakethe lebita tigidzidzi temarandi letinge-300, yekwakha sakhiwonchanti setitfutsi lesidzingeka kakhulu.
zul: abakwa-transnet sebeluqalisile uhlelo lwabo olukhulukazi lokubhekana nesidingo esikhuphukayo sokuhlinzeka amakhasimende abo ngalo lonke usizo aludingayo, oluzodla izigidigidi ezingama-r300, futhi lokhu kuzoholela ekwakhiweni kwengqalasizinda yezokuthutha edingeka kakhulu.

ssw: kute sitfole emandla etemnotfo lokhona enshonalanga kapa naselugwini lwasenshonalanga, setfule indzawo yekutfutfukisa timboni esaldanha sabuye futsi savula timboni letimbili letinsha e-atlantis.
zul: ngenhloso yokusimamisa umnotho wasentshonalanga kapa nowendawo esogwini olusentshonalanga, sesethule isifunda sokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni sase-saldanha futhi savula namafemu amabili e-atlantis.

ssw: kute kwentiwe ncono kuphakelwa kwemanti, kuphotfulwe kwakhiwa kwemadamu lamakhulu lamabili, i-de hoop elimpopo kanye ne-spring grove kwazulu-natal, bese kutsi umlente wesibili wemklamo i-lesotho highlands water wetfulwe madvute nje.
zul: ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukuphakelwa kwamanzi, sekuphothulwe amadamu amakhulu amabili amasha, okuyi-de hoop elimpopo kanye ne-spring grove kwazulu-natali, kanti futhi isigaba sesibili somklamo we-lesotho highlands water project sizokwethulwa khona maduze nje.
