zul: njengengxenye yomzamo onohlonze wokwenza izwe lethu liphephe futhi livikeleke kakhudlwana, ngomfumfu ngonyaka odlule kwethulwa iqhingasu lokutshalwa kwamaphoyisa nokubambisana kwawo nomphakathi.

ssw: engcungcutseleni yamengameli yebudlova lobumiselwe kubulili kanye nekubulawa kwalabasikati, bomake labavela kuyo yonkhe imikhakha bahlangana ndzawonye kanye nahulumende netinhlangano temmango kute bente inkhombandlela yekucedza budlova lobumiselwe kubulili, kwenta kancono kuchumana kwekuhlela, kanye nekusungula kutinikela ekutfoleni tinsita kanye nekuphendvula.
zul: futhi lizohlinzeka ngezinsiza ezengeziwe zokuqhuba umsebenzi wobuphoyisa futhi lulethe ukuxhumana okungcono phakathi kwamaphoyisa nemiphakathi mayelana namasu okuvimbela ubugebengu.

ssw: kunemsebenti lowentiwako wekufezekisa tincomo talengcungcutsela, kufaka ekhatsi kulungiselela lisu lekuhlela lavelonkhe lebudlova lobumiselwe kubulili.
zul: lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi amaphoyisa akhuthale ekulwisaneni nobugebengu futhi athathe izinyathelo ezinqala zokuthola izixazululo mayelana nezinye izinto ezikhathaza umphakathi ngokuphepha kwawo.

ssw: kulomnyaka, sitawusebenta kanye nebalingani betfu etinhlanganweni temmango kufezekisa tincumo tengcungcutsela yebudlova lobumiselwe kubulili kanye nekubulawa kwalabasikati.
zul: ngaphezu kwalokho, siqinisa nokusebenza kwezimpiko ezikhethekile ezihlukahlukene, njengophiko olulwisana nodlame lomndeni, uphiko lokuvikelwa kwezingane kanye nophiko lwamacala ezocansi futhi siyawaphucula namandla namakhono ethu okuphathwa kwezikhungo kanye nokugcina amarekhodi emazingeni wonke.

ssw: siyakhulisa futsi sifaka timali letinyenti etindzaweni tekwesekela, njengemathuthuzela care centre nemakhuseleka care centre.
zul: umbutho wamaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (i-saps) sewuqalise inqubo yokuhlela kabusha ukuze kudluliselwe izinsizakalo zamaphoyisa ezengeziwe eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezisemiphakathini.

ssw: sitowenta kancono lizinga letinsita etindzweni tekukhosela siphindze futsi sicinisekise kutsi tonkhe tiyawatsatsa emalunga e-lgbtqi+.
zul: engqungqutheleni kamongameli yokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane kanye nokubulawa kwabo, abantu besifazane abavela kuyo yonke imikhakha babuthana ndawonye kanye nohulumeni nezinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana ngenhloso yokwakha umkhombandlela wokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane, kwenziwe ngcono ukuhlela ngendlela ehambelanayo, futhi kwenziwe nesibophezelo sokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza ezidingekayo kanye nokuphendula.

ssw: sitawucinisekisa sikhungo selucingo lwamahhala loluphutfumako lolwesekela bomake labahlangabetana nebudlova lobumiselwe kubulili siphindze futsi sente siciniseko sekutsi siyasebenta.
zul: uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokuqalisa ukusebenza kwezinqumo ezathathwa engqungqutheleni, kubandakanya nokwakha uhlelo lukazwelonke lwamasu okusebenza oluqondene nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane.

ssw: sitilalele ticelo tekwenta kutsi kube netimali tekulwa nebudlova lobumiselwe kubulili, futsi sebeke eceleni imali kulesabelotimali samanje kwesekela letincumo letatsatfwa kulengcungcutsela.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizosebenzisana nezinhlangano kanye nezikhungo esibambene nazo emphakathi wonkana ukuqalisa ukusebenza kwezinqumo ezathathwa engqungqutheleni kazwelonke yokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane kanye nokubulawa kwabo.

ssw: hulumende utawuhola umkhankhaso lofaka ekhatsi emadvodza nebafana njengaboshampeni labanemdlandla emzabalazweni wekulwa nebudlova lobumiselwe kubulili.
zul: sihlinzeka ngezimali ezengeziwe ezikhungweni zokweseka nokunakekela ezinjengamathuthuzela care centres kanye namakhuseleka care centre.

ssw: kuphelisa budlova lobumiselwe kubulili yintfo yavelonkhe lephutfumako lebekwa embili ledzinga kuhlanganiswa kwabo bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika kanye nekuhlanganyela kwato tonkhe tikhungo.
zul: besilokhu siqhubeka nemizamo yokuqinisekisa ukuthi zisebenza kangcono izinkantolo zamacala ocansi.

ssw: iningizimu afrika inebantfu labanyenti labasebentisa tidzakamiva budlabha, lokubese kubangela bugebengu kanye nebudlova lobentiwa kubomake nebantfwana, kujulisa buphuya kuphindze futsi kubange inhlupheko nebuhlungu lobukhulu emindenini.
zul: sizoyenza ngcono ikhwalithi yezinsizakalo ezikhungweni zokunakekela nokukhosela futhi siqinisekise ukuthi lezi zikhungo ziyawakhoselisa namalungu omphakathi wabantu bobulili obufanayo abathandanayo, phecelezi i-lgbtqi+.

ssw: singuhulumende siyachubeka nekucalisa tinyatselo tekungenelela tekulungisa tinkinga tetenhlalo letidlovadlova imimango yetfu njengekusebentisa tjwala netidzakamiva budlabha.
zul: sizoqinisa futhi sihlomise isikhungo sezingcingo sikazwelonke esisekela abesifazane abazithola bebhekene nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane futhi siqinisekise ukuthi sisebenza kahle lesi sikhungo.

ssw: kwati njengoba vele siyati kutsi kunekuchumana lokunemandla emkhatsini wekusebentisa budlabha tidzakamiva, kushushunjiswa kwetidzakamiva, bugebengu kanye nekungavikeleki kwemimamango – sigcile ekulweni nalenkinga kanye nemtfombo wayo ngekusebentisa tinhlelo tekuvikela bantfu labahlaseleka kalula ikakhulu lusha.
zul: sisizwile isicelo sokuthi kuhlinzekwe izimali zokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane, futhi kwisabelomali samanje sibeke eceleni imali okuzosekelwa ngayo izinqumo ezathathwa engqungqutheleni.

ssw: siyagcizelela kutsi emashibhini kanye netindzawo tekutsengisa tjwala letisedvute netikolwa tifanele kutsi tivalwe.
zul: uhulumeni uzohola umkhankaso wokubandakanya amadoda kanye nabafana njengezishabasheki ezikhuthele zomzabalazo wokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane.

ssw: siyacaphela kepha, njengoba bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika benta, kutsi imitamo yetfu lemikhulu yekucedza buphuya, kweswelakala kwemisebenti, kungalingani kutawuzuza lokuncane ngaphandle uma ngabe silwa nekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane nenkhohlakalo kuko konkhe lapho ivela khona nakuto tonkhe tindzawo temmango.
zul: ukuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane kuyisidingo sikazwelonke esiphuthumayo esibekwe eqhulwini, esidinga ukuthi kugqugquzelwe bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika futhi kubandakanywe zonke izikhungo.

ssw: lesinyatselo lesisitsatsa manje sekucedza inkhohlakalo bese nekwenta labo labatsintsekako kutsi baphendvule ngetento tabo kutawuncuma sivinini kanye nendlela yetingucuko letimandla tetendlalo netemnotfo lesitifunako.
zul: iningizimu afrika inesibalo esiphezulu ngokwesabekayo sabantu abaxhaphaza izidakamizwa, okuyinto ebhebhethekisa ubugebengu nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane, kukhulisa ububha nobuphofu futhi kudala ubunzima nobuhlungu obukhulu emindenini.

ssw: tembulo letivela kukhomishini yazondo lephenya ngekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane kanye nalamanye emakhomishini tiyaphatamisa kakhulu ngoba tiveta bugebengu lobujulile lobujika insayeya kusisekelo sembuso wetfu wentsandvo yelinyenti.
zul: singuhulumeni, siyaqhubeka nokuqalisa izinhlelo zokungenelela ukuze kulwiswane nezihlava zomphakathi eziyikhahlameza kakhulu imiphakathi, ezinjengobudakwa kanye nokuxhashazwa kwezidakamizwa.

ssw: siyawancoma lakhomishini ngalomsebenti lawentako, imvamisa ngaphansi kwetimo letiyinsayeya, kuvumbulula liciniso.
zul: njengoba sazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi kunokuxhumana okuqinile phakathi kokuxhashazwa kwezidakamizwa, ukushushumbiswa kwezidakamizwa, ubugebengu kanye nokungabi khona kokuphepha nokuvikeleka emiphakathini – sigxile ekulwisaneni nale nkinga emthonjeni wayo ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokuvimbela eziqondiswe kubantu abasengcupheni, ikakhulukazi intsha yakuleli.

ssw: lamakhomishini adzinga kwenta imisebenti yawo ngaphandle kwekuvinjwa futsi sicela bonkhe labo labakhona kuwasita kutsi bawasite eluphenyweni lwawo ngekutsi baye kunika bufakazi.
zul: asijiki nakancane ekutheni amathaveni, amashibhini kanye nezindawo zotshwala esizeduze kwezikole kumele kuvalwe.

ssw: ekuhambeni kwesikhatsi lamakhomishini atawutfola loko lakutfolako abuye ente tincomo ngekuhambisana nemsebenti lanikwe wona, bufakazi bebugebengu lobuvelako butawubukwa yinchubo yetebulungiswa betebugebengu.
zul: kuyinto esiyaziyo, futhi eyaziwa ngabantu bonke baseningizimu afrika, ukuthi imizamo yethu emikhulukazi yokuqeda ububha, ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokungalingani iyozuza impumelelo encane kakhulu uma singakabhekani ngqo nesihlava zokubhozonyelwa kombuso kanye nenkohlakalo noma kuphi lapho kuzibonakalisa khona lokhu futhi nakuyo yonke imikhakha yempilo yomphakathi.

ssw: lapho khona kunebufakazi lobanele bekutsi kushushiswe, kushushiswa kutawulandzela masinyane futsi timali tahulumende letebiwe tifanele kutsi titfolakale, tibuye ngekushesha.
zul: izinyathelo esizithatha manje zokuqeda inkohlakalo kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuthi bayaphendula ngemisebenzi yabo emibi labo ababandakanyekayo, yizona ezizolawula isivinini kanye nomgudu ophokophele oguqukweni lwenhlalo nolwezomnotho olunohlonze esilufunayo.

ssw: kute kube ngumanje, sivumelene ne-ndpp, kutsi kunesidzingo lesiphutfumako sekusungula, ehhovisi le-ndpp, luphiko lwekuphenya lelitawubukana nenkhohlakalo lematima nemacala lahambisana nayo, ngekuhambisana nesigaba 7 semtsetfo we-npa.
zul: izindaba ezivela kwikhomishana yophenyo kazondo ephenya isihlava sokubhozonyelwa kombuso kanye namanye amakhomishana, ziyakhathaza kakhulu, ngoba phela zidalula ububanzi kanye nokujula kwezenzo zobugebengu eziyinselele kwisisekelo sombuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu.

ssw: masinyane nje ngitawenta simemetelo lesitawubeka imibandzela letsite loluphiko lelitawutsatsisa kuyo.
zul: siyawancoma lawa makhomishana ngomsebenzi awenzayo, futhi esikhathini esiningi awenza ngaphansi kobunzima obukhulu, ukuze kuvundululwe iqiniso.

ssw: ngalokubanti, loluphiko lutawugcila kubufakazi lobuvele kukhomishini yazondo lephenya ngekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane, nakulamanye emakhomishini nakuluphenyo lwekujezisa.
zul: lawa makhomishana kumele enze umsebenzi wawo ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa nokuvinjelwa, futhi siyabanxusa bonke labo bantu abasesimweni sokufaka isandlaukuthi basondele bawalekelele amakhomishana ophenyweni alwenzayo.

ssw: lutawukhomba emacala lafanele kutsi abekwe embili bese luyashushisa futsi lutawutfola imphahla letsatfwa njengemphumela wenkhohlakalo.
zul: nakuba kusazothatha isikhathi ukuthi lawa makhomishana akhiphe imiphumela yalokho akutholile ophenyweni lwawo futhi enze nezincomo ngokuhambisana namagunya awo, ubufakazi bezenzo zobugebengu obuvelayo kumele bufakelwe izibuko wuhlelo lobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu.

ssw: loluphiko lutawuhlanganisa emakhono lamanyenti ekuphenya newekushushisa lavela ngekhatsi kuhulumende nakumkhakha lotimele ngaphansi kwemcondzisi lophenyako nalophansi kwa-ndpp.
zul: lapho kunobufakazi obuphathekayo obuvumela ukuba kuqaliswe inqubo yokushushisa, kumele ilandele ngokushesha futhi kubuyiswe ngokushesha imali kahulumeni entshontshiwe.

ssw: esikhatsini lesidze, sitawusebentisana ne-npa kanye nalamanye ema-ejensi lacinisekisa kulandzelwa kwemtsetfo kwakha sisombululo lesicinile lesitawucinisa emandla enchubo yebulungiswa bebugebengu kubukana nenkhohlakalo.
zul: ngenxa yalokho-ke, sivumelene no-ndpp omusha ukuthi kukhona isidingo esisheshayo sokusungula, ehhovisi lika-ndpp, uphiko lokuphenya oluzobhekana ngqo namacala amabi obugebengu kanye namanye ahlobene nawo, ngokuhambisana nesigaba 7 somthetho we-npa.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi,lapho sishukana netinsayeya tesikhatsi setfu lesisandza kwendlula, futsi lapho sijulisa imitamo yetfu yekuncoba nebuhlungu lobuyingoti bekungentiwa kwebulungiswa kweminyakanyaka, kubalulekile kutsi sente njalo emehlo etfu abe agcile kulikusasa.
zul: khona maduze nje ngizokhipha isisaziso esisemthethweni esizobeka ngokucacile imigomo yokusebenza yalolu phiko.

ssw: tigucula indlela bantfu labakhulumisana ngayo, indlela imimango lesebenta ngayo kanye nendlela lebuswa ngayo.
zul: ngokubanzi, lolu phiko, luzogxila ebufakazini osebuvelile kwikhomishana yophenyo kazondo ephenya isihlava sokubhozonyelwa kombuso, nakwamanye amakhomishana kanye nasophenyweni lwezigcawu zokuqondisa izigwegwe.

ssw: imiphumela yekugucuka kwesimo selitulu seyivele iyevakala, timo telitulu letimandla kakhulu timosha tindlela tekuphila, imimango kanye neminotfo yamave.
zul: luzohlonza amacala aseqhulwini okumele aphenywe futhi ashushiswe, futhi luzodla nempahla ehlonzwe njengempahla ethengwe ngemali etholakale ezenzweni zobugebengu.

ssw: njengesive lesincane, lesineminyaka lenge-25 singene kuntsandvo yelinyenti, sibukene nekukhetsa lokumatima.
zul: lolu phiko luzohlanganisa ndawonye abaphenyi kanye nabashushisi abaningi futhi abahlukahlukene, abavela ngaphakathi emkhakheni kahulumeni kanye nalabo abavela emkhakheni ozimele abazoholwa ngumqondisi wezokuphenya osebenza ngaphansi kuka-ndpp.

ssw: kukhetsa kwendlulwa tingucuko tetheknoloji noma siyilawule kute sitfutfukise loko lesifuna kukutfutfukisa.
zul: ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, sizosebenzisana ne-npa kanye nezinye izimpiko zokuphoqelela ukuthotshelwa komthetho ukuthuthukisa isixazululo sesikhathi eside esizoqinisa amandla okuqhuba umsebenzi ngempumelelo ohlelweni lobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu ukuze lukwazi ukubhekana ngqo nenkohlakalo.

ssw: kukukhetsa emkhatsini wekungalingani noma kwakha imphumelelo lesabelana yona ngekwenta lokusha.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,njengoba sisazama ukuxazulula izinselele ezibangelwe yizinto ezenzeke kuleli esikhathini esifushane esedlule, futhi njengoba siqinisa imizamo yethu yokunqoba ububi bokungahanjiswa kwezinto ngobulungiswa, okwaqhubeka amakhulukhulu eminyaka, kusemqoka ukuthi ngenkathi sikwenza lokho amehlo ethu ahlale ethe njo esikhathini esizayo.

ssw: kwakhiwa ngemphumelelo kwetheleskophu i-meerkat enyakatfo kapa, itheleskophu yemagagasi lenkhulu kakhulu emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele leva umsindvo wemagagasi lomncane kakhulu, kanye nekwakhiwa kwe- square kilometre array sekwente iningizimu afrika kutsi ikhone kucecesha tingcweti letinemakhono emikhakheni lefanana nekubukisiswa kwemkhatsi, tebunjinela letihamba embili kanye nekusetjentiswa kwabongcondvomshini labakhulu futsi labanemandla kakhulu letingcweti tisetjentiselwa kwakha i-hera, itheleskophu yemagagasi kutfola, kwekucala ngca, inkhomba yemsindvo lomncane wemagagasi wetikhanyeti nema-galaxy ekucala lawakhiwakucala ngesikhatsi kutalwa imvelo yonkhe.
zul: imiphumela emibi kakhulu yesivuvu sokushisa komhlaba, esiguqula isimo sezulu sethu esijwayelekile, isiyazwela impela njengoba izimo zezulu ezixakile zicekela phansi izindlela abaziphilisa ngazo abantu, futhi zicekela phansi imiphakathi kanye namazwe.

ssw: loku akusiko kwekutfutfukisa nje lwatiso lwebantfu ngekutsi imvelo yonkhe idzabuka kuphi – kumayelana nekuphendvula kutinsayeya iningizimu afriaka lebukene nato manje nasesikhatsini lesitako.
zul: njengesizwe esisha, okuyiminyaka engama-25 nje kuphela izwe libuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, sibhekene nezimo ezinzima futhi ezingagwemeki okumele sikhethe kuzona.

ssw: kumayelana nekutfutfukisa itheknoloji nemakhono latawakha umnotfo lonemandla naloncintisanako lowakha imisebenti lenesitfunti nalesimeme.
zul: kumele sikhethe phakathi kokushiywa ngemuva wuguquko olwenzekayo kwezobuchwepheshe noma silubambe ngazo zombili, silusebenzisele ukufezekisa izifiso nezinjongo zethu zentuthuko.

ssw: kumayelana nekwenta kancono kucinisekisa kuba khona kwekudla, kulawulwa kancono kwetifo, kanye nemandla lashiphile, lahlobile futsi lasebenta kahle kakhulu.
zul: kumele sikhethe phakathi kokuqinisa nokugxilisa ukungaiingani kanye nokwakha isimo esizophumelelisa umuntu wonke ngokusebenzisa intuthuko yokuqanjwa nokusungulwa kwezinto zesimanjemanje.

ssw: kumayelana nekuhlalisa kahle bantfu kanye netisombululo tekutfutfukisa tenhlalo letakhelwe kutidzingo tebantfu naloko labakufunako.
zul: ngaphandle kokuthi nathi siguquke nalolu guquko olwenzekayo, ngaphandle kokuthi nathi siluqonde kahle uhlobo loguquko olunohlonze olushintsha isimo somhlaba wethu, nangaphandle kokuthi nathi siwabambe ngazo zombili amathuba ahlinzekwa yilolu guquko, izithembiso esazenza ngenkathi izwe lethu lithola inkululeko ziyohlala zinjalo, ziyithembiso ezingafezekisiwe.

ssw: kucinisekisa kutsi silawula ngemphumelelo nangekuphutfuma lokukhulu tingucuko tetetheknoloji ngekufuna kukhula kwemnotfo lokufaka konkhe ekhatsi kanye nekutfutfuka kwetenhlalo, ngisungule ikhomishini yetheknoloji yesimanjemanje.
zul: ukwakhiwa ngempumelelo kwesibonakude i-meerkat enyakatho kapa, okuyisibonakude esikhulukazi emhlabeni futhi esisebenza ngamagagasi omoya esinamandla amakhulukazi okubona izinto ezikude emajukujukwini omkhathi, kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwe-square kilometre array (i-ska) sekwenze ukuthi iningizimu afrika ikwazi ukuqeqesha ongoti bemikhakha enjengokubukelwa komkhathi, ubunjiniyela obuseqophelweni eliphakeme kanye nabomkhakha wokusetshenziswa kwamakhompyutha asesingeni eliphakeme kakhulu, obizwa nge-supercomputing.

ssw: ifaka ekhatsi bantfu labatiwako labanelwati labatsetfwe emikhakheni yetenhlalo leyehlukene, lekhomishini itawusebenta njengemeluleki lomkhulu wavelonkhe kutingucuko tetheknoloji yesimanjemanje.
zul: labo ngoti bayasetshenziswa njengamanje ukwakha i-hera, isibonakude esisebenza ngemagagasi omoya esakhelwe ukuhlonza, okokuqala ngqa, isiginali yamagagasi omoya eyingqayizivele evela ezinkanyezini kanye nemithala (ama-galaxy) yasemandulo okungeyokuqala ngqa eyakheka ngenkathi kudaleka imvelo yonke.

ssw: itawukhomba tinchubomgomo, tinhlelo nemasu latawenta iningizimu afriaka ibe ngumdlalindzima wemhlaba loncintisanako emaveni emhlaba kutingucuko tetheknoloji.
zul: lokho akuphathelene nje kuphela nokuqhubekisela phambili ukuqonda kwabantu ngokudaleka kwemvelo yonke – kepha kuphathelene nokubhekana nezinselele ezibhekene nabantu baseningizimu afrika esikhathini samanje kanye nalezo abazobhekana nazo esikhathini esizayo.

ssw: kwakhela kulomsebenti lesiwente kulomnyaka lophelile, sigcila ekuchubekeni nekucinisa emakhono embuso.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nokuthuthukisa ubuchwepheshe kanye namandla namakhono okusebenza azokwakha umnotho okhulayo, oguquka nezikhathi nokwaziyo ukuncintisana neminye, futhi ovula amathuba omsebenzi asezingeni elamukelekile futhi asimeme.

ssw: sente inchubekelembili ekukhuliseni bukhulu neluhlaka lwembuso, futsi lomsebenti sitawucedza ekupheleni kwesikhatsi sekulawula salo hulumende wakhetswa nga-2014.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nokuqinisekisa ukuthi kunokudla okwanele kuleli, ukulawulwa kwezifo kangcono, kanye namandla kagesi angambi eqolo, ahlanzekile futhi asebenza kahle.

ssw: simema bonkhe bantfu baeninghizimu afrika kutsi babeke imibono kutsi hulumende singamntjintja kahle kanjani kute sihlangabetane netidzingo netimfuno tebantfu.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nezindawo zokuhlalisa abantu zesimanjemanje kanye nezinsizakalo zokuthuthukiswa komphakathi ezakhelwe phezu kwezidingo zabantu kanye nezinto ezithandwa yibona.

ssw: ekwenteni kancono emakhono etisebenti tahulumende, sikolwa savelonkhe sahulumde (i-nsg) singenisa tifundvo letinyenti letiphocelelekile, letitsintsa tindzawo letifanana nenkhambo lenhle, kulwa nenkhohlakalo, kuphatsa ezingeni leliphakeme inchubo yekutsenga imikhicito netinsita kanye nekuyiswa kwebaphatsi kuletinye tindzawo bayosebenta umsebenti lomatima kute kuciniswe kwetfulwa kwetinsita.
zul: lokhu kuphathelene nokuphatha okunobuhlakani, okusabelayo futhi okusebenza kahle.

ssw: sitawendlulisa kusebenta kwesigaba se-8 semtsetfo wekulawula kwahulumende nekuphatsa, locinisa kwenta kungabi semtsetfweni kutsi tisebenti tahulumende tichube ibhizinisi nembuso kanye nekwenta hulumende akwati kubukana kahle kakhulu netento tenkhohlakalo.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukuthi silusebenzisa kahle futhi ngokuphuthuma okukhulu uguquko lwezobuchwepheshe ekuphishekeleni ukukhula komnotho okubandakanyayo kanye nokuthuthukiswa komphakathi, sengiqoke ikhomishana kamongameli eqondene noguquko lwezimboni lwesine olugxile ekusetshenzisweni kobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje.

ssw: lomtsetfo utawenta kutsi kube netijeziso letimatima, kufaka ekhatsi tinhlawulo noma nekuboshwa kwetikhulu letephula umtsetfo.
zul: le khomishana, ezobandakanya abantu abavelele futhi abahlonishwayo abavela emikhakheni ehlukahlukene yomphakathi, izosebenza njengethimba elimkhakha-mningi likazwelonke lokweluleka maqondana noguquko lokusetshenziswa kobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje obusebenzisa izinhlelo-kusebenza zekhompyutha.

ssw: luphiko lwenkhambo lelungile, sizotsa, kujezisa kanye nekwelekelela ngetebucwepheshe lutawusungulwa kute lucinise kulawulwa kwenkhambo lefanele nekulwa nenkhohlakalo kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi bayajeziswa labephula tinchubo tahulumende.
zul: lokhu kuzohlonza futhi kwenze izincomo mayelana nezinqubomgomo, amaqhingasu kanye nezinhlelo ezizobeka iningizimu afrika esimweni sokuba yizwe elikwaziyo ukuncintisana namanye amazwe emhlabeni jikelele emkhakheni wezoguquko lokusetshenziswa kobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje obusebenzisa izinhlelo-kusebenza zekhompyutha.

ssw: sitawusebentisa lelitfuba kuchubekisela embili kuthula kulelivekati nasemhlabeni wonkhe jikelele, sichubekisele embili umbononchanti wanelson mandela wekuthula, kutinta nemhlaba lolungile.
zul: siyabanxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi benze iziphakamiso futhi bathumele imibono yabo mayelana nokuthi iyiphi indlela engcono yokwakha nokuhlanganisa uhlaka lwezikhundla zikahulumeni ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzela ukufezekisa izidingo nezimfuno zabantu.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,etinyangeni letimbalwa, bantfu baseningizimu afrika batawube bayovota lihlandla lesitfupha kulohulumende wetfu lobuswa ngentsndvo yelinyenti yetfu kuvotela hulumende wavelonkhe newetifundza.
zul: ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono amakhono kanye namandla okusebenza ezisebenzi zikahulumeni, isikole sikazwelonke sikahulumeni (i-nsg) sethule iqoqwana lezifundo eziphoqelekile, emikhakheni enjengomkhakha wenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, umkhakha wabaphathi abakhulu kanye nokuphathwa kwenqubo yokuthengwa kwempahla nezinsizakalo, kanye nokutshalwa kwabaphathi ezigabeni lapho bezozibambela bona mathupha futhi balekelele emsebenzini wokuhlinzeka umphakathi ngezinsizakalo ukuze kuqiniswe ukuhlinzekwa kwezinsizakalo emphakathini.

ssw: leli litfuba lebantfu bakitsi lekusebentisa lilungelo labo lelatfolakala kamatima kute bancume kutsi lelive licondze kuphi.
zul: sizokwenza yonke imidanti nemicikilisho edingekayo maqondana nokusetshenziswa kwesigaba 8 somthetho wokuphathwa nokulawulwa komkhakha wezisebenzi zikahulumeni, esiqinisa ukunqatshelwa kwezisebenzi zikahulumeni ngokusemthethweni ukwenza ibhizinisi nombuso futhi ukuze uhulumeni ukwazi ukubhekana kangcono nezenzo zenkohlakalo.

ssw: ngikhulumisene nekhomishini yelukhetfo letimele (i-iec) kanye nabondvunankhulu bato tonkhe tifundza, futsi ngicondze kumemetela kutsi lusuku lwelukhetfo ngumhla ti-8 inkhwekhweti 2019. sifisa kukhumbuta bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika labafanelekile labasengakakubhaliseli kuvota kutsi basalelwe kute kufike lusuku lolumenyetelwe kutsi babhalise.
zul: kuzosungulwa uphiko lwezenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo, ubuqotho kanye nokuhlinzeka ngosizo lokuphathwa nokuqhutshwa kwenqubo yokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe ukuze kuqiniswe ukuphathwa nokulawula kwenkambiso yokuziphatha elungileyo nokulwisana nenkohlakalo futhi kuqinisekise ukuthi bayaphendula ngezenzo zabo futhi bathathelwa izinyathelo zokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe labo abaphule izinqubo-kusebenza ezibekiwe zikahulumeni.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,sibantfu labacinile labamelana netimo, labanitikelako nalabanelitsemba.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,kulo nyaka iningizimu afrika seyithathe isikhundla sobulungu besikhashana emkhandlwini wezokuvikela wenhlangano yezizwe (i-unsc).

ssw: intsandvo yelinyenti yetfu ichakatile futsi yakhula, yanakekelwa ngumoya wenhlitiyo lenhle yemadvodza nabomake balelive lababati kahle buhlungu lesabuva ngesikhatsi silwela lenkhululeko.
zul: lesi sikhundla sizosisebenzisela ukukhuthaza nokugqugquzela ukuthula kuleli zwekazi kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele, ngalokho siqhubekisele phambili ihloso-mbono ka-nelson mandela yomhlaba onokuthula, uzinzo, ongachemile futhi onobulungiswa.

ssw: emkhatsini walabamnyama nalabamhlophe, labaphuyile nalabanjingile, emkhatsini walabasemadolobheni nalabasemaphandleni, emkhatsini webantfu labakhuluma tilwimi letahlukene nalabanemasiko langafani.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo, abantu baseningizimu afrika bazovakashela ezikhungweni zokuvota beyovota, okuzobe kungokwesithupha ngaphansi kombuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu bevotela uhulumeni kazwelonke kanye nohulumeni bezifundazwe.

ssw: ngalesinye sikhatsi kubonakele sengatsi kubonakele sengatsi kunakekelana nekuba nekuvela labanye lokwasihlanganisa nga-1994 sekugucuke kwaba simunyu zuzu.
zul: leli yithuba lokuthi abantu bakuleli basebenzise ilungelo labo abalithola kanzima lokuthatha isinqumo mayelana nokuthi leli lizwe kumele lithathe indlela ebheke ngakuluphi uhlangothi.

ssw: live letfu lime ekubeketeleni nesakuphilisaneni, futsi sima sicine, sicinisekile futsi sibumbene simelene nako konkhe lokufuna kusehlukanisa noma kubhubhisa loko lesakuzuza kamatima.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,thina singabantu abakwaziyo ukumelana nezimo ezinzima futhi emva kwalokho bavuke bazithathe, abaphikelelayo futhi abahlalela ethembeni lokuthi konke kuzolunga.

ssw: basitjela kutsi kwakha iningizimu lete lubandlululo yintfo lengeke ikhoneke nekutsi angeke selapheke ngekweliciniso kumlandvo wetfu lelibuhlungu.
zul: nakuba sabhekana nobubi obesabekayo bobandlululo, asizange sibe nomoya wokuziphindisela emva kokuthola inkululeko yethu.

ssw: kepha sakhona kubukana nato timo letimatima, futsi sichubekela embili ngemandla.
zul: umbuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu usukhululile futhi waqhakaza, ukhuliswa ngumusa nezenzo ezinhle zamadoda nabesifazane baleli lizwe elihle kangaka, abakuqonda kahle kamhlophe ukuthi intando yeningi labantu yatholakala emva komzukuzuku nokulahlekelwa okungakanani.

ssw: kwaba litsemba langekhatsi lemoya webuntfu lelagcina ematsemba aphila ngesikhatsi lesimatimba.
zul: umgwaqo obheke enkululekweni yoqobo usemude impela, futhi sikubonile ukukhula koqhekeko ezweni lethu.

ssw: ngulelitsemba leli-ke lelitasichubekisela embili lapho sibukana nelikusasa lelisha lelinemandla.
zul: kwezinye izikhathi bekubonakala sengathi waphephethwa ngumoya umusa owasenza sibuyisane ngowe-1994.

ssw: yiningizimu afrika lebona tinkinga tesikhatsi lesendlulile, kepha ibuka embili kulikusasa icine.
zul: babesitshela ukuthi kuyinto engeke neze yenzeke ukwakha iningizimu afrika engenakho ukucwasana ngokobuhlanga, futhi ngeke neze sikwazi ukuwapholisa ngokweqiniso amanxeba esikhathi esedlule, okuyisikhathi esasinzima kakhulu kuleli.

ssw: yiningizimu afrika lapho khona baholi bayo banemandla futsi bayakhutsateka, baholi labatisebenti tebantfu – futsi kwenetisa imisebenti yabo kungumklomelo lophakeme kakhulu futsi lekukuphela kwawo.
zul: kodwa nakuba kunjalo sakwazi ukuwela ngelibanzi, futhi siyanqoba.

ssw: ngetulu kwako konkhe, yiningizimu lapho khona sonkhe sitigcabha ngaloko lesikuzuzile futsi nangalapho setsemba kuba khona.
zul: ngezikhathi ezinzima kakhulu kuleli, ngumoya ongapheliyo ongaphakathi kithina njengabantu owasikhuthaza ukuthi singapheli amandla futhi sihlalele ethembeni ngoba izinto zizolunga.

ssw: singuhulumende, singemabhizinisi futsi sitakhamiti, asibumbaneni semukele likusasa.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika enabantu abanombono, ugqozi nenkuthalo kanye nokulangazelela ukufezekisa amaphupho nezifiso zabo.

ssw: asibambeni likusasa letfu sonkhe ngetandla totimbili, ngemagama langabuni elucwebhu lwenkhululeko: bahambisana, bonga emandla abo.
zul: okwenza leli lizwe libe yisizinda sokuqanjwa nokusungulwa kwezinhlelo nemikhiqizo yesimanjemanje, ukusungulwa kwamabhizinisi kanye nokusetshenziswa kwenzindlela ezintsha.

ssw: lomsebenti – wekwakha iningizimu afrika lencono – ngumsebenti wetfu sonkhe sibantfu baseningizimu afrika.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika ezivumayo futhi ezamukelayo izinkinga zesikhathi esedlule, kodwa ephokophele phambili ngokuzimisela okukhulu.

ssw: lapho sibukana nalemisebenti netinsayeya, sifanele kutsi sikhumbule emagama atheodore roosevelt lowatsi:“akusiye umuntu logcekayo lobalulekile.
zul: leyo iningizimu afrika enabaholi abanesibindi, abaholi abalokhu beyizinceku ezisebenzela abantu – futhi kubona ukwenza nokufeza umsebenzi wabo kungumvuzo omkhulu kunayo yonke, futhi okunguwona kuphela abawufunayo.

ssw: hhayi indvondza lekhombisa kutsi indvodza lenemandla igileka kanjani, noma lapho umenti wetento ngabe utente kancono.
zul: ngaphezu kwakho konke, leyo iningizimu afrika esiziqhenyayo thina sonke ngalokho esekuzuzile kanye nalapho esiphokophele khona.

ssw: lowenta emaphutsa, lowehluleka njalo njalo, ngoba kute imitamo lete liphutsa netinkinga.
zul: ngoba uma sesiphumelela – futhi nginesiqiniseko sokuthi lokho kuzokwenzeka noma kanjani – kuzohlomula isizwe sonkana.

ssw: amos masondo,sekelamengameli david mabuza,lijaji lelikhulu mogoeng mogoeng nani nonkhe malunga lahloniphekile etebulungiswa,mengameli waphambilini, mnu kgalema motlanthe,mengameli waphambilini, mnu.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, unkz thandi modise,sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli, u-david mabuza,ijaji eliyinhloko, u-mogoeng mogoeng, kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile ophiko lwezobulungiswa,umongameli waphambilini, umnu kgalema motlanthe,umongameli waphambilini, umnu thabo mbeki,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, udkt frene ginwala,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, umnu max sisulu,usomlomo waphambilini wesigungu sikazwelonke, unkz baleka mbete,umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umnu roger nkodo dang,omakadebebona bomzabalazo wenkululeko,udkt dennis goldberg,udkt andrew mlangeni,u-advocate priscilla jana,unkz joyce dipale,unkz lillian keagile,unkz smally maqungo,ongqongqoshe kanye namaphini abo,ondunankulu kanye nosomlomo bezishayamthetho zezifundazwe,usihlalo wenhlangano yohulumeni basekhaya yaseningizimu afrika kanye nezimeya zemikhandludolobha,umphathi webhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika, umnu lesetja kganyago,izinhloko zezikhungo zikahulumeni ezeseka ukubusa ngentando yeningi labantu,abaholi bezinhlangano zezenkolo,abaholi bezikhungo zezemfundo nezocwaningo,amalungu ezindlu zamanxusa,izimenywa ezikhethekile,amalungu ahloniphekile esigungu sikazwelonke,amalungu ahloniphekile omkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe,bantu baseningizimu afrika, njengoba sibuthene lapha, ekuqaleni kwephalamende lesithupha lentando yeningi yabantu, sibuthene ngosuku owaqala ngalo ukusebenza umthetho womhlaba wabomdabu, eminyakeni eyi-106 edlule – okungesinye sezigameko ezadala umonakalo omkhulu, sokuphucwa kwabantu umhlaba wabo, esashiya abantu behleli dengwane futhi esadala ukukhala nokugedla kwamazinyo, nosizi olwesabekayo.

ssw: thabo mbeki,somlomo waphambilini we-na, dkt.
zul: siyawakhumbula amagama ashiwo ngu-sol plaatje, ephawula ngalesi sigameko esibuhlungu kangaka, uma ethi: “ngenkathi evuka ekuseni ngolwesihlanu, mhla zingama-20 kunhlaba ngowe-1913, umuntu omnyama wazithola, empeleni engesona isigqila, kepha eyisilahlwa, esingafuneki neze ezweni lakhe, azalelwa kulona, futhi lapho inkaba yakhe ikhona.” abantu bakithi bahlukumezeka kakhulu futhi bahlangabezana nobunzima obesabekayo ngenxa yokushaywa komthetho womhlaba wabomdabu.

ssw: ngetulu kweminyaka lelikhulu ngemuva kwaleso sento lesiphambene nebulungiswa, simenywa kutsi sakhe iningizimu afrika lengeke ibe nemuntfu losigcili noma sinchunchutseki, kepha ibe nebantfu labakhululeke futsi labalinganako baphindze futsi bahlonishwe.
zul: kunomthelela kuwena, mama wase-delft, ozikhulisela abantwana bakhe yedwana, njengoba ungagcini nje kuphela ngokuzondla wena ngesibonelelo-mali sakho osithola kuhulumeni kodwa kumele futhi wondle nabazukulu bakho imbala.

ssw: sihlangene lapha ngesikhatsi lesimatima kakhulu nalesinetinsayeya emphilweni yelive letfu lelisasakhula lelibuswa ngentsandvo yelinyenti.
zul: kubuhlungu futhi nakuwena, msebenzi wase-nelson mandela bay, ngoba phela nakuba ukhona umholo owutholayo, kunzima kakhulu ukwanelisa izidingo zakho zempilo.

ssw: kepha, siphindze futsi sisesikhatsini semlandvo wetfu lonelitsemba lelikhulu nesitsembiso.
zul: kunzima kuwena, mfundi wenyuvesi i-sol plaatje, enyakatho kapa, othembele kwimadlana encane yokuzondla nokuziphilisa oyiphiwa ngabazali bakho.

ssw: iminyakeni lenge-25 live letfu libuswa ngeentsandvo yelinyenti sesente inchubekela embili lenhle kakhulu ekwakheni sive lesisha lapho khona bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika batawuba nemalungelo lalinganako nematfuba lamanyenti.
zul: konke lokhu engisanda kukusho kuyichaza njengoba injalo impilo ephilwa ngabantu bakithi.

ssw: eminyakeni lenge-25, sente lokunyenti ekuhlangabetaneni netidzingonchanti tebantfu, kwehlisa lizinga lebuphuya siphindze futsi sigucule umnotfo lesimeni lesibi lebewakhelwe kusebentela tidzingo tebantfu labambalwa.
zul: impilo yakho ifana ncamashi nobunzima bansukuzonke bokuphila kwabantu bakuleli.

ssw: kuphindze futsi kuvise nawe buhlungu, sisebenti sasenelson mandzela bay, lotsi nanoma utfola umholo kepha usenebulukhuni bekwenta tintfo tenteke.
zul: lapho ehambe khona nomnu groenewald, njengoba simbonile ehla enyuka ezweni lonkana, naye angasho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi naye ubezwile abantu.

ssw: kumatima kuwe, sitjudeni lesincane senyuvesi isol plaatje enyakatfo kapa, lophila ngembasha lencane yekutiphilisa loyitfola kubatali bakho.
zul: hey kan ook se dat hy het die mense gehoor.. sinizwile.

ssw: ndi amba na he ha tshimbila vho maimane na vho julius malema.. lapho kuhambe khona umhlonishwa buthelezi naye uzwile ukuthi abantu bathini.. lapho mnu.
zul: sonke sinizwile – mina ngokwami nginizwile, nomhlonishwa umaimane unizwile, kanjalo nomhlonishwa umalema, nomhlonishwa ubuthelezi, nomhlonishwa u-groenewald, nomhlonishwa umeshoe, nomhlonishwa uholomisa, nomhlonishwa uzungula, nomhlonishwa u-de lille, nomhlonishwa ukamagwaza-msibi, nomhlonishwa ugalo, nomhlonishwa ulekota, nomhlonishwa unyhontso kanye nomhlonishwa u-hendricks.

ssw: groenewald naye aye khona, njengoba simbonile ahamba kulo lonkhe lelive, hey kan ook se dat hy het die mense gehoor.. sinizwile.
zul: umonakalo ongapheli owashiywa ngumbuso wobandlululo, olokhu uqhubeke njalo.

ssw: elukhetfweni belubanywe ngenkhwekhweti, nisinike sonkhe umyalo locacile wekukhula nekuvusetela.
zul: futhi kusenjalo, kumele sibhekane noguquko lwezobuchwepheshe olwenzeka ngesivinini esikhulu, oluletha izindlela ezintsha zokwenza umsebenzi ezindaweni okusetshenzelwa kuzona, olubumba kabusha umnotho womhlaba futhi olushintsha indlela abantu abaxhumana ngayo, futhi basebenzisane ngayo.

ssw: sonkhe sikuvile – mine, mhlonishwa maimane, mhlonishwa malema, mhlonishwa buthelezi, mhlonishwa groenewald, mhlonishwa meshoe, mhlonishwa holomisa, mhlonishwa zungula, mhlonishwa de lille, mhlonishwa magwaza-msibi, mhlonishwa galo, mhlonishwa lekota, mhlonishwa nyhontso kanye nawe mhlonishwa hendricks.
zul: thina kanye nawo wonke amanye amazwe omhlaba, sizithola sibhekene nezinguquko zesimo sezulu esezidale imbubhiso kanye nomonakalo omkhulukazi emlandweni.

ssw: umonakalo longapheli welubandlululo ushiye live letfu linetinkinga letinkhulu tekuhleleka – ngekwemnotfo nangekwetenhlalo.
zul: isimo sezulu esibi kakhulu esihlobene nesivuvu somkhathi sibeka umnotho wethu engcupheni, futhi siphinde sibeke engcupheni nezimpilo zabantu bakithi kanye nezindlela abaziphilisa ngazo, futhi uma singathathi izinyathelo njengamanje, kungenzeka sigcine sesishabalele sonke thina singabantu.

ssw: kusesenjalo kumele sibukane netingucuko tetheknoloji letenteka masinyane futsi ngemandla lamakhulu letiletsa tindlela letinsha tekusebenta emisebentini, letakha kabusha umnotfo wemave emhlaba futsi letintjintja tindlela bantfu labachumana basebentisane ngato.
zul: sikuzwile lokho okushiwo ngabantu abasha abebeyingxenye yemashi eya e-union buildings ngeviki eledlule, besinxusa ukuthi sisukume sithathe izinyathelo zokuvikela umhlaba wethu.

ssw: sikanye nato tonkhe tive temhlaba, sibukene netingucuko esimeni selitulu semhlaba letiletsa umonakalo longuwona lomkhulu emlandvweni.
zul: yisona-ke isidingo sokubhekana ngqo nalezi zinselelo ezisemqoka kakhulu esaholela ekutheni samukele uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwezwe (i-ndp) ngowezi-2012 ukuze luhole imizamo yethu ezweni lonkana yokunqoba ububha, ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokungalingani.

ssw: nanoma kunjalo, njengoba sekusele iminyaka le-10 ngembi kwekutsi sifike ku-2030, kute inchubekelembili lengako lesiyentile ekuhlangabetaneni nemigomo ye-ndp.
zul: ngaphandle uma sithatha izinyathelo ezinqala futhi ezinohlonze, ngeke neze sikwazi ukufezekisa inhlosombono yowezi-2030.

ssw: ngaphandle nangabe singatsatsa tinyatselo leticatsa, angeke sihlangabetane nembonochanti wanga-2030.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele sizibeke eqhulwini lezo zinto ezisemqoka kakhulu.

ssw: sidzinga kugcila kuleto tinyatselo letitawuba nelifutse lelikhulu kakhulu, tinyatselo letitawuletsa umnyakato lomkhulu wekuya embili, madvutane nje kanye nakuleminyaka le-10 letako.
zul: kumele sigxile kakhulu kulezo zinyathelo ezizoba nomthelela omkhulukazi, izinyathelo ezizokwenza ukuthi sikwazi ukuqhubekela phambili ngesivinini esikhulu, esikhathini samanje kanjalo nasesikhathini esiyiminyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

ssw: kubalulekile kucaphela kutsi luhlaka lwendlelalisu lwethemu lesemkhatsini (i-mtsf) lwaleminyaka lesihlanu leyendlulile belunetinkhomba letingetulu kwaleti-1 100 lebekufanele kutsi sikale ngato inchubekelembili ekufezekisweni kwe-ndp.
zul: kusemqoka ukuthi ngikuveze ukuthi uhlaka lokusebenza kwesikhathi esimaphakathi, (i-mtsf), obeluqondiswe kule minyaka emihlanu edlule belunezinkomba-kusebenza ezingaphezu kwe-1 100 obekudingeka ukuthi sikale ngazo ukuqaliswa kwe-ndp.

ssw: manje sesikhatsi sekufezekisa.
zul: manje sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sibhukule sigxile ekwenzeni lokho esithe sizokwenza.

ssw: sikhatsi sekutsatsa tincumo.
zul: sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sithathe izinqumo mayelana nokuthi yikuphi esizokwenza.

ssw: letinye tincumo letitawutsatfwa kungenteka kutsi tibe matima futsi tingajabulisi wonkhe umuntfu.
zul: ezinye zalelo zinqumo kungenzeka kube yizinqumo ezinzima impela futhi ezinye zazo kungenzeka zingehli kahle kwabanye abantu.

ssw: emnotfweni losakhula, esikhatsini lapho khona timali tahulumende tinemkhawulo, angeke sikwati kukwenta konkhe ngesikhatsi sinye.
zul: esimweni lapho umnotho ungakhuli, futhi esikhathini lapho uhulumeni enemali eyingcosana emgodlagodleni wakhe wezimali, ngeke neze sikwazi ukwenza konke ngesikhathi esisodwa.

ssw: njengobe lohulumende lokhetfwe kulomnyaka utsatsa tintsambo telulawulo, sitawugcila etintfweni letibekwe embili letisikhombisa: tonkhe tinhlelo netinchubomgomo tetfu kuwo onkhe ematiko nema-ejensi atawuyalelwa kutfola lemisebenti lebalulekile lesikholelwa ekutsini kutawuletsa imphilo lencono yawonkhewonkhe waseningizimu afrika.
zul: njengoba singena kuleli hlandla lokuphatha elisha, sizogxila ezintweni eziyisikhombisa eziseqhulwini: zonke izinhlelo nezinqubomgomo zethu, kuyo yonke iminyango nezimpiko zikahulumeni, zizoqondiswa ekufezeni le misebenzi ebanzi futhi ehlanganisa konke, esikholelwa ukuthi izokwazi ukuletha impilo engcono kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

ssw: ngaso futsi leso sikhatsi, sifanele kutsi sibuyisele le-ndp endzaweni yayo enkhabeni yemitamo yetfu yavelonkhe, kute kutsi ibe ngiyo sibili isebente, kuyenta ibe yincenye yaloko bantfu baseningizimu afrika labahlangabetene nako bakuphila.
zul: futhi kusenjalo, kumele sibuyisele i-ndp endaweni yayo, lapho ingumgogodla wakho konke esikwenzayo ezweni, ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi iyasebenza, futhi siyenze ibe yingxenye yempilo yansukuzonke kanye nezimo abahlangabezana nazo abantu baseningizimu afrika.

ssw: ngesikhatsi ngibekwa esihlalweni, satsi loku kusendvulelo sako konkhe lokutako kwalesive setfu lesincane.
zul: enkulumweni engayethula emcimbini wokugcotshwa kwami njengomongameli, ngathi lesi yisikhathi esibaluleke kakhulu esizweni sethu esisesisha.

ssw: sive lesibukene netinsayeya letinkhulu.
zul: okuyisizwe esibhekene nezinselelo ezinkulu.

ssw: live lelinebantfu labatigidzi letinge-57 labasukuma eminyakeni leyendlulile babuye futsi balwa bancoba yinye yetinchubo letimbi kabi letake taba khona leyentiwa bantfu, lubandlululo.
zul: isizwe esinabantu abayizigidi ezingama-57 abasukuma eminyakeni edlule banqoba enye yezinqubo-kuphatha ezimbi kunazo zonke ezisungulwe ngabantu, ubandlululo.

ssw: live lelinebantfu labanesibindzi.
zul: isizwe sabantu abanesibindi.

ssw: live lelinebantfu labatinikele.
zul: isizwe sabantu abanokuzibophezela nokuzinikela okukhulu.

ssw: saphindze satsi loku kungenca yetinyatselo tetfu kutsi manje sesitawuncuma siphetfo setfu.
zul: ngasho futhi ukuthi izinyathelo esizozithatha njengamanje yizona ezizocaba indlela eya phambili kwingomuso laleli lizwe.

ssw: lapho iningizimu afrika ingena eminyakeni lenge-25 ibusa ngentsandvo yelinyenti, kanye nekulandzelela imigomo ye-ndp, asimemetele umgomo lonemandla nalolangatelelelako, inhloso lehlanganisako, lesifaka kuyo yonkhe imitfombolusito nemandla etfu.
zul: njengoba iningizimu afrika ingena eminyakeni elandelayo engama-25 ibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, futhi ngenhloso yokufezekisa izinjongo ze-ndp, masizibekele injongo ebonisa isibindi neqholo, inhloso ezosibumbanisa sonke, esizozibophezela kuyona ngokuphelele futhi sifake kuyona wonke amandla nomfutho esinawo kanye nazo zonke izinsizaku-sebenza nezinsiza-sidingo zethu.

ssw: lapho singena eminyakeni leli-10 yekugcina yembononchanti wanga-2030, asiyichaze kabusha ngalokucacile lenigizimu afrika lesiyifisako siphindze futsi sivumelane ngetinyatselo leticatsa lesitidzingako kute kutsi sikhone kuwuzuza.
zul: njengoba singena kwiminyaka eyi-10 yokugcina yenhloso-mbono yowezi-2030, masikubeke kucace bha ukuthi ngenjani iningizimu afrika esiyifunayo futhi sivumelane ngezinyathelo eziphathekayo futhi ezinohlonze esizozithatha ukufinyelela kuleyo ningizimu afrika esiyifunayo.

ssw: kute sente siciniseko sekutsi imitamo yetfu icondziswe lapho kufanele khona, ngibeka umbono wekutsi, kuletintfo letibekwe embili ngulombuso, sivumelane ngemigomo lesihlanu lebalulekile yaleminyaka lelishumi letako, leyincenye yaletintfo lesikhombisa letibekwe embili.
zul: ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi imizamo yethu iqondiswe ngqo kulokho esifuna ukukwenza, ngiphakamisa ukuthi, kulezi zinto ezibekwe eqhulwini yilo hulumeni ophetheyo njengamanje, sivumelane ngezinjongo eziyisisekelo ezinhlanu okumele sizifezekise kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo, eziyingxenye yalezi zinto eziyisikhombisa ezibekwe eqhulwini.

ssw: asivumelane, sisive kanye nebantfu sihlangene etintfweni lesitifunako, futsi kungakapheli leminyala le-10 sitawube sesente inchubekelembili ekubukaneni nebuphuya, kungalingani kanye nekweswelakala kwemisenti, lapho khona: asitinikeleni khona manje – kitsi nakulabanye – sati kutsi sitawusebentisa imitfombolusito kanye nemakhono onkhe, kepha sibe sivisisa kutsi uma kwenteka siyizuza lemigomo lesihlanu, sitawube siphumelele ukuletsa ingucuko eveni letfu.
zul: masivumelane, njengesizwe futhi njengabantu abanezinhloso ezifanayo, ukuthi ingakapheli le minyaka eyi-10 ezayo sizobe sesenze inqubekelaphambili ekuqedeni ububha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi, lapho: masizenze njengamanje lezi zibophezelo – sizibhekise kithina uqobo futhi sizibhekise nakomunye nomunye wethu – sibe sazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi zizodinga izinsiza-sidingo kanye namandla ethu angeziwe, kodwa futhi ngokuqonda ukuthi uma siphumelela ukufezekisa lezi zinjongo, sizobe siphumelelile ukuletha uguquko olunohlonze ezweni lethu.

ssw: sibeka lemigomo lenemandla ngekungakhohlwa bulukhuni lobukhulu lobukhona manje, kepha ngenca yekutsi tibalulekile.
zul: izinjongo ezinohlonze esizibekele zona asizibekanga ngoba sifuna ukushaya indiva noma ukubukela phansi ubunzima esibhekene nabo esikhathini samanje, kodwa-ke yibona impela lobu bunzima obenze ukuthi sizibekele lezi zinjongo.

ssw: sibeka lemigomo kute kutsi tincumo lesititsatsako manje tinkhulu futsi sitsatsa tinyatselo letiphutfuma kakhulu.
zul: sizibekele lezi zinjongo ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi izinqumo esizithathayo njengamanje yizinqumo ezinohlonze, ezibonisa isibindi futhi ukuze sithathe izinyathelo eziphuthumayo.

ssw: sincumo setfu sekutsi kungakapheli leminyaka leli-10 letako kute umuntfu waseningizimu afrika lotawulamba sibalulekile kumtamo wetfu wekucedza buphuya nekunciphisa kungalingani.
zul: ukuzibophezela kwethu ekutheni kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo asifuni ukubona noyedwa umuntu ebhuqabhuqwa yindlala eningizimu afrika, kuyisisekelo somzamo wethu wokuqeda ububha futhi sinciphise nokungalingani okukhona kuleli.

ssw: kwengeta ekwakheni imisebenti nalamanye ematfuba etemnotfo, loku kusho kutsi sifanele kutsi sicinise tibonelelo tahulumende siphindze futsi sinciphise tindleko tekuphila tetinsuku tonkhe.
zul: ngaphezu kokudala amathuba omsebenzi kanye namanye amathuba ezomnotho, lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele siqinise uhlelo lwezibonelelo nemixhaso yomphakathi ehlinzekwa nguhulumeni futhi sinciphise nezindleko zokuphila.

ssw: kusho kutsi sifanele kutsi sente kancono kukhoneka, kuphepha kanye nekuhlanganisa titfutsi temindeni lehola kancane.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele siqinisekise ukuthi lawo makhaya athola umholo ophansi noma ingeniso-mali ephansi ahlinzekwa ngezithuthi zomphakathi ezingambi eqolo, eziphephile futhi ezididiyelwe.

ssw: nanoma nje sente inchubekelembili ekuniketeni tindlu, bantfu baseningizimu afrika labanyenti basadzinga umhlaba wekwakha emakhaya baphindze futsi bakwati kutiphilisa.
zul: nakuba senze inqubekelaphambili enkulu ekuhlinzekweni kwabantu ngezindlu, baningi abantu baseningizimu afrika abasadinga umhlaba abazozakhela kuwona amakhaya abo kanye nezindawo zokuqhuba ibhizinisi ukuze bakwazi ukuziphilisa.

ssw: kuleminyaka lesihlanu letako, sitawuphutfumisa kwetfulwa kwetindlu letibekwe etindzaweni letifanele kanye nemhlaba kubantfu baseningzimu afrika.
zul: kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo, sizokusheshisa ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu baseningizimu afrika abahlwempu ngezindlu ezakhiwe ezindaweni ezifanelekile futhi ezikulungele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu futhi sibahlinzeke nangomhlaba.

ssw: kwenta kancono timphilo tebantfu baseningizimu afrika, kunciphisa buphuya kanye nekucinisa umnotfo wetfu, sitawubuka temphilo yebantfu bakitsi.
zul: ukuze senze ngcono izinga lempilo ephilwa ngabantu baseningizimu afrika, siqede zonke izinhlobo zobubha futhi siqinise nomnotho wezwe, sizothatha izinyathelo zokubhekelela nokunakekela impilo yabantu bakithi ukuze bahlale bengumqemane.

ssw: sifanele kutsi sibuke inkinga yekuswelakala kwabodokotela nabonesi etibhedlela nasemitfolamphilo yetfu.
zul: kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ezibhedlela kanye nasemitholampilo yethu zikhona zonke izinsiza-kusebenza kanye nezinsiza-sidingo ezidingekayo ukuze lezi zikhungo zikwazi ukusebenza kahle futhi ngobunyoninco.

ssw: gogo loneminyaka lenge-80 angeke futsi akafaneli kutsi acitse lilanga lonkhe eme eludvwendvweni lwekutsatsa imitsi yakhe.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi ugogo oneminyaka yobudala engama-80 achithe usuku lonke emgqeni elinde imithi yakhe.

ssw: sigulane asikafaneli kutsi sijikiswe ngoba bodokotela nabonesi bayashoda.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi umuntu ogula kakhulu ajikiswe, kuthiwe makabuyele ekhaya, ngenxa nje yokuntuleka kodokotela nabahlengikazi.

ssw: make lokhulelwe akafaneli kutsi abeke imphilo yemntfwanakhe losengakatalwa engotini ngoba i-ambulensi itsetse sikhatsi lesidze kufika.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi impilo yengane engakazalwa, yowesifazane obelethayo, ibe sengcupheni ngenxa ye-ambulensi ethatha isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuba ifike izomlanda.

ssw: njengencenye yemsebenti lesifanele kutsi siwente ngekushesha kwenta kancono lizinga lelifanele lenchubo yetemphilo, siphetsa sivumelwane sengcungcutsela yetemphilo yamengameli, lesisebentisa lwatiso loluvela kulengcungcutsela futsi sitawusebentisa tingcweti letivela kubo bonkhe labatsintsekako kulungisa tinkinga letisemitfolamphilo nasetibhedlela tetfu.
zul: njengengxenye yomsebenzi okumele siwenze ngokushesha ukuze senze ngcono izinga lohlelo lwezempilo, siphothula umsebenzi wokuhlanganiswa kwemininingwane yesivumelwano esingumphumela wengqungquthela kamongameli yezempilo, esakhelwe phezu kokuqonda okujulile kanye nemibono eyatholakala lapho, futhi okuyisivumelwano esizosebenzisa ongoti abavela kubo bonke ababambiqhaza abasemqoka ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga ezikhona emitholampilo yethu kanye nasezibhedlela.

ssw: sesisesigabeni lesisembili kakhulu ekubuyeketeni lisu lelibanti lekuphumelelisa umshwalensi wetemphilo wavelonkhe (i-nhi), kufaka ekhatsi kuphutfumisa lizinga lelifanele lemitamo yekunakekela etikhungweni tahulumende, kucinisekisa kutsi letikhungo tinetisebenti letinele, kusungulwa kweluhlaka lwesikhwama se-nhi, nekubala tindleko tekuphatsa sikhwama se-nhi.
zul: mkhulu impela umsebenzi osuwenziwe ekubuyekezweni kohlelo oluqukethe imininingwane ebanzi lokuqaliswa komshwalense kazwelonke wezempilo (i-nhi), kubandakanya ukusheshiswa kwezinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ikhwalithi yosizo nokunakekelwa okutholakala ezikhungweni zikahulumeni, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zikhungo zinabasebenzi abanele, ukusungulwa kohlaka lwesikhwama se-nhi, kanye nokubala ukuthi kuzodinga imali engakanani ukuphathwa kwesikhwama se-nhi.

ssw: sikhatsatekile ngesibalo lesikhulako sebantfu labasuleleka ngesandvulelangculazi (i-hiv), ikakhulu kubomake labasesebancane, kanye nesibalo lesiphasi sabobabe labatihlola i-hiv bese bacala kwelashwa.
zul: sisalokhu sikhathazekile ngesibalo esikhulayo sabantu abatheleleke ngesandulelangculazi (i-hiv), ikakhulukazi amantombazane nabesifazane abasebasha, futhi sikhathazekile nangesibalo esiphansi kakhulu samadoda ahlolelwa i-hiv bese eqala ukwelashwa uma ethelelekile.

ssw: sitawucinisa kufezekiswa kwelisubuciko le-90-90-90 (nga-2020 bantfu labane-hiv labange-90% kumele basazi isimo sabo se-hiv, labange-90% basebentise sidzambisingculazi (ma-arv), labange-90% labasebentisa arv ligciwane le-hiv lingabonakali) kucedza i-hiv njengesifo lesingumashayabhuce, lokufaka ekhatsi kukhulisa linani lebantfu labelashwako ngalokungenani labatigidzi letimbili ngengongoni 2020. uma ngabe sifuna kulungisa ngemphumelelo tinsayeya tebuphuya kuyo yonkhe imimango, sifanele kutsi sinikete emakhono siphindze futsi sivete ematfuba emnotfo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.
zul: sizowuqinisa umsebenzi esiwenzayo wokuqalisa iqhingasu lama-90-90-90 (okungukuthi, ngowezi-2020, abantu abane-hiv abangama-90% kumele basazi isimo sabo se-hiv, abangama-90% basebenzise imishanguzo yokudambisa i-hiv (ama-arv), futhi kwabangama-90% abadla ama-arv lingabe lisabonakala nakancane igciwane le-hiv) okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda i-hiv njengobhubhane olubeka engcupheni impilo yomphakathi wonkana, okuyiqhingasu elibandakanya ukwengeza abanye abantu, okungenani abayizigidi ezimbili ngaphambi kukazibandlela wezi-2020, esibalweni sabantu abathola ukwelashwa njengamanje.

ssw: kuyintfo lekhatsatana kakhulu-ke kutsi kunebantfwana labaseminyakeni yekuya esikolweni labacishe babe yihhafu yesigidzi labaphila nekukhubateka labangafundzi.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukunqoba inselelo yobubha kubantu bonke ngokuhlukahlukana kwabo, kumele sihlinzeke ngamakhono futhi sakhe amathuba omsebenzi abhekiswe kubantu abakhubazekile.

ssw: kulungisa tinkinga tebantfu labaphuyile labasebentako, umholo welizinga lelincane wavelonkhe sewunetinyanga letisitfupha usebenta futsi tinkhomba tekucala tekutsi tinkampani letinyenti tiyatfobela.
zul: ngakho-ke kuyinto ekhathazayo kakhulu ukuthi kukhona izingane ezikhubazekile ezilinganiselwa kwisigamu sesigidi okufanele ngabe zisesikoleni, kodwa njengamanje ezingafundi, ezihleli emakhaya.

ssw: ikhomishini yemholo welizinga lelincane wavelonkhe ilindzeleke kutsi iphetse lucwaningo mayelana nelifutse lalomholo welizinga lelincane emisebentini, kubuphuya, kungalingani, kanye nemehluko emiholweni ekupheleni kwenyoni 2019 asikwati kugucula simo seliveletfu ngaphandle kwekugcila ngekungaphelimandla ekukhuleni kwemnotfo.
zul: ngenhloso yokubhekana nalezi zinselelo, umsebenzi wokuhlelwa nokulawulwa kwezinhlelo eziphathelene nokukhubazeka usufakwe ngaphansi kwehhovisi likamongameli.

ssw: nakubukwa kuncipha ngemandla kwemnotfo ekoteni yekucala, libhangengodla manje lilinganisa kutsi nga-2019 kungenteka kutsi umnotfo ukhule ngelizinga leliphasi kunalelo belilindzelwe kulwabiwomali lwendlovana.
zul: ngenhloso yokuxazulula izinkinga zabantu abasebenzayo abadla imbuya ngothi, sekuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha uqalile ukusebenza umholo ophansi kazwelonke, futhi izinkomba-kusebenza zalesi sikhashana esincane uqalile ukusebenza zibonisa ukuthi izinkampani eziningi ziyawuthobela.

ssw: sinye setizatfu tekungasebenti kahle kwemnotfo bucimicimi bagezi lobenteke ngasekucaleni kwalomnyaka, kukanye nekungabikhona kwelutinto endleleni lekuphakelwa ngayo gezi kanye nesimo lesimatima se-eskom.
zul: ikhomishana yomholo ophansi kazwelonke kulindeleke ukuthi iluphothule ngaphambi kokuphela kwenyanga kamandulo 2019 ucwaningo mayelana nomthelela womholo ophansi kazwelonke ekuqashweni kwabantu, ububha, ukungalingani kanye nokuhluka kwemiholo.

ssw: sifundvo sicacile: mayelana nekukhula, sidzinga kuphakelwa kwagezi lokwetsembekile nalokusimeme.
zul: ngeke neze sikwazi ukuguqula isimo sezwe uma singagxili kakhulu ekukhulisweni komnotho.

ssw: kusukela kwenteka locimicimi wagezi ekucaleni kwalomnyaka, i-eskom seyente inchubekelembili lebonakalako ekufezekiseni lisu lemaphuzu layimfica, kucinisekisa kulungiswa lokuncono kwesiphehligezi, kunciphisa tindleko nekucinisekisa kutsi kunemalahle labekwe eceleni.
zul: kulandela ukwehla nokuncipha kakhulu komnotho ngekota yokuqala yonyaka, manje ibhangengodla selibikezela ukuthi ngowezi-2019 umnotho kungenzeka ukhule ngezinga elingaphansi kwalelo elashiwo kwisabelomali esethulwa ngonhlolanja.

ssw: ngekuhambisana netincomo telicembu lelisebentako lekusimama le-eskom, i-eskom ifaka tisebenti letinemakhono nesipiliyoni lesifanelekile lapho tidzingeka khona kakhulu.
zul: esinye sezizathu ezabangela ukufadalala komnotho wumthelela wokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, kuhlangene nongabazane olulokhu luqhubeke njalo mayelana nokuphakelwa kukagesi kanye nesimo sezinto ebesingesihle kwa-eskom.

ssw: simo setemnotfo sa-eskom siyachubeka nekubanga kukhatsateka lokukhulu.
zul: u-eskom ubhekene nezinkinga ezinkulu kwezezimali, ekuqhutshweni komsebenzi kanye nesimo sonkana ngaphakathi enkampanini.

ssw: ngalemali lekhishiwe lebuya kuhulumende, levetwe kulwabiwomali lwanga-2019, i-eskom seyinemali leyenele yekubhadala tikweleti netindlekotayo kute kube sekupheleni kwemphala 2019. nangabe i-eskom ipholota kukhokhela timalimboleko tayo itawubanga kupholota nasesikweletini sayo lesisele futsi loku kutawuba nelifutse lelikhulu esikhwameni sahulumende lesivele sinebulukhuni.
zul: emva kokumiswa kohlelo lokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, u-eskom usenze inqubekelaphambili enkulu impela ekuqalisweni kohlelo olunamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye, ekuqinisekiseni ukulungiswa nokugcinwa kweziphehla-mandla za-eskom zisebenza kahle, ekuncishisweni kwezindleko kanye nasekuqinisekiseni ukuthi kunamalahle agciniwe anele.

ssw: ngako-ke, sitawenta kutsi, silulungise loludzaba ngekwetfula umtsetfosivivinyo weluphakelomali lokhetsekile ngekuphutfuma sabele i-eskom incenye lebonakalako yetigidzigidzi letinge-r230 temali levela kuhulumende eminyakeni yekucala yesikhatsi seminyaka le-10o.
zul: ngokuhambisana nezincomo zethimba elengamele umsebenzi wokuqinisekisa ukusimama kuka-eskom kanjalo nethimba lokubuyekeza umsebenzi ka-eskom, u-eskom uzothumela labo basebenzi bakhe abanekhono kanye nolwazi lomsebenzi olunzulu namava ezindaweni lapho bedingeka khona kakhulu.

ssw: loku kufanele kutsi sikwente ngoba i-eskom ibaluleke kakhulu emnotfweni wetfu kutsi ingayekela nje yehluleke.
zul: isimo sezimali sale nkampani siyinto elokhu iqhubeke njalo nokudala ukukhathazeka okukhulu.

ssw: i-eskom ingumtfwalo wetfu sonkhe sisive futsi sifanele kutsi sente siciniseko sekutsi siyayesekela.
zul: njengoba kukhona isamba semali ebekwe eceleni esivela kuhulumeni esamenyezelwa kwisabelomali sowezi-2019, u-eskom unemali eyanele ezokwenza akwazi ukuqhuba imisebenzi yakhe kanye nokukhokhela izikweletu kuze kube sekupheleni kukamfumfu 2019. uma u-eskom engahluleka ukukhokha imali ethile abolekwe yona lokho kungaholela ekutheni athathwe njengenkampani ehlulekile ukukhokhela zonke ezinye izikweletu zakhe futhi lokho kungaba nomthelela omkhulukazi emgodlagodleni wezimali zikahulumeni, kakade obhekene nesimo sokuntuleka nokushoda kwezimali.

ssw: wefika e-eskom ngesikhatsi lesimatina kakhulu futsi wente umsebenti loncomekako akanye nebhodi leholwa ngumnu.
zul: lokhu sizokwenza ngoba phela u-eskom ubaluleke kakhulu emnothweni wezwe, ukuthi singavele simyeke nje afadalale, ahluleke nokwenza umsebenzi wakhe.

ssw: masinyane nje sitawubeka esikhundleni sisebenti lesikhulu sekuhlela kabusha, lesitawulindzeleka kutsi siletse lutinto lwetimali e-eskom ngekunakekela kakhulu kuhlanganiswa kwemalingena, luhlaka lwetikweleti netindleko talenkampani.
zul: sizomemezela ukuqashwa komphathi omkhulu (i-ceo) omusha kulandela ukwesula emsebenzini kukamnu phakamani hadebe.

ssw: i-eskom futsi isebentisana nahulumende nalabanye labatsintsekako kulungisa luhlelo lwayo lweluhlaka lolubanti kanye netikweleti tayo tonkhe kanye nesikweleti sabomasipala nebantfu labasebentisa gezi.
zul: wathatha izintambo ngesikhathi esinzima kakhulu kwa-eskom futhi mkhulu umsebenzi awenzile ukuletha uzinzo kule nkampani, ebambisene nebhodi lakwa-eskom eliholwa ngumnu jabu mabuza.

ssw: silive, sifanele kutsi sibeke umtsetfomgomo lotsi labo labasebentisa gezi bafanele kutsi bawukhokhele.
zul: khona maduze nje sizoqasha isikhulu esiyinhloko yokuhlelwa kabusha kwenkampani, okulindeleke ukuthi siguqule futhi siphucule isimo sezimali sakwa-eskom ngokuthi sicubungule ngokucophelela okukhulu uhlaka lwesimo sengeniso-mali, izikweletu kanye nezindleko zale nkampani.

ssw: kwehluleka kuwukhokhela kubeka engotini konkhe kuphakelwa gezi, umnotfo wetfu kanye nemitamo yekwakha imisebenti.
zul: futhi u-eskom usebenzisana nohulumeni kanye nabanye ababambiqhaza ukuze kubhekisiswe indlela eyakheke ngayo le nkampani, kanye nezikweletu zonke zenkampani kanjalo nemali ekweletwa ngomasipala kanye nabo bonke abanye abasebenzisi bakagesi kule nkampani.

ssw: ngako-ke, simema bonkhe bantfu bakitsi labasebentisa gezi kutsi bakhokhe kute kutsi eskom akhone kuphakela.
zul: njengezwe, kumele siwugcizelele umgomo wokuthi labo abasebenzisa ugesi kumele bawukhokhele.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika, kute kutsi sihlangabetane nemigomo yetfu yekukhulisa umnotfo, kufuneka sakhe kabusha sisekelo semnotfo wetfu ngekuvusetela siphindze futsi sikhulise imikhakha lekhicitako.
zul: ukungawukhokheli ugesi kubeka engcupheni uhlelo lonkana lokuphakelwa kukagesi, futhi kubeka engcupheni nomnotho wezwe, kuphazamise nemizamo yethu yokwakha amathuba omsebenzi.

ssw: loku kusidzinga kutsi sicabange kabusha ngelisubuciko letetimboni letfu, kukhulula emandla elutjalomali lwangasese nekwekusetela umbuso kute kutsi sifake umnotfo emandla.
zul: sezadlula izinsuku zokuduba kanye nokwenqaba ukukhokha.

ssw: kudzinga umbuso kutsi udlale indzima yawo ngemphumelelo njengemnikimandla loniketa tinsitanchanti kanye nesakhiwonchanti lesibalulekile, umlawuli lobeka imitsetfo leyakha ematfuba lalinganako abo bonkhe badlalindzima, nelitiko lelicinisekisa kutsi imimango lephuyile iyavikelwa futsi inikwa litfuba lekukhombisa emandla nemakhono awo.
zul: ngakho-ke, siyabanxusa bonke abantu bakithi abasebenzisa ugesi ukuthi bawukhokhele, ukuze u-eskom akwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi wakhe wokuphakela izwe ngogesi.

ssw: indzima lapho khona umbuso uyakwati kutidzela ubuye futsi wente umnotfo ukhule.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukuhlangabezana nemigomo yokukhulisa umnotho esizibekele yona, sizokwakha kabusha izisekelo zomnotho wethu ngokuvuselela nokwelula imikhakha yethu ekhiqizayo.

ssw: sitawubeka embili sinake imikhakha yetemnotfo lenemandla lamakhulu kakhulu ekukhula.
zul: lokhu kudinga ukuthi siqhamuke nendlela ehlukile yokwakha kabusha iqhingasu lethu lezimboni, sigqugquzele ngamandla utshalomali oluvela emkhakheni ozimele futhi sifake umdlandla embusweni ukuze sikhuthaze ukubandakanywa komuntu wonke emnothweni.

ssw: sicaphuna kulesiphumelele kuko emkhakheni wekwakhiwa kwetimoto, sitawufezekisa tinhlelo letinkhulu sikanye nabosomabhizinisi netinhlangano tetisebenti kutimboni letinjengemkhakha wetimphahla tekugcoka netindvwangu, wegesi, wemakhemikhali kanye nemaplastiki, wetintfo letingabute tentiwe umkhicito lomusha, wetinsimbi kanye nemethali.
zul: lokhu kudinga futhi ukuthi umbuso udlale indima yawo ngendlela efanele njengomvuli wamathuba nomphumelelisi wezinto ohlinzeka ngezidingongqangi kanye nengqalasizinda esemqoka, umlawuli oshaya imithetho eyakha futhi ivule amathuba ngokulinganayo kubo bonke ababambiqhaza, futhi njengomabi wezinto kabusha oqinisekisayo ukuthi bavikelekile futhi bayabhekelelwa labo ababuthakathaka futhi abasengcupheni ngoba bengakwazi ukuzinakekela kahle ngokwabo, abanikeze amathuba futhi abahlomise ukuze nabo bakwazi ukubonisa amakhono abo ngokuphelele futhi baphile impilo abayifunayo.

ssw: sitawukhulisa tekulima netekuhlelenjiswa kwemikhicito yalokulinyiwe ngalokubonakalako ngekwesekela tinchubo tekwengeta emandla nemikhicito, sifune tindzawo nemave lamasha lesitawutsengisa kuwo imikhicito yetfu nekunciphisa kuphila ngemikhicito yetekulima letsengwa kulamanye emave.
zul: kunenye futhi indima esifuna ukuthi idlalwe ngumbuso, okuyindima ephathelene nokuvulwa kwamabhizinisi.

ssw: sitawucinisa imboni yetimbiwa ngekutsi sifune emave lesitawuhwebelana nawo ngetimbiwa taseningizimu afrika ngekusebenta bazuzi labacondziwe, sinciphise tindleko temitfombolusito, nekukhulisa lucwaningo nekutfutfuka.
zul: indima lapho umbuso ukwazi ukwenza izinto ezingaba wusizo olukhulu nakuba zinobungozi nobungcuphe obuthile, futhi ngalokho-ke alekelele umnotho ukuthi ukhule.

ssw: ngekusebentisa tingenelelo tendzawo njengetindzawo temnotfo letikhetsekile, kuvusetela mapaki etimboni endzawo, tikhungo tebhizinisi, tikhungo tebuchwepheshe besimanje kanye nemabhizinisi asemalokishini nasemakhaya, sitawuletsa intfutfuko yetemnotfo etindzaweni tasemakhaya.
zul: ngokusebenzela phezu kwempumelelo esiyizuzile emkhakheni wezimoto, sizoqalisa izinhlelo-ngqangi ezenziwe ngokubambisana nabamabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi ezimbonini ezinjengemboni yomkhakha wezingubo zokugqoka, owendwangu, owegesi yemvelo, owamakhemikhali nemikhiqizo kacwazi, owemikhiqizo evuselelekayo, kanye nowokukhiqizwa kwensimbi nemikhiqizo esansimbi.

ssw: sitawuphindze futsi sigcile kumabhizinisi lamancane nalasemkhatsini emadolobheni etfu, emalokishini nasemaphandleni siphindze futsi sakhe tindzawo tetimakethe lapho bahwebelana khona ngemikhicito yabo.
zul: sizowukhulisa futhi siwunwebe kakhulu umkhakha wezolimo nokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo ngokuthi sisekele uchungechunge lokukhiqizwa kanye nokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, sibheke amazwe nezindawo ezintsha esizothengisa kuzona imikhiqizo yethu futhi sinciphise ukuthembela kwethu emikhiqizweni yezolimo evela emazweni angaphandle.

ssw: loku sitokwenta ngalokuvusetela ligama lalelive, kungenisa inchubo yema-visa lehamba embili emhlabeni wonkhe kanye nekugcila kakhulu kutivakashi letivela echina nase-india kanye nakuleto letifika ngetindizamshini tivela kulo lonkhe lelivekati.
zul: sizoyiqinisa futhi siyeseke imboni yezimayini ngokuthi sibheke amazwe nezindawo okuzothengiswa kuzona izimbiwa zaseningizimu afrika, ngokuthi silungise imikhiqizo yezimbiwa ethile, okuzokwenza ukuthi ikhuphuke ikhwalithi ngokunjalo nenanintengo laleyo mikhiqizo, sinciphise izindleko zokukhiqiza izimbiwa futhi sikhuphule nocwaningo kanye nokuthuthukiswa.

ssw: sitawukhulisa imboni yetfu tetetheknoloji ngekucinisekisa imitsetfolelawulako ikhutsata kucanjwa kwetintfo letinsha, ngekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono ebantfu labasha kumatheknoloji lamasha, nekunciphisa tindleko te-data.
zul: ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokuhlinzeka ngendawo yokuqhuba ibhizinisi, njengezizinda zomnotho ezikhethekile, ukuvuselelwa kwamapaki ezimboni endawo, izizinda zebhizinisi, izizinda zobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye namabhizinisi asemalokishini kanye nawasezindaweni ezisemakhaya, sizoletha intuthuko yezomnotho eduze kwezindawo okuhlala kuzona abantu.

ssw: konkhe lapho sihambe khona, bantfu labasha bebaphakamisa ludzaba lwekubita kwakhulu kwe-data lapha eningizimu afrika.
zul: sizogxila emabhizinisini asafufusa emadolobheni ethu, emalokishini kanye nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya futhi sakhe nezindawo zemakethe yokuhweba lapho osomabhizinisi bezothengisa khona imikhiqizo yabo.

ssw: kuniketa lenchubo emandla, kungakapheli lenyanga letako, indvuna yetekuchumana utawukhipha inchubomgomo lecondziswe kumtimba lotimele wetekuchumana waseningizimu afrika (i-icasa) kutsi kutsi ucale inchubo yikukhipha emalayinsesi e-spectrum.
zul: sizoyifezekisa inhloso nesifiso sethu sokukhulisa ngokuphindwe kabili inani lezivakashi zakwamanye amazwe ezivakashela kuleli, liyifinyelele ezigidini ezingama-21 ngaphambi kowezi-2030.

ssw: lenchubo itawufaka ekhatsi tinyatselo tekukhutsata kucudzelana, tingucuko, kukhula lokufaka konkhe ekhatsi kwalomkhakha kanye nekufinyelela ngalokufananako.
zul: lokhu sizokwenza ngokuthi sivuselele isasasa lokuvakashela kuleli lizwe futhi senze leli lizwe libe yizwe elihehayo, sethule inqubo yokukhishwa kwezimvume zokungena nokuvakashela kuleli (ama-visa) ezisezingeni lomhlaba, futhi sigxile ikakhulukazi ekuheheni abavakashi abavela kwelase-china kanye nase-india, ngokunjalo nezivakashi ezifika kuleli ngendiza, ezivela emazweni aleli zwekazi lethu, i-afrika.

ssw: lesi sinyatselo lesibaluleke kakhulu kumitamo yekwehlisa tindleko te-data, lokuyintfo lebaluleke kakhulu ekutfutfukeni kwemnotfo kanye nekukhulula ematfuba ebantfu labasha.
zul: sizibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izivakashi ezivakashela ezweni lethu ziphephile.

ssw: simema imboni yetakhiwonchanti tekuchumana kutsi ichubeke yehlise tindleko te-data kute kutsi ifane netslamanye emave emhlaba.
zul: sizoyikhulisa imboni yezobuchwepheshe nobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi imithetho kanye nemithethonqubo elawulayo igqugquzela ukuqanjwa kwezinto ezintsha, sithuthukise amakhono abantu abasha kwezobuchwepheshe obusha, futhi sinciphise nezindleko ze-data.

ssw: siyachubeka nekuveta ematfuba elutjalomali, latawuvetwa kunkhomfa yelutjalomali yaseningizimu afrika yesibili letawubanjwa kusukela mhla ti-5 kuya kumhla ti-7 lweti.
zul: ukuze sifake umfutho kule nqubo, kule nyanga ezayo, ungqongqoshe wezokuxhumana uzokhipha umyalelo oqondiswe ophikweni oluzimele lwezokuxhumana lwaseningizimu afrika (i-icasa) ukuthi luqalise inqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwamalayisensi omthamo wamagagasi okusakaza nokuthunyelwa kolwazi ngomoya.

ssw: esikhatsini sekungaciniseki, umsebenti wetitfunywa telutjalomali sewakhe lubambiswano loluhle emkhatsini wahulumende netemabhizimisi.
zul: le nqubo izobandakanya izinyathelo zokukhuthaza ukuncintisana, uguquko, ukukhuliswa kwalo mkhakha ngendlela ebandakanya umuntu wonke kanye nokuqinisekisa ukufinyelela kwabantu bonke.

ssw: embikweni wabo labawetfulile, kuyacaca kutsi kusesekunyenti lokusadzinga kutsi kwentiwe kute kwentiwe kancono simo selutjalomali.
zul: lokhu kuyingxenye esemqoka ekwehliseni izindleko ze-data, okuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni komnotho kanjalo nasekuvulweni kwamathuba aqondiswe entsheni.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kubuyeketwa kwendlela hulumende lachumanisa ngayo umsebenti wekusombulula tinsayeya batjalimali lababukene nato nekwakha kabusha tinchubomgomo netinhlelo tetfu tekukhutsata lutjalomali.
zul: siyayinxusa imboni yengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana ukuthi iphinde izehlise futhi izindleko ze-data ukuze inanintengo le-data lilingane nelamanye amazwe omhlaba.

ssw: kwentiwe inchubekelembili lenhle ngemtamo wekukhulisa umnotfo wahulumende nemkhakha lotimele, loholwa yindvuna nkosazana dlamini zuma, mnu.
zul: siyawuqinisa impela umkhankaso wethu wokuheha utshalomali.

ssw: umkhakha lotimele wetsembise kutjala imali letigidzigidzi letinge-r840 kumiklamo lenge-43 kumikhakha le-19 kanye nekwakha imisebenti le-155 000 kuleminyaka lesihlanu letako.
zul: kutshalomali olungamabhiliyoni angama-300 amarandi olwamenyezelwa kwingqungquthela yotshalomali yokuqala ngqa eyabanjwa ngonyaka odlule, kunemiklamo esiqalisiwe yenani elingaphezulu nje kancane kwamabhiliyoni angama-250 amarandi.

ssw: ekucocisaneni nebemabhizinisi, hulumende utinikele kususa tihibe aphindze futsi asheshise kufezekiswa kwalemiklamo.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwakha umgudu wotshalomali olungenayo kuleli, futhi lokhu kuzoboniswa kwingqungquthela yesibili yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika ezobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyisi-5 kuze kube ngumhla ziyisi-7 kulwezi.

ssw: sisebenta ngekuphutfuma kusungula tingucuko etintfweni letibekwe embili kute sente kancono kwentiwa kwebhizinisi kalula ngekuhlanganisa nekwenta tihambisane netinchubo tekwenta imitsetfo yekulawula, kwenta kutsi timvume nalokunye kufakwa kweticelo kwentiwe ku-inthanethi, kanye nekunciphisa tindleko tekuhambisana naloku.
zul: esikhathini lapho sibhekene nongabazane, umsebenzi wamanxusa otshalomali sewuvule amaxhama okuxhumana nokusebenzisana asemqoka kakhulu phakathi kukahulumeni namabhizinisi.

ssw: sakhiwonchanti singumkhakha lobaluleke kakhulu welutjalomali lowesekela kuguculwa kweluhlaka, kukhula nekwakhiwa kwemisebenti.
zul: uma sibheka imbuyisambiko esiyithole kubona, kuyacaca ukuthi kusekuningi okusamele kwenziwe ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono isimo okusetshenzelwa ngaphansi kwaso esiphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali.

ssw: kubaluleke kakhulu ekwentiweni kancono kwemnotfo wetfu, kwenta lendlela lensha yekuphatsa ibe yintfo lengiyo futsi lebonakalako.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukubuyekezwa kwendlela olawula ngayo umsebenzi wokuxazulula izinselelo abahlangabezana nazo abatshalizimali kanye nokuphucula nokuhlela kabusha inqubomgomo yokukhuthaza utshalomali kanye nohlaka lwesakhiwo sayo.

ssw: indlela yetfu lensha yekubukana nekutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti imiselwe ekusebentisaneni lokunemandla lokusemkhatsini wahulumnde nemkhakha lotimele, nakanye nemimango yendzawo.
zul: mkhulu umsebenzi esesiwenzile ngaphansi kohlelo lokukhulisa umnotho ngobambiswano phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele oluholwa ngungqongqoshe unkosazana dlamini-zuma, umnu roelf meyer kanye nodkt johan van zyl slabbert.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi mali letawubekwa eceleni kanye neluntjintjo lolutakwentiwa kutikhungo kuniketa tekwakha emandla kanye nekubeka embili sakhiwonchanti semanti, imigwaco kanye netindzawo tekuhlala tetitjudeni ngekusebentisa imali leyabiwe ngekuhlakanipha.
zul: umkhakha ozimele usuthembise ukutshala imali engamabhiliyoni angama-840 amarandi emiklamweni engama-43 ngaphansi kwemikhakha eyi-19, futhi lokho kuzodala amathuba omsebenzi ayizi-155 000 kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo.

ssw: njengoba bekumenyetelwe ku-sona yaphambilini, hulumende sewubeke eceleni tigidzigidzi leti-r100 tekusungula sikhwama sesakhiwonchanti.
zul: ezingxoxweni ebezibanjwe nabamabhizinisi, uhulumeni usezwakalise ukuzibophezela ekususeni izithiyo nemigoqo ephathelene nezinqubomgomo nemithetho eyinkimbinkimbi futhi asheshise ukuqaliswa kwale miklamo.

ssw: sisebentela kwenta lesikhwama sibe sesikhungo, lesitawulawulwa yi-development bank of south africa (i-dbsa), lona litiko letemisebenti yesive nesakhiwonchanti lelentiwe kabusha litawudlala indzima yekwengamela nekucaphela umsebenti walesikhwama.
zul: senza imizamo esheshayo yokuletha izinguquko ezisemqoka okuhloswe ngazo ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi kuleli, ngokuthi sihlanganise futhi sihlele kabusha imithethonqubo elawulayo, senze kube kula kakhulu ukuthola izimvume nokufaka izicelo ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, futhi kuncishiswe nezindleko zokuthotshelwa kwenzinqubo ezibekiwe.

ssw: besisolo senta loku ngekubonisana nebatjalimali labatimele, njengetikhungo letiphetse tikhwama tempensheni, letinemadlandla mayelana nekuhlanganyela kulesikhwama sesakhiwanchanti.
zul: ingqalasizinda ingumkhakha osemqoka kakhulu okumele kutshalwe kuwona izimali, osekela ukulethwa koguquko ezikhungweni, ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

ssw: letingucuko titawucinisekisa kuhlela kancono imiklamo yesakhiwonchanti, kwenta lucwaningo lolubanti lwekuhlola kutsi sikhawonchanti singenteka ngemphumelelo yini kanye nekwenta emalungiselelo lafanele, kwenta ncono kulawulwa kwelisubuciko, kwenta umsebenti kahle nekwengamela lokwentiwe kancono.
zul: ingqalasiizinda ibaluleke kakhulu futhi ekuvuselelweni komnotho wezwe, kanye nokuletha nokuqalisa isikhathi esisha sokuvuselela nokuthuthukisa izwe lethu.

ssw: loku kutawuniketa emandla ladzingeka kakhulu emkhakheni wetekwakha losewunesikhatsi uloku ume ndzawonye ungakhuli sitawuvusa futsi sikhutsate bantfu kutsi batsenge imikhicito yakuleli siphindze futsi sikhulise umkhakha wetekukhicita waseningizimu afrika ngekucinisekisa kutsi umkhankhaso ‘i-buy local’ (tsenga umkhicito walapha ekhaya) ukhona yonkhe indzawo futsi uhlala ukhona.
zul: indlela entsha esizoyilandela ekuthuthukisweni kwengqalasizinda isekelwe phezu kobambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele, kanye nemiphakathi yendawo.

ssw: simema bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika kutsi batsenge ngenhloso nangalokuchubekako imikhicito leyentiwe kuleli lakitsi.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya inhlanganisela ekhethekile yezinyathelo eziphathelene nezimali kanye nalezo eziphathelene nokuphatha nokulawula okuhloswe ngazo ukukhuthaza umsebenzi wokwakha kanye nokubeka eqhulwini ukwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi, imigwaqo kanye nezindlu zokuhlalisa abafundi, ngokuthi kusetshenziswe ngobunyoninco leyo mali eyabelwe le miklamo.

ssw: lesudu, thayi kanye nelishethi lengigcokile lamuhla kwakhiwa lapha kitsi batfungi baseningizimu afrika e-house of monatic, lapha esalt river ekapa.
zul: njengoba kwamenyezelwa kwi-sona edlule, uhulumeni ubeke eceleni isamba esingamabhiliyoni ayi-100 amarandi ngenhloso yokuxhasa nokugqugquzela isikhwama sengqalasizinda.

ssw: sonkhe asitsenge imikhicito lekhicitwe kuleli lakitsi kute kutsi sikhulise isibalo sebantfu labatsenga imikhicito lekhicitwe kuleli.
zul: senza imizamo yokuthi lesi sikhwama sibe yisikhungo, esizolawulwa yibhange lentuthuko laseningizimu afrika (i-dbsa), futhi umnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nengqalasizinda ohlelwe kabusha yiwona ozoqapha umsebenzi owenziwa yilesi sikhungo.

ssw: ungakapheli lomnyaka, sifuna kuphetsa tivunelwane netitolo letinkhulu kutsi bafanele kutsi batsenge kakhulu imikhicito leyentiwe lapha eningizimu afrika kanye nekukhutsata kutsengwa kwemikhicito yelizinga leliphakeme leyentiwe tisebenti talapha eningizimu afrika.
zul: lokhu sikwenza ngokubonisana kanye nokubambisana nabatshalizimali abazimele, abafana nezikhungo ezilawula izikhwama zempesheni, ezingabatshalizimali abanentshisekelo ekubambeni iqhaza esikhwameni sengqalasizinda.

ssw: letinyatselo leti tisekelwe kutinikela kwetfu lokunemandla kunchubomgomo yemnotfo jikelele neyetimali tahulumende lokutawuchubeka kukhutse kwetsenjwa nelutjalomali.
zul: lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuhlelwa kangcono kwemiklamo yengqalasizinda, umsebenzi onohlonze wokuhlola ukuthi ingqalasizinda izokwenzeka ngempumelelo yini nokwenza amalungiselelo afanelekile, ukuphucula ukuphatha okukhethekile, ukuqaliswa ngobunyoninco kwemisebenzi yengqalasizinda kanye nokuphatha okuhle.

ssw: sitinikele ekubolekeni ngekuhlakanipha kanye nekulawula lusebentisomali ngesandla lesicinile kute sisimamise timali tetfu tesive siphindze futsi sinciphise tikweleti.
zul: lokhu kuhlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okudingeka kakhulu emkhakheni wezokwakha osekuphele isikhathi eside impela ufadalele.

ssw: libhangesilulu leningizimu afrika sikhungo lesibaluleke kakhulu kulelive letfu libuswa ngentsandvo yelinyenti, lesifaneleke nalelihlonishwa kakhulu kulelive nangemave emhlaba.
zul: sizogqugquzela futhi sikhuthaze abantu ukuthi bathenge imikhiqizo nezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli futhi sikhulise umkhakha wezokukhiqiza waseningizimu afrika ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi umkhankaso ‘wokuthengwa kwezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli’ (i-‘buy local’) ungundabuzekwayo futhi ubonakala yonke indawo.

ssw: kukhuphuka kwetintsengo temkhicito netinsita kulimata emandla ekutsenga abo bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika, kepha ikakhulu kwalabo labaphuyile.
zul: siyabanxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi, ngenhloso futhi ngokuqhubekayo, bathenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli.

ssw: kwehla nekwenyuka kwetintsengo kwentela phasi kuncintisana kwemkhicito yetfu letsengiselwa lamanye emave kanye nemafemu etfu lancintisana nemikhicito letsengwa kulamanye emave, lokubeka timboni nemisebenti engotini.
zul: le sudu nehembe kanye nothayi engikugqokile namhlanje kwakhiwe ngabasebenzi bemboni yendwangu yaseningizimu afrika e-house of monatic, khona lapha e-salt river edolobheni lasekapa.

ssw: ngenca yeletizatfu leti, umtsetfosisekelo wetfu ucondzisa libhangesilulu leningizimu afrika kutsi livikele intsengo yemali yetfu kulungiselela kukhula lokulingene nalokusimeme.
zul: sonke masithenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli ukuze sikhulise isibalo sabantu abathenga impahla ekhiqizwe kuleli.

ssw: lamuhla, siyasicinisekisa lesicondziso, libhangengodla lelifanele kutsi lisilandzelele ngekutimela, ngaphandle kwekwesaba, kuvuna luhlangotsi noma kukhetsa.
zul: kulo nyaka esiwuphethe, sifuna ukwenza izivumelwano nezitolo ezithengisa impahla ukuthi ziqinisekise ukuthi zithenga izimpahla ezikhiqizwe eningizimu afrika futhi ziyikhangise ngenkuthalo imikhiqizo emihle kakhulu eyakhiwe ngabasebenzi baseningizimu afrika.

ssw: umtsetfosisekelo wetfu uphindze futsi ufune kutsi kuhlale njalo kunekubonisana emkhatsini welibhangengondla kanye nendvuna yetetimali kukhutsata lulawulo loluhle lwemnotfo jikelele, konkhe loku kwentelwa kwakha imisebenti kanye nekukhula kwemnotfo.
zul: futhi kusenjalo sizokhangisa ngomdlandla omkhulu imikhiqizo yethu ezwekazini lase-afrika kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

ssw: uma ngabe sifanele kutsi sincintisane ezingeni lemave emhlabe, nangabe sifuna kuheha lutjalomali, sifanele kutsi silungise letindleko letinkhulu tekuchuba ibhizinisi eningizimu afrika, nemitsetfo leneminingwane leminyenti lengadzingeki.
zul: lezi zinyathelo zisekelwe phezu kwesibophezelo sethu esiqinile kwinqubomgomo yomnotho-jikelele kanye neyezezimali ezoqhubeka nokukhuthaza ukwethenjwa kwaleli lizwe futhi kukhuthaze nokutshalwa kwezimali.

ssw: sifanele kutsi sifike ezingeni lapho khona kute inkampani lefanele kutsi ilindze imvume noma ilayisensi ngetulu kwetinyanga letisitfupha futsi tinkampani letinsha tifanele kutsi tikwati kutsi tibhaliswe ngelilanga linye.
zul: sizibophezele ekubolekeni izimali ngobuhlakani obukhulu ukuze singaboleki imali engaphezu kwamandla ethu okukhokha leyo mali esiyibolekile futhi sizibophezele ekusebenziseni imali ngokucophelela okukhulu ukuze siqinisekise uzinzo ezimalini zikahulumeni futhi sinciphise nesikweletu sezwe.

ssw: sitawuchubeka nekunciphisa tindleko tekuchuba ibhizinisi ngekunciphisa intsela yetimpahla letitfunyelwa kulamanye emave esikhumulweni semikhumbi, kulandzelela tindleko letiphansi tekuphehla gezi, kanye nekwenta titfutsi tetitimela tincintisane kakhulu futsi tonge.
zul: ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika lisiyikhungo esisemqoka kakhulu ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, esithenjwayo futhi esihlonishwa kakhulu kuleli nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

ssw: ngekuholwa yi-ndp, kungumsebenti wetfu kulandzelela intfutfuko lefake konkhe ekhatsi, lesimeme lemelana nekugucuka kwesimo selitulu.
zul: uzinzo lwamananintengo luyadingeka impela, kepha-ke alwanele ekuqinisekiseni ukukhula komnotho.
