ssw: sisebenta ngekubambisana nemkhakha lotimele, tetisebenti kanye nemave emhlaba sitawenta kancono imitamo yetfu yekumelana nekugucuka kwesimo selitulu futsi sinciphise nemtselela waloku.
zul: amananintengo ezimpahla nezinsizakalo adlondlobalayo anciphisa amandla okuthenga abo bonke abantu baseningzimu afrika, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi.

ssw: sinelitfuba lekuhamba embili emitameni yetekutfutfukisa umnotfo longanukubeti simondzawo nemvelo, timboni letitfucutisa umoya lomncane longcolile, lekuba ngemavulandlela kutematheknoloji lamasha esimanje kanye nekukhula kwamasinyane lokucondze emnotfweni wesikhatsi lesitako.
zul: ukwehla kwamandla emali kunciphisa amandla okuncintisana ezimpahla zakuleli ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kanye namafemu akuleli akhiqiza izimpahla ezincintisana nezimpahla ezingena kuleli ezakhiwe kwamanye amazwe, futhi lokhu kubeka engcupheni izimboni zakuleli kanye nemisebenzi.

ssw: sifanele kutsi sikhuphule sikalo semandla lavusetelelekako nalahlobile etinhlobeni letahlukene tagesi letisetjentiswe kulelive siphindze futsi sibukisise nendzima lengadlalwa ngumnotfo wehayidrojini.
zul: ngenxa yalesi sizathu-ke, umthethosisekelo wethu ugunyaza ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika ukuthi livikele isilinganisontengo semali yakuleli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukukhula komnotho okulingene futhi okusimeme.

ssw: kukhula masinyane kwemnotfo kuphindze futsi kudzinge kuhlelwa kabusha kwemhlaba lokusheshako emaphandleni nasemadolobheni kanye nemalungelo emhlaba lanemandla.
zul: namuhla, sithanda ukuligcizelela leli gunya elihlinzekwe ngokomthethosisekelo, okumele lifezekiswe yibhange lombuso ngokuzimela, ngaphandle kokuchema noma ukucwasa.

ssw: siwutfolile umbiko wephaneli leyelulekako yamengameli lelibhekene nekuhlelwa kabusha kwemhlaba netekulima, lebeyiholwa lisekelamengameli, lemanje utawetfulwa kukhabhinethi kute iwubukisise.
zul: umthethosisekelo wethu uyalela futhi ukuthi kube nokubonisana okuqhubekayo phakathi kwebhangengodla kanye nongqongqoshe wezezimali ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo emnothweni wezwe wonkana, ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokukhulisa umnotho.

ssw: tincomo talephaneli titawesekela kuphetfwa kweluhlelo lwekuhlelwa kabusha kwemhlaba lolukhulu, naloluletsa tingucuko.
zul: uma sifuna ukuncintisana ngempumelelo namazwe omhlaba, futhi uma sifuna ukuheha utshalomali, kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokunciphisa izindleko eziphakeme kakhulu zokwenza ibhizinisi eningizimu afrika, futhi sixegise imithethonqubo nemidanti eyinkimbinkimbi futhi ewundendende okumele ilandelwe.

ssw: esikhatsini lesilandzela masinyane, hulumende utawuphutfumisa imitamo yekutfola nekukhulula umhlaba wahulumende lofanele tindzawo tekuhlala letiphucukile, tindzawo tekuhlala tasemadolobheni newekulima.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokunciphisa izindleko zokwenza ibhizinisi ngokuthi sinciphise intela yezimpahla ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle, sizame ukuthola nokusebenzisa izindlela zokuphehla ugesi ezishimbile, futhi senze umkhakha wokuthutha impahla ngezitimela ube sesimweni sokuncintisana neminye imikhakha yokuthuthwa kwempahla futhi usebenze ngobunyoninco.

ssw: kumgodla wetivusamfutfo nekuvusetela lomenyetelwe kulomnyaka lophelile, setsembisa kusita ngetimali balimi labasakhansa.
zul: ngokuholwa yi-ndp, kungumthwalo nomsebenzi wethu ukuqinisekisa intuthuko ebandakanya umuntu wonke futhi esimeme, ezokwazi ukumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

ssw: kulesikhatsi sesabelotimali sethemu lesemkhatsini, tigidzigidzi leti-r3.9 setabelwe i-land bank kutsi isite balimi labamnyama labalimela kutsengisa.
zul: ngokubambisana nomkhakha ozimele, abasebenzi kanye namazwe omhlaba sizoqinisa futhi sikhuphule imizamo yethu yokumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu futhi sinciphise nomthelela omubi walokhu.

ssw: incenye lebaluleke kakhulu yelisubuciko bekukhula kweningzimu afrika kusekuhlanganiseni umnotfo wetfu naloyo wabomakhelwane betfu kanye nalo lonkhe livekati letfu.
zul: sinethuba lokuqinisekisa ukuthi sihamba phambili emizamweni yokukhulisa umnotho ngendlela ebhekelela futhi inakekele imvelo, sibe nezimboni ezisebenzisa izindlela-kusebenza ezikhiqiza ikhabhoni encane kakhulu futhi ezingawuncolisi umkhathi nemvelo, sihambe phambili ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe obusha futhi sithathe amagxathu amakhulukazi aphokophele emnothweni wangomuso.

ssw: indzawo yekuhwebelana ngalokukhululekile yelivekati lase-afrika (i-afcta) itawenta kancono kuhanjiswa kwemikhicito netinsita, imali kanye netinsita tekukhicita kulo lonkhe lelivekati.
zul: kumele siwukhulise umthamo wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo futhi ongayingcolisi imvelo, kwizinhlobo zemithombo kagesi ehlukahlukene esetshenziswa kule lizwe, futhi sizame ukucubungula nokubhekisisa ukuthi ngeke yini kube wusizo ukuthi siguqukele emnothweni ogxile kakhulu ekusetshenzisweni kwegesi ihayidrojini.

ssw: lisubuciko letfu lekwenta kancono timboni ligcile ekukhuliseni lubambiswano ngelutjalomali nekuhwebelana naso sonkhe sigodzi lesingaseningizimu ne-afrika kanye nalelivekati ngebubanti balo.
zul: ukukhula komnotho okusheshayo kudinga futhi ukuthi kusheshiswe izinguquko kwezomhlaba ezindaweni ezisemakhaya kanye nezosemadolobheni futhi kube khona inqubo-kusebenza ecacile ephathelene nokuphathwa kwamalungelo omhlaba.

ssw: ngekhatsi kummango longaphansi kwenhlangano yekutfutfukisa emave laseningizimu ne-afrika, sitawubeka embili kutfutfukiswa kwetinchubo tekwengeta bunjalo bemkhicito emikhakheni lebalulekile njengakutemandla, timbiwa, tekukhicita, tesakhiwonchanti nekwendluliswa kwemkhicito wetekulima.
zul: sesiwutholile umbiko wethimba elikhethekile lokweluleka umongameli mayelana nezinguquko kwezomhlaba nezolimo, elabe liholwa yiphini likamongameli, manje osuzokwethulwa phambi kwekhabhinethi ukuze ucutshungulwe.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika, kukhula kwemnotfo wetfu angeke kubaluleke kangako ngaphandle nangabe kwakha imisebenti leminyenti.
zul: izincomo zaleli thimba elikhethekile yizona ezizosetshenziswa ukuhlanganisa nokuphothula uhlelo lwezinguquko kwezomhlaba olubanzi futhi oluzoletha uguquko olunohlonze.

ssw: liciniso lekutsi lizinga lekweswela imisebenti kwalabasha baseningizimu afrika lingetulu kwe-50% yinhlekelele yavelonkhe ledzinga tisombululo letiphutfumako, letinsha naletichumanisekako lapho khona sifanele sonkhe sikubone njengalokudzingekako ekusebenteni ngekutikhandla.
zul: kulesi sikhashana esifushane esizayo, uhulumeni uzosheshisa imizamo yokuhlonza kanye nokwaba umhlaba kahulumeni okulungele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, onazo izinsiza nezidingongqangi zesimanjemanje, futhi uhulumeni uzokwaba nomhlaba ozosetshenziselwa ukulima.

ssw: futsi njengoba banyenti bantfu labasha labafinyelela esigabeni sekufuna umsebenti njalo ngemnyaka, umnotfo ufanele kutsi wakhe imisebenti leminyenti kakhulu yelusha kunaloku lokwentekako manje.
zul: kwiphakheji yokukhuthaza nokuvuselela umnotho eyamenyezelwa ngonyaka odlule, sathembisa ukuthi sizokubeka eqhulwini ukuxhaswa ngezimali kwabalimi abasafufusa.

ssw: lelisu leli litawusebenta kuwo onkhe ematiko ahulumende nakuto totintsatfu tinhlaka tahulumende, kubanjiswene nemkhakha lotimele.
zul: ingxenye esemqoka kakhulu yeqhingasu lokukhulisa umnotho leningizimu afrika wukudidiyelwa komnotho wakuleli neminotho yamazwe angomakhelwane kanye neminotho yamazwe aleli zwekazi lonkana.

ssw: sesivele sisebentisana nemkhakha lotimele kwakha ematfuba ebantfu labasha ngekukhulisa sibalo salamatfuba emisebenti yesikhashana lekhona.
zul: isizinda sokuhwebelana mahhala kwamazwe ezwekazi lase-afrika, (i-afcfta), sizothuthukisa futhi senze ngcono ukuhamba nokuthunyelwa kwezimpahla kanye nezinsizakalo, ingqala-bhizinisi kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza zokukhiqiza impahla kwizwekazi lonkana.

ssw: lankha ngematfuba emisebenti yesikhashana lavumela bantfu labasha labawasebentisako kubonakala, batfole kwesekela kwaletinkapani basebenta kuto kanye nematfuba ekukhombisa kuba bakhona futsi bafuna imisebenti noma kutisebentela.
zul: iqhingasu leningizimu afrika elivuseleliwe futhi lafakwa nomfutho ligxile ekukhuliseni ubudlelwano bokuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali phakathi kwelizwe lethu nesifunda sonkana samazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika kanye nezwekazi lonkana.

ssw: lamatfuba enta siciniseko sekutsi lusha lolubuya emakhaya laphuye kakhulu – nelusha lolubomake labasesebancane ikakhulu – bayahlonyiswa kute bakwati kungena emisebentini lemisha.
zul: ngaphakathi kwenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika (i-sadc), sizobeka eqhulwini uchungechunge lokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo kanye nokuthunyelwa nokuhanjiswa kwayo phakathi kwamazwe angaphansi kwale nhlangano, okuyimikhiqizo yemikhakha enjengowezamandla, owezimayini nokuthuthukiswa kwekhwalithi yemikhiqizo yezimbiwa, owezokukhiqizwa kwempahla, owezengqalasizinda kanye nowokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo.

ssw: hulumende utawuchubeka nekuniketa imisebenti ngekusebentisa luhlelo lwemisebenti yemmango leyengetiwe (i-epwp), ikakhulu etindzaweni letidzinga tisebenti letinyenti njengekulungisa kugcina tintfo tisesimeni lesifanele, kususa titjalo letingafuneki, kuvala emaphayiphi lavutako, kanye nekwakha imigwaco.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukukhula komnotho wezwe ngeke neze kuwenze umehluko ophawulekayo uma kungalekeleli ekwakhiweni kwamathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

ssw: sitawuchubeka nekwenta tinhlelo letitawucinisekisa kutsi bantfu labasha labangakafakwa kutemnotfo bakulungele kufakwa emikhakheni lenematfuba lamanyenti emisebenti.
zul: njengoba izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni lingaphezu kwama-50% kusho ukuthi izwe libhekene nengwadla enkulukazi edinga ukuthi kutholakale izixazululo eziphuthumayo, ezihambisana nokusetshenziswa kwamaqhingasu amasha futhi ezihambelanayo, lapho wonke umuntu kumele akubone njengento edingekayo futhi esemqoka kakhulu ukuthi kusetshenzwe ngokubambisana.

ssw: lemikhakha ifaka ekhatsi tikhungo temave emhlaba telusito ngelucingo, imisebenti yekwengeta bungibo betekulima, kufaka tintfo tebucwepheshe, kulungisa nekugcina tintfo tisesimeni sato lesifanele kanye nematfuba lamasha laniketwa ngumnotfo we-inthanethi kanye netheknoloji yesimanje.
zul: futhi njengoba abantu abasha bengena ngobuningi minyaka yonke esigabeni sabantu abathungatha amathuba omsebenzi, umnotho wezwe kumele wakhe amathuba omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni angaphezulu kakhulu kwamathuba avulekayo njengamanje.

ssw: hulumende utawuphindze futsi ente siciniseko sekutsi bantfu labasha bacashwa tinhlangano netikhungo temmango njengasetinkhulisa nakutikhungo tekunakekelwa kutemphilo.
zul: ngenhloso nje yokuqinisekisa ukuthi alidlondlobali ngokweqile izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni.

ssw: sitawukhulisa luphiko lwetemisebenti yelusha lwavelonkhe kutsi lutsatse bantfu labasha laba-50 000 njalo ngemnyaka.
zul: iqiniso elimsulwa wukuthi mayelana nenkinga yokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni, kumele senze imizamo enohlonze futhi ephuthumayo, ngenhloso nje yokunciphisa amanani aphakeme kakhulu esibhekene nawo njengamanje entsha ehleli emakhaya engasebenzi, singakayibali intsha esazophuma ezikhungweni zemfundo, nayo ifune umsebenzi.

ssw: hulumende utawesekela tinkapani letisebentisa itheknoloji tebantfu labasha labatisebentako etindzaweni tasemaphandleni nasemalokishini.
zul: ngakho-ke kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siluqalise ngokushesha okukhulu uhlelo olubanzi – oluqhutshwa futhi lulawulwe yihhovisi likamongameli – ukuze kwakhiwe amathuba amasha omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni, angekho ngaphansi kwezigidi ezimbili kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

ssw: sitawukhulisa tinhlelo tetfu kute sente bantfu labasha bakwati kutfola sipiliyoni semsebenti lobakhokhelako ngekusebentisa imitamo lefana neluphiko lwetemisebenti yelusha (i-yes), knaye nekuchuba kufundzela uimsebenti emsebentini.
zul: sesiqalile kakade ukusebenzisana nabomkhakha ozimele ekwakheni imigudu yokufaka abantu abasha emsebenzini ngokuthi sikhulise futhi sithuthukise izinhlelo ezikhona njengamanje zokuphathwa kwemigudu yokufakwa kwentsha emsebenzini.

ssw: sitawuvula tikhungo tekutfutfukisa emabhizinisi lamancane kuniketa emabhizinisi lacalako elusha lusito lwetimali nangekwelulekwa ngebhizisi lapho bacala emabhizinisi wabo.
zul: lezi yizinhlelo ezivumela labo bantu abasha ababhalise ngaphansi kwazo ukuthi babonakale kalula, bathole ukwesekwa kanye namathuba azokwenza ukuthi bavele obala ukuze babonakale kalula ukuthi badinga amathuba omsebenzi noma amathuba okusungula amabhizinisi.

ssw: itolo, ngibe nelitfuba lekuhlangana nekucocisana nebantfu labasha baseningizimu afrika labanyenti labenta imisebenti lemangalisako yekwakha live letfu nekutfutfukisa labanye bantfu.
zul: lezi zinhlelo ziyaqinisekisa ukuthi intsha evela emakhaya ahlwempu – futhi ikakhulukazi abesifazane abasebasha – iyahlonyiswa futhi icijwe ngendlela efanele ukuze ikwazi ukuwabamba ngazo zombili amathuba amasha avelayo.

ssw: babosomabhizinisi nebatfutfukisi bebantfu, tishikashiki kanye nabosomaciko.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokuhlinzeka amathuba omsebenzi ngaphansi kohlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi (i-epwp), ikakhulukazi emikhakheni edinga abasebenzi abaningi njengomkhakha wokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda, ukuhlakulwa kokhula nokususwa kwezihlahla nezitshalo ezingadingekile, ukuvalwa kwamapayipi amanzi avuzayo kanye nokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo.

ssw: nangabe kunentfo yinye lesiyifundzile ekukhulumisaneni kwetfu nelusha lwalelive kutsi angeke sibahlisibete ngetisombululo tetfu: konkhe lesikwentako kufanele kutsi kuholwe bantfu labasha lucobo lwabo.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokuthuthukisa izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha abangasebenzi bakulungele ukusebenza futhi bayafakwa emsebenzini kuleyo mikhakha lapho kunamathuba omsebenzi akhulayo.

ssw: bafuna kucashwa, yebo, kepha futsi bafuna kuba bacashi, bagcwele imibono, bahamba embili ekucanjweni kwalokusha, futsi bafuna kutentela tintfo bona ngekwabo.
zul: le mikhakha ibandakanya imikhakha enjengowezinsizakalo zamazwe ngamazwe zokuhlinzeka usizo ngocingo, uchungechunge lomsebenzi wokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, ukuxhunywa kwemishini yezobuchwepheshe, ukulungiswa nokugcinwa kwemishini isesimweni sokusebenza esihle kanye namathuba amasha ahlinzekwa ngumnotho wezobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye noguquko lwezimboni lwesine olugxile ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje.

ssw: sifanele kutsi siyesekele lenshisekelo yabosomabhizinisi ngoba umcebo walelive usime kumandla nesiphiwo sekucamba sebantfu balelive labasha.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka futhi nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha bayaqashwa ezinhlanganweni nasezikhungweni zomphakathi ezinjengezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane kanye nezinhlangano ezihlinzeka ngosizo lwezempilo nokunakekelwa.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika, nangabe sifuna kuciniseka kutsi kungakapheli leminyaka le-10 letako, wonkhe umntfwana loneminyaka le-10 budzala utawukwati kufundza ngekuvisisa, sifanele kutsi sigcogce sonkhe sive sisigcogcele umkhankhaso lomkhulu wekufundza.
zul: sizolukhulisa uhlelo lukazwelonke lokuvulwa kwemisebenzi eqondiswe entsheni ukuze luqashe abantu abasha abayizi-50 000 njalo ngonyaka.

ssw: kusheshe ucale kufundza kusisekelo lesincuma inchubekelembili yetemfundvo yemntfwana, ngekuya esikolweni, ngemfundvo lephakeme kanye nasemsebentini.
zul: uhulumeni uzosekela futhi axhase izinhlelo-kusebenza zobuchwepheshe eziqondiswe kubantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nasemalokishini.

ssw: yonkhe leminye imitamo – kusukela kulomsebenti lowentelwa kwenta kancono lizinga lemfundvo lesisekelo kuye ekuniketweni kwalabaphuyile imfundvo yamahhala, kusuka emakolishi etifundvo tebuciko betemisebenti yetandla kanye nekucecesha (ema-tvet) kuye ekukhulisweni kwekufundza emsebentini – angeke ikhicite lemiphumela lesiyifunako ngaphandle nangabe sicala ngekwenta siciniseko sekutsi bantfwana bayakwati kufundza ngekuvisisa.
zul: sizozikhulisa izinhlelo zethu ukuze silekelele abantu abasha bakwazi ukuthola ulwazi nesipiliyoni somsebenzi lapho bezokwenza umsebenzi abazowuholela, ngaphansi kwezinhlelo ezinjengohlelo lophiko lokuqashwa kwentsha (i-yes), futhi silekelele intsha ekutholeni amathuba okuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini.

ssw: bonkhe bothishela besigaba sabokhewana nebesigaba lesisemkhatsini batawuceceshwa kute bafundzise singisi netilwimi temdzabu, futsi sicecesha siphindze futsi siyisa kuleminye imisebenti licembu lebaceceshi labanesipiliyoni labatawusekela bothishela ngalokusezingeni leliphakeme.
zul: sizohlinzeka ngezizinda zokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emabhizinisini amancane ngenhloso yokunikeza abantu abasha izeluleko eziphathelene nezimali kanye nokuqhutshwa kwebhizinisi ngenkathi besungula amabhizinisi abo.

ssw: sifezekisa luhlelo lwekufundza lwelibanga lekucala, lolufaka ekhatsi tinhlelo tekufundza letihlanganisiwe, tincwadzi tekufundza letengetiwe kanye nekwesekelwa kwebungcweti kwabothishela besigaba sabokhewana.
zul: izolo, kube yintokozo enkulu kimina ukuhlangana nokuxoxisana neqenjana labantu abasha baseningizimu afrika abenza umsebenzi omuhle kakhulu ekwakheni izwe lethu kanye nokuthuthukisa abantu bakithi.

ssw: loku kwenta incenye yemtano lobanti wekucinisa inchubo yemfundvo lesisekelo ngekuhlomisa emacembu ebaholi besikolwa, kwenta kancono emakhono abothishela nekucinisekisa kukalwa kwencubekelembili lokungagucuki kwelibanga lesitsatfu, lesitfupha nelemfica.
zul: bangosomabhizinisi, abathuthukisi bomphakathi, izishoshovu kanye namaciko.

ssw: sifanele kutsi siphindze silungiselele bantfu betfu labasha imisebenti yesikhatsi lesitako.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka esizifundile kulezi zingxoxo ebesizibambe nentsha yaleli lizwe wukuthi akumele siqhamuke nezixazululo ezicatshangwa yithina bese sithi mabazisebenzise: konke esikwenzayo kumele kuholwe ngabantu abasha ngokwabo.

ssw: kungako nje singenisa tifundvo letifanana nekusebentisa emakhodi (i-coding) ne-data analytics etikolweni temabanga laphansi.
zul: baqhamuke nemiqondo-mbono eminingi futhi ehlukahlukene, bahamba phambili ekusetshenzisweni kwezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha, futhi bafuna ukuzenzela izinto ngokwabo.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile, iningizimu afrika lesiyifisnako yiningizimu afrika lapho khona bonkhe bantfu bangativa nje baphephile kepha baphephile impela.
zul: kumele siyeseke le ntshisekelo yentsha ekusunguleni amabhizinisi ngoba phela impumelelo yaleli lizwe incike emdlandleni wabantu abasha kanye nasethalenteni labo lokuqhamuka nemiqondo emisha kanye nezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha.

ssw: ngako-ke, asisebente ngekubambisana kute sicinisekise kutsi bugebengu bebudlova buncishiswa ngalokungenani ngehhafu kuleminyaka le-10 letako.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo zonke izingane ezineminyaka eyi-10 ziyakwazi ukufunda futhi zikuqonda kahle lokho ezikufundayo, kumele sigqugquzele isizwe sonke ukuthi siweseke umkhankaso omkhulukazi wokufunda.

ssw: sinyatselo sekucala kukhulisa kubonakala kwemaphoyisa ngekutsi kucashwe emaphoyisa lamanyenti, siphindze futsi sakhe indzima leshukuma kakhulu yetakhamuti ngekusebentisa tinkhundla temaphoyisa emmango lasebenta ngemphumelelo.
zul: ukufunda kwengane isencane kuyinto eyisisekelo, futhi ukuphumelela nokuqhubekela phambili kwengane emfundweni yayo kuncike kulokhu.

ssw: kwamanje, tingetulu kwe-5 000 titjudeni letibhalisele kuceceshwa lokusisekelo emakolishi etfu emaphoyisa futsi silindzele kutsi lelinani litawukhuliswa liye ku-7000 ngemjikeleto kulamahlandla lamabili letako ekutsatfwa kwetitjudeni temaphoyisa.
zul: kusukela esikoleni kuqhubeke njalo kuyongena emfundweni ephakeme kuze kuyofinyelela nasemsebenzini imbala.

ssw: sisebentela kwenta kancono emazinga ekuphenya nekushushisa bugebengu, nekucinisekisa kuceceshwa lokuncono nebungcweti kuyo yonkhe inchubo yetebulungiswa.
zul: zonke ezinye izinhlelo zethu – kusukela emsebenzini owenziwayo ukwenza ngcono izinga lemfundo eyisisekelo kuyofinyelela ekuhlinzekweni kwemfundo ephakeme yamahhala kubantu abahlwempu, kusukela kutshalomali nokwesekwa esikunikeza amakolishi ezobuchwepheshe nemisebenzi yobungoti bezandla kuyofinyelela ekukhulisweni kwezinhlelo zokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini – ngeke neze zikhiqize imiphumela emihle uma singaqali ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane ziyakwazi ukufunda.

ssw: bugebengu bebudlova yinkinga yemmango ledzinga kutsi wonkhe ummango ubukane nayo.
zul: yizinhlelo ezinjengomkhankaso wokufunda kazwelonke ezizokwenza sikwazi ukuqhuba ngempumelelo lo mzamo owenziwa ezweni lonkana.

ssw: sisebenta netinhlangano temmango mayelana nemasu ekucedza budlova lobucondziswe kubulili kanye nekubulawa kwabomake.
zul: bonke othisha bezinga eliyisisekelo kanye nelimaphakathi bazoqeqeshelwa ukufundisa isingisi kanye nezilimi zabomdabu, futhi njengamanje siqeqesha amaqembu abaqeqeshi esizobathumela ezikoleni ukuthi bayohlinzeka ngosizo olusezingeni eliphezulu kothisha ngaphakathi esikoleni.

ssw: silandzela kubonisana nekukhulumisana lokunemandla, sisebentela kusungula umkhandlu webudlova lobucondziswe kubulili nekubulawa kwabomake kanye nelisubuciko lavelonkhe lelitasikhombindlela sonkhe, nanoma ngukuphi lapho sikhona, emitameni yetfu yekucedza lenkinga lecakile yavelonkhe.
zul: siqalisa uhlelo lokufunda emabangeni aphansi, olubandakanya izinhlelo zesifundo ezinako konke, izincwadi zokufunda ezengeziwe kanye nosizo longoti kothisha bezinga eliyisisekelo.

ssw: sikhulisa emakhono futsi sihlomisa emaphoyisa netinkantolo kutsi tesekele labo lababahlukunyetwa bebudlova lobucondziswe kubulili.
zul: lokhu kuyingxenye yemizamo ebanzi yokuqinisa uhlelo lwemfundo eyisisekelo ngokucija nokuhlomisa amathimba abaphathi bezikole, siphucule amakhono othisha futhi siqinisekise ukusetshenziswa kwendlela ethembakele yokukala inqubekelaphambili yabafundi ebangeni lesithathu, elesithupha kanye nelesishiyagalolunye.

ssw: sicinisa kulwa netigungu tetidzakamiva ngekufezekisa lisubuciko lavelonkhe lekulwa nemagenge kanye nelisu lelikhulu letidzakamiva lelibuyeketiwe.
zul: yingakho, ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi, sethula izifundo enjengomsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamakhodi ezinhlelo-kusebenza zamakhompyutha (izifundo ze-coding) kanye nomsebenzi wokuhlola nokuhlaziya i-data (i-data analytics).

ssw: sincumo setfu besimiselwe ekongeni imali, kugcina tindleko, kubusa ngekubambisana kanye nekuhambisana nelisubiciko.
zul: isinyathelo sokuqala wukukhulisa inani lamaphoyisa abonakala ehamba hamba emphakathini, ngokuthi kuqashwe amaphoyisa angeziwe, kanye nokwenza isimo esizoholela ekutheni izakhamuzi zibambe iqhaza ngenkuthalo ngaphansi kwamaqenjana omphakathi asebenzisana namaphoyisa (ama-cpf) asebenza kahle.

ssw: loku sicalo senchubo lenkhulu yekubuka nekwehla kwelikhono lembuso nekuhlela kabusha luhlelo lwetfu lwekwetfulwa kwetinsita kute kutsi lusebentele kahle kakhulu takhamuti talelive lakitsi.
zul: njengamanje, bangaphezu kwezi-5 000 abafundi ababhaliselwe ukuqeqeshwa okuyisisekelo emakolishi ethu okuqeqesha amaphoyisa futhi sibheke ukuthi leli nani likhuphuke liyofinyelela kwizi-7 000 ngomjikelezo ngamunye kumahlandla okuqeqeshwa kwamaphoyisa amabili ezayo.

ssw: sitawusebentisa indlela lemiselwe kutigodzi – sigcile etigodzini letinge-44 emadolobhakati lasiphohlongo – kusheshisa kutfulwa kwetinsita, kucinisekisa kutsi bomasipala basekelwa kahle nekutsi futsi banetinsita letenele.
zul: senza imizamo yokwenza ngcono amazinga empumelelo yokuphenywa nokushushiswa kwamacala, kanye nokuqiniseka ukuqeqeshwa okungcono kanye nokusebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco ohlelweni lwezobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu.

ssw: kucinisekisa kutsi umbuso uyakhona kwenta kutsi umnotfo ube khona kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwetenhlalo, kubalulekile kutsi sicinise emabhizinisi embuso (ema-soe).
zul: ubugebengu obuhambisana nodlame buyinkinga yezwe lonkana, futhi edinga ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo ezibandakanya abantu bonke.

ssw: ngekusebentisa umkhandlu wamengameli wema-soe, hulumende uhlose kwakha kuhambisana emkhatsini wetinkampani tembuso kanye nekuchaza kancono imisebenti yato.
zul: sizebenzisana nezinhlangano zomphakathi ukuthola amaqhingasu okunqanda nokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane.

ssw: ngalomkhandlu, sitawusbentisana nebaholi bema-soe sitowutfutfukisa imitsetfo netinchubomgomo letitawukhutsata kucamba lokusha nekwenta tintfo ngekushesha kanye nekwenta kancono kuncitisana kwawo.
zul: kulandela ukubonisana okunohlonze, senza imizamo yokusungula umkhandlu wokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane kanye nohlelo lukazwelonke olukhethekile oluzoba ngumhlahlandlela wethu sonke, kungakhathalekile ukuthi sikuphi, emizamweni yethu yokuqeda lesi sihlava esisabalele ezweni lonkana.

ssw: sitakwakhela kulomsebenti lesesivele siwucalile kulungisa tinkinga tekwengamela lokukabi, kungasebenti kahle nekusimama kwetimali.
zul: simatasa sicija futhi sihlomise amaphoyisa kanye nezinkantolo ekusekeleni izisulu zodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile.

ssw: sitimisele ekwakheni umbuso lonenkhambo lefanele lote inkhohlakalo, lokhetsa labatsandvwa baholi, kuntjontja kanye nekudlabhatisa imali yahulumende.
zul: siyayiqinisa impi yokulwisana namaqembu ezigelekeqe eziqhuba ibhizinisi lokuthengisa izidakamizwa, ngokuqalisa iqhingasu likazwelonke lokulwisana namaqembu emigulukudu kanye nohlelo-ngqangi lukazwelonke lokulwisana nezidakamizwa.

ssw: sifuna tisebenti tahulumende letingcweti naletinemakhono letinesimilo lesisezingeni leliphakeme kakhulu – naletitimisele ngemsebenti wato.
zul: manene namanenekazi, zimenywa ezikhethekile, ukufezekiswa kwazo zonke lezi zinjongo kudinga umbuso onamandla nekhono lokusebenza kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezidingekayo, futhi othuthukisayo.

ssw: tinyatselo lesititsetse tekucedza kubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane nekulwa nenkhohlakalo, kufaka ekhatsi tindlela tekucinisa umkhandlu wetebushushisi wavelonkhe (i-npa), luphiko lwekuphenya lolukhetsekile (i-siu), temisbeneti yemalingena yaseningizimu afrika (i-sars) neluphiko lwekuvikeleka kwembuso, titfola imiphumela lebalulekile.
zul: lowo akuwona nje umbuso ohlinzeka kuphela ngezikhungo kanye nengqalasizinda ezokwenza ukuthi umnotho wezwe kanye nomphakathi usebenze, kodwa ngumbuso onezindlela-kusebenza zokuletha uguquko.

ssw: sidzinga kucinisekisa kutsi imali yehulumende leyebiwe ibuyiselwa emuva futsi isetjentiselwe kwetfulwa kwetinsita kanye nesakhiwonchanti lesidzingeka kakhulu emimangweni lephuye kakhulu.
zul: ngasekuqaleni kwale nyanga, samemezela ukuhlelwa kabusha kweminyango kahulumeni eminingana ukuze ikwazi ukwenza kahle imisebenzi ethweswe yona.

ssw: silindzele kutsi inkantolo lekhetsekile ye-siu lensha itawucala umsebenti wayo kuletinyanga letimbalwa letitako kuphutfumisa ticelonkhokhelo letivela ekuphenyeni kwe-siu, kwamanje lelinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi leti-r14.7.
zul: isinqumo sethu besisekelwe phezu komzamo wokuqiniseksa ukusebenza ngobunyoninco, ukunciphisa izindleko, ukuphatha ngokubambisana kanye nokuhambelanisa imisebenzi eyenziwa yiminyango kahulumeni ehlukahlukene.

ssw: iningizimu afrika itawuchubeka nekudlala indzima lenemdlandla kutebudlelwane nemave emhlaba mayelana nekutfola kuthula nekuvikeleka emaveni emhlaba, intfutfuko lemiselwe kubantfu nekuphumelela kwawonkhewonkhe.
zul: lokhu kuyisiqalo senqubo ebanzi yokunqanda ukufadalala kwamandla okusebenza ombuso kanye nokuhlela kabusha uhlelo-kusebenza lwethu lokuhlinzeka ngezidingo-ngqangi ukuze lukwazi ukuzisebenzela kahle kakhulu izakhamuzi zezwe lethu.

ssw: sivusetela sincumo setfu sekusebenta ngekubambisana nemave emhlaba kulondvolota nekuvikela nenchubo yebudlelwane nemave emhlaba lemiselwe kumitsetfomgomo namhlabuhlangene (i-un) njengenhloko yayo.
zul: sizosebenzisa inqubo-kusebenza ezogxila ezifundeni ezingama-44 nemikhandlu-dolobha eyisishiyagalombili ngenhloso yokusheshisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi, futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi omasipala bahlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okufanelekile futhi banikezwe nezinsiza-kusebenza ezanele.

ssw: sitawusebentisa bulunga betfu bemkhandlu wetekuvikela we-un (i-unsc) kukhutsata kusombulula tincabano ngekuthula, ikakhulu kulelivekati letfu.
zul: ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi umbuso uyakwazi ukuletha kahle intuthuko kwezomnotho kanye nakwezenhlalo yomphakathi, kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siqinise amabhizinisi ombuso (ama-soe).

ssw: sifanele kutsi sakhe budlelwane lobucinile emkhatsini wahulumende, emabhizinisi, tisebenti kanye netinhlangano temmango.
zul: ngokusebenzisa umkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe, uhulumeni uhlose ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo phakathi kwazo zonke izinkampani zombuso futhi kucaciswe kahle namagunya nemisebenzi ezethweswe yona ngokuhlukahlukana kwazo.

ssw: hulumende ufanele kutsi ente simondzawo lesiniketa emandla, kusetjentiswe kahle tinsita tahulumene kuphindze futsi kutjalwe imali kumakhono ebantfu balelive.
zul: ngaphansi kwalo mkhandlu, sizosebenzisana nabaholi bama-soe ukuthuthukisa imithetho nemithethonqubo ezogqugquzela ukusetshenziswa kwezindlela ezintsha zesimanjemanje ezihambisana nokukhalipha okukhulu futhi kwenziwe ngcono nekhono namandla okuncintisana kwalezi zinkampani nezimbangi zazo kwezebhizinisi.

ssw: singatsandza kutsi emabhizinisi acabange ngemigomo yelisubuciko yavelonkhe kanye netintfo tetenhlalo etincumeni kanye nasekwenteni kwawo.
zul: sizokwakhela phezu komsebenzi osuqalisiwe kakade okuhloswe ngawo ukuxazulula izinkinga zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, nokuhluleka ukusebenza ngobunyoninco kanye nezinkinga eziphathelene nokusimama ngakwezezimali.

ssw: siyavuma kutsi tinyonyane tifanele kutsi tilwele emalungelo etisebenti kube futsi, ngesikhatsi lesifananako, tikhutsata kusimama kwemabhizinisi nekwakhiwa kwemisebenti.
zul: sizibophezele ekwakheni umbuso olandela izinkambiso zokusebenza ngobuqotho lapho ingekho nakancane inkohlakalo, ukwenzelela, ukuzicebisa ngokungemthetho, kanye nokweba imali kahulumeni.

ssw: tinhlangano temmango tidzinga kuchubeka tidlale indzima yato ekwenteni hulumende kutsi aphendvule ngemisebenti yakhe kepha tifanele kutsi tiphindze tihlanganyele natsi ekusebenteleni kuzuza imigomo yetfu lefananako.
zul: sifuna ukuba neqembu labasebenzi bakahulumeni abanekhono, abasebenza ngobungoti futhi abenza umsebenzi wabo ngobuqotho obukhulu futhi abazinikele emsebenzini wabo wokusebenzela umphakathi.

ssw: sibuke emacembu etepolitiki ephalamende kutsi abe yincenye lebalulekile yalesivumelwano sekusebentisana, elekelele, anikete lwati abuye futsi ete netisombululo leticinile nemitamo yekukhutsata loko lokufunwa velonkhe.
zul: seziqalile ukukhiqiza imiphumela emihle futhi esemqoka izinyathelo esizithathile zokuqeda ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso kanye nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, kubandakanya nezinyathelo zokuqinisa uphiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa (i-npa), uphiko lokuphenywa kwamacala akhethekile (i-siu), uphiko lokuqoqwa kwentela lwaseningizimu afrika (i-sars) kanye nenhlangano kahulumeni yezokuvikela.

ssw: uma ngabe singavusetela iminkhankhaso yekufezekisa ndp, sifanele kutsi amehlo wetfu abuke khashane lapho silibangise khona.
zul: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi iyabuyiswa imali kahulumeni entshontshiwe ukuze isetshenziselwe ukuhlinzeka izidingo-ngqangi kanye nengqalasizinda eyisisekelo edingeka kakhulu emiphakathini edla imbuya ngothi.

ssw: sifuna iningizimu afrika lebeke embili bojantji betitimela, futsi lekhicita titimela letihamba ngesivinini lesikhulu letichumatisa emadolobhakati etfu kanye netindzawo telive letfu letisemaphandleni kakhulu.
zul: sibheke ukuthi inkantolo entsha ekhethekile ye-siu iqale umsebenzi wayo kulezi zinyanga ezimbalwa ezizayo ngenhloso yokusheshisa amacala okudliwa kwempahla ahlobene nophenyo lwe-siu, njengamanje alinganiselwa kwinani-bungako elingamabhiliyoni ayi-14.7 amarandi.

ssw: sifanele kutsi sicabange live lapho khona titimela letigijima ngesivinini lesikhulu tendlula ejozi uma tiya emusina, bese tima ebuffalo city endleleni yato lebuya ethekwini tibuyela emuva lapha ekapa.
zul: iningizimu afrika izoqhubeka nokudlala indima esemqoka kwezobudlelwane bamazwe omhlaba emizamweni yokuqinisekisa ukuthula nokuvikeleka emhlabeni, intuthuko egxile kubantu kanye nokuchuma nokuphumelela kwabantu bonke.

ssw: sifuna iningizimu afrika letemnotfo wetebucwepheshe lapho khona kusetjentiswa tetemphilo letisebenta ngabongcondvomshini, ema-roboticsi kuncunyelwa imitsi ungekho embi kwadokotela kanye nekucala kusetjentiswa kwe-nhi.
zul: siyakuvuselela ukuzibophezela kwethu ekusebenzisaneni okuhle namazwe omhlaba ngenhloso yokugcina nokuvikela uhlelo lokubambisana nokusebenzisana kwamazwe ngamazwe olusekelwe phezu kwemithetho ebekiwe, oluholwa yinhlangano yezizwe (i-un).

ssw: sifuna iningizimu afrika lengamane nje itsengise imikhicito yayo lengakahlutwa kulamanye emave kepha lesikhungo sekukhicita tincenye letibalulekile letisetjentiswa kuma-elekthroniki, etimotweni nakubongcondvomshini, sifanele kutsi sibe live lelikhona kutondla nalelisebentisa tekulima letiphucukile tamanje.
zul: sizosebenzisa isikhundla sethu njengelungu lomkhandlu wezokuvikela we-un, (i-unsc), ukugqugquzela imizamo yokuxazulula izingxabano ngokuthula, ikakhulukazi kwizwekazi lase-afrika bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukufinyelela kuhlobo lweningizimu afrika esiyifisayo, sidinga isivumelwano sokusebenzisana nokubambisana esisha.

ssw: ngiphupha ngeningizimu afrika lapho khona lelidolobhakati lekucala lelakhiwe ngesikhatsi sentsandvo yelinyenti liyaphakama, linemabhilidi lamadze, tikolwa, emanyuvesi, tibhedlela nemafekthri.
zul: kudingeka ukuthi sakhe ubambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni, abasebenzi, imiphakathi kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi.

ssw: ingabe sikhatsi sisekafiki sekutsi sibe nesibindzi futsi sifinyelele khashane futsi sente loko lokubukeka sengatsi yintfo lengeke ite yenteke?
zul: futhi sidinga ukuzidela kanye nokuhlangabezana phakathi, ukuze kube khona ukuvumelana nokusebenzisana okuhle.

ssw: sisive saseningizimu afrika, ngemtsetfosisekelo waso, siniketa litsemba kulabo labo labete litsemba, emalungelo kulabo labatsatselwe futsi lababekwe labanganakwa, kudvudvuteka nekuvikeleka kubobabe, bomake neebantfwana bayo.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho wonke muntu ezophila kamnandi futhi ahlale ngokunethezeka, akhombe ngophakathi.

ssw: nanoma nje kungenteka kutsi sente emaphutsa, asikatikhohlwa kutsi sibobani, nekutsi simele ini.
zul: kodwa-ke futhi sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho sizokwazi ukusebenzisa ngokuphelele amandla namakhono ethu ngenkathi siqhubeka endleleni ephokophele phambili.

ssw: nginelitsemba ngoba ngihambe nebantfu balelive – bonesi, netisebenti letinakekela ngetemphilo, emaphoyisa, emasotja, bothishela etikolweni tetfu, titjudeni lekutsi noma emakhaya kuto kumatima titimisele kuphumelela, kanye nelusha lolwetama kusungula alo emabhizinisi, kusungula nekucamba, kanye nekuncoba simo sabo.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika ebeke eqhulwini izinhlelo zayo zokuthutha ngesitimela futhi okuyizinhlelo ezikhiziqa izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu ezizoxhumanisa amadolobhakazi ethu nezindawo zasemakhaya ezisemajukujukwini ezwe lethu.

ssw: baphupha ngemphilo lencono yabo bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika,sisebenta ngekubambisana kute lokungasehlula, kute lesingeke sikhone kukwenta, futsi kute lesingeke sikuzuze.
zul: kumele sizibone ngamehlo engqondo sesiphila ezweni lapho izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu zidlula egoli ziphokophele e-musina, futhi lapho zifika e-buffalo city zithi ukuma kancane, zivela ethekwini, sezibuyela emuva lapha edolobheni lasekapa.

ssw: bantfu labanakekela labo labakhonako kubuka embili futsi babone iningizimu afrika lephumelelako.
zul: kumele sibe yizwe elikwaziyo ukuzondla futhi lokhu sikwenze ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kwezolimo.

ssw: i vanhu lava va hlayisaka volavo va kotaka ku languta emahlweni na ku vona afrika-dzonga leri humeleleke.. ndi vhenevho vhane vha ri afrika tshipembe heḽi ḽashu vha ṱoḓa ḽi tshi ya phanḓa, ḽi vhe na mvelaphanḓa ine ya ḓo vhonwa nga vhathu vhoṱhe.. lena-ke ngiyo iningizimu lefanele kutsi isifake inshisekelo.
zul: kuyiphupho lami ukubona iningizimu afrika lapho kwakhiwa idolobha elisha sha esikhathini sombuso wentando yeningi labantu, elinamabhilidi amade, izikole, amanyuvesi, izibhedlela kanye namafemu.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika, kungalesikhatsi lesi-ke setinsayeya lapho sifanele kutsi sicabange ngeningizimu afrika lesiyifisako.
zul: ngabantu abanephupho lempilo engcono ezothokozelwa yibona bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

ssw: thandi modise,sihlalo wemkhandlu wetifundza wavelonkhe (i-ncop), mnu.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, nks thandi modise,sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli, u-david mabuza,ijaji eliyinhloko, u-mogoeng mogoeng, kanye nawo wonke amalungu ahloniphekile ophiko lwezobulungiswa,umongameli waphambilini, umnu thabo mbeki nonkk mbeki,umongameli waphambilini, umnu kgalema motlanthe nonkk motlanthe,iphini likamongameli laphambilini u-fw de klerk no nkk de klerk,somlomo waphambilini unks baleka mbete nomnu khomo,umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umnu roger nkodo dang, omele abesifazane baseningizimu afrika kunhlangano yezizwe, nks anne githuku-shongwe,isithwalandwe, umnu andrew mlangeni,ongqongqoshe kanye namaphini abo,ondunankulu kanye nosomlomo bezishayamthetho zezifundazwe,umongameli wenhlangano yohulumeni basekhaya yaseningizimu afrika kanye nezimeya zemikhandludolobha,umphathi webhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika, umnu lesetja kganyago,izinhloko zezikhungo zikahulumeni ezeseka ukubusa ngentando yeningi labantu,abaholi bezinhlangano zezenkolo,abaholi bezikhungo zezemfundo nezocwaningo,amalungu ezindlu zamanxusa,izimenywa ezikhethekile,amalungu ahloniphekile esigungu sikazwelonke,amalungu ahloniphekile omkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe,bantu baseningizimu afrika,ndi tama u lumelisa vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha vha fhano na hayani.

ssw: andrew mlangeni,tindvuna nemasekelatiindvuna,bondvunankhulu betifundza nabosolomlomo betishayamtsetfo,sihlalo wenhlangano yabohulumende basekhaya eningizimu afrika nabosodolobha,mphatsi welibhangesilulu laseningizimu afrika, mnu.
zul: njengoba sihlangane ukuzobuka isimo sezwe lethu, sihlanganyele nomndeni ka-basil february, iqhawe lenkululeko elinesibindi elashona ezimbabwe emkhankasweni i-wankie ngonyaka we-1967.

ssw: lesetja kganyago,tinhloko tetikhungo tahulumende letesekele intsandvo yelinyenti,baholi betinhlangano tetenkholo,baholi betemfundvo netikhungo telucwaningo,malunga emancusa,tivakashi letimenyiwe,malunga lahloniphekile elibandla lavelonkhe,malunga lahloniphekile emkhandlu wavelonkhe wetifundza,bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,ndi tama u lumelisa vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha vha fhano na hayani.
zul: kusihlwa nje, sihlangene lapha sithotshwe izinkumbulo zalawo madoda nabafazi abanikelela ngezimpilo zabo enkululekweni yethu, sisazi kahle isibophezelo esikhulu esisiphethe sokufezekisa amaphupho abo.

ssw: lifanele kutsi sishisekele kuya embili, singavumeli kungatsita nome bulukhuni kutsi kusikhiphe endleleni.
zul: yinina, abantu baseningizimu afrika, enithwele lomthwalo, enibhekene nezindleko zokuphila ezikhuphukayo, ukungabikho kwemisebenzi, ukungakwazi ukubalekela inhlupheko, ukungakwazi ukubonisa okwazi ukukwenza.

ssw: kubuyiselwa esimeni kwemnotfo wetfu kumile njengaloku kweswelakala kwemandla kuchubeke njalo ngekutsikameta emabhizinisi kanye netimphilo tebantfu.
zul: umhlaba onothe ngokumbiwa phansi kanye nokuhlukahlukana kwempilo yezitshalo nezilwane esingawulinganisa nengcosana emhlabeni.

ssw: emabhizinisi langaphasi kwahulumende (ema-soe) asenkingeni lenkhulu, netimali tetfu tembuso tingephasi kwencindzetelo lenkhulu.
zul: isizinda esijulile somnotho, izingqalasizinda ezibanzi, imithetho enengqondo kanye nezikhungo eziqinileyo.

ssw: ngini, bantfu baseningizimu afrika, lenitfwele lomtfwalo, lenibukene netindleko tekuphila letenyukako, kweswela imisebenti, kungakhoni kuphuma ebuphuyeni, kungakhoni kufezekisa loko longakhona kukwenta.
zul: abantu abanothile, abahlukahlukene, abasebasha futhi abanamakhono.

ssw: nanome kunjalo, ngalokufananako, kukhona lelinye liciniso lesimo setfu.
zul: ngalo busuku, sihlanganyele kanye nozozibini tunzi, ukwethwesa kwakhe isicoco sikazime womhlaba kuyisikhumbuzo kwamandla esinawo ukuzuza okukhulu simelene nezingqinamba.

ssw: liciniso lesimo selinanibantfu lelusha lelikhona kufinyelela kutfola imfundvo kakhulu kunaphambilini futsi lokuyintfo lekhombisa imiphumela yenzuzo ngalokusimeme.
zul: samukela futhi ukaputeni wamabhokobhoko (springbok) u-siya kolisi, owahola iqembu elinempokophelo nelibumbene laseningizimu afrika ukuba abanqobi bomhlaba bebhola lombhoxo ngowezi-2019.

ssw: simo seliciniso letfu futsi ngulabafundzi laba-720 000 labatfole kusitwa ngumbuso ngetimali bemakolishi elwatitsite nemfundvo yetemsebenti nekuceceshwa (ema-tvet) nemanyuvesi kulomnyaka lophelile.
zul: amandla amakhulu entando yeningi labantu yomthethosisekelo wethu, nesizathu esenza ubekezelelwe, ingenxa yokuthi sikwazile ukuqhubela phambili imifelandawonye esabalele nezivumelwano zomphakathi, kungaba namabhizinisi, abasebenzi, abantu abanentshisekelo efanayo noma umphakathi jikelele.

ssw: lamuhla ebusuku, sinazozibini tunzi, kwenyuka kwakhe atfweswe sicoco sekuba ngulobuhle wemhlaba kusikhumbuta sekubanemandla kwetfu ekuzuza lokukhulu kakhulu nome ngabe sibukene nebumatima lobunjani.
zul: noma besingahlanganisa zonke izinsiza esinazo, siphinde sizifake ezindlekweni ezinkulu zemali yomphakathi, angeke sisodwa sakwazi ukuqinisekisa umsebenzi kubantu abayizigidi abangasebenzi.

ssw: semukela futsi nakaputeni welicembu lemabhokobhoko siya kolisi, lohole licembu lebantfu baseningizimu afrika lelitimisele nalelibumbene kutsi libe tingcwele telibhola lembhoco nga-2019.
zul: eminyakeni emibili edlule - selokhu ngaqala ukuma lapha ukuzokwethula inkulumo ngesimo sezwe - sesisebenzile ukwakha izivumelwano phakathi kwabantu baseningizimu afrika ukubhekana nezinselelo eziphambi kwethu.

ssw: lamuhla futsi sihlangene lapha nalomunye umuntfu lomusha lobaluleke kakhulu, mk.
zul: ngezingqungquthela zemisebenzi, silethe umsebenzi, ibhizinisi, uhulumeni nemiphakathi bendawonye ukuthola izisombululo kulolu sizi lokuswelakala kwemisebenzi, futhi siyaqhubeka ukuhlangana ekuqaleni kwanyangazonke, iphini likamongameli kanye nami ukususa izithiyo nokuqhuba phambili izingenelelo ezizokonga futhi zakhe imisebenzi.

ssw: sinoyolo qumba, umfundzi welibanga le-11 waselenasia south, locitse sikhatsi lesinyenti itolo angisita kubhala lenkhulumo yebunjalo belive (i-sona).
zul: sesihlangane ndawonye, njengohulumeni nomphakathi, imiphakathi nezinhlangano zezenkolo, ukubhekana ngqo nenye inselelo enkulu ewudlame olwenziwa amadoda kwabesifazane.

ssw: kuhlakanipha kwakhe, kucaphela kwakhe tenhlalo, lutsandvo lwakhe lolukhulu nekukhutsala kwakhe kunginika litsemba lelikhulu ngelikusasa lalelive.
zul: sesihlanganise abezamabhizinisi, ezabasebenzi nohulumeni ukuza namasu amahle alezi zimboni ezinamandla amakhulu okukhula.

ssw: etinkhulumeni tami tekucala letimbili lengatetfula esiveni ngakhuluma kakhulu mayelana nesidzingo selifutse letenhlalo, kanye nesibopho lesikhulu lesisemahlombe etfu njengahulumende sekuchuba kusebentisana kanye nekuvumelana ngelivi linye.
zul: sihlanganyele ndawonye njengemikhakha eyehlukene kahulumeni, njengezinhlaka ezehlukene zombuso, njengezinhlangano zamabhizinisi kanye namaqembu omphakathi ngaphansi kohlelo olusha lokuthuthukiswa kwesifunda oluyisisekelo sokushintsha indlela esibhekana ngayo nokuthuthukiswa kwasekhaya.

ssw: nga-1994, sakhetsa indlela yekucocisana, kuvumelana ngekudzela loko besikumele nekuvumelana ngekuthula, esikhundleni sentondvo nekutiphindzisela.
zul: besilokhu sakha izivumelwano zomphakathi ngoba kungokubambisana nokusebenzisana ukuthi singaqhubekela phambili.

ssw: umlandvo wetfu kanye nalesesihlangabetana nako kwanyalo kusifundzise kutsi nangabe sitawuphumelela kuloko lesitincumele kukwenta, kufanele kutsi sigcile kuloko lokusenta sibumbane kunaloko lokusehlukanisako.
zul: sindawonye, eminyakeni emibili edlule, sisebenze ukuletha uzinzo emnothweni wethu nokwakha isisekelo sokukhula.

ssw: emandla lamakhulukati emtsetfosisekelo wetfu wentsandvo yelinyenti, nesizatfu sekutsi kungani ubeketele kute kube ngunyalo, yingobe sakhona kugcugcutela kuhlangana ngebubanti nekubumbana ngekwetenhlalo, kungaba temabhizinisi, temisebenti, temacembu lanalakutsandzako lokukhetsekile nome sive sonkhana.
zul: sesibenenhloso ukuphinda sakhe izikhungo sibuye sisuse izithiyo kutshalomali.

ssw: kutfola kuvumelana ngelivi linye nekwakha kubumbana ngekwetenhlalo akusiyo inkhomba yekubabutsakatsaka.
zul: sibhekane ngendlela efanele ukumelana nokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane nokulwa nenkohlakalo.

ssw: sivumelwane lesigcile enhlosweni yelisubuciko lelisu letfu lavelonkhe lekutfutfukisa, lokuhloswe ngalo kucedza buphuya kanye nekunciphisa kungalingani nga-2030.
zul: akukaze kwenela ukuzisindisa emiphumelweni emibi yokucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, nasemnothweni ontengantengayo nowehlayo emhlabeni jikelele.

ssw: ngisho nome ngabe besingahlela lowo nalowo mtfombolusito lesinawo, futsi sisebentise incitfomali lenkhulu yetimali tahulumende, ngeke sisodvwa sicinisekise kutsi labantfu labatigidzi labangasebenti batawutfola umsebenti.
zul: njengoba sikhetha ukubhekana ngqo nezinselelo zethu, umsebenzi wethu osheshayo, obalulekile nophelele ukubeka umnotho wethu emgudwini wokukhula komnotho okubandakanya wonke umuntu.

ssw: ngekusebentisa ingcugcutsela yetemisebenti, sihlanganise ndzawonye temisebenti, temabhizinisi, hulumende kanye nemimango kute sitfole tisombululo talenkinga yekuswelakala kwemisebenti, futsi siyachubeka ekucaleni kwaleyo naleyo nyanga, sekelemengameli nami, kute sisuse tihibe futsi sichube kutsi kube netingenelelo letitawusindzisa imisebenti tiphindze futsi tiyidale.
zul: imayelana nezinqubo ezibucayi esizozithatha kulo nyaka ukwakha umbuso onekhono nokubeka umnotho wethu endleleni yokululama.

ssw: besisolo sakha kuhlangana kwetenhlalo ngobe kungenca yekusebentisa budlelwane kanye nekusebentisana lokusenta sichubekele embili.
zul: futhi siqinisekisa ukwenza kahle kakhulu ekuhleleni nasekusebenzeni kuhulumeni.

ssw: sisonkhe, kuleminyaka lemibili leyengcile, sisebenta sasimamisa umnotfo wetfu sakha sisekelo sekukhula kwemnotfo.
zul: bantu baseningizimu afrika,ngaphezu kweminyaka eyishumi, abantu baseningizimu afrika bekumele babhekane nemiphumela yobunzima bokulethwa kukagesi.

ssw: besikwenta ngenhloso kuphindza futsi sakhe kabusha tikhungo sasusa netihibe letingavimba lutjalomali.
zul: sengikhulume kabanzi ngendima ebalulekile edlalwa u-eskom emnothweni wezwe lethu nasezimpilweni zabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

ssw: sitsatse sincumo lesicinile sekulwa nekubanjwa ngabhongwane kwembuso kanye nekulwa nenkhohlakalo.
zul: ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kwezinyanga ezimbalwa ezedlule kube nomthelela ebuthakathakeni bezwe lethu.

ssw: sesikwente kancane kancane ncono kutsi kutfolakale imfundvo, kwentiwa ncono lizinga lekunakekela ngetemphilo futsi sanaka netidzingo letisisekelo talabaphuyile.
zul: kuvele kwabuyisela emuva yonke imizamo yethu yokuphinde sakhe umnotho nokukwakha imisebenzi.

ssw: asizange sikhone kutsi sisindze kumitselela lemibi yekucishwa kwagezi ngenhloso yekuwonga, asizange sisindze futsi nasekucindzetelweni ngumnotfo wemhlaba wonkhe nalongakasimami.
zul: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma kwenzeka, kuphazamisa izimpilo zabantu, idala ukukhungatheka, ukubambezeleka, nobunzima.

ssw: singativumela sitinikele kuletinkinga letinengi naletilukhuni tesikhatsi lesidze lesibukene nato, nome singabukana nato ngco, ngekutimisela nekucina mbamba kanye nekutsatsa sinyatselo.
zul: kumnyombo wayo, ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kungumphumela ongenakugwenywa wokuhluleka kuka-eskom eminyakeni eminingi - ngenxa yesikweletu, ukuntuleka kwamandla kanye nokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane - ukunakekela iziphehlimandla zawo.

ssw: njengaloku sikhetsa kubukana netinsayeya tetfu, umsebenti wetfu lophutfumako, lomcoka nalomkhulu kutsi sibeke umnotfo wetfu endleleni yekukhula lokungukhukhulelangoco.
zul: iqiniso okuzomele silamukele ukuthi ukuze u-eskom akwazi ukulungisa okubalulekile okudingekayo ukwenza ngcono ukuthembeka kokuthunyelwa kogesi, ukucishwa kogesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kuzohlala kuyinto engenzeka esikhathini esizayo.

ssw: ngaphandle kwekukhula, ngeke kube nemisebenti, kantsi nakute imisebenti ngeke kube nentfutfuko lephatsekako etimphilweni tebantfu bakitsi.
zul: lapho ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kungenakugwenywa, kumele sikuthathe ngendlela engaqageleka futhi kunciphise ukuphazamiseka nezindleko ezimbonini nasemakhaya.

ssw: lesona-ke, ngako-ke, imayelana nekukhula lokungukhukhulelangoco.
zul: ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo, njengoba u-eskom usebenza ukubuyisa amakhona akhe okusebenza, sizobe sisebenzisa izindlela ezizoguqula ngendlela ebaluleke kakhulu umgudu wokuphehlwa kogesi ezweni lethu.

ssw: imayelana netinyatselo letimcoka lesitatitsatsa kulomnyaka kutsi sakhe umbuso lokhonako bese sibeka umnotfo wetfu endleleni yekuwubuyisela esimeni futsi.
zul: sithatha lezi zinyathelo ezilandelayo ukukhuphula ngokushesha okukhulu umthamo wokuphehlwa kukagesi ngaphandle kwakwa-eskom.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,kuleminyaka lelishumi leyengcile, bantfu baseningizimu afrika basalwa nemtselela wekuphakelwa kwemandla lokungekho esimeni lesemukelekako.
zul: esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini abahlelwa ngaphansi komkhandlu wezwe wokuthuthukisa ezomnotho nezabasebenzi (nedlac) babe nemihlangano lapho bebedingida iziphakamiso eziningana emavikini amabili adlule ukuvuma izimiso zesivumelwano somphakathi ngogesi.

ssw: sengikhulume kabanti macondzana nendzima lemcoka ledlalwa yi-eskom emnotfweni walelive letfu kanye nasetimphilweni tebantfu bonkhe baseningizimu afrika.
zul: lokhu kungukuthuthuka okuqophe umlando futhi okuqalayo njengoba kubonisa ukuzibophezela kwabobonke esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini ukuthatha izinyathelo ezidingekayo nokunikelela ngokufanele ukubhekana nezidingo zethu zogesi.

ssw: kucishwa kwagezi ngenhloso yekuwonga kuletinyanga letimbalwa letengcile kube nemtselela lomubi eveni letfu.
zul: ngalesi sivumelwano okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini bafuna u-eskom osebenza kahle, onemiphumela kanye nolungele ukusebenza okhiqizela imiphakathi nezimboni ugesi ngamanani angabizi.

ssw: kuyibuyisele emuva kabi kakhulu imitamo yetfu yekwakha futsi lomnotfo kanye nekudala imisebenti.
zul: lokhu kudinga ukuncishiswa okukhulu ezindlekweni - kubandakanya nokubuyekezwa kwezivumelwano zokusebenza ezingalandeli umthetho - nezindlela zokuhlanganisa izinsiza ezizonciphisa isikweletu sika-eskom bese zifaka imali lapho kudingeka khona.

ssw: ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi nakwenteka, kutsikameta timphilo tebantfu, kudale kutsi kube nekuhlaphaneka, kuphatseka kabi, nebulukhuni.
zul: okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini - izinyonyana zabasebenzi, amabhizinisi, izinhlangano ezibhekele inhlalo yomphakathi kanye nohulumeni - bazinikele ukuthola uxhaso lwezimali ukubhekana nosizi lwezimali lwaka-eskom oluzoyiqhuba isikhathi eside ngokwezimali.

ssw: nangabe kucishwa kwagezi ngenhloso yekuwonga akugwemeki, kufanele kutsi kwentiwe ngendlela yekubikelwa kucala futsi nangendlela lenciphisa kutsikameteka kanye netindleko emafemini kanye nasemakhaya.
zul: bazofuna ukukwenza lokhu ngendlela engabeki impesheni yabasebenzi engcupheni futhi engathunazi ubuqotho bohlelo lwezezimali.

ssw: kuletinyanga letimbalwa letitako, njengaloku eskom asebenta kute abuyisele esimeni kusebenta kwakhe, sitawube sifezekisa tinyatselo letitawugucula ngalokusemcoka indlela yekuphehla emandla kulelive letfu.
zul: ngesikhathi besebenza ukuqedela lesi sivumelwano, iqiniso ukuthi uhlelo lwethu logesi luzobe lulokhu lukhungathekile koze kuqale ukusebenza kokukhiqizwa kogesi okusha.

ssw: sitsatsa letinyatselo letilandzelako kute sandzise ngekushesha futsi ngendlela lemcoka emandla ekuphehla ngaphandle kwe-eskom:sigaba se-34 sesincumo setindvuna sitawukhishwa khona madvute nje, yindvuna yetimbiwa nemandla, kunika emandla lisu lemitfombolusito lehlanganisiwe langa-2019, kwenta kutsi kube nekusungulwa kwemandla langetiwe egridi lavela kumandla lavusetelwe, igesi yemvelo, emandla emanti, kugcinwa kwemandla elibhethri nemalahle.
zul: ngalezindlela ezisheshayo nomsebenzi oqhubekayo wokuhlela kabusha isisekelo semboni yethu kagesi, sizozuza ukuthunyelelwa kogesi okuthembekile, ongabizi futhi, ekugcineni, ozosiqhuba isikhathi eside.

ssw: sitawucala ngenchubo yekutsenga emandla laphutfumako kumaphrojekthi langaphakela gezi kugridi etinyangeni letintsatfu kuya kuleti-12 emva kwekuvunywa.
zul: sithatha lolu guquko olunezinqumo ngomgudu wogesi wethu ngesikhathi lapho abantu bebhekene nokusatshiswa okukhulu osake kwaba khona okungesimo sokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

ssw: umlawuli wavelonkhe wegezi utawuchubeka ngekubhalisa lokuncane kusatjalaliswa kwekuphehlwa kwagezi kutsi utisebentisele wona ngekwakho ube ngephasi kwe-megawatt yinye (i-mw), kwenta loko ayidzingeki imvume.
zul: izolo ngihlangane no-ayakha melithafa, isishoshovu sesimo sezulu esisesincane sase-eerste rivier esasihambele isigungu esengamele ukuthuthukiswa komnotho emhlabeni e-davos kulo nyaka ukucela abaholi bomhlaba ukuthi babumele baqine ubulungiswa besimo sezulu.

ssw: sitawuvula sikhatsi sikubhida selihlandla le-5 sebakhiciti labatimele bemandla lavusetelelwako (ema-ipp) futsi sisebente nebakhiciti kutsi siphotfule ngekushesha sikhatsi sekubhida selihlandla le-4 semaphrojekthi.
zul: ikhomishana kamongameli kwezokuguquka kwesimo sezulu izoqinisekisa ukuthi njengoba siya phambili endleleni yekhabhoni ephansi asishiyi muntu emuva.

ssw: sitawucocisana mayelana netivumelwane tekutsenga emandla ekwengetelela kutsi sitfole emandla ekwenta loko emoyeni lokhona kanye nakutikhungo letikhicita emandla elilanga.
zul: sizoqedela umthethosivivinywa wokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu, onikeza uhlaka lwezimiso zokuphathwa ngendlela kwemithelela yokuguquka kwesimo sezulu okungenakugwenywa ngokuthuthukisa ukumelana nokuguquka kwesimo sezulu, kuqiniswe ukuzilungiselela nokulindela ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu kanye nokunciphisa ukuba buthakathaka ngenxa yokuguquka kwesimo sezulu - nokuthola amathuba ezimboni amasha emnothweni onciphisa ubungozi kwezemvelo.

ssw: sitawuphindza futsi sente kutsi kube netinyatselo tekusita bomasipala labasesimeni lesihle setetimali kutsi batitsengele gezi wabo kuma-ipp.
zul: sidinga ukulungisa izimali zomphakathi wethu.

ssw: ngekuhambisana nalomkhombandlela lowamenyetelwa kulomnyaka lophelile, i-eskom sewucalile ngenchubo yekwehlukanisa tindlela tayo letintsatfu tekusebenta – kuphehla, kwendlulisa nekusabalalisa – leyo naleyo ndlela itawuba nebhodi yayo kanye netinhlaka tayo tekuyilawula.
zul: amazinga aphansi okukhula achaza ukuthi asenzi imali engenayo eyanele ukuhlangabezana nezindleko zethu, isikweledu sethu sibheke emazingeni lapho singeke sisakhona, nokuchitha imali lapho kungafanele khona ekuqedeni nasekukhokheni isikweletu kanye nenzalo kunezingqalasizinda nemisebenzi ekhiqizayo.

ssw: lena yintfutfuko leyincophamlandvo futsi lengazange seyibekhona ngobe ikhombisa kutinikela kwabo bonkhe balingani kutsi batsatse tinyatselo letidzingekile futsi bente iminikelo ledzingekile kute kutsi kucinisekiswe kubakhona kwetidzingo tetfu temandla.
zul: sizibandakanye nabasebenzi kanye nabanye ababamba iqhaza ezinhlelweni esizidingayo ukugcina umthethosivivinywa wamaholo abasebenzi bakahulumeni nokunciphisa ukumosha.

ssw: ngekusebentisa lokubumbana kwebalingani betenhlalo kufuna indlela lenelikhono, lekhicitako nalefanele inhloso ya-eskom ngekuphehla gezi ngetintsengo letingabiti emimangweni nasetimbonini.
zul: imizamo yokunciphisa ukuchithwa kwemali kukahulumeni, ukubeka phambili izinsiza ngendlela esebenza kahle, nokwenza ngcono ukusebenza kahle kohlelo lwentela kubalulekile - kodwa akwenele - ukunikelela ukuletha uzinzo kwezezimali zikahulumeni.

ssw: lokukudzinga kutsi kokubili kuncishiswa kakhulu kwetindleko – lokufaka ekhatsi kubuketwa njalo kwetinkontileka letingekho emtsetfweni – kanye netinyatselo tekuhlanganisa ndzawonye imitfombolusito letawunciphisa sikweleti saka-eskom kuphindze futsi kufakwe kabusha imali yekucala ibhizinisi lapho kudzingeke khona.
zul: ukuzuza uzinzo ekugcineni kuzodinga ukuthi sibhekana nezinselelo zokwakheka komnotho ezikhuphula izindleko zempilo nokwenza ibhizinisi.

ssw: labalingani betenhlalo – tinyonyana tetisebenti, betemabhizinisi, tinhlangano temmango kanye nahulumende – batinikele ekuhlanganiseni timali kute kulungiswe inkinga yetetimali yaka-eskom ngendlela yekusimama ngekwetetimali.
zul: ngokusebenza nomcwaningimabhuku omkhulu ukunciphisa izindleko ezingekho emthethweni, ngokugudluka ekusebenziseni imali kukahulumeni ezindlekweni iyotshalwa kwingqalasizinda, sihlose ukwenza ngcono isimo sezimali zikahulumeni wethu.

ssw: bangatsandza kwenta loku ngendlela yekutsi loko akubeki timphesheni tetisebenti ebungotini futsi kungenteli phasi bucotfo beluhlelo lwetetimali.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke nebhangengodla laseningimu afrika basebenza ndawonye ukukhulula ingcindezi kumabhizinisi nakubathengi.

ssw: ngesikhatsi basebenta kuphotfula lesivumelwane, simo lesiliciniso sitsi luhlelo lwetfu lwetemandla lutawuhlala lucindzetelekile kudzimate kufike indlela lensha yekuphehla gezi.
zul: sinqume ukusungula isikhwama somcebo esizimele njengemizamo yokugcina nokukhulisa isizwe sethu ngoxhaso-mali lwezwe, ukwenza ngempela umyalelo wokuthi abantu kumele babelwe kumcebo wezwe.

ssw: ngekusebentisa letindlela tamasinyane kanye nalomsebenti losachubeka wekwakha kabusha imboni yetfu yetemandla, sitawuphumelela kutsi sitfole siphakelwe ngagezi lotsembekile, lotsengekako futsi, ekugcineni gezi losimeme.
zul: siyaqhubeka futhi nokusungulwa kwebhange lombuso njengengxenye yomzamo wethu ukwandisa ukufinyelela kwabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ezinsizakalweni zezimali.

ssw: sitsatsa lesincumo sekuntjintja indlela yetfu yemandla ngesikhatsi lapho luntfu lubukene khona nebungoti bekuphila lobuletfwa simo sekugucuka kwesimo selitulu.
zul: sizobe sithatha izindlela ezifinyelela ekudeni zokuguqula isimo somnotho ngokuthi sizofaka lezo eziqukethwe kushicilelo olwadidiyelwa ngumgcinimafa kazwelonke, olusihloko sithi ‘economic transformation, inclusive growth and competitiveness’ ‘ukuguquka komnotho, ukukhula okulinganayo ngokomnotho kanye nokuncintisana’kulo nyaka, siyasuka kuzinzo lwamabhizini aphethwe nguhulumeni siya ekunikezeni lezi zinkampani zamasu enye inhloso yokweseka ukukhula nokuthuthuka.

ssw: itolo, ngihlangene na-ayakha melithafa, sishikashiki setesimo selitulu lesingumuntfu lomusha lesivela e-eerste rivier labehambele inkhundla yemhlangano wetemnotfo edavos kulomnyaka kucela bonkhe baholi bemhlaba kutsi beme bacine ekwenteni bulungiswa betesimo selitulu.
zul: emva kweminyaka yokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane, inkohlakalo kanje nokuphatha budedengu, sisebenza ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke amabhizinisi aphethwe uhulumeni (soes) ayakwazi ukufezekisa umyalo wabo wokuthuthukisa nokuba nozinzo kwezezimali.

ssw: ayakha ungicele kutsi ngente siciniseko sekutsi kute umntfwana wase-afrika loshiywa ngemuva kuluhlelo lwekuntjintjela kukhabhoni lephasi, ekumelaneni nesimo selitulu kanye nesive lesisimeme.
zul: ekuxoxisaneni nomkhandlu kamongameli wamabhizinisi aphethwe uhulumeni, sizoqala umsebenzi wokuhlela kabusha amabhizinisi ethu aphethwe uhulumeni futhi siqinisekise ukuthi asebenzela izinhloso zamasu omnotho noma okuthuthukisa.

ssw: sitawuphotfula lomtsetfosivivinyo wekugucuka kwesimo selitulu, lonika luhlakamsebenti lwetekulawula kute kutsi kube nekulawulwa ngemphumelelo lifutse letingucuko tesimo selitulu letingeke tigwemeke ngekutsi kwentiwe ncono emandla ekutetayeta, kucinisa kumelana kanye nekunciphisa kuhlaseleka lula ingucuku yetesimo selitulu– kanye nekubona ematfuba lamasha etetimboni kumnotfo lonciphisa bungoti emvelweni nalongayonakalisi.
zul: umonakalo wokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane, inkohlakalo kanye nokuphatha budedengu kuma-soe kubonakala kahle kakhulu enkampanini yamabhanoyi i-south african airways, eyabekwa ekutakulweni kwamabhizinisi ekupheleni konyaka odlule.

ssw: malunga lohloniphekile,sidzinga kutsi silungise tetimali tetfu tahulumende.
zul: abasebenza ukutakula amabhizinisi balindeleke ukuveza obala amaqhinga abo okuhlela kabusha inkampani yezokundiza emavikini ambalwa azayo.

ssw: emazinga laphasi ekukhula asho kutsi asiyikhiciti ngalokwanele imalingena kute ihlangabetane netindleko tetfu, tikweleti tetfu tiya emazingeni ekungasimami, kantsi imali isetjentiselwa kuphela kudla kanye nekukhokhela tikweleti kunekutsi isetjentiselwe takhiwonchanti nemisebenti lekhicitako.
zul: ekukhathaleleni imboni yezokundiza yaseningizimu afrika kanye nomnotho wethu, kubalulekile ukuthi inkampani yezokundiza esihlelwe kabusha ngengomuso izoba nozinzo ngokwentengiso nangokusebenza futhi ayincikile ekuqhubekeni ukuthi ixhaswe nguhulumeni.

ssw: sihlangene siyakhulumisana netemisebenti kanye nalabanye labatsintsekako mayelana netinyatselo tekulawula sikweleti sahulumende semiholo nekunciphisa kusaphateka kwemali.
zul: umsebenzi oqhubekayo kweminye imizila kufaka ukuthuthukiswa kweziteshi, ukubuyisela kabusha izindawo zokupaka, ukufaka izimpawu ezintsha kanye nokuthuthukiswa kokudonswa kukagesi phezulu.

ssw: imitamo yekunciphisa kusetjentiswa kwemali nguhulumende, kwenteka ngemphumelelo kutsi imitfombolusito ibe bomabekwembili, kanye nekwenta likhono leluhlelo lwetfu lwemtselo kubalulekile – kodvwa akukaneli – iminikelo lecondziswe ekusimamiseni timali tahulumende.
zul: njengoba sisebenza ukulungisa amakhono okusebenza kombuso, siyazi ukuthi ukukhula kanye nokwenza imisebenzi ngokwesilinganiso esikhulu kuzoqhutshwa amabhizinisi azimele.

ssw: kuzuza kusimama kutawudzinga kutsi ekugcineni silungise tinsayeya tekwakheka kutemnotfo letenyusa lizinga letindleko tekuphila kanye nekuchuba temabhizinisi.
zul: ngakho-ke sakha indawo yokusebenza evuna ukwenza ibhizinisi.

ssw: ngekusebentisana nemhlolimabhuku jikelele kute kuncishiswe incitfomali lengekho emtsetfweni, ngekutsi sintjintje kusetjentyiswa kwemali yahulumende kube sakhiwonchanti selutjalomali, sihlose kwenta ncono simo setetimali tahulumende.
zul: ngokusebenza ngokubambisana nezinhlaka zomphakathi, siqhubekile nokubhekana nezingqinamba eziningana esezibe izithiyo ekwenzeni imisebenzi.

ssw: temafa avelonkhe ne-srb basebenta ngekuhlanganyela ngenhloso yekwehlisa kuncindzeteleka kwemabhizinisi kanye nebatsengi.
zul: ezinye zalezi zingqinamba yizimvume zokusebenzisa amanzi, abalulekile ekusebenzeni emapulazini, ezimbonini nasezimayini, ngokwedlule osekuthathe isikhathi eside ngokungafanele ukuthi zicutshungulwe, ngesinye isikhathi kufika eminyakeni emithathu kuya kwemihlanu.

ssw: sesincume kusungula sikhwama semcebo lesitimele njengesinyatselo sekonga nekukhulisa selekelomali savelonkhe sesive setfu, kukhombisa ngendlela lephatsekako lenkhulumo letsi bantfu batakwabelana ngemnotfo walelive.
zul: ngohlelo lwe-bizportal umuntu usezokwazi manje ukubhalisa inkampani ngosuku olulodwa, abhalisele isikhwama somshwalense wabalahlekelwe umsebenzi (uif) nomnyango wokuqoqa kwentela eningizimu afrika (sars) kanye nokuvula i-akhawunti yasebhange.

ssw: sitawutsatsa tinyatselo tekugucula temnotfo letitawuba nemphumela wesikhatsi lesidze letitawufaka leto lecuketfwe ephepheni lelikhishwe temafa avelonkhe, lelinesihloko letsi tingucuko temnotfo, kukhula lokungukhukhulengoco nekucudzelana.
zul: phakathi nalo nyaka, sizoqala ukulungisa kabusha ichweba lasethekwini – indawo yesithathu enkulukazi yokungeniswa kwezimpahla kwelaseningizimu – ukunciphisa ukubambezeleka nezindleko.

ssw: kulomnyaka, siyasuka ekusimamiseni ema-soe sitinika tinhloso kabusha letinkampani telisubuciko kute tesekele kukhula nentfutfuko.
zul: uxhaso olubalulekile esingalwenza ekukhuleni komnotho okubandakanya umutnu wonke lusekuthuthukiseni kwamakhono afanele.

ssw: ngemuva kweminyakanyaka yekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane, yenkhohlakalo nelulawulo lolubi, siyasebenta kute sicinisekise kutsi onkhe ema-soe ayakhona kufezekisa ligunyakwenta lawo letentfutfuko futsi akhone kusimama ngekwetetimali.
zul: ukutshalwa kwezimali esikwenza manje ukuthuthukisa ukukhuliswa kwabantwana nokufunda usasemncane kuzoholela emiphumelweni emihle yezomnotho eminyakeni engama-20 ezayo – nangale.

ssw: ngekubonisana nemkhandlu wema-soe wamengameli, sitawutsatsa tinyatselo tenchubo yekwenta ema-soe kutsi tibe nemphumelelo kakhulu ngekutsi tinikwe tisebenti letinengi netisetjentiswa kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi asita ngetinhloso telisubuciko letemnotfo nentfutfuko.
zul: kodwa kukhona ukungenelela kwamanje esikwenzayo ukwenza ngcono ubukhethelo nokufaneleka kwemiphumela yezemfundo yethu.

ssw: bukhulu bekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane, benkhohlakalo nelulawulo lolubi kuma-soe kubonakala kahle enhlanganweni yetemoya yaseningizimu afrika, leyafakwa ngaphasi kwelusito kutebhizinisi ngasekupheleni kwemnyaka lophelile.
zul: senza inqubekela phambili ngokwethulwa kohlelo lwezinhla ezintathu lwezemfundo, nokwethula ukugudluka okubalulekile kubhekwe kakhulu ukufundisa amakhono nezobuchwepheshe.

ssw: ngenca yenshisekelo yemboni yetemoya yaseningizimu afrika kanye nemnotfo wetfu, kubalulekile kutsi inhlangano yetemoya yakusasa lehleleke kabusha nalesimeme kutebhizinisi kanye nangetekusebenta futsi lenganciki ekusitweni nguhulumende ngetimali.
zul: sakha amakolishi amakhono nobuchwepheshe ayi-9 kulonyaka, e-sterkspruit, e-aliwal north, e-graaff reinet nasengqungqushe empumalanga kapa, kanye nase-umzikhulu, e-greytown, emsinga, kwanongoma nakwagqikazi kwazulu-natali.

ssw: macalakwentiwa lomcoka walomnyaka kulungisa umvila wetitimela tebagibeli, lokuyintfo lemcoka kakhulu emnotfweni kanye nemphilo lesezingeni yebantfu bakitsi.
zul: ngezivumelwano ezinxa-mbili zemifundaze yabafundi, esizisayine namanye amazwe, sakha iqembu elikhulu labantu abasha abazoya phesheya kwezilwandle njalo ngonyaka ukuyoqeqeshelwa amakhono abucayi.

ssw: inethiwekhi yetfu yemvila wetitimela ngelilanga itfutsa bagibeli labangetulu kwesigidzi kuya nekubuya emsebentini.
zul: siwubonile umthelela lokhu ongaba nawo ohlelweni lokuqeqeshelwa ezokulapha i-nelson mandela castro medical programme e-cuba, esikhiqize odokotela abelaphayo abangaphezu kwe-1200 kanye nabafundi abangama-640 abalindeleke ukuthwala iziqu ngozibandlela kunyaka wezi-2020.

ssw: senta kutsi inethiwekhi yemvila wetitimela te-prasa ibe yesimanjemanje.
zul: lolu hlelo luyisikhumbuzo esibonakalyo kulezi zingqalabutho ezimbili.

ssw: umsebenti usachubeka kuleminye imivila lokufaka ekhatsi kwetiwancono titeshi, kufaka letinye titeshi tetitimela, tinhlelo letinsha tetikhombisi nekwentiwa ncono kwetintsambo tagezi lengetulu temandla.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizokwethula izifundo ezifundwa ngobuchwepheshe bamakhompyutha i-coding ne-robotics emabangeni r kuya ebangeni lesithathu ezikoleni ezingama-200, ngohlelo lokuliqalisa ngokuphelele ngonyaka wezi-2022.

ssw: njengaloku sisebenta silungisa emakhono ekusebenta kwembuso, siyati kutsi kukhula kanye nekudaleka kwemisebenti kakhulu kutawuchutjwa ngemabhizinisi latimele.
zul: sesinqume ukusungula isikhungo semfundo ephakeme yezesayensi nezindlela ezintsha zokwenza izinto (university of science and innovation) e-ekurhuleni.

ssw: kusebenta kanye kanye nebalingani betenhlalo, sesichubekile salungisa tindzaba letinengi lebetikadze titihibe ekudaleni umsebenti.
zul: lokhu kuzovumela abantu abasha kulelo dolobha ukuqeqeshwelwa izimboni ezikhona nezangomuso izindlela ezintsha zobuchwepheshe banamuhla nobunomthelela ophezulu kakhulu.

ssw: timvume tekusebentisa emanti, letimcoka kakhulu ekusebenteni emapulazini, emafekthri nasetimayini, etikhatsini lesengcile titsatse sikhatsi lesidze kutsi tisetjentwe, ngalesinye sikhatsi kute kube yiminyaka lesihlanu.
zul: utshalomali nokukhula kudinga indawo ephephile, enozinzo kanye nengenabugebengu.

ssw: ngekusebentisa inkhundla yebizportal, nyalo umuntfu sekangakhona kubhalisa inkampani ngelilanga linye, kubhalisa esikhwameni semshwalensi wekusita labangasebenti kanye neluphiko lwekugcogca umtselo waseningizimu afrika ngisho kanye nekuvula i-khawunti yasebhange.
zul: ukubonakala kwamaphoyisa, nokuqeqeshwa okufanele kanye nokuba khona kwezinsiza eziteshini zamaphoyisa kuseqhulwini.

ssw: tintfunja tetfu tigcwele kakhulu futsi tite likhono.
zul: ngibeke eqhulwini ukubhekana kwethu nenkinga edlondlobalayo yamaqembu ezigebengu akhwabanisa imali yezinkontileka zokwakha namanye amabhizinisi.

ssw: ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi kulomnyaka, sitawube senta kabusha lokumcoka edurban port – siteshi seticukatsi lesitsatfu ngebukhulu eningizimu yemhlaba – kute kuncishiswe kubambeleleka netindleko.
zul: amathimba ayizipesheli - ahlanganisa uphiko lwamaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (saps) kanye nophiko lwezokushushisa lukazwelonke - anikwe umyalelo wokulwa nalobu bugebengu obuphazamisa umnotho.

ssw: ligalelo lelibalulekile lesingalenta ekukhuliseni umnotfo ngakhukhulelangoco kusekutfutfukiseni emakhono lafanele kanye nemakhono ekwenta.
zul: ukweseka ukukhula kwemboni yezokuvakasha, amaphoyisa azobonakala kakhulu ezindaweni ezikhethiwe zokuheha izivakashi.

ssw: lutjalomali lesilwentako nyalo ku-ecd kanye nekufundza sikolo eminyakeni yekucala yekukhula kutawuba nesivuno setinzuzo tetemnotfo letinkhulu kumashumiminyaka lamabili letako – kanye nangale kwaloko.
zul: ukuqeqesha abaqaphi bezokuphepha kwezokuvakasha nokusungula izikhundla zamavolontiya amaphoyisa azobhekana nokuqapha izindawo eziheha izivakashi.

ssw: senta inchubekelembili ngekwetfula imodeli lemkhakhamtsatfu yekharikhulamu, lendvulela kuntjintja lokumcoka kwalokutawugcilwa kuko kuyelwe kakhulu emfundvweni yetemisebenti neyelwatitsite.
zul: ithimba elilwisana namaqembu ezigelekeqe lizophinde liqiniswe, ngokubeka eqhulwini indawo yasentshonalanga kapa, impumalanga kapa, i-gauteng kanye nefreyistata.

ssw: tifundvo letikhetsekile telwatitsite lwetemisebenti letehlukahlukene setivele tetfuliwe etikolweni letinge-550 bese tikolo letinge-67 nyalo tilingakusebenta kwemkhakha wetemisebenti.
zul: emva kokuthola iziqu kwamaphoyisa ayeqeqeshwa ayizi-5000 ngonyaka odlule, amaphoyisa amasha azoqeqeshwa ayizi-7000 asefakwe ohlwini ukuze siqise ezokuqapha ekhaya.

ssw: sakha emakolishi e-tvet lamasha layimfica kulomnyaka, esterkspruit, e-aliwal north, egraaff reinet nasengungqushe emphumalanga kapa, kanye nasemzimkhulu, egreytown, emsinga, kanongoma nakwagqikazi kwazulu-natal.
zul: ukwenza ngcono ubukhethelo bophenyo olujwayelekile nolukhethekile, sisungula isikhungo semfundo ephakeme esibhekene nokutholwa kobugebengu (crime detection university) e-hammanskraal.

ssw: ngekusebentisa tivumelwane temfundzate webafundzi emkhatsini wemacembu lamabili lesitisayinile nalamanye emave.
zul: ezinyangeni esiyisithupha ezedlule, izwe lonke beliphoqeleke ukuma ngezinyawo - emiphakathini, uhulumeni, izinhlangano zomphakathi, izinhlangano zezenkolo, uphiko lwezobulungiswa kanye nephalamende - ukuqenda usizi lodlame olwenziwa ngamadoda kwabesifazane bezwe lethu.

ssw: sakha kancane kancane licembu lebantfu labasha lavele ngesikhatsi sinye labahambela emave angesheya ngalowo nalowo mnyaka bayowuceceshelwa emakhono lamcoka.
zul: kube ukusabela okunokuzimisela nokubambana ngokweqiniso kusuka kubobonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

ssw: sesilibonile lifutse laloku lelibe khona enelson mandela fidel castro medical training programme ecuba, lesikhicite bodokotela betekwelapha labangetulu kwe-1.200 kanye nalabanye bafundzi labange-640 balindzeleke kutsi batfweswe ticu tabo ngengongoni 2020. loluhlelo lusikhumbuto lesiphilako kulabaletsi labakhulu bengucuko lababili.
zul: saqalisa ukusebenza ngohlelo oluphuthumayo nokuphinde sibeke eqhulwini imali eyisigidigidi esi-1.4 samarandi ukweseka loluhlelo kuze kuphele unyaka wezimali esikuwo.

ssw: lokukutawusita bantfu labasha kulendzawo kutsi baceceshwe kutebuchwepheshe letisetulu kakhulu kanye nakumcondvo lomusha wetebuchwepheshe lotawusetjentiswa etimbonini njenganyalo kanye nasesikhatsini lesitako.
zul: lempi izonqotshwa uma ihlaselwa nguwona wonke umphakathi, uma sakha izivumelwano ezingenzeka nazo zonke izinhlangano zomphakathi.

ssw: lutjalomali nekukhula kudzinga indzawo lephephile, lesimeme nalete bugebengu.
zul: ngakho-ke siyawamukela umsebenzi wokubambisana kukahulumani nezinhlangano zomphakathi begqugquzelwa ngokusungula isu likazwelonke lokulwa nenkohlakalo nohlelo lokuqala ukusebenza, osekuseduze ukuthi kuphele kulesigaba somsebenzi.

ssw: kubonakala kwemaphoyisa, kuceceshwa lokunemphumelelo kanye nemitfombolusito lencono etiteshini temaphoyisa tintfo letingubomacalakwentiwa betfu.
zul: ikhomishana kazondo efaka imibuzo ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane iyaqhubeka nomsebenzi wayo obucayi ngokwesekwa ngokuphelele ngohulumeni nezinye izikhungo.

ssw: sengikwente kwaba ngumacalakwentiwa kuphendvula kwetfu kulenkinga yebacembu etebugebengu latsatsa imali ngenkhani kutekwakha kanye nakulamanye emabhizinisi.
zul: ngithole umbiko ogcwele imininingwane ngekhomishana yophenyo lwezenhlangano yezokutshalwa kwezimali zombuso.

ssw: emayunithi lakhetsekile – lahlanganisa ndzawonye luphiko lwetemaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (i-saps) kanye neluphiko lwavelonkhe lwetekushushisa – kunikwe ligunyakwenta lekulwa nalobugebengu lobutsikameta tetemnotfo.
zul: ngizokwenza ukuthi itholakale emphakathini kanye necebo lokudlulisela phambili okutholakele nezincomo ezinsukwini ezimbalwa.

ssw: kwesekela kukhula kwemboni yetekuvakasha, i-saps itakwandzisa kubonakala kwayo kuleto tindzawo letiheha tivakashi.
zul: njengoba silungisa izisekelo, sisaqinisa izinguquko esizenzile, siphokophelele izindawo ezibucayi zokukhuliswa komnotho okubandakanya umuntu wonke.

ssw: kucecesha bacapheli bekuphepha kutekuvaka futsi sitawusungula emaphoyisa labekelwe eceleni lanelikhono lekutsi agcile agadze tindzawo letiheha tivakashi.
zul: enkulumweni yesimo sezwe eyandulela lena, ngathi indawo ebucayi yokutshalomali eyeseka ukwakhekha koguquko, ukukhula kanye nokudala imisebenzi,iqembu elibhekele ukusebenza kwesikhwama sezingqalasizinda sesiluphothulile uhla lwemisebenzi esime ngomumo ukuqala ukusebenza futhi seliqalile ukwandisa utshalomali lwangasese luya emikhakheni yezingqalasizinda zikahulumeni ngezindlela ezehlukene zokuthola imali.

ssw: emayunithi lamelene nemacembu ebugebengu atawuciniswa, kucalwe kucala ngenshonalanga kapa, imphumalanga kapa, i-gauteng nefreyistata.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya izindawo ezifana nendawo yokuhlala yabafundi, izindlu zomphakathi, abakhiqizi bamanzi abazimele, ojantshi besitimela abachezukela eceleni, ukuphehlwa kukagesi ngokwezilingasizo ezincane, inqwaba yezingqalazisinda zomasipala, kanye nokuqedela uhlelo lokuthunyelwa kwemiyalezo eminingi ngasikhathi sinye.

ssw: ngemuva kwekutfola ticu kwemaphoyisa labececeshwa kulomnyaka lophelile, emaphoyisa lamasha latawuceceshwa la-7 000 asabutsiwe kulomnyaka kutsi atewucinisa temaphoyisa tendzawo.
zul: iqembu linomsebenzi eliwenzayo njengamanje oluzoba nomphumela wotshalomali olungaphezu kwama-700 ezigidigidi zamarandi, kubandakanya iminikelo kahulumeni naleyo okungeyona ekahulumeni.

ssw: kwenta ncono lizinga jikelele kanye neteluphenyo lolukhetsekile lwe-saps, sisungula inyuvesi yekubona bugebengu lapha ehammanskraal.
zul: imishini yokuthwala izinto ezisindayo nemishini yokusebenza ephuzi ebesilangazelela ukuyibona emathafeni ezwe lethu kuzophinde futhi kube into esiyibona nsuku zonke.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,kuletinyanga letisitfupha letengcile, sive besibumbene – kuyo yonkhe imimango, hulumende, tinhlangano temmango, emacembu etenkholo, luphiko lwetebulungiswa nephalamende – kucedza lenkinga yebudlova lobentiwa madvodza lobucondziswe kubomake balelive letfu.
zul: uhlelo lwezindlu zomphakathi lokwakhela imindeni ehola kancane izindlu zokuqasha sekusezingeni lokuqalwa, olungafika emandleni ayisi-9 sezigidigidi zamarandi zotshalomali lwangasese ekwakhiweni izindlu zokuqasha ezingama-37 000. abantu abasha abasenyuvesi nasemakolishi amakhono nobuchwepheshe babhekene nezinselele ezinkulu zendawo yokuhlala.

ssw: sicale ngekufezekisa lisu lekwenta leliphutfumako futsi sabeka embili tigidzigidzi le-r1.6 kutsi sisekele lelisu kudzimate kube sekupheleni kwalomnyakatimali.
zul: sizosebenzisa ama-64 ezigidigidi zamarandi eminyakeni ezayo ezindaweni zokuhlala zabafundi futhi sizoboleka okungenani ama-64 ezigidigidi zamarandi kutshalomali lwangasese.

ssw: sitawuchibela umtsetfo webudlova basekhaya kute sivikele ncono labo labahlukumetekile ebudlelwaneni lobunebudloba basekhaya kanye nemtsetfo wemacala etemacansi kute kuvulwe kakhulu imikhakha yalabanemacala etemacansi emagama abo kufanele kutsi afakwe kurejista yavelonkhe yalabente emacala etemacansi, futsi sitawuphasisa umtsetfo lotawucinisa kutfolakala kwebheyili kanye netigwebo emacaleni lafaka ekhatsi budlova lobucondziswe kubulili lobutsite (i-gbv).
zul: sizimisele ukunqoba izinselelo zezimali nokunye obekudonsela emuva inqubekela-phambili futhi kuncisha abantu bale ndawo insinza ebaluleke kangaka.

ssw: sidzinga kutsi sisebentisane ngekuhlanganyela kute sicedze inkhohlakalo futsi sicinise kusebenta kwemtsetfo.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngacela izwe ukuthi lihlanganyele nami ekujuleni ngemicabango ngedolobha elisha elihle, idolobha elinganalo ubandlululo oluzodlondlobala ukushintsha ukwakheka komphakathi nomnotho wobandlululo.

ssw: siyawemukela ngako-ke umsebenti wahulumende nekuhlanganyela nemacembu etinhlangano temmango lanikwe umsebenti wekusungula lisubuciko lavelonkhe lekulwa nebugebengu kanye nelisu lekulifezekisa, lesekusele kancane kutsi umsebenti walo ube sesigabeni sekuphotfulwa.
zul: umsebenzi uholwa ihhovisi lokutshalwa kwezimali nezingqalasizinda ehhovisi likamongameli libambisene nohulumeni bezifundazwe zase-gauteng kanye nasenyakatho ntshonalanga, ngokusebenzisana namadolobhakazi afana ne-, i-tshwane kanye nemadibeng.

ssw: ikhomishini yazondo lephenya ngekubanjwa ngabhongwane kwembuso iyachubeka ngemsebenti wayo lomcoka kakhulu hulumende naletinye tikhungo labayisekela ngalokuphelele.
zul: sisebenzisana nezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa komnotho sesihlanganise umsebenzi omusha ozoxhasa ngokwezimali ukuthuthwa kwendle, ugesi, amanzi, izingqalasizinda zobuchwephashe kanye nemigwaqo ezoba isisekelo saleli dolobha elisha.

ssw: ngitfole umbiko longumculu lomkhulu nalonemininingwane leminyenti lomayelana nekhomishini yeluphenyo kukoporasi yelutjalotimali tembuso.
zul: angeke nje kuphela libe lihle nokulungela ubuchwepheshe besigaba sesihlanu i-5g, kodwa lizoba umaka ohamba phambili wengqalasizinda ebheke ezemvelo ezwenikazi nasemhlabeni jikelele.

ssw: ngitakwenta kutsi sive siwutfole ngivete kanye nelisu lekutsatsa loko ikhomishini lekutfolile kanye netincomo sichubeke siye embili emalangeni lambalwa.
zul: sizobe sihlola ukusebenza kwelinye ilokishi kanye nezinhlelo zemigwaqo yasemakhaya lapho imigwaqo emine okuvivinywa ngayo izoluleka ibe ngamakhilomitha angama-50 ngamunye izokwakhiwa ezindaweni ezihlukene zezwe.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,njengaloku silungisa loko lokutisekelo letimcoka, njengaloku sijulisa lokulungiswa kabusha lesesikwentile, silandzela tindzawo letimcoka kakhulu ekukhula lokungukhukhulelangoco.
zul: lo msebenzi uzoqinisekisa izixazululo zezindleko zombuso, ukudluliselwa kwamakhono afanele kanye nokuba namandla okusebenza kanzima ukudala imisebenzi kunezindlela zokwakha imigwaqo ezejwayelekile.

ssw: ku-sona yaphambilini, ngatsi loko yindzawo lemcoka yelutjalomali leyesekela kulungiswa kabusha kwemumo, kukhula kanye nekudaleka kwemisebenti.
zul: sibhekane nosizi lokungasebenzi kwabantu abasha.

ssw: luhlelo lwetindlu tamahhala lutakwakha tindlu tekucashisa temindeni lehola imiholo lephasi selusesigabeni sekufezekiswa, lokuyintfo lengenta kutsi kube nelutjalomali lwalabatimele lwetigidzigidzi leti-r9 ekwakheni tindlu tekucashisa leti-37 000. bantfu labasha labasemanyuvesi kanye nasemakolishi e-tvet babukene netinsayeya tendzawo yekuhlala.
