zul: kusihlwa nje, sizochaza ngenqubekela phambili esesiyenzile ekuqaliseni ukusebenza kwezibophezelo esazenza ku-sona yonyaka odlule.

ssw: ekuhambeni kwalomnyaka lophelile, sakhe sisekelo lesicinile lesimiselwe kutibophelelo lesitentile tekukhula ngekushesha ngemkhankhaso wetfu wekutjala timali, tingucuko kutemnotfo, tinhlelo tekucashwa kwemmango kanye neluhlelo lolukhulako lwesakhiwonchanti.
zul: ngokuqhubeka konyaka odlule, sabeka isisekelo esiqinile esisuselwa kwizibophezelo esazenza zokuletha ukukhula okusheshayo ngokusebenzisa umshikashika wethu wokuheha utshalomali, izinguquko kwezomnotho, izinhlelo zokuqashwa komphakathi kanye nohlelo lokwandiswa kwengqalasizinda.

ssw: lokucacako ngalesihlangabetene nako kuleminyaka lembalwa leyendlulile - ngempela emlandvweni wetfu njengentsandvo yelinyenti - kutsi asisibo bantfu labatinikela kalula esiphetfweni setfu.
zul: okucace bha ezimweni esihlangabezane nazo kule minyaka embadlwana edlule – ngokunjalo futhi nasemlandweni wethu njengezwe elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu – wukuthi thina asibona neze abantu abaphonsa ithawula kalula nje, bamukele noma yini eyenzeka kubona.

ssw: ngesikhathi sibukene nensayeya lenkhulu yelubandlululo, asitange sititfobe ngaphasi kwencindzetelo umbuso welubandlululo bewuyihlisibete bantfu bakitsi.
zul: ngenkathi sibhekene nenselele enkulukazi yobandlululo asizange siphonse ithawula, samukele ingcindezelo yombuso wobandlululo phezu kwabantu bakithi.

ssw: sema sacina futsi sasiphalata, sinelitsemba lekutsi injongo yetfu itawuphumelela.
zul: sabhekana nayo ngqo, sazabalaza, ngethemba lokuthi sizonqoba.

ssw: futsi yaphumelela.
zul: ngempela waphumelela umzabalazo wethu.

ssw: ngekumelana nato tonkhe tinkinga letinkhulu sakwati kuncoba luhlelonchubo yelubandlululo.
zul: nakuba lokhu kwakuwumqansa saphumelela ukunqoba inqubo yobandlululo.

ssw: singakwati, futsi sitawutintjintja letimo lesititfola sikuto lamuhla.
zul: singaziguqula izimo esizithola sikuzona namuhla, futhi sizoziguqula.

ssw: siyakwati futsi sitimisele kubuncoba lobumatima futsi sibeke umnotfo wetfu endleleni lecinile yekululama nekusimama.
zul: sinawo amandla ngokunjalo futhi nokuzimisela ukunqoba lobu bunzima futhi sibeke umnotho wethu endleleni eqinile ebheke ekululameni nokusimama.

ssw: lokufanele kutsi sikwente ngekushesha kubuyisela ezingeni lelifanele kuba khona kwemandla agezi.
zul: into esemqoka kakhulu eseqhulwini okumele sibhekane nayo ngokushesha wukuqinisekisa ukuthi kubuyela esimweni esijwayelekile ukuphakelwa kukagesi futhi siqinisekise ukuthi ugesi utholakala ngaso sonke isikhathi.

ssw: sibukene nenkinga lenkhulu yemandla agezi, inhlanyelo leyahlanyelwa eminyakeni leminyenti leyendlulile.
zul: sibhekene nenkinga enzima kakhulu yokuntuleka kukagesi, okuyinto eyaqala ngenxa yokungaqhutshwa kwezinto ngendlela efanele eminyakeni eminingi edlule.

ssw: angeke sikwati kuhlehlisa emaphutsa lentiwa esikhatsini lesendlulile, emandla agezi langatange akhiwe, umonakalo lodalwe etikhungweni tetfu letiphehla gezi ngenca yekungalungiswa, noma imiphumela yekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane etikhungweni tetfu.
zul: ngeke neze sikwazi ukuguqula nokwesula amaphutha enzeka esikhathini esedlule, amaphutha omsebenzi ongenziwanga wokwakha iziphehlagesi nokuhlinzeka ngezinsizakusebenza ezifanele, umonakalo owenziwa ezikhungweni zethu eziphehla ugesi ngenxa yokungalungiswa kwazo ukuze zihlale zisesimweni esikahle sokusebenza, noma imithelela yokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso okwenzeka ezikhungweni zethu.

ssw: lesingakwenta kutsi siyilungise lenkinga lamuhla, kute kutsi sigcine tibane tetfu tikhanya kusasa nasetitukulwaneni letitako.
zul: esingakwenza thina namuhla wukulungisa le nkinga, siqinisekise ukuthi ugesi uhlala ukhona njalo ngomuso futhi uhlale ukhona njalo nasezizukulwaneni ezizayo.

ssw: ngakholwane kulomnyaka lophelile, ngimemetele luhlelo lwekusebenta lolucacile lwekulungisa lenkinga lenkhulu yemandla agezi.
zul: ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule, ngamemezela uhlelo lokusebenza olucacile lokubhekana nenkinga kagesi.

ssw: loku bekwentelwe kutsi kulungise sikhebesi semamegawathi la-4 000 kuya kuleti-6 000 (mw).
zul: lokhu kwenzelwe ukulungisa inkinga yokushoda kukagesi ongamamegawathi (mw) ayizi-4 000 kuya kwizi-6 000. lolu hlelo lwabalula izindlela ezinhlanu ezimqoka kakhulu zokungenelela: okokuqala, ukulungisa iziteshi zika-eskom eziphehla amandla kagesi ngamalahle kanye nokwenza ngcono ukutholakala kukagesi ophakelwayo njengamanje.

ssw: loluhlelo luvete tindlela letinhlanu tekungenelela letibalulekile: kwekucala, kulungisa titeshi tetiphehligezi taka-eskom letisebenta ngemalahle kanye nekwenta kancono bukhona bekwetfulwa lokukhona kwanyalo.
zul: okwesibili, ukuvumela nokusheshisa utshalomali oluvela kubatshalizimali abazimele ekuphehlweni kwamandla kagesi.

ssw: kwesibili, kwenta nekusheshisa lutjalomali lolutimele lolukhulu kumtsamo wekuphehla.
zul: okwesithathu, ukusheshisa ukuthengwa kwamandla kagesi amasha kulabo abakhiqiza ugesi ovuselelekayo, ugesi ophehlwa ngegesi kanye nogesi ophehlwa bese ugcinwa kumabhethri.

ssw: kwesitsatfu, kusheshisa kutsengwa kwemandla agezi lamasha kusuka kulavusetelekako, awegesi nagcinwa kwibhethri.
zul: okwesine, ukuvumela amabhizinisi kanye namakhaya ukuthi azithengele ubuchwepheshe bukagesi welanga obubekwa phezu kophahla.

ssw: kwesine, kukhulula emabhizinisi nemakhaya akhone kutsenga emandla agezi wesola lebekwa eluphahleni.
zul: okwesihlanu, ukuguqula kakhulu umkhakha kagesi ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukutholakala kukagesi ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi lokhu kuqhubeke isikhathi eside.

ssw: kwesihlanu, kugucula umkhakha wagezi kute uzuze kuba khona kwemandla agezi sikhatsi lesidze.
zul: ongoti bayavuma ukuthi lolu hlelo yiyona ndlela engasebenza futhi iphumelele uma iqhathaniswa nezinye ekuqedeni ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

ssw: etinyangeni letisitfupha letendlulile, sente inchubekelembili lebalulekile ekucaliseni kusebenta kwaloluhlelo.
zul: kulezi zinyanga eziyisithupha ezedlule, senze inqubekela phambili esemqoka ekuqaliseni lolu hlelo.

ssw: sitsetse tinyatselo tekutfutfukisa kusebenta kwetiteshi tagezi letikhona taka-eskom kute kutsi titeshi tekuphehla gezi letiniketa ema-80% wagezi wetfu tikhicite linani lagezi letakhelwe wona.
zul: sithathe izinyathelo zokwenza ngcono ukusebenza kweziteshi eziphehla amandla kagesi zika-eskom ezikhona njengamanje ukuze iziteshi eziphehla amandla kagesi ngamalahle ezihlinzeka ama-80% kagesi wethu zikwazi ukukhiqiza umthamo kagesi ezazakhelwe ukuwukhiqiza.

ssw: ngaphasi kwebhodi yayo lensha, i-eskom isabalalisa bantfu netinsita kute kutsi kutfutfukiswe kwetsembeka kwetiteshi letisitfupha letifake kakhulu sandla ekubeni khona kwacimicimi wagezi.
zul: ngaphansi kwebhodi lakhe elisha, u-eskom ujube abantu kanye nezinsiza ukwenza ngcono ukuthembakala nokusebenza ngendlela efanele kweziteshi eziphehla amandla kagesi eziyisithupha okuyizona ezibe nesandla esikhulu ekucinyweni kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

ssw: i-eskom ilandzelela ngekushesha kwakhiwa kwesisombululo kwesikhashana sekubuyisa emayunithi lamatsatfu esiteshini sagezi ekusile kulandzela kubhidlika kwesitaki sashimula emnyakeni lowendlule, ngesikhatsi lesifanako silungisa sakhiwo salomphelo.
zul: u-eskom usheshisa kakhulu umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwesixazululo sesikhashana sokulungisa nokubuyisela emsebenzini amayunithi amathathu esiteshi esiphehla amandla kagesi ikusile kulandela ukubhidlika kwengxenye kashemula walesi sikhungo ngonyaka odlule, futhi kusenjalo kwakhiwe isakhiwo sanomphela.

ssw: sakha kabusha emakhono lalahlekile futsi sesivele sihehe basebenti labanemakhono labatawungena etikhundleni letiphakeme kute bafakwe etiteshini letingasebenti kahle.
zul: sakha kabusha amakhono alahlekile futhi sesiqalile kakade ukuqasha abasebenzi abanamakhono emazingeni aphezulu abazothunyelwa eziteshini eziphehla amandla kagesi ezingawenzi ngendlela egculisayo umsebenzi wazo.

ssw: umkhandlu wetebunjiniyela waseningizimu afrika unikele ngekuniketa lonkhe lusito loludzingekako ekusabalaliseni bonjiniyela kute kutsi basebentisane nemacembu ebaphatsi etiteshini tagezi.
zul: umkhandlu wezobunjiniyela waseningizimu afrika usuthembisile ukuthi ungahlinzeka ngalo lonke usizo oludingekayo ngokuthi uthumele onjiniyela ukuze basebenzisane namathimba abaphathi eziteshini eziphehla amandla kagesi.

ssw: sinemakhono lajulile nebungcweti khona lapha eningizimu afrika - sidzinga-nje kuwasebentisa.
zul: sinawo amakhono nolwazi olunzulu khona lapha eningizimu afrika – okumele sikwenze nje wukuwasebenzisa.

ssw: litiko letekugcina emafa avelonkhe liphotfula tisombululo temtfwalo wesikweleti saka-eskom setigidzigidzi letinge-r400 ngendlela lefanele nalelungile kubo bonkhe badlalindzima, lokutawenta lenhlangano kutsi ikwati kutjala timali letidzingekako ekunakekeleni nasekundluliseni imali.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke uphothula isixazululo maqondana nesikweletu sika-eskom esiyizigidigidi ezingama-400 zamarandi, ngendlela engenzeleli futhi enobulungiswa kubo bonke ababambiqhaza, okuzokwenza ukuthi le nkampani ikwazi ukutshala izimali emsebenzini wokulungiswa nokugcinwa kwezikhungo zisesimweni sokusebenza esikahle kanye nokudluliswa nokuthuyelwa kukagesi.

ssw: hulumende utawuyisita i-eskom kute itfole lenye imali yekutsenga dizili kute kuphele lomnyakatimali.
zul: uhulumeni uzomeseka u-eskom ekutholeni uxhasomali olwengeziwe ukuze akwazi ukuthenga udizili kuze kuphele lo nyakamali esiwuphethe.

ssw: loku kufanele kunciphise lifutse lelibi kabi lacimicimi wagezi njengoba i-eskom itawukwati kusebentisa tiphehli tayo letisebentisa uma loluhlelo lubukene nebumatima lobukhulu.
zul: lokhu kubhekeke ukuthi kunciphise ubude nokuphindaphindeka kakhulu kokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga njengoba u-eskom ezokwazi ukusebenzisa izikhungo zakhe eziphehla ugesi ngodizili lapho uhlelo lokuphakelwa kukagesi lungaphansi kwengcindezi.

ssw: i-eskom yetfule luhlelo lwekutsenga emandla agezi lengetiwe kutiphehli letitimele futsi sewuvele utfole e-300 mw emaveni labomakhelwane betfu.
zul: u-eskom wethule uhlelo lokuthenga amandla kagesi ezinkampanini ezizimele eziphehla ugesi ongaphezulu kwalowo eziwudingayo futhi usewutholile kakade ugesi ongama-300 mw ovela emazweni angomakhelwane.

ssw: temisebenti yemaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (i-saps) basungule litsimba lelitinikele lelinebaholi labasetulu labatawubukana nenkhohlakalo ledlangile kanye nekweba etiteshini letinyentana lokube nemtselela ekusebenteni kabi kwaletiteshi.
zul: umbutho wamaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (i-saps) sewusungule ithimba elikhethekile elibandakanya abaholi abaphezulu ukubhekana nenkohlakalo nobusela obuthe chithi saka futhi obulokhu buqhubeke njalo eziteshini eziningana eziphehla amandla kagesi okuyinto esiholele ekutheni lezi ziteshi zingasebenzi ngendlela egculisayo.

ssw: imisebenti lechutjwa tebunhloli etindzaweni letichumene ne-eskom kute kube ngunyalo sekuholele ekuboshweni kwebantfu labange-43.
zul: imikhankaso esekelwe phezu kolwazi lwezobunhloli seyiholele ekuboshweni kwabantu abangama-43 ezizindeni ezihlobene no-eskom kuze kube manje.

ssw: njengencenye yeluhlelo lolubanti lwetingucuko, kwakhiwa kabusha kwe-eskom lesakumemetela ngaphambilini kuyachubeka futsi inkhampani yavelonkhe yekwendlulisa nekutfunyelwa kwagezi itawusebenta madvute-nje kanye nebhodi letimele.
zul: njengengxenye yenqubo ebanzi yokwenziwa kwezinguquko, kuyaqhubeka ukuhlelwa kabusha kuka-eskom esakumemezela ngaphambilini futhi inkampani kazwelonke yokudluliswa nokuthunyelwa kukagesi izoqala khona maduze nje ukusebenza futhi izoba nebhodi elizimele.

ssw: ekuhambeni kwalomnyaka, sitawetfula umtsetfosivivinyo wekuchibela tekulawulwa kwetagezi kute ugucule lomkhakha wetemandla agezi bese usungula imakethe yemandla agezi lencintisanako.
zul: ngokuhamba kwalo nyaka, sizokwethula umthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyela umthetho wokulawulwa kukagesi ukuze kulethwe uguquko emkhakheni wezamandla kagesi futhi kusungulwe imakethe kagesi enokuncintisana okufanele.

ssw: njengoba kwashiwo ngakholwane wemnyaka lophelile, futsi ngenhloso yekubukana nenkinga yacimicimi wagezi, sitawuchubeka nekwetfulwa kwemaphaneli esola labekwa eluphahleni.
zul: njengoba ngasho ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule, futhi ngenhloso yokuxazulula inkinga yokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, sizoqhubekela phambili nokukhishwa kwamaphaneli kagesi welanga abekwa ophahleni.

ssw: enkhulumeni yakhe yesabelomali, indvuna yetetimali itawuchaza kutsi emakhaya atawusitwa kanjani nekutsi emabhizinisi wona atawukhona kanjani kuzuza kusibonelelo-sikhutsati semtselo.
zul: enkulumweni yakhe yesabelomali, ungqongqoshe wezezimali uzochaza ukuthi amakhaya azolekelelwa kanjani kanye nokuthi amabhizinisi wona azohlomula kanjani kwisibonelelo-sikhuthazo sentela.

ssw: litiko letekugcinwa kwemafa avelonkhe lenta tingucuko kuluhlelo lwemalimboleko kute kutsi kusitwe emabhizinisi lamancane kutsi akhone kutjala timali emishinini yesola, kanye nekuvumela emabhange netikhungo tekutfutfukisa kutsi tiboleke ngalokucondzile kuloluhlelo kute kutsi kube lula kucashiswa kwemasola kumakhasimende abo.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke wenza izinguqukwana ezithile ohlelweni lokubolekisa ngemali yokuvuselela amabhizinisi akhahlamezekile ukuze ashaye ibuya, phecelezi i-bounce-back loan scheme ukuze kulekelelwe amabhizinisi amancane ekuthengeni ubuchwepheshe nemishini kagesi welanga, futhi ukuze kuvunyelwe amabhange kanye nezikhungo zezimali yentuthuko zikwazi ukuboleka ngqo kulolu hlelo ukwenza lula ukuqashiswa kwamaphaneli kagesi welanga kumakhasimende azo.

ssw: lenye yetingucuko letinemandla lesitentile kuvumela batfutfukisi labatimele kutsi baphehle gezi.
zul: enye yezinguquko ezinohlonze esizenzile wukuvumela abathuthukisi-mhlaba abazimele ukuthi baphehle ugesi.

ssw: nyalo kunemiklamo lengetulu kwe-100, lokulindzeleke kutsi anikete umtsamo lomusha we-9 000 mw ekuhambeni kwesikhatsi.
zul: njengamanje sekunemiklamo engaphezu kwe-100, okulindeleke ukuthi ihlinzeke ngamandla amasha kagesi angama-9 000 mw ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

ssw: tinkampani letinyentana letidlale indzima ekuhlolweni kwemandla agezi lavuselelekako titawungena madvute-nje kutekwakha futsi tiletse samba lesiphelele semandla agezi lesi-2 800 mw.
zul: kunezinkampani eziningana ezibambe iqhaza ohlelweni lwamandla kagesi avuselelekayo ezizokwakhiwa khona maduze nje futhi zizohlinzeka ngamandla amasha kagesi ongama-2 800 mw.

ssw: i-eskom itawutsenga emandla agezi esimo lesiphutfumako longasatjalaliswa kungakapheli tinyanga letisitfupha kute kutsi kuvalwe ligebe lelikhona kwanyalo.
zul: u-eskom uzothenga amandla kagesi esimo esiphuthumayo angathunyelwa kungakapheli izinyanga eziyisithupha ngenhloso yokuvala ngokushesha igebe elivulekile.

ssw: sitjala timali etintsanjeni tekwendlulisa letinsha nasetiteshini letincane, ikakhulukati etindzaweni letifana nemphumalanga kapa, inyakatfo kapa kanye nenshonalanga kapa.
zul: sitshala izimali kumakhebuli nengqalasizinda entsha yokudlulisa nokuthumela ugesi kanye neziteshi ezincane, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni ezinjengempumalanga kapa, nyakatho kapa kanye nentshonalanga kapa.

ssw: tonkhe letinyatselo titawuholela ekukhuphukeni lokukhulu kwemandla agezi kugridi kuletinyanga letitako leti-12 kuya kuleti-18, nekwendlula lapho.
zul: zonke lezi zinyathelo zizoholela ekukhuleni okukhulukazi kwamandla kagesi athunyelwa esikhungweni sikazwelonke samandla kagesi kulezi zinyanga eziyi-12 kuya kweziyi-18 ezizayo, kuya phambili.

ssw: lamandla agezi atawuhambisana netilondvoloti temitfombo yetfu leyehlukahlukene yemandla agezi, kufaka ekhatsi titeshi tetiphehligezi letisebentisa emalahle, lilanga, umoya, igesi, inuzi, emanti kanye nebhethri.
zul: la mandla kagesi azohlinzekwa ngendlela ehambisana nemithombo yethu kagesi oxubile kubandakanya iziteshi zethu ezikhona njengamanje eziphehla amandla kagesi ngamalahle, ugesi welanga, ugesi womoya, ugesi ophehlwa ngegesi, ugesi wenuzi, ugezi wamanzi kanye nogesi ogcinwe kubuchwepheshe bamabhethri.

ssw: kute kutsi loluhlelo luphunyeleliswe ngalokuphelele, sidzinga kuchunyaniswa lokusendzaweni yinye lokunemandla kanye nesinyatselo lesincumako.
zul: ukuze luqaliswe ngokuphelele lolu hlelo, sidinga ukulawulwa okunohlonze okuzokwenziwa esizindeni esisodwa futhi sidinga nezinyathelo ezisheshayo futhi ezinohlonze.

ssw: ngetikhatsi tenhlekelele, sidzinga lulawulo loluvela endzaweni leyodvwa kanye nekusebenta ngekubambisana.
zul: esikhathini lapho sibhekene nesimo esinzima, sidinga isizinda esisodwa esizohlinzeka ngemiyalelo futhi sidinga umgudu wokusebenza owodwa ozolandelwa.

ssw: njengoba silungisa imbangela yalenhlekelele, sidzinga futsi kulungisa nemtselela wayo.
zul: ngokufanayo nokubhekana ngqo nembangela yale nkinga kumele futhi sibhekane ngqo nomthelela wayo.

ssw: lenhlekelele iye ngekuya yatsintsa tonkhe tincenye temmango wetfu.
zul: le nkinga seyisabalale ngokuqhubekayo yaze yaba nomthelela kuyona yonke ingxenye yomphakathi.

ssw: sifanele kutsi siphakame sitsatse tinyatselo kute kutsi sinciphise umtselela walenhlekelele kubalimi, kumabhizinisi lamancane, nakusakhiwonchanti setfu kanye nakuluhlelo lwetfu lwetekutfutsa.
zul: kumele sithathe izinyathelo ukunciphisa umthelela wale nkinga kubalimi, kumabhizinisi amancane, kwingqalasizinda yethu yamanzi kanye nasohlelweni lwethu lonkana lwezokuthutha.

ssw: sikhungo savelonkhe setekulawula tinhlekelele ngenca yaloko sesifake lenkinga yemandla agezi nemtselela wayo emkhakheni wetinkinga letincunywe kutsi titinhlekelele.
zul: ngenxa yalokho-ke isizinda sikazwelonke sokuphathwa kwenhlekelele sesinqume ukuthi inkinga yamandla kagesi kanye nomthelela wayo kuthathwe njengenhlekelele.

ssw: ngakho-ke, lesimo sisimemetela njengaleso lesiyinhlekelele yavelonkhe kute kutsi sibukane nalenhlekelele yagezi kanye nemtselela wayo.
zul: ngakho-ke, simemezela isimo sikazwelonke senhlekelele ukuze kubhekwane nenkinga kagesi nemithelela yayo.

ssw: indvuna yelitiko letekubusa ngekubambisana netendzabuko isandza kusifaka kugazethi lesimo senhlekelele, lesitawucala masinyane-nje.
zul: ungqongqoshe wezokubusa ngokubambisana nezindaba zendabuko usanda kushicilela ukumenyezelwa kwesimo senhlekelele kusomqulu kahulumeni, okuyisimemezelo esizoqala ngokushesha ukusebenza.

ssw: lesimo senhlekelele sitawukwenta kutsi sikwati kusita ngetinyatselo letentekako lesidzinga kutitsatsa kute sesekele emabhizinisi eluchungechungeni lwekukhicita kudla, kugcinwa kanye nekutsengiswa kwemphahla etitolo, lokufaka ekhatsi kukhishwa kwamajeneretha, emaphaneli esola kanye nekuphakelwa kwagezi lokungatsikameteki.
zul: isimo senhlekelele sizosivumela ukuthi sihlinzeke ngezinyathelo ezinohlonze futhi eziphathekayo esizidingayo ukulekelela amabhizinisi ekukhiqizweni kokudla, ekugcinweni kwempahla kanye nokuthengwa nokuthengiswa kwempahla ezitolo, kubandakanya nokukhishwa kwemishini ephehla ugesi (amajeneretha), amaphaneli kagesi welanga kanye nokuphakelwa kwamandla kagesi okuqhubekayo futhi okunganqamuki.

ssw: lapho kungenteka khona ngekwebuchwepheshe, kutawusenta kutsi sikwati kukhulula sakhiwonchanti lesibalulekile njengetibhedlela netindzawo zekuhlanta emanti ekucishweni kwagezi.
zul: lapho kunokwenzeka, lokhu kuzosivumela ukuba sikwazi ukubhekelela ngokukhethekile ingqalasizinda ekhethekile nesemqoka kakhulu enjengezibhedlela kanye nezizinda lapho kuhlanzwa khona amanzi, ngokuthi ungacinywa ugesi oya kulezi zikhungo.

ssw: futsi kutawusenta kutsi sikwati sisebente sisheshise imiklamo yemandla agezi siphindze futsi sinciphise tidzingo tekulawula sibe futsi kuko sibe sigcina kuvikelwa kwemvelo ngalokunemandla, timiso tekuthengwa kwemphahla kanye netilinganiso temazinga etebucwepheshe.
zul: futhi lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi sisheshise imiklamo yamandla kagesi futhi sinciphise izidingo zokulawula, kusenjalo futhi sigcine izinqubo ezinqala zokuvikelwa kwemvelo, imigomo yokuthengwa kwempahla-kusebenza kanye nemisebenzi kanye namazinga okumele athotshelwe okuqhutshwa komsebenzi ngendlela efanele.

ssw: kutawuletfwa umcwaningimabhuku jikelele kute kutsi acinisekise kulandzelela lokuchubekako kwelusebentisomali, kute kutsi kugadvwe nanoma ngukuphi kusebentisa ngalokungafanele timali letifanele kutsi tilungise lenhlekelele.
zul: umcwaningimabhuku jikelele uzojutshwa ukuba aqinisekise ukuqashelwa nokuhlolwa ngokuqhubekayo kochithomali, ukuze kugwenywe ukuxhashazwa nokusetshenziswa ngokungafanele kwezimali ezidingekayo ukubhekana nale nhlekelele.

ssw: kute sibukane ngemphumelelo nengekuphutfuma kakhudlwana netinsayeya lesibukene nato, ngitawubeka indvuna yetagezi ehhovisi lamengameli letawuba nesibopho lesiphelele sekwengamela tonkhe tinhlangotsi tesimo lesibucayi setagezi, lokufaka ekhatsi nemsebenti welikomidi lavelonkhe letinkinga tetemandla agezi.
zul: ukuze kubhekwane kahle futhi ngokushesha nezinselele esibhekene nazo, ngizoqoka ungqongqoshe wezikagesi ozozinza ehhovisi likamongameli ukuze kube nguyena ozokwenza ngokuphelele umsebenzi wokwengamela konke okuphathelene nezinyathelo esizithathayo ukubhekana nenkinga kagesi, kubandakanya nomsebenzi wekomidi likazwelonke lokubhekana nenkinga kagesi.

ssw: lendvuna itawugcila ngalokuphelele iphindze futsi isebentisane nebhodi yaka-eskom nebaphatsi ekucedzeni cimicimi wagezi kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi luhlelo lwekusebenta lwetemandla agezi lufezekiswa ngekushesha.
zul: ungqongqoshe uzogxila kulo msebenzi ngokuphelele futhi asebenzisane nebhodi kanye nabaphathi baka-eskom ekuqedeni ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lokusebenza lwamandla kagesi luqaliswa ngokushesha futhi ngaphandle kokubambezeleka.

ssw: kute kutsi kususwe nanoma ngukuphi kudideka, indvuna yetemabhizinisi ahulumende itawuhlala imele baninimasheya baka-eskom futsi icondzise kuhlelwa kabusha kwe-eskom, icinisekise kusungulwa kwenkampani lehambisa gezi, icondzise kucaliswa kweluhlelo lwekushintjwa kwemandla ngendlela lefanele, futsi ingamele kusungulwa kwenkampani lelawula emabhizinisi embuso (ema-soe).
zul: ukuze kuqedwe noma yikuphi ukudideka, ungqongqoshe wezamabhizinisi kahulumeni kusazolokhu kunguyena ummeleli womninimasheya kwa-eskom futhi ozoqhuba ukuhlelwa kabusha kuka-eskom, nokuqinisekisa ukusungulwa kwenkampani yokudlulisa nokuthumela ugesi, nokwengamela umsebenzi wokuqaliswa kohlelo lokuguqukela kugesi ohlanzekile oluqhutshwa ngobuqotho nobulungiswa, kanye nokwengamela ukusungulwa kwenkampani engumnikazi wamabhizinisi ombuso (ama-soe), phecelezi i-state-owned enterprises holding company.

ssw: inchubo yekuhlela kabusha hulumende itawuniketa litfuba lekuncuma kubekwa kwetindzawo letehlukahlukene temisebenti nekutsi temisebenti leyehlukene kanye nematiko kungayisebentela kahle kakhulu imiklamo yetfu.
zul: inqubo yokuhlelwa kabusha kukahulumeni izosinikeza ithuba lokubheka nokuhlonza ukuthi imisebenzi ehlukahlukene izokwenziwa kuyiphi imikhakha kanye nokuthi amahhovisi ongqongqoshe ahlukahlukene kanye neminyango ingalekelela kanjani ngokuphelele ekufezekiseni izinjongo zethu zikazwelonke.

ssw: lunako lwetfu lugcile kakhulu enkingeni yagezi njengamanje futsi sitawubukana nekuhlelwa kabusha kwahulumende ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi.
zul: okwamanje sigxile kakhulu enkingeni yamandla kagesi futhi ukuhlelwa kabusha kukahulumeni yinto esizoyenza ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

ssw: loku kuyadzingeka ngoba imphendvulo lesebentako kulenkinga ibandzakanya ematiko netinhlaka letimbalwa letehlukene letidzinga kuchunyaniswa esikhungweni sahulumende.
zul: lokhu kudingekile ngoba phela ukuthathwa kwezinyathelo ezifanele ukubhekana nale nkinga kubandakanya iminyango nezikhungo eziningana ezihlukahlukene okuyinto edinga ukulawulwa ngendlela efanele okuvela kwiziphathimandla eziphezulu zikahulumeni omkhulu.

ssw: sitawufaka ekhatsi nalabanye balingani betfu esakhiweni lesisebentako lesifana nalesi lesasisungula sekuchuba kukhishwa nekusetjentiswa kwemigomo yekuvikela.
zul: sizobandakanya nabanye esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini ohlakeni olusebenza kahle olufana nalolo esalusungula ngenkathi siqhuba umsebenzi wokukhipha umgomo siwunikeza abantu.

ssw: timo letingakavami tidzinga tinyatselo letingakavami.
zul: izimo ezingajwayelekile zidinga izinyathelo ezingajwayelekile.

ssw: inkinga lenkhulu yagezi ilusongo lolukhona emnotfweni wetfu kanye nakutenhlalo.
zul: inkinga yamandla kagesi ibeka engcupheni umnotho wethu nokusebenza kwawo kanye nokuxhumana okuhle nensebenziswano emphakathini.

ssw: akukafanele kutsi siyekele umtamo, futsi akukafanele sivumele kubambeleleka, ekusebentiseni letinyatselo.
zul: kumele senze konke esingakwenza, futhi kungabi khona nokuncane ukubambezeleka esikuvumelayo ekuqaliseni lezi zinyathelo.

ssw: njengoba sitsatsa lesinyatselo kute kutsi sisombulule lenkinga yagezi, siyabucaphela bungoti lobubangelwa kugucugucuka kwesimo selitulu emmangweni wetfu.
zul: njengoba sizothatha lezi zinyathelo ukuxazulula inkinga yamandla akagesi, buyinto esiyazi kahle kamhlophe ubungozi bokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu emphakathini wethu.

ssw: tehlakalo tesimo selitulu lesibi kakhulu lesisomiso, tikhukhula kanye nemililo yemadlelo kuya ngekuya kuba yingoti kutemphilo netenhlalakahle netekuphepha kwebantfu.
zul: izehlakalo zesimo sezulu esixakile ezinjengesomiso, izikhukhula kanye nemililo yequbula zinobungozi obudlondlobalayo empilweni, inhlalakahle kanye nokuphepha kwabantu.

ssw: sitawuchubeka nengucuko yetfu lefanele leya emnotfweni wekhabhoni lephasi ngesivinini lelive letfu lelingakwati kulifinyelela nangendlela lecinisekisa kuvikeleka kwemandla agezi.
zul: sizoqhubeka noguquko lwethu olunobuqotho nobulungiswa lokuguqukela emnothweni ohlanzekile okhiqiza ikhabhoni encane okuyinto esizoyenza ngesivivini esihambisana nesimo esizokwazi ukumelana naso izwe lethu futhi ngendlela eqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamandla kagesi ngokuqhubekayo futhi ngaso sonke isikhathi.

ssw: sitawukwenta tingucuko tetfu letilungile ngendlela letawuvula ematfuba elutjalomali lolusha, kutfutfukiswa kwetimboni letinsha nekutsi, ngetulu kwako konkhe, kudzaleke ematfuba emisebenti lemisha.
zul: ukuguqukela kwethu ngobuqotho nobulungiswa kugesi ohlanzekile sizokwenza ngendlela ezovula amathuba amasha otshalomali, kusungule izimboni ezintsha futhi ngaphezu kwakho konke, kube wuguquko oludala imisebenzi emisha.

ssw: ikhomishani yelihhovisi lamengameli yetesimo selitulu icondzisa incenye lenkhulu yalomsebenti, futsi, ngekwenta loko, yakha indlela lensha lefaka ekhatsi wonkhewonkhe nekutsatsa tincumo letifaka ekhatsi wonkhe umuntfu, letifaka ekhatsi bantfu labatimele, basebenti, kanye nemimango letsintseke kakhulu ngenca yalolushintjo.
zul: ikhomishani yesimo sezulu kamongameli iyona elawula ingxenye enkulu yalo msebenzi, futhi, ngokwenza njalo, yakha uhlelo olusha lokuthathwa kwezinqumo okubandakanyayo futhi okwenziwa ngokuhlanganyela, ngokuthi kubandakanywe umuntu ngamunye, abasebenzi kanye nemiphakathi ekhahlamezeke kakhulu ngenxa yalolu guquko.

ssw: ngekusebentisa luhlelo lwelutjalomali lwetingucuko temandla agesi letilungile, kutawutjalwa mathriliyoni langu-r1.5 emnotfweni wetfu eminyakeni lesihlanu letako emikhakheni lemisha lefana nagezi lovusetelwako, ihayidrojini lenganukubeti imvelo kanye netimoto tagezi.
zul: ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuguqukela emandleni kagesi ohlanzekile olunobuqotho nobulungiswa, kuzotshalwa isamba semali engamathriliyoni angu-1.5 amarandi emnothweni wethu kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo emikhakheni emisha enjengomkhakha wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo, ihayidrojini engayinukubezi imvelo kanye nezimoto ezisebenza ngogesi.

ssw: imikhakha leminyentana lemisha iyavela emnotfweni, njengehayidrojini lenganukubeti imvelo, timoto tagezi nemaseli akhicita gezi ngemakhemikhali ema-fuel cell.
zul: kuneminye imikhakha emisha eminingana equbukayo emnothweni, njengomkhakha omkhulukazi wehayidrojini engayinukubezi imvelo, izimoto ezisebenza ngogesi kanye namaseli akhiqiza ugesi ngamakhemikhali, phecelezi ama-fuel cell.

ssw: imiklamo leminyenti seyivele icaliwe, lokufaka ekhatsi nekutfutfukiswa kwesikhungo lesisha se-sasol e-boegoebaai enyakatfo kapa, i-prieska power reserve efreyistata, kanye neluhlelo lwe-hydrogen valley elimpopo, egauteng nakwazulu-natal.
zul: kunemiklamo eminingana eqhubekayo kakade kubandakanya ukuthuthukiswa kwesikhungo esisha ngabakwa-sasol e-boegoebaai enyakatho kapa, i-prieska power reserve efreyistata, kanye nomklamo wokukhiqiza ugesi ngehayidrojini, i-hydrogen valley initiative oqhutshwa e-limpopo, e-gauteng nakwazulu-natali.

ssw: inyakatfo kapa seyivele ihehe lutjalomali lolungetulu kwetigidzigidzi leti-r100 emiklameni yagezi lovusetelekako.
zul: isifundazwe sasenyakatho kapa sesihehe utshalomali olungaphezu kwezigidigidi eziyi-100 zamarandi olufakwe emiklamweni yamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo.

ssw: loku kanye nalokunye kutjalwa kwetimali lokukhulu kwemandla agezi avuselelekayo kutawudzala ematfuba emisebenti futsi kukhutsate umnotfo wendzawo hhayi enyakatfo kapa kuphela, kodvwa nasemphumalanga kapa, enshonalanga kapa nasemphumalanga, kugucule ngisho nelugwadvule lolomile lube ngumtfombo lomkhulu wemandla agezi.
zul: le miklamo kanye neminye yotshalomali olufakwe emkhakheni wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo izokwakha imisebenzi futhi ikhuthaze nokusimama kweminotho yendawo hhayi nje kuphela enyakatho kapa kodwa ngisho nasempumalanga kapa, entshonalanga kapa kanye nasempumalanga imbala, okuyinto ezoguqula ngisho ugwadule olome kakhulu lube yisikhondlakhondla somthombo wamandla kagesi.

ssw: ngetulu kwako konkhe, ingucuko yetfu lenebulungiswa itawubeka embili basebenti nemimango lesetimbonini letisengotini kute kutsi kucinisekiswe kutsi kute losala emuva.
zul: ngaphezu kwakho konke, uguquko lwethu lokuguqukela emandleni kagesi ahlanzekile olunobuqotho nobulungiswa luzobeka eqhulwini abasebenzi kanye nemiphakathi esezimbonini ezisengcupheni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi akekho noyedwa umuntu ozosala ngemuva.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika, umnotfo wetfu udzinga kukhula ngekushesha uma ngabe sifuna kunciphisa buphuya ngelizinga lelibonakalako.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, umnotho wethu kudingeka ukuthi ukhule ngesivinini esikhudlwana impela uma sifuna ukunciphisa ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi ngendlela ebonakalayo nephawulekayo.

ssw: ku-sona yemnyaka lophelile, sakhuluma ngenhloso yekusungula inhlanganisela yetenhlalo lephelele letawuhlanganisa bonkhe lababambisene betenhlalakahle eluhlelweni lolufanako lekwakha kabusha umnotfo wetfu futsi sente nekukhula lokusezingeni leliphakeme.
zul: kwi-sona ngonyaka odlule, sakhuluma ngenhloso yethu yokwakha isivumelwano esibanzi phakathi kukahulumeni nemiphakathi yonkana esabe sizohlanganisa bonke labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini ngaphansi kohlelo olulodwa lokwakha kabusha umnotho wethu kanye nokuvumela ukukhula okuphakeme.

ssw: asitange sikhone kwephetsa sivumelwano setenhlalo esikhatsini lebesisihlelile ngenca yekutsi kuye kwavela timo letinyenti letinsha letente kwaba matima kutsi balingani betfu betenhlalakahle bente kuvumelana.
zul: asikwazanga ukuphothula isivumelwano somphakathi wonkana ngesikhathi esabe silindelekile ngenxa yokuqubuka kwezimo ezintsha eziningana ezenza ukuthi kube nzima ukuthi kube nokuvumelana nabo bonke okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini.

ssw: balingani betenhlalakahle bavakalise inhloso yabo yekuphotfula sivumelwano setenhlalakahle futsi bachubekile nekusebenta ngeluhlaka lolutawuvumela tinyatselo letihlangene emikhakheni lebalulekile lefana netemandla, etekutfutsa kanye netekuhlela, kwakhiwa kwematfuba emsebenti kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono, kutjalwa kwetimali kanye nekwakhiwa kwendzawo, kuvikelwa kwemmango, bugebengu kanye nenkhohlakalo.
zul: labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathi bazwakalise inhloso yabo yokwenza isivumelwano nohulumeni futhi baqhubekile nomsebenzi wokwakha uhlaka oluzovumela ukuthatha izinyathelo ngokuhlanganyela emikhakheni emqoka njengokagesi, ezokuthutha nokuhanjiswa kwempahla, ukwakhiwa kwemisebenzi nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, utshalomali nokulungiswa ngokuphelele kwemikhiqizo yezimbiwa neminye ngaphakathi kuleli, ukuvikelwa komphakathi, ubugebengu kanye nenkohlakalo.

ssw: nanoma-nje sisatibophelele ekwenteni sivumelwano lesisha emkhatsini kwato tonkhe tinhlaka temmango wetfu, sente kubambisana lokubonakalako etindzaweni letitsite.
zul: ngenkathi sisalokhu sizibophezele ekwakheni ukuvumelana okusha phakathi kwayo yonke imikhakha yomphakathi wethu, siphinde futhi sathatha izinyathelo eziphathekayo zokubambisana ezindaweni ezithile.

ssw: linyentana laletinye tivumelwano liphotfulwe emkhatsini kwebalingani bemmango.
zul: kunezinye izivumelwano eziningana esizenzile nalabo esibambisene nabo emphakathini.

ssw: siyakubona kutibophelela kwabo bonkhe balingani betenhlalo etinhlelweni tekubambisana letisungulelwe kulwa nelubhubhane lwe-covid-19 nekwenta luhlelo lwekugoma lolukhulu kunawo onkhe emlandvweni wetfu.
zul: siyakubona ukuzibophezela kwabo bonke labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini ezivumelwaneni ezenziwe ngenhloso yokulwisana nobhubhane lwe-covid-19 kanye nokuqhuba uhlelo lokugoma olungolukhulukazi emlandweni wethu.

ssw: sikubonile etinhlelweni letifana nesikhwama selubumbano lesahlanganisa ummango, kukhutsata takhamiti kanye nekwelekelelwa ngetimali kute kufezeke tinhloso letifanako, kanye nasebudlelwaneni bokucedza budlova lobucondziswe kubulili lobutsite kanye nekubulawa kwebesifazane (i-gbvf), kanye nekubukana nemitselela yekugucuka kwesimomvama selitulu.
zul: sizibonile izinhlelo ezinjengesikhwama sobumbano ezigqugquzele umphakathi, zakhuthaza ubushoshovu bezakhamuzi futhi zanxenxa uxhasomali ukuze kufezekiswe izinhloso ezifanayo, futhi okuyizinhlelo ezenziwe ngobambiswano okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane (i-gbvf), kanye nokubhekana ngqo nemithelela yokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

ssw: sesitibonile tinzuzo talendlela yekutfutfukisa kutjalwa kwetimali kanye nekutfutfukisa tinhlelo letinhle emikhakheni yetemnotfo efana netimoto, tingubo tekugcoka netindwangu, tinkhukhu, shukela, tilimo kanye netinsitakalo temabhizinisi emhlaba.
zul: siyibonile imihlomulo yale ndlela yokusebenza ekugqugquzeleni utshalomali kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezinhlelo-ngqangi emikhakheni yomnotho enjengomkhakha wezimoto, owezingubo zokugqoka nendwangu, owezinkukhu, okashukela, owezolimo kanye nowezinsizakalo zebhizinisi zomhlaba wonke.

ssw: tinhlelo letinhle lesetiphotfuliwe tisekela kuvuselelwa kwemikhakha lefanele, kufakwa kwekutjalwa kwetimali tinkampani letitimele kanye nekwakhiwa kwematfuba lamasha emisebenti netindlela tekutiphilisa.
zul: izinhlelo-ngqangi eseziphothuliwe zeseka ukuvuselelwa kabusha kwaleyo mikhakha ethintekile, nokufakwa kotshalomali okwenziwa ngabomkhakha ozimele kanye nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi emisha kanye nezindlela zokuziphilisa.

ssw: siyajabula kutsi balingani betfu betenhlalakahle, ikakhulukati bemabhizinisi, bebeloku basita ngekusekela kute kucale kusebenta luhlelo lwekusebenta lwemandla agezi ngemoya wekubumbana kwemmango.
zul: kuyasithokozisa ukubona ukuthi labo esibambisene nabo emphakathini, ikakhulukazi abamabhizinisi, bebelokhu behlinzeka ngokweseka ukuqaliswa kohlelo lokusebenza lwamandla kagesi ngokomoya wobambiswano nokwenziwa kwezivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nezinhlaka zomphakathi wonkana.

ssw: ngalokufanako, sisungule budlelwano bekusebenta lobudvute nabo bobabili basebenti kanye nemmango ekusekeleni letinye tici tekubukana netinkinga temandla agezi.
zul: ngokufanayo, sesakhe ubambiswano nensebenziswano eqinile nabasebenzi ngokunjalo futhi nomphakathi ekusekeleni eminye imikhakha yezinhlelo zokubhekana nenkinga yamandla kagesi.

ssw: njengoba emandla agezi abalulekile ekukhuleni kwemnotfo, kanjalo nekuphakelwa kwamanti lokutsembekile kanye neluhlelo lwesakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa lolusebenta kahle.
zul: njengoba amandla kagesi ebalulekile ekukhuleni komnotho, kubalulekile futhi nokutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi kanye nohlelo lwezokuthutha olusebenza kahle kanye nengqalasizinda yomgwaqo.

ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekutfutsa ngetitimela luhlupheke iminyaka leminyenti ekungatjali imali kancane, kweswelakala kwesondlo, tento tebugebengu kanye nekungasebenti kahle.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuthutha ngezitimela lukhahlamezekile ngenxa yeminyaka eminingi kungatshalwa izimali kulona ngendlela efanele, ungenziwa nomsebenzi wokulungisa, nezenzo zobugebengu kanye nokungaqhutshwa neze kahle komsebenzi.

ssw: kute silungise loku, emnyakeni lophelile, semukela inchubomgomo yavelonkhe yakaloliwe kute icondzise kwentiwa kwesimanjemanje kanye nekuguculwa kwemboni yetitimela, isite, emkhatsini waletinye tintfo, kute kutsi tinkampani letingephandle kwahulumende tifinyelele kuluhlelo lwetfu lwekutfutsa ngetitimela.
zul: ngenhloso yokubhekana ngqo nalokhu, ngonyaka odlule, samukela inqubomgomo kazwelonke yezezitimela ukuze isihole ekwenzeni umkhakha wezitimela ube ngowesimanjemanje futhi kulethwe uguquko kuwona, kuhlinzekwe, phakathi kokunye, ngokufinyelela kwezikhungo nezinkampani ezingaphandle kukahulumeni ohlelweni lwethu lokuthutha ngezitimela.

ssw: sisebenta kuhulumende wonkhe kutfutfukisa libalavendlela laka-transnet letawuhumusha tibopho tetfu tenchubomgomo tibe nguletiphatsekako, lokufaka ekhatsi kuhlelwa kabusha kwetitimela taka-transnet tekutfutsa imphahla kute kwakheke umphatsi wesakhiwonchanti lesehlukile seluhleloluchumano lwetitimela ngemphala nga-2023.
zul: kuhulumeni wonkana sisebenzela ukuthuthukisa umhlahlandlela wakwa-transnet ozoguqula izibophezelo zenqubomgomo yethu zibe yinto eyenzekayo, ephathekayo futhi ebonakalayo, kubandakanya ukuhlelwa kabusha komkhakha wakwa-transnet wokuthuthwa kwempahla ngezitimela ukuze kwakhiwe umphathi wengqalasizinda oseceleni ozoqondana ngqo nohlelo lokuthutha ngezitimela ngaphambi kokuphela kukamfumfu 2023. u-transnet kanye nezinkampani zomkhakha ozimele bazokwenza izivumelwano zokubambisana nokusebenzisana esikhumulweni semikhumbi sasethekwini nesasengqura, ukuze kuvunyelwe ukungena kotshalomali olusha emachwebeni ethu futhi kuphuculwe nendlela aqhuba ngayo umsebenzi.

ssw: tinkampani taka-transnet kanye netinkampani letitimele titawuphotfula budlelwano esikhungweni semakhonteyina asethekwini nasengqura, kute kutsi kube nelutjalomali lolusha ematibukweni etfu futsi kutfutfukiswe nekusebenta kahle kwawo.
zul: lokhu kuzolekelela amachweba ethu ukuthi abuyele endaweni abekuyo emhlabeni ngokuthi aphinde athathwe njengamanye amachweba awuqhuba ngobunyoninco obukhulu umsebenzi wawo.

ssw: loku kutawusita ematibuko etfu kutsi aphindze atfole sikhundla sawo semhlaba njengamatibuko lasebenta kahle kakhulu futsi.
zul: inkulu kakhulu impumelelo ezuziwe emsebenzini wokuguqula isimo sokusebenza kwesikhumulo sezimoto sase-port elizabeth, esesiwuphindaphinde kabili umthamo waso futhi osekuqalile kusona ukubonakala komthamo ophakeme wemikhiqizo ethunyelwa emazweni angaphandle.

ssw: kube nemphumelelo lenkhulu ekumiseni kabusha sikhumulo setimoto sasebhayi, lesesiphindze kabili umtsamo waso futsi lesesivele sahlangabetana nekukhula kwemphahla letfunyelwa kulamanye emave.
zul: likhulile impela inani lezimoto ezithunyelwa ezimakethe zaphesheya eziphuma esikhumulweni sezimoto sase-port elizabeth.

ssw: letinye timoto letinyenti letiya etimakethe letingesheya setivula sikhumulo setimoto sasebhayi.
zul: futhi u-transnet wenza umsebenzi wokulungisa nokuvuselela izitimela ebezihleli zingasebenzi futhi ukhulisa nenani lezitimela zakhe.

ssw: i-transnet nayo uvusetela titimela tayo letingasebenti futsi yandzisa titimela tayo.
zul: besibhekene nezinselele kwezokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela.

ssw: sibukane netinsayeya ekutfutfweni kwebagibeli ngetitimela.
zul: kulandela ukuhlelwa kabusha kwesikhungo sokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela saseningizimu afrika, iyi-13 imizila yokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela esiphinde yavulwa futhi, osekunciphise kakhulu izindleko zokugibela kubasebenzi abaningi.

ssw: kuphakelwa kwemanti lokwetsembekile kubalulekile emphilweni yebantfu kanye nasekukhuleni kwemnotfo wetfu.
zul: ukutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi kusemqoka kakhulu kwinhlalakahle yabantu kanye nasekukhuleni komnotho wethu.

ssw: kucinisekisa kutfolakala lwemanti nyalo nasesikhatsini lesitako, litiko letemanti nekutfutfwa kwendle kuhola loluhlelo lwekutjala emiklamini lemikhulu yesakhiwonchanti kulo lonkhe lelive.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi, manje nasesikhathini esizayo, umnyango wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle uhola inqubo yokutshalwa kwezimali emiklamweni yengqalasizinda emikhulukazi ezweni lonkana.

ssw: ngemuva kwekubambeleleka iminyaka leminyentana, imisebenti yekwakha ngalokuphelele kwemklamo wesigaba sesibili se-lesotho highlands itawucala kulomnyaka lona.
zul: emuva kokubambezeleka iminyaka eminingana, kulo nyaka uzoqaliswa ngokuphelele futhi umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwesigaba sesibili somklamo we-lesotho highlands.

ssw: lomklamo we-lesotho highlands ubalulekile ekucinisekiseni kutfolakala kwemanti laphakelwa igauteng, ifreyistata, impumalanga, inyakatfo nshonalanga kanye nasenyakatfo kapa.
zul: umklamo we-lesotho highlands usemqoka kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukuphakelwa kwamanzi e-gauteng, efreyistata, empumalanga, enyakatho ntshonalanga kanye nasenyakatho kapa.

ssw: kumashuminyaka lambalwa ngemuva kwekuhlongotwa kwekucala kanye neminyaka lesishiyagalolunye ngemuva kwemcimbi wekuphendvulwa kwelisoyi, sigaba sekucala semklamo wamanti wasemzimvubu sitawucala emnyakenitimali lolandzelayo.
zul: emuva kwamashuminyaka ambadlwana kwenziwa isiphakamiso futhi emuva kweminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye kwabanjwa umcimbi wokuphendula isoyi, isigaba sokuqala somklamo wamanzi i-umzimvubu water project sizoqaliswa kulo nyakamali ozayo.

ssw: lesigaba lesi, lesibandzakanya kwakhiwa kwelidamu lasentabelanga, sakhiwonchanti sekunisela kanye nekusatjalaliswa kwemanti emmangweni, sitawulekelelwa ngetimali nguhulumende.
zul: lesi sigaba, esibandakanya ukwakhiwa kwedamu i-ntabelanga dam, nengqalasizinda yokuchelela kanye nokuthunyelwa kwamanzi emiphakathini, sizoxhaswa ngezimali nguhulumeni.

ssw: sigaba lesilandzelako kutawuba kwakhiwa kwelidamu ililane, lokutawufaka ekhatsi siteshi sesiphehligezi semanti.
zul: isigaba esilandelayo kuzoba wukwakhiwa kwedamu i-lilane dam, elizobandakanya nesiteshi esiphehla amandla kagesi ngamanzi.

ssw: imiklamo lemikhulu yekukhulisa umtsamo welidamu i-clanwilliam, lidamu i-hazelmere kanye nelidamu lasetzaneen kutawenta kancono kuphakelwa kwemanti e-west coast, ethekwini kanye nasencenyeni yelimpopo lengasemphumalanga.
zul: imiklamo emikhulukazi yokukhuphula umthamo wamadamu i-clanwilliam dam, ne-hazelmere dam kanye ne-tzaneen dam izokwenza ngcono ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ogwini olusentshonalanga, ethekwini kanye nasengxenyeni esempumalanga ye-limpopo.

ssw: emnyakeni lophelile, simemetele luhlelo loluphelele lwekuntjintja kute kutsi kulungiswe inchubo yekufakwa kweticelo temalayisensi ekusebentisa emanti, lekuyintfo lebaluleke kakhulu kute kutsi kutjalwe timali letinkhulu.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, samemezela uhlelo olubanzi lokuguqula isimo okuhloswe ngalo ukuhlela kabusha inqubo yezicelo zamalayisensi okusebenzisa amanzi, okuyinto esemqoka ekungeniseni utshalomali oluthe xaxa.

ssw: kusukela lapho, siye sasusa kusalela emuva kwemalayisensi okusebentisa amanzi futsi sanciphisa nesikhatsi sekufaka ticelo saba ngemalanga lange-90.
zul: kusukela lapho, sesikuqedile ukusalela emuva komsebenzi wokukhishwa kwamalayisensi okusebenzisa amanzi futhi sabunciphisa nobude besikhathi sezicelo sayofinyelela ezinsukwini ezingama-90.

ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekwakha sakhiwonchanti luyandlondlobala ngemsebenti wesikhwama sesakhiwonchanti kanye nesakhiwonchanti saseningizimu afrika, lesisungulelwe kweseka imiklamo yesakhiwonchanti yelisubuciko.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda seluqala ukuhamba ngesivinini esikhulu impela ngenxa yomsebenzi owenziwa yisikhwama sengqalasizinda kanye nesikhungo sezengqalasizinda saseningizimu afrika, i-infrastructure south africa, okuyisikhungo esisungulelwe ukweseka imiklamo yengqalasizinda ekhethekile.

ssw: sinye setihibe letinkhulu tekutjala kusakhiwonchanti kweswelakala kwemakhono etebucwepheshe kanye nemakhono ekuphatfwa kwemiklamo.
zul: esinye sezithiyo ezinkulukazi kutshalomali lwengqalasizinda wukuntuleka kwamakhono obungoti bomsebenzi kanye namandla okuphathwa kwemiklamo.

ssw: kute kutsi sakhiwonchanti saseningizimu afrika sabelwe tigidzi letinge-r600 tekulungiselela lomklamo, ikakhulukati ezindzaweni tasemakhaya naleteswele tinsitakusebenta letisisekelo.
zul: ukuze kulungiswe lokhu, i-infrastructure south africa yabelwe isamba esiyizigidi ezingama-600 zamarandi okuyimali eqondiswe emsebenzini wokulungiselelwa kwemiklamo, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nezindawo ezingenazo kahle izinsiza.

ssw: tindlela tekwesekela kanye nekuhlela lesitibekile eminyakeni leminyentana seticala kutsela titselo ekukhuleni kwelutjalomali kusakhiwonchanti semmango.
zul: izindlela zokweseka nokuhlela esizisungulile esaziqalisa kule minyakana embadlwana edlule manje seziqala ukubonisa izithelo ezinhle njengoba sekubonakala ukukhula kotshalomali lukahulumeni kwingqalasizinda.

ssw: ngabhimbidvwane kulomnyaka lesikuwo, imiklamo yetigidzigidzi letinge-r232 beyisakhiwa kantsi imiklamo lebita cishe tigidzigidzi le-r4 seyiphotfuliwe.
zul: ngomasingana kulo nyaka, iyisamba esiyizigidigidi ezingama-232 zamarandi imiklamo eyakhiwayo kanti futhi beseyiphothuliwe imiklamo ebalelwa kwisamba esiyizigidigidi ezine zamarandi.

ssw: lemiklamo lephotfuliwe ifaka ekhatsi kuhlaliswa kwebantfu lokusha egauteng, kutfutfukiswa kwemigwaco kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwematheku lamancane.
zul: imiklamo esiphothuliwe ibandakanya imiklamo yezindlu ezintsha zokuhlalisa abantu e-gauteng, imiklamo yokulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwemigwaqo kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamachweba amancane.

ssw: kutfutfuka lokukhulu, yi-ejensi yavelonkhe yetemigwaco yaseningizimu afrika – i-sanral – ikhiphe emakontileka ekwakhiwa kwemigwaco letigidzigidzi leti-r18 kuletinyanga letintsatfu letengcile.
zul: maqondana nemiklamo yentuthuko emikhulu, isikhungo sezemigwaqo sakuleli, i-south african national roads agency – i-sanral – sesihlinzeke ngezinkontileka zokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo zenani eliyizigidigidi eziyi-18 zamarandi kule zinyanga ezintathu ezedlule.

ssw: kwakhiwa kwelibhuloho lasemsikaba kanye nelibhuloho lasemtentu kutawuphotfulwa futsi kutawenta kuya emphumalanga kapa kube ncono kakhulu.
zul: umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwebhuloho imsikaba bridge kanye nebhuloho imtentu bridge uzophothulwa futhi uzokwenza kube ngcono kakhulu ukuhamba empumalanga kapa.

ssw: lolutjalomali lutawuyizuzisa kakhulu imboni yetekwakha kuphindze futsi kuvule ematfuba emisebenti leminyenti, kutfutfukiswa kwemakhono kanye nekunciphisa buphuya, ikakhulukati emimangweni yasemaphandleni ladvutane.
zul: lolu tshalomali luzohlomulisa kakhulu imboni yezokwakha futhi luvumele ukwakhiwa kwemisebenzi eminingi, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono kanye nokuxosha indlala, ikakhulukazi emiphakathini yezindawo zasemakhaya eziseduzane.

ssw: emnyakeni lophelile, satsi sitawukhulisa kwakhiwa kwemabhuloho asemaphandleni njengencenye yeluhlelo lwewelisizwe, kute kutsi takhamiti tikwati kufinyelela kalula etikolweni, etindzaweni tekusebenta kanye nasetindzaweni tetinsita.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sathi sizowukhulisa umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamabhuloho ezindaweni zasemakhaya njengengxenye yohlelo iwelisizwe, ukuze silekelele abahlali bakwazi ukufinyelela kalula futhi ngokuphepha ezikoleni, emsebenzini kanye nasezikhungweni ezisemqoka.

ssw: nyalo emabhuloho lange-24 kwazulu-natal ayachubeka nekwakhiwa kantsi kulungiselelwa indzawo yekwakha lamanye emabhuloho lange-24.
zul: angama-24 amabhuloho akhiwayo njengamanje kwazulu-natali futhi uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokulungiswa kwezizinda okuzokwakhiwa kuzona amanye amabhuloho angama-24.

ssw: emkhakheni wetekuchumana, kuphotfulwa kwendali yamagagasi omoya kuvule lutjalomali lolusha futsi kwafaka tigidzigidzi leti-r14 etimalini tahulumende letingenako.
zul: emkhakheni wezokuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe, ukuphothulwa kwendali yamagagasi omoya obuchwepheshe bezokuxhumana (spectrum) sekuvule amathuba otshalomali olusha futhi sekufake imali eyizigidigidi eziyi-14 zamarandi emgodlagodleni wezimali kahulumeni.

ssw: ekuhambeni kwalomnyaka, sitawutfutsa emakhaya lasele siwafake kunkhomba yamabonakudze yekwedijithali futsi sicedzele kucishwa kwe-analogu.
zul: ngokuqhubeka kwalo nyaka, sizofudusela amakhaya asele kwisiginali kamabonakude wedijithali futhi siphothule nenqubo yokucinywa kwesiginali kamabonakude osakaza nge-analogi.

ssw: loku kutawukhipha magagasi emoya labalulekile kute atosetjentiswa kumanethiwekhi abomakhalekhikhini be-5g futsi kutawunciphisa tindleko tedatha.
zul: lokhu kuzokhulula amagagasi omoya obuchwepheshe bezokuxhumana ayigugu kakhulu ukuze asetshenziselwe ukukhishwa kwamanethiwekhi e-5g omakhalekhukhwini futhi kuzonciphisa izindleko zedatha.

ssw: letento leti titawusisondzeta embonweni wetfu wekufinyelela ku-inthanethi letsengekako, leshesha kakhulu futsi lefinyelelwa nguwonkhewonkhe.
zul: lezi zinyathelo zizosisondeza ekufezekiseni inhlosombono yethu yokufinyelela kwabantu bonke ku-inthanethi engambi eqolo futhi esheshayo.

ssw: ku-sona yemnyaka lophelile, satsi sitawugcilisa imitamo yetfu ekuhlanganiseni emazinga lamakhulu ekutjalwa kwetimali, lokubalulekile ekukhuliseni umnotfo nekwakha ematfuba emisebenti.
zul: ku-sona ngonyaka odlule, sathi sizogxilisa imizamo yethu ekugqugquzeleni amazinga aphakame otshalomali, okuyinto esemqoka ekukhuliseni umnotho nokwakha imisebenzi.

ssw: satsi sitawufaka umfutho emkhankhasweni lesawucala cishe eminyakeni lesihlanu ledlulile wekucoca mathriliyoni langu-r1.2 ekutjalwenimali lolusha.
zul: sathi sizofaka umfutho emkhankasweni esawuqalisa cishe eminyakeni emihlanu edlule wokuthola nokunxenxa utshalomali olusha olungamathriliyoni angu-1.2 amarandi.

ssw: kulomnyaka lophelile, ingcungcutsela yelutjalomali yaseningizimu afrika (i-saic) yesine icoce tigidzigidzi letinge-r367 lokwenta kutsi umgomo wetfu wekutjalwa kwetimali weminyaka lesihlanu ubonakale.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ingqungquthela yesine yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika, (i-saic) yathola izithembiso zotshalomali oluyisamba esiyizigidigidi ezingama-367 zamarandi, okuyinto ewakhuphule kakhulu amathuba okufezekisa umgomo weminyaka emihlanu wotshalomali okuhloswe ukufinyelela kuwona.

ssw: emnyakeni lophelile, letinyenti taletibopho tiholele ekutseni tinkampani letente leto tibopho titjale imali etimbonini letinsha, tikhungo tetincingo, timboni temandla agezi welilanga, tintsambo tekuchumana letihamba ngaphasi kwelwandle, kukhuliswa kwetikhungo tekukhicita kanye nekwemukelwa kwebucwepheshe lobusha.
zul: kulo nyaka odlule, eziningi zalezi zibophezelo ziholele ekutheni izinkampani ezenze lezo zibophezelo zitshale izimali emafemini amasha, izizinda ezamukela izingcingo, izikhungo zikagesi welanga, amakhebuli ezokuxhumana ahamba ngaphansi kolwandle, ukwandiswa kwezizinda zokukhiqiza kanye nokwamukelwa nokusetshenziswa kobuchwepheshe obusha.

ssw: lokubalulekile, lokutjalwa kwetimali kwente kutsi kube khona imisebenti lemisha nematfuba lamasha emabhizinisi lamancane lasacatfuta.
zul: okusemqoka kakhulu, lolu tshalomali seluholele emisebenzini emisha kanye namathuba amasha emabhizinisini amancane asafufusa.

ssw: mhla ti-13 kumbasa kulomnyaka, sitawubamba i-saic yetfu yesihlanu.
zul: ngomhla ziyi-13 kumbasa kulo nyaka, sizobamba i-saic yethu yesihlanu.

ssw: kulengcungcutsela, sitawutibekela umgomo lomusha wekuhlanganisa imali lengetulu kwemathriliyoni la-r2 elutjalwenimali lolusha nga-2028.
zul: kule ngqungquthela, sizozibekela umgomo omusha esihlose ukufinyelela kuwona wokunxenxa utshalomali olusha olungaphezu kwamathriliyoni amabili amarandi ngaphambi kowezi-2028.

ssw: kutjalwa kwetimali lokungene emnotfweni kute kube ngunyalo kube nemtselela ekwenyukeni lokukhulu kwekukhicitwa kwasekhaya.
zul: utshalomali olungenile emnothweni kuze kube manje lulekelelile ekukhuleni kakhulu komsebenzi wokukhiqiza kuleli.

ssw: lokutjalwa kwetimali kukhutsate imitamo yetfu yekutsenga imikhicito leyentiwe kuleli live.
zul: lolu tshalomali selukhuthaze imizamo yethu yokuthenga imikhiqizo eyenziwe kuleli.

ssw: kulomnyaka lophelile, ngetfula i-sona ngigcoke isudu neticatfulo letakhiwe ngekutichenya lapha eningizimu afrika.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngathula i-sona ngigqoke isudu nezicathulo ezithungwe ngokuziqhenya khona lapha eningizimu afrika.

ssw: namuhla kusihlwa, nginatsa emanti ngengilazi leyakhiwe ewadeville ngemphelasontfo leyendlulile basebenti basekatlehong, vosloorus nasegermiston.
zul: kusihlwa nje, ngiphuza amanzi ngengilazi eyenziwe e-wadeville ngeviki eledlule ngabasebenzi abavela e-katlehong, e-vosloorus nase-germiston.

ssw: sekuminyaka leminyenti iningizimu afrika itsenga tingilazi tekunatsa kulamanye emave.
zul: besekuphele iminyaka ngeminyaka iningizimu afrika izithenga emazweni angaphandle izingilazi zokuphuza.

ssw: manje siya ngekuya siwakha lapha ekhaya.
zul: manje uyadlondlobala umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwazo kuleli.

ssw: kodvwa akusito-nje tingilazi kuphela.
zul: kodwa akuzona izingilazi nje kuphela.

ssw: uma uya esibhedlela uyohlindvwa, manengi ematfuba ekutsi utfole umutsi lobulala imiva lowentiwe endzaweni yekukhicita lesezingeni lemhlaba emphumalanga kapa.
zul: uma uya esibhedlela uyohlizwa, makhulu amathuba okuthi uthole izidambisizinhlungu ezenziwe esikhungweni sokukhiqiza esisezingeni lomhlaba esisempumalanga kapa.

ssw: ngesikhatsi sekuvakasha kwami kwembuso e-united kingdom emnyakeni lophelile, ifemu yaseningizimu afrika yatfola ilayisense yekukhicita umutsi lonatfwako wekugomela ikholera kwekucala-ngca lapha eningizimu afrika.
zul: ohambweni lwami olusemthethweni lokuvakashela e-united kingdom ngonyaka odlule, ifemu yaseningizimu afrika yathola ilayisensi yokukhiqiza umgomo wesifo sohudo (ikholera) ophuzwayo okungokokuqala ngqa lapha eningizimu afrika.

ssw: tivumelwano tekuhlanganisa kwemabhizinisi abe yinkhampani leyodvwa tente kutsi phethiloli lowengetiwe utawuhlutwa lapha kuleli kanye nekudla lokwengentiwe lokufanele kutsi kutsengwe kubalimi bakhona lapha kuleli.
zul: izivumelwano zokuhlanganiswa kwamabhizinisi abe yinkampani eyodwa sezihlinzekele ukuthi imikhiqizo kawoyela engeziwe ilungiswe futhi icwengwe kuleli futhi nokudla okuthe xaxa kuthengwe kubalimi bakuleli.

ssw: kulomnyaka lophelile, sitinikele ekuvuleni lutjalomali emkhakheni wetensangu.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sazibophezela ekuvuleni amathuba otshalomali emkhakheni wemikhiqizo yensangu.

ssw: emnyakeni lophelile, sitibophelele ekuvuleni kutjalwa kwetimali emkhakheni wemikhicito yensangu.
zul: siyaqhubeka nomsebenzi wokwakha izimo ezikahle ezizovumela lo mkhakha ukuthi ukhule.

ssw: litiko letekulima, tingucuko kutemhlaba nekutfutfukiswa kwetindzawo tasemaphandleni kanye nelitiko letemphilo lilungisa timo letikhona tekutjalwa kwensangu kute kutsi kuvunyelwe ukulinywa ngaphandle nekucocwa kwesivuno kubalimi bendzabuko.
zul: umnyango wezolimo, izinguquko kwezomhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nomnyango wezempilo izolungisa udaba lwezimo ezikhona njengamanje maqondana nokutshalwa kwensangu ukuze kuvunyelwe ukutshalwa kwayo ngaphandle kwezakhiwo kanye nokuqoqwa kwezivuno kubalimi bendabuko.

ssw: loku kutawuvula emandla lamakhulu kutemnotfo etindzaweni tasemakhaya talelive, ikakhulukati emphumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natal nasempumalanga.
zul: lokhu kuzovula amathuba amakhulukazi omnotho ezindaweni zasemakhaya zakuleli, ikakhulukazi empumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natali nasempumalanga.

ssw: umsebenti lophutfumako uphotfulwa kuye wonkhe hulumende kwakha luhlakamsebenti lwekulawula loluvumela sikhungo sonkhe, tonkhe tindlela letisemtsetfweni temitsi yekusita lesemtsetfweni, kudla, timonyo, kanye nemikhicito yetimboni, lehambisana netivumelwano temave emhlaba kanye netindlela letihamba embili.
zul: uhulumeni uphothula umsebenzi ophuthumayo ukuze kwakhiwe uhlaka lwemithetho elawulayo oluzovumela ukusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo yesihlahla sonke ngokuphelele, nendlela yokusebenza ezovumela imisebenzi evumelekile ukuze isihlahla sisetshenziselwe ukwakha imithi, ukudla, izimonyo, kanye nemikhiqizo yezimboni, ngokuhambisana nezivumelwano zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nezinkambiso ezingungqaphambili.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kuhlelwa kabusha kwetabelomali telitiko kutsi kutfutfukiswe umkhakha nekwesekelwa kwebalimi bendzabuko, labamnyama, kanye nekuhambisana nekuciniswa kwe-saps netingucuko tekulawula.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukwabiwa kabusha kwezabelomali zeminyango ukuze kuthuthukiswe lo mkhakha futhi kwesekwe abalimi bendabuko, abamnyama, futhi kuhanjelaniswe nomsebenzi we-saps wokuphoqelela ukuthotshelwa komthetho nezinguquko zokulawula.

ssw: umnotfo lokhulako kumele nawo ube ngumnotfo lobandzakanya wonkhe umuntfu.
zul: umnotho okhulayo kumele futhi ube ngumnotho obandakanyayo ngokukhulayo.

ssw: ingcungcutsela yabosotimboni labamnyama yekucala ngakholwane wemnyaka lophelile yabonisa imphumelelo yebantfu labamnyama baseningizimu afrika ekukhiciteni kudla, tinsimbi tetimoto, ifenisha, tingubo tekugcoka, insimbi, emakhemikhali kanye nemikhicito yetimayini, kwakha tinkhulungwane letinyenti temisebenti kanye nekwengeta emalini yemkhicizo wetfu wasekhaya.
zul: ingqungquthela yokuqala yosozimboni abamnyama eyabanjwa ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule yabonisa impumelelo yabantu abamnyama baseningizimu afrika ekukhiqizeni ukudla, izingxenye zezimoto, ifenisha, izingubo zokugqoka, insimbi, amakhemikhali kanye nemikhiqizo yezimayini, osekudale izinkulungwane eziningi zemisebenzi futhi kwafaka isandla kwisambamkhiqizo sezwe.

ssw: nyalo sesinabosotimboni labamnyama labacishe babe yi-1 000 labadlala indzima eluhlelweni lwabosotimboni labamnyama.
zul: manje sesinosozimboni abamnyama ababalelwa kwabayi-1 000 ababambe iqhaza ohlelweni losozimboni abamnyama.

ssw: njengesibonelo sebungcweti balabosotimboni kutebuchwepheshe, lomunye walabatfole tindondo kulengcungcutsela yi-astrofica technologies, inkampani leyasungulwa nguwesifazane lomnyama, jessie ndaba, aniketa tisombululo tedatha yekusebenta kwemasathelayithi.
zul: njengesibonelo sekhono lezobuchwepheshe elimangalisayo losozimboni labo, enye inkampani eyahlabana ngendondo kule ngqungquthela yi-astrofica technologies, okuyinkampani eyasungulwa ngokubambisana ngowesifazane omnyama, u-jessie ndaba, ohlinzeka ngezinsiza zedatha yokusetshenziswa kwamasathelayithi.

ssw: sente inchubekelembili emnyakeni lophelile ekuzuzeni emazinga laphakeme ebunikati bebasebenti emnotfweni.
zul: kulo nyaka odlule, senze inqubekela phambili ekufezekiseni amazinga aphakeme obunikazi bomnotho kubantu abamnyama.

ssw: manje sebengetulu kwe-400 000 basebenti labanamasheya emafemini labawasebentelako.
zul: manje sekunabasebenzi abangaphezu kwezi-400 000 abanezabelo emafemini abawasebenzelayo.

ssw: kukhula kanye nekwakhiwa kwematfuba emisebenti emnotfweni wetfu kutawuchutjwa ngemabhizinisi lamancane nalasemkhatsini nendzawo, imifelandzawonye kanye nemabhizinisi langakahleleki.
zul: ukukhula nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi emnothweni wethu kuzoqhutshwa ngamabhizinisi asafufusa, imifelandawonye kanye namabhizinisi angahlelekile.

ssw: emnyakeni lophelile, setfula luhlelo lwekuboleka imali lolwentiwa ngemabhange naletinye tikhungo tetetimali, futsi lolucinisekiswe nguhulumende, lwetinkampani letidzinga imali kute tilulame emiphumeleni lemibi yalolubhubhane.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sethula uhlelo lokubolekisa ngemali kumabhizinisi akhahlamezekile ukuze ashaye ibuya, olulawulwa ngamabhange nezinye izikhungo zezimali, futhi oluqinisekiswe nguhulumeni, ukuze kulekelelwe izinkampani ezidinga ukuxhaswa ngezimali ukuba zivuke kwimithelela yobhubhane.

ssw: litiko letekutfutfukiswa kwemabhizinisi lamancane litawusebentisana nemgcinimafa wavelonkhe mayelana nekutsi loluhlelo lungaciniswa kanjani kute kutsi kusitwe emabhizinisi lamancane nalasacatfuta kanye nemabhizinisi emkhakheni longakahleleki.
zul: umnyango wezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane uzosebenzisana nomgcinimafa kazwelonke maqondana nokuthi luzoqiniswa kanjani lolu hlelo ukuze kulekelelwe amabhizinisi asafufusa kanye namabhizinisi asemkhakheni ongahlelekile.

ssw: kute kutsi kubukwane nensayeya yekweswelakala kwemisebenti kwelusha, sikhutsato semtselo wetekucasha sikhulisiwe kute kutsi kukhutsatwe emabhizinisi kutsi acashe bantfu labasha labanyenti.
zul: ukuze kubhekwane nenselele yokuntuleka kwemisebenzi entsheni, seluliwe isibonelelo-sikhuthazo sentela yokuqasha ngenhloso yokukhuthaza amabhinizinisi ukuthi aqashe abantu abasha abaningi.

ssw: emnyakeni lophelile, ngamemetela kutsi sitawutama kunciphisa imibandzela lematima kute kutsi kususwe live letfu ekuphatfweni ngendlela lengadzingeki levamise kubambelela.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngamemezela ukuthi sihlose ukunciphisa izinqubo zemidanti nemicikilisho eminingi kwinkambiso kahulumeni ukuze kuqedwe ukubambezeleka okungenasidingo ezweni lethu okuvamise ukuvimbela inqubekelaphambili esheshayo.

ssw: litsimba lekunciphisa lemibandzela lebambelelako ehhovisi lamengameli ngaphasi kwamnu.
zul: ithimba lokuncishiswa kwezinkambiso ezibambezelayo elizinze ehhovisi likamongameli eliholwa ngumnu sipho nkosi belilokhu lisebenzisana neminyango ehlukahlukene ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi.

ssw: kutsetse indlela yekusebentisana, isebentisana nematiko nema-ejensi etindzaweni letifana neluhlelo lwemalungelo etimayini, emalayisense ekusebenta kwetekutfutsa tekuvakasha, ema-visa kanye netimvume tekusebenta, kutfutfukiswa kwebantfwana basesebancane kanye nemkhakha longakahleleki.
zul: lokhu kulandele indlela yokusebenza ngokubambisana, ngokuthi kusetshenziswane neminyango kanye nezikhungo zikahulumeni emikhakheni enjengohlelo lwamalungelo okumba ezimayini, amalayisensi abaqhubi bamabhizinisi ezokuthutha kwezokuvakasha, ama-visa nezimvume zokusebenza, ukuthuthukiswa kwezingane ezisencane kanye nomkhakha ongahlelekile.

ssw: kulomnyaka lona, sitawuphotfula tichibelo temtsetfo wetemabhizinisi, wa-1991 (umtsetfo we-71 wa-1991) kute kwehliswe tihibe tekulawula emabhizinisi lamancane, lasemkhatsini nendzawo namancane kakhulu (ema-smme) kanye nemifelandzawonye nekwenta kube lula kubosomabhizinisi kucala emabhizinisi.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizophothula izichibiyelo zomthetho wezamabhizinisi, we-1991 (umthetho wama-71 we-1991) ukuze kuncishiswe izithiyo zokulawula kumabhizinizisi asafufusa (ama-smme) kanye nemifelandawonye futhi kwenziwe lula ukuthi osomabhizinisi basungule amabhizinisi.

ssw: ngekusebentisa i-ejensi yetetimali yemabhizinisi lamancane - sihlela kusita ngetimali letisigidzigidzi le-r1.4 bosomabhizinisi labangetulu kwalaba-90 000. hulumende, ngekubambisana nesikhwama sakwa-sa sme usebentela kusungula sikhwama semali letigidzigidzi le-r10 kute kutsi sisekele kukhula kwema-smme.
zul: ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sokuxhaswa kwamabhizinisi amancane ngezimali – sihlose ukuhlinzeka ngoxhasomali oluyizigidigidi ezingu-1.4 zamarandi kosomabhizinisi abangaphezu kwezi-90 000. uhulumeni, ngokubambisana nesikhwama i-sa sme fund usebenzela ukusungula isikhwama esiyizigidigidi eziyi-10 zamarandi ngenhloso yokweseka ukukhuliswa kwama-smme.

ssw: hulumende ubuka kutsi kungenteka yini ukutsi kube netigidzigidzi le-r2.5 kulesikhwama kanye nemali lesele letigidzigidzi le-r7.5 letawucocwa etinkampanini letitimele.
zul: uhulumeni ubheke ukuthi kunokwenzeka yini ukuthi yena ahlinzeke ngoxhasomali oluyizigidigidi ezi-2.5 zamarandi kulesi sikhwama bese kuthi lena enye imali esele eyizigidigidi eziyisi-7.5 zamarandi itholakale kwabomkhakha ozimele.

ssw: ukuniketwa kwe-postbank ilayisensi kutawukwakha sisekelo sekwakhiwa kwelibhange lembuso lelitawusita ema-smme ngetimali, emabhizinisi laphetfwe lusha nebesifazane kanye nemimango lenganakwa.
zul: ukuhlinzekwa kwe-postbank ngelayisensi kuzobeka isisekelo sokusungulwa kwebhange lombuso elizohlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zezimali kuma-smme, amabhizinisi abantu abasha kanye nawabantu besifazane kanye nemiphakathi engakutholi kahle ukuhlinzekwa ngezinsiza ezifanele.

ssw: lapho libandla lavelonkhe licubungula umtsetfosivivinyo wekuchibela te-postbank, i-postbank ibuyeketa tinsita letiniketako kute kutsi itewukhona emabhange etekuhwebelana letinye tinsita letingasetjentiswa lengabiti kakhulu.
zul: njengoba isigungu sikazwelonke sicubungula isichibiyelo somthethosivivinywa weze-postbank, i-postbank ibuyekeza izinsizakalo ezihlinzekayo ukuze ikwazi ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo ezingasebenziseka ngempumelelo futhi ezingambi eqolo ezingasetshenziswa ngabantu esikhundleni sokusebenzisa amabhange ajwayelekile.

ssw: indlela lephumelela kakhulu futsi lesimeme yekwakha umnotfo kuhlomisa bantfu ngemakhono nelwati lwekuwuchuba.
zul: indlela esebenza kahle kakhulu futhi engasebenziseka ngempumelelo isikhathi eside yokwakha umnotho wukucija abantu ngamakhono kanye nolwazi lokuthi bangawuqhuba kanjani.

ssw: ngako-ke besisebentela kucinisa kuchumana emkhatsini kwemakhono lesiwatfutfukisako nemakhono ladzingwa yindzawo yekusebenta.
zul: ngakho-ke besisebenza ngenhloso yokuqinisa ukuxhumana phakathi kwamakhono esiwathuthukisayo kanye namakhono adingwa ngabaqashi endaweni yokusebenzela.

ssw: kulomnyaka, sikhwama savelonkhe semakhono sitawukhipha tigidzi letinge-r800 tetfutfukisa emakhono emkhakheni wedijithali nebuchwepheshe ngekusebentisa imodeli lensha lechumanisa kukhokhelwa kwekuceceshwa nemiphumela yekucashwa.
zul: kulo nyaka, isikhwama sikazweloke samakhono sizohlinzeka ngemali eyizigidi ezingama-800 zamarandi yokuthuthukisa amakhono emkhakheni wezedijithali nowezobuchwepheshe ngokusebenzisa uhlelo olunobuhlakani bokusebenzisa amaqhingasu amasha oluxhumanisa inkokhelo yokuqeqeshwa kanye nemiphumela yokuqashwa.

ssw: sigcizelela simemo setfu etinkampanini, ematikweni kanye nakuma-soe kutsi asuse sidzingo sesipiliyoni semsebenti elusheni lolufuna tikhundla tesigaba sekungena.
zul: sigcizelela kwikhwelo lethu elibhekiswe ezinkampanini, iminyango kanye nama-soe lokuthi basuse isidingo sokuthi abantu abasha kumele babe nesipiliyoni somsebenzi uma befuna ukuqashwa emisebenzini esesigabeni sokuqala.

ssw: emnyakeni lophelile, satsi sitawucasha bafundzi basemakolishi etemfundvo yetebuciko nekucecesha (ema-tvet) labangetulu kwalaba-10 000. sesilendlulile lelo nani futsi nyalo sesitibekele umgomo wemnyaka we-2023 webafundzi basema-tvet laba-20 000 labatawucashwa.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sathi sizofaka emsebenzini abafundi abangaphezu kwezi-10 000 abaphothule izifundo zabo emakolishi ezobuchwepheshe namakhono ezandla nokuqeqeshwa (ama-tvet).

ssw: lelinani letitjudeni letingenela kuceceshelwa imisebenti yetandla emakolishi e-tvet litawenyuka lisuke ku-17 000 liye ku-30 000 ngemnyaka wekufundza we-2023.
zul: sidlulile kuleli nani futhi manje sesizibekele inani esifuna ukufinyelela kulona ngowezi-2023 labafundi abaphothule kuma-tvet abayizi-20 000. inani labafundi abangenela ukuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wobungcweti bamakhono ezandla emakolishi angama-tvet lizokhushulwa lisuka kubafundi abayizi-17 000 liyofinyelela kubafundi abayizi-30 000 ngonyaka wemfundo wezi-2023.

ssw: lenye yetinto letibalulekile ekukhuleni komnotfo kanye nasekuncintisaneni likhono lekuheha emakhono ladzingwa ngumnotfo.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka kakhulu ekukhulisweni komnotho nokuzibeka ethubeni lokuncintisana kahle yikhono lokuheha amakhono adingwa ngumnotho.

ssw: ngemuva kwekuphotfula kubuyeketwa lokuphelele kweluhlelo lwe-visa yemsebenti, sitawuhamba ngekushesha kute sisebentise tincomo letibekwe embili.
zul: njengoba sesiwuphothulile umsebenzi obanzi wokubuyekezwa kohlelo lwama-visa omsebenzi, sizoqhubeka ngokushesha ukuqalisa ukusebenza kwezincomo eziphakanyisiwe.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kusungula luhlelo lolusime emaphuzwini lavumelana netimo kute kutsi kuhehwe bantfu bekufika labanemakhono, kusebentisa luhlelo lwemcashi lotsenjwako kwenta inchubo ye-visa ibe lula kubatjalitimali labakhulu kanye nekwenta lula tidzingo tekufaka ticelo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukusungulwa kohlelo olusekelwe phezu kwamaphuzu oluguqulekayo ukuze luhambelane nezimo ezihlukahlukene ukuze kuhehwe abantu bakwamanye amazwe abanamakhono, kuqaliswe uhlelo lwabaqashi abathembakele ukuze kwenziwe inqubo ye-visa ibe lula kubatshalimali abakhulu futhi kuhanjelaniswe ngendlela efanele izidingo zokufakwa kwezicelo.

ssw: sitawuphindze futsi setfule i-visa yesisebentibucalu kanye nesikhatsi lesikhetsekile sekucalisa kukhula lokuphakeme.
zul: sizokwethula futhi ne-visa yabasebenzi abazosebenza bekude nendawo yokusebenzela futhi kube nohlelo olukhethekile lokubhekelela ukusungulwa kwamabhizinisi amasha anamandla nekhono lokukhula ngesivinini futhi anwebeke ngokushesha.

ssw: ngesikhatsi luhlelo lwetingucuko luchubeka, sitawuchubeka nekwesekela kucashwa kwemmango kanye netenhlalakahle kute sinikete umsebenti kulabo labawudzingako.
zul: ngenkathi kuqhubeka uhlelo lwezinguquko, sizoqhubeka nokweseka ukuqashwa kwabantu kuhulumeni nasemphakathini ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngomsebenzi kulabo abawudingayo.

ssw: emnyakeni lowendlulile, sakhuluma ngekubaluleka kwesikhutsato setekucashwa selihhovisi lamengameli ekusiteni ngematfuba emsebenti nekutiphilisa.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sakhuluma ngosizo lohlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuqashwa kwabantu ekuhlinzekeni ngamathuba omsebenzi nawokuziphilisa.

ssw: loluhlelo selwakhe ematfuba langetulu kwesigidzi, lufinyelela kuto tonkhe tifundza netigodzi talelive letfu.
zul: manje lolu hlelo seludale amathuba angaphezu kwesigidi esisodwa, futhi selufinyelele kuzo zonke izifundazwe nezifunda ezweni lethu.

ssw: kuleliviki leliphelile, litsimba lelisha lebasiti betikolwa laba-150 000 licale kusebenta etikolweni letingetulu kwaleti-22 000, liniketa sitfunti, litsemba kanye nelwati lolubalulekile lwemsebenti elusheni lolungasebenti.
zul: ngeviki eledlule, iqembu elisha labasebenzi abangabasizi ezikoleni abayizi-150 000 liqalile ukusebenza ezikoleni ezingaphezulu kwezi-22 000, okuyinto ehlinzeke ngesithunzi, ithemba kanye nesipiliyoni somsebenzi esibaluleke kakhulu kubantu abasha abebengasebenzi.

ssw: sikhwama setekucashwa setenhlalakahle siheha bahlanganyeli laba-50 000 esigabeni saso lesilandzelako kutsi bente umsebenti kutekutsi wonkhe umuntfu atfole kuhlomula, kantsi futsi neluphiko lwelusha lwavelonkhe loluvuselelwe lutawakha lamanye ematfuba la-36 000 ngetinhlangano letingenti izunzo kanye netinhlangano letitinte emimangweni.
zul: isikhwama sokusiza abangasebenzi emphakathini sizoqasha abanye ababambiqhaza abayizi-50 000 esigabeni saso esilandelayo abazokwenza umsebenzi ozohlomulisa umphakathi wonkana, kanti futhi uhlelo lukazwelonke lwemisebenzi yentsha luzokwakha amanye amathuba angeziwe ayizi-36 000 ngokusebenzisa izinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo kanye nezinhlangano ezisebenzela ngaphakathi emiphakathini.

ssw: litiko letasekhaya likhetse litsimba lekucala lebantfu labasha labangasebenti laba-10 000 kutsi bafake kudijithali emarekhodi emmango lasephepheni langetulu kwetigidzi letinge-340.
zul: umnyango wezasekhaya usuqashe iqembu lokuqala labantu abasha abangasebenzi abayizi-10 000 abazosusa imininingwane yabantu engaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-340 egcinwe emaphepheni bayifake kumakhompyutha.

ssw: nyalo kunebasebentisi labangetulu kwetigidzi letintsatfu lababhaliswe ku-sayouth.
zul: manje sebengaphezu kwezigidi ezintathu abasebenzisi ababhalisiwe ku-sayouth.

ssw: mobi, inkhundla ye-inthanethi leyentelwe lusha laseningizimu afrika kutsi lufinyelele kumatfuba ekufundza nekuhola.
zul: mobi, okuyinkundla ye-inthanethi okungenwa kuyona mahhala eyenzelwe abantu abasha baseningizimu afrika ukuze bakwazi ukufinyelela emathubeni okufunda kanye nokuzitholela imali.

ssw: loku kwentiwe ngekubambisana ne-ejensi yavelonkhe yetekutfutfukiswa kwelusha (i-nyda), lesachubeka nekuniketa lusito lolubalulekile bosomabhizinisi labasesebasha nalabafuna imisebenti.
zul: lokhu kwenziwe ngokubambisana kanye nokusebenzisana kakhulu nesikhungo sikazwelonke sokuthuthukiswa kwentsha (i-nyda), okuyisikhungo esiqhubekayo nokuhlinzeka ngosizo olukhulu kubantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi kanye nabantu abafuna umsebenzi.

ssw: ngiyishayela lihlombe i-nyda ngendlela lesita ngayo lusha kutsi lutfole umsebenti.
zul: ngiyishayela ihlombe ngempela i-nyda ngendlela elekelela ngayo intsha ukuthi ithole umsebenzi.

ssw: sikhutsato selihhovisi lamengameli naso sesekela bantfu kutsi batiphilise.
zul: uhlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuqashwa kwabantu nalo futhi luyabeseka abantu ukuze bakwazi ukuziphilisa.

ssw: babalelwa ku-140 000 balimi labasakhasa sebawatfolile emavawusha ekuthenga tinhlanyelo, manyolo kanye netinsitakusebenta, lokwesekela kutfolakala kwekudla kanye netingucuko kutekulima.
zul: abalimi abancane abayizi-140 000 bathole amavawusha ezolimo okuthenga imbewu, umanyolo kanye namathuluzi, okuyinto esikhuthaze ukutholakala kokudla okwanele kanye nezinguquko kwezolimo.

ssw: lomtamo lona sewuholele ekulinyweni kwemhlaba longemahektha la-640 000. silinganiso se-68% salabalimi bantfu besifazane.
zul: lesi sinyathelo sesiholele ekulinyweni komhlaba ongamahektha ayizi-640 000. okuhlaba umxhwele kulokhu wukuthi ama-68% kulaba balimi ngabantu besifazane.

ssw: kulomnyaka, sihlose kusita balimi labasacatfuta ngemavawusha lange-250 000. leti tibonelo temehluko hulumende langawenta etimphilweni tebantfu ngekusungula tintfo letinsha, buhlakani kanye nekutinikela.
zul: kulo nyaka, sihlose ukuhlinzeka ngamavawusha angeziwe ayizi-250 000 kubalimi abancane.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika, kukhuphuka kwetindleko tekuphila kukhulisa buphuya nekungalingani.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, izindleko zokuphila ezikhulayo zenza sibe sibi kakhulu isimo sobubha kanye nokungalingani.

ssw: tigidzi tebantfu baseningizimu afrika abakwati kutondla bona ngekwabo kanye nemindeni yabo.
zul: abantu baseningizimu afrika abayizigidi ngezigidi abakwazi ukuzondla futhi bondle nemindeni yabo.

ssw: kukhona mama lote babe wakakhe e-alex, ukhatsatekile ngekutsi utawuphila kanjani njengoba tindleko temmbila netekisi tiloku tiyakhuphuka.
zul: kunomama ozikhulisela abantwana bakhe ngayedwana e-alex, okhathazekile ukuthi uzothathani ahlanganise nani ukuze ondle umndeni wakhe njengoba intengo yommbila kanye nemali yokugibela amatekisi kulokhu kuqhubeke njalo nokukhuphuka.

ssw: kunemsebenti losebenta efekthri egqeberha lasabukene nelikusasa lelingakaciniseki njengoba cimicimi wagezi wenta kutsi kumiswe umsebenti wekukhicita.
zul: kunesisebenzi sefemu e-gqeberha manje esesibhekene nekusasa elingacacile neze kahle njengoba ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kuwumisa nse umsebenzi wokukhiqiza.

ssw: kungumsebenti wembuso kusita ngelizingancane lekuvikeleka lapho khona kute umuntfu waseningizimu afrika lotaweswela.
zul: kungumsebenzi wombuso ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikeleka okuyisisekelo lapho kungafanele neze ukuthi kube khona noyedwa umuntu waseningizimu afrika ozithola eyisisulu.

ssw: njenganyalo-nje lapha eveni lakitsi, kunebantfu labangetulu kwetigidzi letinge-25 labatfola luhlobo lolutsite lwekusitwa ngemali.
zul: njengamanje ezweni lethu, kunabantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-25 abathola uhlobo oluthile losizo lwesibonelelo-mali.

ssw: ngetulu kwaloko, cishe imindeni lephuyile lelinganiselwa etigidzini letimbili itfola emanti mahhala, gezi wamahhala kanye nekutfutfwa kwenkhukhuma.
zul: ngaphezu kwalokhu, kunamakhaya adla imbuya ngothi abalelwa ezigidini ezimbili athola izinsiza eziyisisekelo zamahhala zokuphakelwa ngamanzi, ugesi kanye nokuthuthelwa imfucuza.

ssw: cishe e-60% wesabelomali setfu sisetjentiselwa loko lokwentiwa ngekutsi tibonelelo tahulumende, tisita ngetindlela letehlukahlukene tekwesekela, tinsita letisisekelo kanye nelusito emakhaya nakubantfu ngabanye kute kuliwe nebuphuya nendlela yokutiphilisa.
zul: cishe ama-60% esabelomali sethu asetshenziselwa lokho okubizwa ngezibonelelo zikahulumeni, ezihlinzeka ngezinhlobo ezihlukahlukene zosizo, izinsizakalo eziyisisekelo kanye nosizo oluqondiswe emakhaya kanye nomuntu ngamunye ngenhloso yokulwisana nobubha nokuxosha indlala.

ssw: ngekwesekela lomsebenti kanye nekubukana nekukhuphuka kwetindleko tekuphila, sitawuchubeka nesibonelelomali sekusita bantfu labangasebenti (i-srd), kwanyalo lufinyelela kubantfu lababalelwa etigidzini leti-7.8.
zul: ngenhloso yokweseka lo msebenzi kanye nokulekelela abantu ezindlekweni zokuphila ezilokhu zikhuphuke njalo, sizoqhubeka nokukhipha isibonelelo senhlalo sabangasebenzi (i-srd), njengamanje esifinyelela kubantu ababalelwa ezigidini eziyi-7.8.

ssw: sitawucinisekisa kutsi tibonelelo tahulumende letikhona tiyakhuphuka kute kuvikelwe labaphuyile ekukhuphukeni kwekwehla kwamandla emali.
zul: sizoqinisekisa ukuthi ziyakhushulwa izibonelelo zikahulumeni ezikhona njengamanje ukuze sinciphise ukukhahlamezeka kwabantu abampofu ngenxa yokwehla kwamandla emali okudlondlobalayo.

ssw: loku kutawubekwa kusabelomali lesitawentiwa yindvuna yetetimali.
zul: imininingwane yalokhu izohlinzekwa kwisabelomali ngungqongqoshe wezezimali.

ssw: uyachubeka umsebenti wokutfutfukisa indlela yekwesekela isibonelelomali lesiyisisekelo kulabo labasengotini lenkhulu, ngaphasi kwetinkinga tetfu tetimali.
zul: uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kohlelo lwesibonelelomali esiyisisekelo esiqondiswe kuphela kulabo bantu abadinga ukubhekelelwa kakhulu abadla imbuya ngothi, uma isimo sezimali sikuvumela lokhu ngoba phela umgodlagodla kahulumeni unezidingo eziningi kanti imali ekhona incane.

ssw: loku kutawukwakhela ngetulu kwekucanjwa kwalokusha lokwetfulwe ngesibonelelo se-srd, lokufaka ekhatsi kuchumanisa imininingwane lesinayo kuhulumende wonkhe kute kutsi sicinisekise kutsi sifinyelela kubo bonkhe labo abadzinga lusito.
zul: lokhu kuzokwakhela phezu kweqhingasu elisha lokusebenza esilithulile ngokusebenzisa isibonelelo se-srd, kubandakanya ukuxhunyaniswa kwemininingo esinayo kuhulumeni wonkana ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi siyafinyelela kubo bonke labo abantulayo.

ssw: litiko lavelonkhe letetimali licubungula kwenteka kwetinyatselo letiphutfumako tekunciphisa umtselela wacimicimi wagezi emananini ekudla.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke wenza izinhlelo zokucubungula ukuthi kungalunga yini uma eqhamuka nezinyathelo eziphuthumayo zokunciphisa umthelela wokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga emananini okudla.

ssw: kulomnyaka, sitawutsatsa tinyatselo tekuvula linani lelikhulu lemakhaya laphuyile ngekusheshisa kusitwa ngematayitela etindlu tesibonelelo.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizothatha izinyathelo zokulekelela kakhulu amakhaya ampofu ngokuthi sisheshise ukuhlinzekwa kwamatayitela ezindlu zomxhaso.

ssw: kusalela emuva ekucubunguleni ematayitela etindlu letingetulu kwesigidzi, lokulinani lelilinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi lenge-r242 temphahla lokufanele ibe setandleni temakhaya laphuye kakhulu eningizimu afrika.
zul: njengamanje ukusalela emuva kwenqubo yokukhishwa kwamatayitela kungaphezu kwezindlu eziyisigidi esisodwa, okuyinani lempahla elinganiselwa kwizigidigidi ezingama-242 zamarandi okufanele ngabe isezandleni zamakhaya ampofu kakhulu aseningizimu afrika.

ssw: ngeke sigcile kuphela ekucedzeni lokusalela emuva, kodvwa nasekwenteni luhlelo lwematayitela kutsi lusebente kakhudlwana futsi lufinyeleleke kalula.
zul: asizogxila nje kuphela ekuqedeni lokhu kusalela emuva, kodwa futhi sizogxila nasekwenzeni uhlelo lwamatayitela lusebenze ngendlela efanele futhi lufinyeleleke kalula.

ssw: njengoba sangena ku-sona emnyakeni lophelile, litiko letemisebenti yahulumende nesakhiwonchanti sewuphotfulile kundluliselwa kwemhlaba wahulumende longamahektha la-14 000 kute kube netindlu.
zul: njengoba sazibophezela ku-sona ngonyaka odlule, umnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi nengqalasizinda usukuphothulile ukudluliswa kwamahektha omhlaba wombuso ayizi-14 000 ukuze kwakhiwe kuwona izindlu.

ssw: kufinyelela kulizinga lelingulonalona letemfundvo kwawonkhewonkhe kulithulusi lelinemandla kakhulu lesinalo lekucedza buphuya.
zul: ukufinyelela kwabo bonke abantu kwimfundo eseqophelweni eliphezulu yilona thuluzi elinamandla kakhulu esinalo lokuqeda ububha.

ssw: kudzingeka sicale ngebantfwana labasesebancane kakhulu, sibanike sisekelo lesisidzingako kute bakwati kubhala nekufundza bavisise, bafundzele kutfola lwati futsi batfutfuke.
