zul: kumele siqale ngezingane ezisencane kakhulu, sizihlinzeke ngesisekelo ezisidingayo ukuze zikwazi ukuyiqonda kahle into eziyibhalayo neziyifundayo, ukuze zikwazi ukufunda futhi zithuthuke.

ssw: ngako-ke, kubalulekile kutsi linani lebantfwana labatfola selekelelo seluhlelo lwekutfutfukiswa kwebantfwana basesebancane (lwe-ecd) seliphindzeke ngetulu kwalokubili emkhatsini wa-2019 na-2022, lifinyelele esigidzini nesigamu sebantfwana.
zul: ngakho-ke, kuyinto esemqoka ukuthi inani lezingane ezithola umxhaso ohlelweni lokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane (i-ecd) selifinyelele ngaphezu kokuphindaphindwe kabili phakathi kowezi-2019 nowezi-2022, njengoba selifinyelele ezinganeni eziyisigidi nesigamu.

ssw: litiko letemfundvo lesisekelo lihlela kahle tidzingo tetikhungo te-ecd kute kutsi titfole futsi tente tinkhulungwane ngetinkhulungwane letengetiwe titfole selekelelo kuhulumende.
zul: umnyango wezemfundo eyisisekelo uhlela kabusha izidingo zezikhungo ze-ecd ukuze zikwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa futhi ukuze ezinye eziyizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zithole imixhaso evela kuhulumeni.

ssw: nanoma ngakolunye luhlangotsi loluhambo lwemfundvo lesisekelo, kufanele sishayele lihlombe lizinga lekuphasa lakamatikuletjeni lalomnyaka lophelile le-80%, ngoba tonkhe tifundza tikhombisa imiphumela lencono.
zul: futhi ngakolunye uhlangothi lohambo lwemfundo eyisisekelo, kumele silishayele ihlombe izinga lokuphumelela kwabafundi bakamatikuletsheni ngonyaka odlule elingama-80%, njengoba futhi zonke izifundazwe zibonise imiphumela engcono kunaleyo eziyithole ngaphambilini.

ssw: loku kukhuphuka kwesuka ku-76% emnyaka lowendvulela lona.
zul: leli zinga likhuphukile lisuka kuma-76% ngonyaka owandulela lona odlule.

ssw: lelinani lebafundi labaphase ngelizinga le-bachelor etikolweni letingakhokhisi libe ncono lisuke ku-55% nga-2019 laya ku-64% nga-2022.
zul: inani labafundi abaphumelele ngokwezinga elibavumelayo ukuthi benze iziqu ze-bachelor abavela ezikoleni ezingayikhokhisi imali yokufunda likhuphukile lisuka kuma-55% ngowezi-2019 layofinyelela kuma-64% ngowezi-2022.

ssw: loku kusho kutsi kusebenta kwebafundi labavela etikolweni letiphuyile kuya ngekuya kuyatfutfuka, lokucinisekisa kubaluleka kwekwesekelwa nguhulumende ngaloko labasita ngako.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi ukuphumelela kwabafundi abavela ezikoleni ezimpofu kulokhu kukhuphuke njalo, okuyinto ebonisa ngokusobala ukubaluleka kosizo nokwesekwa okuhlinzekwa nguhulumeni kulezo zikole.

ssw: lokuvetwa ngulemiphumela kutsi kunengucuko letsite leyenteka etikolweni.
zul: okuboniswa yile miphumela wukuthi kunoguquko olunohlonze olwenzeka buthule ezikoleni zethu.

ssw: tikolwa tifanele kutsi tibe yindzawo lephephile futsi levumela kufundzisa nekufundza ngemphumelelo.
zul: izikole kumele zibe yindawo ephephile futhi zivumele ukufunda nokufundisa ngempumelelo.

ssw: umklamo i-sanitation appropriate for education initiative - lowatiwa ngekutsi yi-safe - kanye ne-accelerated school infrastructure delivery initiative yakhe tindlu zangasese letifanele letinge-55 000 ngetinsita letivela embonini yahulumende naletimele.
zul: uhlelo lwenhlanzeko kwezemfundo i-sanitation appropriate for education initiative – olwaziwa nge-safe – ngokuhlanganyela nohlelo lokusheshiswa kokwakhiwa nokuhlinzekwa kwengqalasizinda yezikole selwakhe izindlu zangasese ezisezingeni elikahle eziyizi-55 000 ngokusebenzisa izinsiza ezivela emkhakheni kahulumeni kanye nasemkhakheni ozimele.

ssw: kute sikhicite emakhono ladzingwa ngulelive lakitsi, sandzisa tinhlelo tetemfundvo nekuceceshwa ngendlela yekufezekisa ikharikhulamu levunyiwe yemodeli lemkhakha mitsatfu.
zul: ukuze kukhiqizwe amakhono adingwa yizwe lethu, siyalukhulisa uhlelo lwamakhono ezandla nokuqeqeshwa ngokuthi siqalise ukusebenza kwekharikhulamu egunyaziwe yohlelo lwemigudu yemfundo olumikhakha-mithathu.

ssw: kulomnyaka, hulumende uhlela kuphotfula luhlelo lolukhulu lwekusita ngetimali bafundzi betemfundvo lephakeme, ikakhulukati bafundzi labawela ngaphandle kwenchubo yanyalo kusikimu savelonkhe sekusita titjudeni ngetimali.
zul: kulo nyaka, uhulumeni uhlela ukuphothula uhlelo olubanzi lokuxhaswa kwabafundi ngezimali oluqondiswe emkhakheni wezemfundo ephakeme, ikakhulukazi kubafundi abavaleleke ngaphandle ngenxa yemigomo yokufaneleka yohlelo lukazwelonke lokuxhaswa kwabafundi ngezimali.

ssw: kufinyelela kulabo labatiwa ngekutsi ngema- ‘missing middle’.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukufinyelela kulabo bafundi abangondingasithebeni abaziwa ngokuthi yi-‘missing middle’.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile, bugebengu lobunebudlova buhlukumeta wonkhe umuntfu waseningizimu afrika.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, ubugebengu obunodlame sebukhahlameze wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika.

ssw: imimango kulo lonkhe lelive lakitsi iphila ngekwesabela kuphepha kwemindeni yayo.
zul: imiphakathi ezweni lonke ihleli lubhojozi isabela ukuphepha kwemindeni yawo.

ssw: simo lesinjena asikwati kutsi singachubeka.
zul: asikwazi neze ukuvumela lesi simo siqhubeke.

ssw: sicinisa i-saps kute kutsi sivikele bugebengu kanye nekwenta kancono emandla eluphiko lwavelonkhe lwetekushushisa (i-npa) kanye netinkantolo kute kucinisekiswe kutsi babhebhetseli balokubi babukana nekujeziswa.
zul: siqinisa i-saps ukuvimbela ubugebengu futhi senza ngcono amandla ophiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa (i-npa) kanye nezinkantolo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abenzi bobubi babhekana nengalo yomthetho.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kubekwa kwemaphoyisa lamanengi emigwacweni nekusungula ematsimba lakhetsekile latawugcila etihlotjeni letitsite tebugebengu.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukukhuliswa kwesibalo samaphoyisa emigwaqeni kanye nokusungula amathimba akhethekile azogxila kwizinhlobo ezithile zamacala.

ssw: kulomnyaka lophelile, sahlwaya emaphoyisa la-12 000. kusukela lapho, bangetulu kwe-10 000 bantfu labasha labatfweswe ticu etikhungweni temaphoyisa kanye nalabanye.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sanquma ukuqasha amaphoyisa amasha ayizi-12 000. kusukela lapho, angaphezu kwezi-10 000 amaphoyisa amasha aphothule ukuqeqeshwa kwawo ezikhungweni zokuqeqesha amaphoyisa futhi kunamanye ayizi-10 000 azoqashwa bese eqeqeshwa kulo nyaka.

ssw: laba-10 000 batawucashwa futsi baceceshwe kulomnyaka.
zul: amathimba amaphoyisa akhethekile abhekene ngqo namacala okuthumba, ukuphanga kanye nokumbiwa kwezimbiwa ngokungemthetho asezuze impumelelo emacaleni amaningi, lapho ebophe khona amashumi ngamashumi abasolwa futhi baningi kulaba abalahlwe ngamacala.

ssw: litsimba lemaphoyisa lelikhetsekile lelisebentela kulwa nebugebengu lobufana nekutfumba, kuphanga kanye nekumba timayini letingekho emtsetfweni libe netimphumelelo letinyenti, labopha basolwa labanyenti kanye nabanyentana labalahlwe ngemacala.
zul: kuthathwa izinyathelo ezinqala ukubhekana namacala okucekelwa phansi komnotho ngamabomu kanye namanye amacala ahlobene nalokho, okungamacala adala umonakalo omkhulukazi emnothweni.

ssw: kutsatfwa tinyatselo leticinile tekubukana nekwentelwa phasi kwemnotfo kanye nebugebengu lobuhlobene naloko lobudzala umonakalo lomkhulu emnotfweni.
zul: amathimba akhethekile amikhakha-miningi okuvikela ingqalasizinda yezomnotho manje enza umsebenzi wawo ezindaweni ezingama-20 ezihlonziwe eziyizizinda zobugebengu.

ssw: ematsimba ekusebenta esakhiwonchanti setemnotfo lesimikhakhamnyenti nyalo asasebenta etindzaweni letinge-20 letikhonjwe njengaletihamba embili.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngatshela izwe ngomonakalo omkhulukazi odalwa wukwebiwa kwamakhebuli ethusi nensimbi ohlelweni lwethu lukagesi, izintambo zojantshi bezitimela kanye nenye ingqalasizinda yomphakathi.

ssw: kulomnyaka lophelile, ngaphawula ngemonakalo lomkhulu lodzalwe kwebiwa kwentsambo yelitfusi nensimbi eluhlelweni lwetfu lwagezi, tintsambo tesitimela kanye naletinye takhiwonchanti temmango.
zul: kusukela lapho, amaphoyisa aphezu kwawo amasela amakhebuli.

ssw: kusukela lapho, emaphoyisa acinise sandla ekuntjontjweni kwemakhebuli.
zul: ngozibandlela, uhulumeni wethule ukumiswa okwesikhashana kokuthunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kwamakhebuli ethusi asesetshenzisiwe kanye nezinsimbi ezithile ezingamasekeni ukuze kunqandwe amaqembu ezigelekeqe futhi kuvunyelwe ukuqaliswa kohlelo olusha lokuhweba.

ssw: ngengongoni, hulumende wetfule kuvinjelwa kwesikhashana kwekutfunyelwa kulamanye emave kwekhebuli lelitfusi lelilahliwe kanye netinsimbi letitsite kute kutsi kuphatamiseke tigungu tebugebengu futsi kwentiwe luhlelo lolusha lwetekuhwebelana.
zul: njengoba sesiqalise izinguquko zomnotho kwezikagesi, amanzi, ukuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe kanye nokuthuthwa kwempahla ngokusebenzisa umkhankaso i-operation vulindlela, ngakolunye uhlangothi siqalisa inqubo yezinguquko yokuphucula impumelelo yempi yethu yokulwisana nobugebengu.

ssw: njengoba sesicale tingucuko kutemnotfo temandla agezi, emanti, tekuchumana kanye netekuhlela ngeluhlelo lwe-operation vulindlela, sicala inchubo yekugucula kute sitfutfukise kusebenta ngemphumelelo kwemphi yetfu yekulwa nebugebengu.
zul: sizosebenzisa ikhono lethu lokwenza ngobunyoninco futhi ngendlela engambi eqolo umsebenzi wezizinda ezamukela izingcingo ukuze sisekele ukusebenza ngendlela efanele kwenombono yosizo i-10111, ngokubambisana nabomkhakha ozimele.

ssw: sitawusebentisa kuncintisana kwetfu emisebentini yesikhungo setincingo kute sisekele kusebenta kahle kwelucingo lwekusita lwa-10111, ngekubambisana netinkampani letitimele.
zul: lokhu kwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uma abantu befonela amaphoyisa, ziyaphendulwa izingcingo zabo futhi izimo eziphuthumayo ababhekene nazo zithathelwa izinyathelo.

ssw: loku kwentelwa kutsi uma bantfu bashayela emaphoyisa, tincingo tabo tiyaphendvulwa kanye netimo letiphutfumako tinakwe.
zul: futhi sizosebenzisa ngobuhlakani obukhulu izindlela ezisekelwe kakhulu kwimininingo yolwazi olutholakele ukuhlonza kanye nokugxila ngokuqondileyo ezidlekeni zobugebengu.

ssw: sitawusebentisa tindlela letisebentisa imininingwane ngendlela lemankimbonkimbo kutfola nekucondza-ngco tindzawo letihamba embili ngekuba nebugebengu.
zul: okusemqoka kakhulu, amaphoyisa, i-npa kanye nophiko oluphenya amacala akhethekile kuzokwabelwa imali engeziwe kulesi sabelomali.

ssw: lokubalulekile kutsi imali leyengetiwe itawutfolakala kulesabelomali semaphoyisa, i-npa kanye neluphiko lwekuphenya lolukhetsekile.
zul: amacala abhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane asalokhu eyinto ekhathazayo kakhulu empilweni yesizwe sethu.

ssw: ngelweti kulomnyaka lophelile, saba nengcungcutsela yelihhovisi lamongameli yesibili ye-gbvf kute sihlole inchubekelembili ekucalisweni kweluhlelo lwavelonkhe lwelisubuciko, lolwamukele njengendlela lebanti, lephumelelako nalehlangene yekubukana nalolubhubhane.
zul: ngolwezi ngonyaka odlule, sabamba ingqungquthela kamongameli yesibili ye-gbvf ngenhloso yokuhlola inqubekela phambili esiyenziwe ekuqaliseni uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke, eyamukela ngokusemthethweni uhlelo olubanzi, olusebenza kahle futhi olunokubumbana lokulwisana nalolu bhubhane.

ssw: lenye yetimphumelelo lenkhulu yemtamo wetfu wekulwa ne-gbv lizinga lababambisene ngalo betenhlalakahle labaye bahlanganyela ngalo kute basekele loluhlelo lavelonkhe lelisubuciko.
zul: enye yezimpumelelo ezinkulukazi zomzamo wethu wokulwisana ne-gbv yindlela abalwamukele futhi balweseka ngayo uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke labo esibambisene nabo emphakathini.

ssw: ngabhimbidvwane kulomnyaka lophelile, ngasayina kwaba ngumtsetfo tincenye letintsatfu letibalulekile temtsetfo letiniketa kuvikeleka lokwengetiwe kwalabalulama ku-gbv futsi ngicinisekise kutsi benti balobubi abasakwati kusebentisa tintfunja temtsetfo kute babalekele kushushiswa.
zul: ngomasingana ngonyaka odlule, ngasayina imithethosivivinywa emithathu esemqoka ukuze ibe yimithetho ezonikeza ukuvikeleka okuthe xaxa kulabo abasinde ku-gbv futhi eqinisekisayo ukuthi abenzi bobubi ngeke besakwazi ukusebenzisa amaqhinga athile awumphumela wobuthakathaka bomthetho ukuze bagweme ukushushiswa.

ssw: siyachubeka nekwenta ncono kufinyeleleka kanye nekusebenta kwetinkantolo temacala etemacasi futsi sikhulise inani letikhungo tema-thuthuzela care centres.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwenza ngcono ukufinyeleleka kanye nokusebenza kwezinkantolo zamacala ezocansi kanye nokwandisa izikhungo zokunakekela, phecelezi, ama-thuthuzela care centres.

ssw: luhlangotsi lolukhulu lwaloluhlelo lwavelonkhe lelisubuciko kufukulwa kwabesifazane ngekwemnotfo.
zul: into esemqoka kakhulu ohlelweni lweqhingasu likazwelonke wukufukulwa nokuhlonyiswa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho.

ssw: kusukela samemetela kutimisela kwetfu kucondisa lokungenani ema-40% wekutsengwa kwemphahla yemmango emabhizinisini laphethwe besifazane, sitame kusungula indzawo levumako yekwesekela bosomabhizinisi besifazane.
zul: kusukela ngamemezela ukuzimisela kwethu ukuthi okungenani ama-40% empahla nezinsizakalo ezithengwa nguhulumeni kumele kuthengwe emabhizinisini abesifazane, sihlose ukwenza isimo esikahle esizovumela ukwesekwa kosomabhizinisi besifazane.

ssw: sesiceceshe emabhizinisi ebantfu besifazane labangetulu kwe-3 400 kute sibalungiselele kusebentisa ematfuba ekutsenga.
zul: sesiqeqeshe amabhizinisi abesifazane angaphezu kwezi-3 400, ukuze siwalungiselele ukusebenzisa amathuba okuhlinzeka ngempahla nezinsizakalo kuhulumeni.

ssw: ngelibandla labomake letemnotfo, sibone tinhlangano tetimboni netinkampani titibophelela ekufezeni imigomo yengucuko yebulili embonini yonkhe.
zul: ngokusebenzisa ingqungquthela yabesifazane yezomnotho, sesibone izinhlangano nezinkampani zemboni zizibophezela ekufinyeleleni emigomweni ebekiwe yoguquko oluphathelene nezobulili embonini yonkana.

ssw: inhlangano yetekutfutfukisa timboni ibeke eceleni imali lelinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi leti-r9 letawutjalwa emabhizinisini ebantfu besifazane.
zul: inhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni seyibeke eceleni imali elinganiselwa kwizigidigidi eziyisi-9 zamarandi ezotshalwa emabhizinisini aholwa ngabesifazane.

ssw: letinye tinhlaka, letifaka ekhatsi inhlangano yahulumende yekutjalwa kwetimali kanye nesikhwama savelonkhe sekuhlomisa ngemandla, nato titibophelele ekusunguleni tinhlelo letinenhloso lekhetsekile tekwesekela emabhizinisi ebesifazane.
zul: ezinye izikhungo, kubandakanya inhlangano yezokutshalwa kwezimali zikahulumeni kanye nesikhwama sikazwelonke sokufukula nokuhlomisa abantu abamnyama, nazo sezizibophezelelile ukuthi zizosungula izinhlelo ezikhethekile ezenzelwe kuphela umsebenzi wokweseka amabhizinisi abesifazane.

ssw: sonkhe kumele sidlale indzima yetfu, njengabantfu ngabanye, tikhungo nebaholi emmangweni wonkhe, kucedza lobugebengu lobubhekiswe kubomake nebantfwana.
zul: sonke kumele sidlale indima yethu, njengomuntu ngamunye, njengezikhungo futhi njengabaholi emphakathini wonkana ukuze siqede lobu bugebengu obubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane.

ssw: kulomnyaka lowendlulile, ngatsi sitawutsatsa tinyatselo letincumako letilwa nenkhohlakalo siphindze futsi sehlukane ngalokucacile nesikhatsi sekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngathi sizothatha izinyathelo ezinqala zokulwisana nenkohlakalo futhi ukuze siphume siphele esikhathini sokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane.

ssw: ikhomishana yetekubanjwa kwahulumende ngabhongwane leholwa lijaji lelikhulu raymond zondo iphotfule umsebenti wayo yaphindze futsi yahambisa incenye yekugcina yembiko wayo ngonhlaba kulomnyaka lophelile.
zul: ikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane ephethwe yinhloko yamajaji u-raymond zondo isiwuphothulile umsebenzi wayo futhi iyithumelile ingxenye yokugcina yombiko wayo ngonhlangulana wonyaka odlule.

ssw: silive, sikweleta lijaji lelikhulu zondo, basebenti bekhomishini kanye nabo bonkhe labo labetfula bufakazi isikweleti lesikhulu kakhulu sekubabonga ngemsebenti wabo longetulu kwalowetayelekile wemmango.
zul: njengezwe, kumele sibonge sinconcoze kwinhloko yamajaji uzondo, abasebenzi bekhomishani kanye nabo bonke labo abethula ubufakazi ngomsebenzi omkhulukazi abawenzela isizwe.

ssw: letincomo tekhomishani tisetjentiswa ngekweluhlelo lengaluletsa ephalamende ngemphala kulomnyaka lophelile kute kutsi kubukwane nebutsakatsaka beluhlelo lobukhonjwe yikhomishini buyalungiswa kute kutsi kubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane kungaphindzi kwenteke.
zul: izincomo zekhomishani ziyaqaliswa ngokohlelo engaluthumela ephalamende ngomfumfu ngonyaka odlule ukuze ukuntengantenga nobuthakathaka obukhona obahlonzwa yikhomishani kubhekwane ngqo nako futhi ukuze singalokothi neze sikuvumele ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso.

ssw: umkhandlu wavelonkhe wetekweluleka ngekumelana nenkhohlakalo, lofaka ekhatsi bantfu labavela kuwo wonke ummango, ume ngemumo kute weluleke ngetindlela letifanele tekucedza inkhohlakalo, lokufaka ekhatsi kulungiswa kabusha kwesakhiwo sesikhungo sekulwa nenkhohlakalo.
zul: umkhandlu kazwelonke wokweluleka mayelana nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, owakhiwe ngabantu abavela emphakathini wonkana, sewusunguliwe ukuze weluleke maqondana nezindlela zokuqeda inkohlakalo, kubandakanya nokulungiswa kabusha ngokuphelele kwesimo sohlaka lokwakheka nokusebenza kwezikhungo ukuze kulwiswane nenkohlakalo.

ssw: sisebentela kuhlomisa luphiko lokuvikelwa kwabofakazi futsi sitawukwetfula sichibelo semtsetfo wekudzalula ngalokuvikelekile, wanga-2000 (umtsetfo we-26 wanga-2000) kanye nemtsetfo wekuvikelwa kwabofakazi, wanga-1998 (umtsetfo we-112 wanga-1998) kute kutsi kuciniswe kuvikeleka kwetinhlabamkhosi.
zul: siyasebenza ngenhloso yokuhlomisa ngezinsiza nokucija uphiko lokuvikelwa kofakazi futhi sizokwethula izichibiyelo emthethweni wokudalula ulwazi ngendlela evikelekile, wezi-2000 (umthetho wama-26 wezi-2000) kanye nomthetho wokuvikelwa kofakazi, we-1998 (umthetho we-112 we-1998) ukuze siqinise ukuvikelwa kwezingede.

ssw: sewuvele ucaliwe umsebenti wekutfutfukisa kufinyelela kuluhlelo lwekuvikelwa kwabofakazi kubasebenti bahulumende labadzalula kuphatsa kabi, inkhohlakalo kanye nekutiphatsa ngalokungafanele.
zul: usuqalile umsebenzi wokwenza ngcono ukufinyelela ohlelweni lokuvikelwa kofakazi kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni abaveza obala izenzo zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, inkohlakalo kanye nokuziphatha okungenaso isimilo nobuqotho.

ssw: sitawuphotfula luhlaka lwemtsetfosivivinyo wekutfolwa kwemphahla kute kutsi kulungiswe lobutsakatsaka lobutfolwe yikhomishini yekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane bese kutfutfukiswa kusebenta kahle, kuhambisana kwemsebenti nemali kanye nekwenta tintfo ngekungafihli lutfo.
zul: sizophothula uhlaka lomthethosivivinywa wokuthengwa kwempahla nezinsizakalo ezidingwa nguhulumeni ukuze silungise ubuthakathaka nokungahanjiswa kwezinto ngendlela okwahlonzwa yikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane futhi senze ngcono ukusebenza, uhulumeni athole imbuyiselomali enhle ngemali ayisebenzisile futhi kusetshenzwe ngendlela evulelekile nesobala.

ssw: ema-ejensi etfu ekucinisekisa kutfotjelwa kwemtsetfo laphindze futsi aciniswa atsatsa tinyatselo atitsatsela tinkampani kanye nebantfu labasolwa ngekuba nesandla ekubanjweni kwembuso ngabhongwane.
zul: izimpiko zethu zokugcina umthetho esezinogqozi nofuqufuqu olusha zithatha izinyathelo ezinqala ezinkampanini nakubantu abasolwa ngokubandakanyeka ekubanjweni kombuso ngobhongwane.

ssw: luphiko lwetekuphenya lwe-npa, lengalisungula nga-2019, selifake basolwa laba-187 enkantolo emacaleni lange-32 ekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane kanye nenkhohlakalo.
zul: uphiko lwezokuphenya amacala lwe-npa, engalusungula ngowezi-2019, selubizele enkantolo abasolwa abayi-187 emacaleni angama-32 okubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kanye nenkohlakalo.

ssw: imali lengetulu kwetigidzi leti-r7 seyibuyiselwe kuhulumende kusukela lephuma emacaleni ekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane.
zul: kuze kube manje iyizigidigidi eziyisi-7 zamarandi imali esibuyiselwe kumbuso evela emacaleni okubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane.

ssw: kute kube ngunyalo, imali letigidzi leti-r12.9 kanye nemphahla ivaliwe.
zul: kuze kube manje, iyizigidigidi eziyi-12.9 zamarandi imali nempahla ebanjiwe.

ssw: kulomnyaka, kutawusungulwa luphiko lwetekuphenya lwalomphelo ngekhatsi kwe-npa.
zul: kulo nyaka, uphiko lwezokuphenya amacala selusungulwe njengesikhungo esizosebenza unomphela ngaphakathi kwe-npa.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika, kute kutsi sizuze noma nguyiphi inchubekelembili ekubukaneni netinsayeya letiphutfumako lesibukene nato, sidzinga umbuso lonelikhono nalosebenta ngemphumelelo.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, ukuze kwenziwe noma iyiphi inqubekela phambili ekusombululeni izinselele eziphuthumayo esibhekene nazo, sidinga umbuso onamandla futhi onekhono lokusebenza kahle.

ssw: butsakatsaka betfu lobukhulu kakhulu busemabhizinisini ahulumende kanye nakuhulumende wasekhaya.
zul: ubuthakathaka bethu obukhulu busemabhizinisini ombuso nakohulumeni basekhaya.

ssw: ema-soe etfu lamanyenti atfwele kamatima ngenca yetikweleti letinkhulu, kungatjalwa kwetimali lokuncane kusakhiwonchanti, imiphumela yekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane kanye nekuswelakala kwemakhono.
zul: iningi lama-soe ethu licwile ezikweletini ezinzima, utshalomali alufakwa kahle kwingqalasizinda, futhi libhekene nemithelela yokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kanye kunokushoda kwamakhono.

ssw: sitawusebentisa tincomo temkhandlu wema-soe wamengameli wekusungula inkampani lephetfwe nguhulumende lelawula emasheya njengencenye yebuninimasheya lobusendzaweni yinye letawucinisekisa kwenganyelwa ngemphumelelo kwema-soe.
zul: sizokuqalisa ukusebenza kwesincomo somkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe sokusungula inkampani ezoba ngumnikazi wamabhizinisi ombuso njengengxenye yohlelo lokubeka amandla obunikazi bomnikazimasheya ezandleni zesikhungo esisodwa oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi wokuqapha ama-soe wenziwa ngendlela efanele.

ssw: ngekuhlukana, sengiyalele lihhovisi lamengameli kanye nemgcinimafa wavelonkhe kutsi basebentisane kute kutsi kulungiswe ematiko, tinhlaka netinhlelo tahulumende eminyakeni lemitsatfu letako.
zul: okunye okuseceleni okwehlukile wukuthi sengiyalele ihhovisi likamongameli kanye nomgcinimafa kazwelonke ukuthi basebenzisane ekuhlelweni kabusha kweminyango, izikhungo kanye nezinhlelo zikahulumeni kule minyaka emithathu ezayo.

ssw: lihhovisi letekugcina emafa lavelonkhe lilinganisela kutsi singazuza konga lokungaba tigidzigidzi letinge-r27 esikhatsini lesisemkhatsini uma singasebentana nemitsetfo leyecela ngale, sivale tinhlelo letingasebenti ngalokuyimphumelelo kanye nekuhlanganisa emabhizinisi lapho kufanele khona.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke ulinganisela ekutheni kungenzeka kongiwe imali eyizigidigidi ezingama-27 zamarandi esikhathini esimaphakathi uma kulungiswa inkinga yamagunya afanayo enziwa ngokungenasidingo yiminyango nezikhungo ezahlukene, kuvalwe nezinhlelo ezingasebenzi kahle futhi kuhlanganiswe izikhungo ezahlukene zibe yisikhungo esisodwa lapho kufanelekile.

ssw: kungasebenti kahle kubohulumende basekhaya kuyachubeka nekuba yindzawo levusa lunako.
zul: ukungaqhubi kahle kohulumeni basekhaya abaningi kusalokhu kuyinto edala ukukhathazeka.

ssw: bomasipala betfu labaningi kakhulu, laba-163 kulabange-257, abasebenti kahle noma basebumatimeni ngenca yekungaphatfwa kahle, kungasebenti kahle futsi ngalesinye sikhatsi kuphatfwa kwetimali nekuphatfwa lokunenkhohlakalo kanye nekungaletfwa kahle kwetinsita.
zul: omasipala bethu abaningi kakhulu, abayi-163 komasipala abangama-257, abasebenzi neze kahle noma basobishini ngenhla yokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, nokungasebenzi kahle futhi kwesinye sikhathi ngenxa yenkohlakalo ekuphathweni kwezimali nokulawulwa kwemisebenzi yomasipala kanye nokungathunyelwa kwezidingongqangi ngendlela efanele.

ssw: hulumende ucale kusebentisa tindlela tekungenelela letinengi tekubhekana nekwehluleka ezingeni kwabohulumende basekhaya kanye nekwenta kancono kwetfulwa kwetinsita letisidzingo letisisekelo.
zul: uhulumeni uqalisa izinhlelo zokungenelela eziningana ngenhloso yokulungisa ukuhluleka okukhona ezingeni lohulumeni basekhaya futhi kwenziwe ngcono nokuhlinzekwa kwezidingongqangi.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kukhuphula emandla ebameleli bemmango netikhulu, kugcina nekutfutfukisa sakhiwonchanti sendzawo, kanye nekucela emandla ahulumende wavelonkhe kutsi angenelele lapho bomasipala behluleka kuhlangabetana netibopho tabo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukuphuculwa kwamandla namakhono okusebenza abameleli bomphakathi kanye nabasebenzi, ukulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda yendawo, kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamandla kahulumeni kazwelonke okungenelela lapho omasipala behluleka ukufezekisa izibopho zabo.

ssw: kusebentela ummango lokuceceshekile, lokunebasebenti labanemakhono, abatinikele nabanesimilo, kubalulekile kute kube nembuso losebentako futsi kucedvwe inkhohlakalo, kusebentisa emandla ngalokungafanele kanye nekumoshwa.
zul: umkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni osebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco, onabasebenzi abanamakhono, abazinikele futhi abanobuqotho, usemqoka kakhulu embusweni osebenza kahle kanye nasekuqedeni inkohlakalo, ukuqasha ngokwenzelela ngokusebenzisa amandla ngokungafanele kanye nokumosha.

ssw: kuphendvula ikhomishini yetekubanjwa kwahulumende ngabhongwane futsi ngekuhambisana neluhlaka lwekwentiwa kwemsebenti wemmango ngebungcweti, kuhlolwa kwebucotfo kutawuba yimfuneko leyimphoco kute kutsi kucashelwe umsebenti wemmango kanye netivivinyo tekungena kutakwetfulwa.
zul: ngenhloso yokusabela nokufezekisa lokho okushiwo yikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane futhi ngokuhambisana nohlaka lokwenziwa komkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni usebenze ngobuchule nobunyoninco, ukuhlolwa kwesimilo nobuqotho kuzoba yisidingo esiphoqelekile uma kuqashwa abasebenzi emkhakheni wezemisebenzi kahulumeni futhi kuzokwethulwa ukuhlolwa kwalabo abagaqele ukungena futhi basebenze kulo mkhakha.

ssw: sichibela umtsetfo futsi sicinisa indzima ledlalwa yikhomishini yetemisebenti yahulumende kute sicinisekise kutsi bantfu labaceceshiwe babekwa etikhundleni tekuphatsa letiphakeme futsi sichubekele ekwakhiweni umtimba munye futsi lobumbene wetemisebenti yahulumende.
zul: sichibiyela imithetho futhi siqinisa indima yekhomishani yezemisebenzi kahulumeni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ngabantu abanezicucu zemfundo nolwazi lomsebenzi olufanelekile abaqashwa ezikhundleni zokuphatha eziphezulu futhi ukuze sikwazi ukuqalisa umsebenzi wokwakha umkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni owodwa futhi osebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile, njengoba-nje sitibophelele ekwenteni ncono timo tenhlalo nemphumelelo yemadvodza nabomake balelive lakitsi znekuchubela embili kuchuma lokwabiwe kubo bonkhe bantfu, kanjalo nekutibophelela kwetfu ekuzuzeni i-afrika lencono kanye nomhlaba loncono.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, njengoba sizibophezele ekwenzeni ngcono isimo senhlalo nempumelelo yabesilisa nabesifazane bakuleli kanye nasekuthuthukiseni ukuchuma komuntu wonke, ngokunjalo futhi sizibophezele nasekufezekiseni i-afrika engcono kanye nomhlaba ongcono.

ssw: sikhatsateke kakhulu ngekundlondlobala kwakamuva kwetincushuncushu emkhatsini we-israel nemapalestine, futsi sicela kutsi kucedvwe kulwa futsi kucalwe kabusha inchubo yekuthula lebambelelekile.
zul: sikhathazeke kakhulu ngokudlondlobala kamuva nje kwengxabano phakathi kwabantu bakwa-israel kanye nabantu base-palestine, futhi siyanxusa ukuthi kuphele ukungqubuzana futhi kuqaliswe kabusha inqubo emileyo njengamanje yokuletha uxolo.

ssw: iningizimu afrika ivakalisa kudzabuka kwayo lokukhulu kuhulumende nakubantfu basetürkiye kulandzela kutamatama kwemhlaba lokudzale umonakalo ekucaleni kwaleliviki.
zul: iningizimu afrika izwakalisa ukuzwelana kwayo okukhulu nohulumeni kanye nabantu base-türkiye kulandela ukuzamazama komhlaba okudale umonakalo omkhulu ngasekuqaleni kwaleli viki.

ssw: silive siyatichenya kakhulu ngemitamo ye-gift of the givers yekusita labo labakhahlanyetwe kutamatama kwemhlaba.
zul: njengezwe siziqhenya kakhulu ngemizamo yenhlangano i-gift of the givers yokusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe wukuzamazama komhlaba.

ssw: sisakhatsateke kakhulu ngencabano lechubekako emkhatsini werussia ne-ukraine futsi sincusa tonkhe tinhlangotsi kutsi tiyekele kulwa futsi tifune sisombululo lesinekutfula ngetingcoco.
zul: sisalokhu sikhathazeke kakhulu ngempi eqhubekayo phakathi kwe-russia ne-ukraine futhi siyabanxusa bonke abathintekayo ukuba babeke phansi izikhali futhi bazame ukuthola isixazululo esinokuthula ngokuthi kuxoxiswane.

ssw: imphumelelo yeningizimu afrika ichumene ngalokungeke kwehlukaniswe naleyo yelivekati letfu, futsi ikakhulukati neyemmango wekutfutfukisa i-afrika leseningizimu.
zul: impumelelo yeningizimu afrika incike kakhulu kuleyo yezwekazi lethu, ikakhulukazi isifunda samazwe angaphansi kwenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika.

ssw: ngenca yelwetfu lutinto kanye nemphumelelo, sibophelelekile kutsi silandzele kungenelela lokutawuletsa kutfula, kutinta nentfutfuko evenikati letfu.
zul: ngenxa yokucabangela uzinzo nokuchuma kwakuleli, sinesibopho sokwenza imizamo yokungenelela ezoletha ukuthula, uzinzo kanye nentuthuko ezwekazini lethu.

ssw: sitawuchubeka nekwandzisa ematfuba etekuhwebelana ekutjalwa kwetimali kanye nebalingani betfu betekuhwebelana bemhlaba futsi sitawubuka kuheha lutjalomali kanye nekusita iningizimu afrika ngetimali ngekudlala kwetfu indzima kutinkhundla temave ngemave njenge-g20, lesitawuyibamba nga-2025.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokwandisa amathuba okuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali namazwe esibambisene nawo kwezohwebo emhlabeni futhi sizozama ukuheha utshalomali kanye nokuxhaswa ngezimali kweningizimu afrika ngokusebenzisa ukubamba iqhaza kwethu kwizigcawu ezibandakanya amazwe ahlukahlukene ezinjenge-g20, okuyisigcawu esizosisingatha ngowezi-2025.

ssw: kulomnyaka iningizimu afrika itsatsa sikhundla sekuba ngusihlalo welicembu lemave lafaka ekhatsi ibrazil, irussia, i-india, ishayina kanye neningizimu afrika.
zul: kulo nyaka iningizimu afrika izophinda futhi iqhoqhobale isikhundla sokuba ngusihlalo wombimbi lwamazwe lwe-brazil, i-russia, i-india, i-china kanye neningizimu afrika.

ssw: kugcila kwetfu kutawuba sekusebentisaneni nentfutfuko lesimeme, lengucuko yetemandla agezi lolunobulungiswa, kutfutfukiswa kwetimboni kanye nokucaliswa kweluhlelo lwetekuhwebelana ngekukhululeka kwelivekati lase-afrika.
zul: sizogxila kubambiswano maqondana nentuthuko esimeme, ukuguqukela emandleni kagesi ohlanzekile ngendlela enobulungiswa nobuqotho, ukusungulwa kwezimboni kanye nokuqaliswa kwendawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini lase-afrika.

ssw: iningizimu afrika, kanye nabomakhelwane betfu enhlanganweni yetemtselo leseningizimu ne-afrika, madvute-nje itawuphotfula siphakamiso setfu setimboni mayelana nendzawo yelivekati lase-afrika yekuhwebelana ngalokukhululekile.
zul: iningizimu afrika, ngokuhlanganyela nomakhelwane bayo kwinhlangano yamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika angakhokhisani intela yezimpahla ezingenayo neziphumayo emingceleni, phecelezi, i-southern african customs union, khona maduze nje izophothula isiphakamiso sethu esiphathelene nezimboni kwindawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini lase-afrika.

ssw: uma sekusebente ngalokugcwele, luhwebelwano lwelivekati lelikhululekile lutawuniketa litfuba lelingakate libonwe lekujulisa kuhlanganisa umnotfo wase-afrika, kukhulisa umnotfo wavelonkhe, futsi kuvulwe imincele netimakethe letinsha tetinkampani taseningizimu afrika bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika, similo sangempela sesive sivetwa ngetikhathi tebumatima.
zul: uma seyisebenza ngokuphelele, indawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini izohlinzeka ngethuba eliyingqayizivele lokuqinisa ukudidiyelwa kwe-afrika kwezomnotho, ukukhuliswa kweminotho yamazwe, kanye nokuvulelwa kwezinkampani zaseningizimu afrika imingcele emisha kanye nezimakethe.

ssw: sive sichazwa ngendlela bantfu baso lababukana ngayo nebumatima lobukhulu - noma ngabe basebenta ndzawonye futsi babukane netinsayeya tabo njengentfo yinye, behlanganiswe yinhloso yinye, noma batinikele etinkingeni letingembi kwabo.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, isimobunjalo soqobo sesizwe sivela obala lapho kubhekenwe nesimo esinzima.

ssw: sisive lesibanjwe tinsayeya tanyalo, kodvwa futsi sisive lesilwela kufeta sitsembiso selikusasa letfu.
zul: isizwe sizibonakalisa ubunjalo baso ngendlela abantu baso ababhekana ngayo nobunzima obukhulu – sizibonakalisa ngokuthi siyakwazi yini ukusebenzisana ngokuhlanganyela futhi sibhekane ngqo nezinselele zaso njengesizwe esisodwa, esibunjaniswe yinhloso efanayo, noma-ke siyisizwe esithi maluju, siphonse ithawula ezinkingeni esibhekene nazo.

ssw: ngesikhatsi sitsatsa tinyatselo tetfu tekucala emgwacweni wentsandvo yelinyenti, saba nembono locacile wekutsi lowo mgwaco utawusiholela kuphi.
zul: thina siyisizwe esimatasa esibhekene nezinselele zesikhathi samanje, kodwa futhi siyisizwe esizabalazela ukufezekisa isithembiso sengomuso lethu.

ssw: sabona live lapho khona bonkhe bantfu bayalingana.
zul: ngenkathi sithatha isinyathelo sokuqala emgwaqeni obheke kwintando yeningi labantu, sabe sinombono ocacile wokuthi uyosiholela kuphi lowo mgwaqo.

ssw: sabona live lapho khona ingcebo yemtfombolusito yetfu itawutfokotelwa ngubo bonkhe.
zul: sabona izwe lapho abantu bonke belingana.

ssw: sabona live lapho khona singahlala ndzawonye ngekutfula, lapho singasebenta ndzawonye kute sakhe kutatisa lokufananako kanye nelikusasa lelihlanganyelwe.
zul: sabona izwe lapho ingcebo yezinsiza zethu ithokozelwa ngumuntu wonke.

ssw: titawusenta kutsi sikwati, ngekusebentisana kanye nangenhloso, kutsi siphume kulenkinga njengesive lesiguculiwe.
zul: sabona izwe lapho singaphila ndawonye ngokuthula, lapho singasebenza ngokubambisana ukwakha ubuzwe bethu obufanayo kanye nengomuso lethu sonke.

ssw: sitawuphuma kulenkinga ngeluhlelo lwagezi lolusebenta kahle kakhulu, lolutsembekile nalolukwati kuncintisana.
zul: isizwe sethu sakhelwe phezu komthethosisekelo oqinisekisa amagugu entando yeningi labantu, okuyisithunzi, ukulingana kanye nenkululeko, kanye namalungelo omunye nomunye wethu sonke.

ssw: sitawuvumbuka nematibuko nemizila yetitimela lephindze futsi ichudzelane nalehamba embili emhlabeni, ngekufinyelela umkhakha lobanti kubantfu labanengi baseningizimu afrika etincenyeni letinyenti telive, kanye nekwesekelwa kwemanti asezingeni lelichubekako.
zul: izinyathelo engikhulume ngazo kafushane kusihlwa nje, ezakhela phezu komsebenzi esesiwenzile kakade, zizosisondeza kulowo mbono.

ssw: sitawemukela tivakashi letinengi eveni letfu, futsi sitfutfukise futsi sihehe emakhono ladzingwa ngumnotfo wetfu.
zul: zizokwenza ukuthi, sisebenze ngokuhlanganyela futhi sisebenze ngenhloso, ukuze siphume kulesi simo esinzima siyisizwe esiguqukile.

ssw: sitawakha imisebenti yalabo labangasebenti, sinikete litsemba kulabo lasebalindze sikhatsi lesidze.
zul: sizophuma kulesi simo esinzima siphethe uhlelo lukagesi olusebenza kahle kakhulu, oluthembakele kakhudlwana futhi oluncintisana kangcono.

ssw: uma sinemamaphoyisa lamanengi emgwacweni, nemaforamu emaphoyisa lasebentako kanye nesiphatsimandla sekushushisa lesisebentako nalesitimele, bantfu bakithi batawukwati kutsembela ekuvikelweni kwembuso.
zul: sizophuma siphethe izikhumulo kanye nezokuthutha ngezitimela ezizophinda futhi zibe sesimweni sokuncintisana nalezo eziphuma phambili emhlabeni, sizophuma siphethe uhlelo lwe-inthanethi olusheshayo okufinyelela kulona abantu baseningizimu afrika abaningi futhi olutholakala ezingxenyeni eziningi zezwe, futhi sizophuma siphethe ukuphakelwa kwamanzi aseqophelweni eliphezulu, atholakala ngaso sonke isikhathi.

ssw: ngekulwa nekwentelwa phasi kwemnotfo kanye nebugebengu lobuhleliwe, sakhiwonchanti setfu sitawuvikeleka kakhudlwana futsi nemabhizinisi atawukwati kusebenta ngekukhululeka.
zul: sizokwamukela izivakashi ezithe xaxa ezweni lethu, futhi sithuthukise siphinde sihehe amakhono adingwa ngumnotho wethu.

ssw: ngekusebentisa luhlelonchubo lwetekuvikeleka lwetenhlalo lolucinisiwe nalolukhulisiwe, bambalwa bantfu labatawuhlala baphuyile futsi ambalwa nemakhaya latawuhlangabetana nendlala.
zul: sizokwakha amathuba omsebenzi kulabo abangasebenzi, futhi sinikeze ithemba kulabo osekuphele isikhathi eside kakhulu belindile.

ssw: sifanele kutsi sitente tonkhe letinto, hhayi-nje kutsi sincobe tinsayeya tetfu letikhona kwanyalo, kepha sivusetele sitsembiso seningizimu afrika.
zul: ngokuthumela amaphoyisa angeziwe emigwaqeni, ngokuba nezinhlangano zomphakathi ezibambisene namaphoyisa ezisebenza kahle kanye nophiko lwezokushushisa olusebenza kahle futhi oluzimele, abantu bakithi bazokwazi ukuthembela ekuvikelweni ngumbuso.

ssw: lesi sitsembiso lesisigcinile etinhlitiyweni nasetentweni tetfu.
zul: ngokulwisana nokucekelwa phansi komnotho ngamabomu kanye nobugebengu obuhleliwe, ingqalasizinda yethu izovikeleka kakhudlwana futhi amabhizinisi azokwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi wawo ngokukhululeka okukhulu.

ssw: “tento tetfu sibantfu baseningizimu labetayelekile tifanele kutsi tikhombise liciniso mbamba laseningizimu afrika lelitawucinisekisa kukholelwa kweluntfu kubulungiswa, licinise kutetsemba kwabo esitfuntini semphefumulo webuntfu, liphindze futsi lisimamise onkhe ematsemba etfu emphilo lenhle kakhulu yawonkhewonkhe.” kwakha ummango lonjalo, kute sincobe bumatima lobukhulu banyalo, sidzinga kusebentisana.
zul: njengoba sihlonipha leli qhawe, masithole ugqozi emazwini awasho emcimbini wokugcotshwa kwakhe ngowe-1994, lapho athi: “ekuhlangabezananeni nenhlekelele yesintu engajwayelekile neze eqhubeke isikhathi eside ngokwedlulele, kumele kuzalwe umphakathi abazoziqhenya ngawo bonke abantu.
